anya-e0804n0:636: Mantha mattha viloḷane. Manthati. Manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca ādāya. Abhimatthati dummedhaṃ vajiraṃvamhamayaṃ maṇiṃ. Sineruṃ matthaṃ katvā.
anya-e0804n0:637: Kuthi puthi luthi hiṃsāsaṃkilesesu. Kunthati. Kuntho, kunthakipillikaṃ. Disvāna patitaṃ sāmaṃ, puttakaṃ paṃsukunthitaṃ. Punthati. Lunthati.
anya-e0804n0:638_0: Nātha yācanopatāpissariyāsīsāsu. Nāthadhātu yācane upatāpe issariye āsīsane cāti
anya-e0804n0:638_1: catūsvatthesu vattati. Tenāhu porāṇā “nāthatīti nātho, veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ āsīsati
anya-e0804n0:638_2: pattheti, parasantānagataṃ vā kilesabyasanaṃ upatāpeti, “sādhu bhikkhave bhikkhu
anya-e0804n0:638_3: kālena kālaṃ attasampattiṃ paccavekkheyyā’tiādinā taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācatīti
anya-e0804n0:638_4: attho, paramena cittissariyena samannāgato sabbasatte vā guṇehi īsati abhibhavatīti
anya-e0804n0:638_5: paramissaro bhagavā ‘nātho’ti vuccatīti nāthatīti nātho”ti. Saddasatthavidū pana
anya-e0804n0:638_6: tesu catūsu atthesu nātha nādha iti dhātudvayaṃ paṭhanti. Attanobhāsattā pana tassa
anya-e0804n0:639_0: Ettha siyā “yadi yācanatthena nāthatīti nātho, evaṃ sante yo koci yācako daliddo,
anya-e0804n0:639_1: so eva nātho siyā. Yo pana ayācako samiddho, so na nāthati na yācatīti anātho siyā”ti?
anya-e0804n0:639_2: Na, nāthasaddo hi yācanatthādīsu pavattamāno lokasaṅketavasena uttamapurisesu nirūḷho,
anya-e0804n0:639_3: bhagavā ca uttamesu sātisayaṃ uttamo, tena taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācatīti nāthasaddassattho
anya-e0804n0:639_4: vutto. Anāthasaddo pana ittarajanesu nirūḷho, so ca kho “na nāthoti anātho. Natthi
anya-e0804n0:639_5: nātho etassāti vā anātho”ti dabbapaṭisedhavasena, na pana “na nāthati na yācatīti
anya-e0804n0:639_6: anātho”ti dhātuatthapaṭisedhavasena. Yo hi aññassa saraṇaṃ gati patiṭṭhā hoti, so
anya-e0804n0:639_7: nātho, yo ca aññassa saraṇaṃ gati patiṭṭhā na hoti, nāpi attano añño saraṇaṃ gati
anya-e0804n0:639_8: patiṭṭhā hoti, so anāthoti vuccati saṅketavasena. Tathā hi “saṅketavacanaṃ saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:639_9: lokasammutikāraṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne “lokanātho
anya-e0804n0:639_10: tuvaṃ eko, saraṇaṃ sabbapāṇina”nti ca “anāthānaṃ bhavaṃ nātho”ti ca –
anya-e0804n0:642_0: Pāḷiyo nidassanāni bhavanti. Yasmā pana sāsane ca loke ca yācako “nātho”ti na vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:642_1: ayācako ca “anātho”ti. Lokassa pana saraṇaṃ “nātho”ti vuccati. Yassa saraṇaṃ na vijjati,
anya-e0804n0:642_2: so “anātho”ti vuccati, tathā samiddho “nātho”ti vuccati, asamiddho “anātho”ti. Tasmā
anya-e0804n0:642_3: paññavatā sabbesu ṭhānesu dhātuatthamattena lokasamaññaṃ anatidhāvitvā yathānurūpaṃ
anya-e0804n0:642_4: attho gahetabbo. Ayañca nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0804n0:644: Satha seṭhille. Sathati. Sathalo hi paribbājo, bhiyyo ākirate rajaṃ. Siṭhilotipi pāḷi dissati. Tadā ṭhikāro muddhajo gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:646_0: Kattha silāghāyaṃ. Katthati, vikatthati. Katthanā, vikatthanā. Tattha katthatīti
anya-e0804n0:646_1: pasaṃsati. Vikatthatīti virūpaṃ katthati abhūtavatthudīpanato. Ettha ca “bahumpi
anya-e0804n0:646_2: so vikattheyya, aññaṃ janapadaṃ gato”ti ca “idhekacco katthī hoti vikatthī, so katthati
anya-e0804n0:646_3: ‘ahamasmi sīlasampannoti vā vattasampannoti vā vikatthatī’ti” ca ādayo payogā.
anya-e0804n0:647: Byatha dukkhabhayacalanesu. Byathati. Bhantā byathitamānasā. Tato kumārābyathitā, sutvā luddassa bhāsitaṃ. Itthetaṃ dvayaṃ calañceva byathañca.
anya-e0804n0:648: Sutha kutha katha hiṃsāyaṃ. Sothati. Kothati. Kathati.
anya-e0804n0:649_0: Patha gatiyaṃ. Pathati. Patho. Pathoti maggo. So duvidho mahājanena padasā paṭipajjitabbo
anya-e0804n0:649_1: pakatimaggo ca paṇḍitehinibbānatthikehi paṭipajjitabbo paṭipadāsaṅkhāto ariyamaggo
anya-e0804n0:649_2: cāti. Tattha pakatimaggo uppannakiccākiccehi janehi pathiyati gacchiyatīti patho,
anya-e0804n0:649_3: paṭipadā pana amatamahāpuraṃ gantukāmehi kulaputtehi saddhāpātheyyaṃ gahetvā pathiyati
anya-e0804n0:649_4: paṭipajjiyatīti patho. Atha vā pātheti kārakaṃ puggalaṃ gameti nibbānaṃ sampāpetīti
anya-e0804n0:649_5: vā patho, paṭipadāyeva. Maggābhidhānaṃ curādigaṇe maggadhātukathanaṭṭhāne kathessāma.
anya-e0804n0:652: Potha pariyāyanabhāve. Pothati. Pothako. Pothetīti ayaṃ curādigaṇepi vattati. Tena “samantā anupariyeyyuṃ, nippothentā catuddisā”ti payogo dissati.
anya-e0804n0:657_0: Dā dāne. Āpubbo gahaṇe. Saddho dānaṃ dadāti deti, sīlaṃ ādadāti ādeti. Imāni suddhakattupadāni
anya-e0804n0:657_1: taddīpakattā. Saddho assaddhaṃ dānaṃ dāpeti, sīlaṃ ādapeti, samādapeti. Ye dhammamevādapayanti
anya-e0804n0:657_2: santo. Imāni kāritapadāni hetukattupadānīti ca vuccanti taddīpakattā. Saddhena dānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:657_3: dīyati, sīlaṃ ādīyati, samādīyati, imāni kammapadāni taddīpakattā. Ayañca dā dāneti
anya-e0804n0:657_4: dhātu sāsanānurūpasutivasena divādigaṇaṃ patvā supanakriyaṃ vadanto “dāyati niddāyati
anya-e0804n0:657_5: niddā”ti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati. Dānamavakhaṇḍanañca vadanto “diyati
anya-e0804n0:657_6: dānaṃ dātta”nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati. Suddhiṃvadanto “dāyati vedāyati
anya-e0804n0:657_7: vodāna”nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati, imasmiṃ pana bhūvādigaṇe dānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:657_8: vadanto āpubbavasena gahaṇañca vadanto “dadāti deti ādadāti ādeti dānaṃ ādāna”nti
anya-e0804n0:657_9: sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati. Tathā kucchitagamanaṃ vadanto “dāti suddāti
anya-e0804n0:657_10: suddo suddī”ti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayatīti ayaṃ viseso daṭṭhabbo. Yathā
anya-e0804n0:657_11: cettha, evamaññatrāpi yathāsambhavaṃ viseso upaparikkhitabbo nayaññūhi.
anya-e0804n0:658_0: Idānissa nāmapadāni tumantādīni brūma. “Dānaṃ, deyyaṃ, dātabbaṃ, brahmadeyyaṃ, dinnaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:658_1: dāyako, dāyikā, dakkhiṇā” iccādīni, “dātuṃ, padātuṃ, dātave, padātave, datvā, datvāna,
anya-e0804n0:658_2: dadātuna, daditvā, daditvāna, dadiya, dajjā, dadiyāna, ādātuṃ, ādāya, ādiya” iccādīni ca yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:659_0: Tattha dānanti dātabbaṃ, dadanti etenāti atthe na deyyadhammo dānacetanā ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:659_1: Kasmā pana tattha dinnasaddoyeva kathiyati, na dattasaddoti? Akathane kāraṇamatthi.
anya-e0804n0:659_2: “Dānaṃ dinna”ntiādīsu hi dinnasaddaṭṭhāne dattasaddo na dissati, tasmā na kathiyati.
anya-e0804n0:661: “Manasā dānaṃ mayā dinnaṃ”, iti dinnapadaṃ viya.
anya-e0804n0:664_0: Tasmā “devadatto”tiādīsu “devena dinno”ti samāsaṃ katvā paṇṇattivacanattā dinnasaddassa
anya-e0804n0:664_1: dattādeso kātabbo sāsanānurūpena. Upari hi “dinnassa datto kvaci paṇṇattiya”nti lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0804n0:664_2: passissatha. Ayameva hi sāsane nīti avilaṅghanīyā. Idaṃ panettha vavatthānaṃ –
anya-e0804n0:675: Ediso pāḷiyaṃ natthi, nayo tasmā na so varo;
anya-e0804n0:685: Koci pana saddasatthavidū garu evaṃ saddaracanamakāsi –
anya-e0804n0:690_0: Ettha ca brahmadattanti idaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāto nayaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ, na pāḷito. Pāḷinayañhipatvā
anya-e0804n0:690_2: bhavitabbaṃ. Tathā hi “bodhisatto ca maddī ca sammodamānā sakkadattiye assame vasiṃsū”ti
anya-e0804n0:690_3: pāḷinayānurūpo aṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati. Tasmā etthevaṃ vadāma –
anya-e0804n0:693: Ayaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā. Atra pana paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇavasena yathārahaṃ padakkamo bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:694_0: Dadāti, dadanti. Dadāsi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma. Dadātu, dadantu. Dadāhi, dadātha.
anya-e0804n0:694_1: Dadāmi, dadāma, dadāmase. Dadeyya, dade, dajjā. Dajjā sappuriso dānaṃ. Dadeyyuṃ,
anya-e0804n0:694_2: dajjuṃ. Pitā mātā ca te dajjuṃ. Dadeyyāsi, dajjāsi, dajjesi iccapi. Dajjāsi abhayaṃ
anya-e0804n0:694_3: mama. Mātaraṃ kena dosena, dajjāsi dakarakkhino. Sīlavantesu dajjesi, dānaṃ maddi
anya-e0804n0:694_4: yathārahaṃ. Dadeyyātha, dajjātha. Dadeyyāmi, dajjāmi, dadeyyāma, dajjāma. Dadetha,
anya-e0804n0:694_5: daderaṃ. Dadetho, dadeyyāvho, dajjāvho. Dadeyyaṃ, dajjaṃ. Neva dajjaṃ mahosadhaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:694_6: Dadeyyāmhe, dajjāmhe. Ayamasmākaṃ khanti. Garūnaṃ pana khanti aññathā bhavati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n0:698: Na hi sabbappakārena, pāḷiyo paṭibhanti no.
anya-e0804n0:699_0: Tattha asmākaṃ khantiyā “dajjā dajja”ntiādīni yyakārasahiteyeva sattamiyā padarūpe
anya-e0804n0:699_1: sijjhanti. “Dajjā sappuriso dāna”nti ettha hi “dajjā idaṃ “dadeyyā”ti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0804n0:699_2: yyakāre pare saralopaṃ katvā tato tiṇṇaṃ byañjanānaṃ saṃyogañca tīsusaññogabyañjanesu
anya-e0804n0:699_3: dvinnaṃ sarūpānamekassa lopañca dyakārasaññogassa ca jakāradvayaṃ katvā tato dīghavasenuccāritabbattā
anya-e0804n0:699_4: animittaṃ dīghabhāvaṃ katvā nipphajjati. Evaṃ sāsanassānurūpo vaṇṇasandhi bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:699_5: Duvidho hi sandhi padasandhi vaṇṇasandhīti. Tesu yattha padacchedo labbhati, so padasandhi.
anya-e0804n0:699_6: Yathā? Tatrāyaṃ. Yattha pana na labbhati, so vaṇṇasandhi. Yathā? Atrajo. Yathā ca
anya-e0804n0:699_7: sugato, yathā ca paddhāni. Evaṃ duvidhesu sandhīsu “dajjā”ti ayaṃ vaṇṇasandhi eva.
anya-e0804n0:701: “Ayaṃ so indako yakkho, dajjā dānaṃ parittakaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:703_0: Dassanato. Ettha hi dajjāti datvāti attho. Idaṃ pana datvāsaddena samānatthaṃ “dadiyya”
anya-e0804n0:703_1: iti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṃ katvā saññogesu sarūpalopañca
anya-e0804n0:703_2: tato dyakārasaññogassa jjakāradvayaṃ dīghattañca katvā nipphajjati.
anya-e0804n0:704_0: Athāparopi rūpanayo bhavati kammani yapaccayavasena. Tathā hi “petānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e0804n0:704_1: dajjā”ti ca “dakkhiṇā dajjā”ti ca dve pāṭhā dissanti. Tattha pacchimassa dajjāti
anya-e0804n0:704_2: dātabbāti attho kammani yapaccayavasena. Idha pana dādhātuto yapaccayaṃ katvā dhātussa
anya-e0804n0:704_3: dvittañca pubbassa rassattañca tato yakāre pare saralopaṃ saññogabhāvañca jjakāradvayañca
anya-e0804n0:704_4: itthiliṅgattā āpaccayādiñca katvā “dajjā”ti nipphajjati. Evaṃ “dajjā dadeyyā”ti ca
anya-e0804n0:704_5: “dajjā dadiyya datvā”ti ca “dajjā dātabbā”ti ca etāni paccekaṃ pariyāyavacanāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:704_6: “Dajjuṃ. Dajjāsi, dajjātha. Dajjāmi, dajjāma. Dajjāvho, dajja”nti etānipi “dadeyyuṃ
anya-e0804n0:704_7: dadeyyāsī”tiādinā padarūpāni patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṃ saññogesu sarūpalopaṃ
anya-e0804n0:704_8: dyakārasamaññogassa jjakāradvayañca katvā nipphajjanti. Etesu dajjāsīti yaṃ rūpaṃ
anya-e0804n0:704_9: tassāvayavassa ākārassa ekāraṃ katvā aparampi “dajjesī”ti rūpaṃ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:705_0: Acinteyyānubhāvassa hi sammāsambuddhassa pāḷinayo acinteyyoyeva hoti, gambhīro dukkhogāḷho,
anya-e0804n0:705_1: na yena kenaci lakkhaṇena sādhetabbo, yathātanti viraciteheva lakkhaṇehi sādhetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:705_2: Tathā hi “khattiyā titthiyā cetiyānī”tiādīsu yakāre pare saralopo bhavati, tena “athetthekasataṃ
anya-e0804n0:705_3: khatyā. Evampi titthyā puthuso vadanti. Ārāmarukkhacetyānī”ti payogā dissanti. Tathā
anya-e0804n0:705_5: ca padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā sahasaddassa hakāralopaṃ, saṃsadde ca niggahītalopaṃ katvā
anya-e0804n0:705_6: sakāragatassa sarassa dīghaṃ katvā yakāre pare saralopaṃ katvā tato thyakārasaññogassa
anya-e0804n0:705_7: cchayugaṃ katvā visabhāgasaññoge eko ekassa sabhāgattamāpajjati. Tena “sākacchati
anya-e0804n0:705_8: taccha”nti rūpāni sijjhanti. Tathā hi “aññamaññaṃ sākacchiṃsu. Kālena dhammasākacchā.
anya-e0804n0:705_9: Bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ. Yathātathiyaṃ viditvāpi dhammaṃ, sammā so loke paribbajeyyā”ti savikapāni
anya-e0804n0:705_11: yakāre pare lopavidhi labbhatiyeva. Vividho hi sāsanānukūlo rūpanipphādanupāyo, upari
anya-e0804n0:705_12: ca etesaṃ sādhanatthaṃ “saralopo yamanarādīsū”tiādīni lakkhaṇāni bhavissanti. Tattha –
anya-e0804n0:708_0: Atridaṃ vattabbaṃ, kiñcāpi aṭṭhakathācariyehi “mātaraṃ tena dosena, dajjāhaṃ dakarakkhino”ti
anya-e0804n0:708_1: ettha dajjanti padassa “dammī”ti vattamānāvasena vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ, tathāpi sattamīpayogoyeva.
anya-e0804n0:708_2: Ācariyā hi “sattamīpayogo aya”nti jānantāpi “kadāci aññe parikappatthampi gaṇheyyu”nti
anya-e0804n0:708_3: āsaṅkāya evaṃ vivaraṇamakaṃsu. Tathā kiñcāpi tehi “anāparādhakammantaṃ, na dajjaṃ
anya-e0804n0:708_4: dakarakkhino”ti ettha na dajjanti padassa “nāhaṃ dakarakkhassa dassāmī”ti bhavissantīvasena
anya-e0804n0:708_5: vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ, tathāpi sattamīpayogoyeva, anāgataṃ pana paṭicca vattabbatthattā
anya-e0804n0:708_6: evaṃ vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ. “Neva dajjaṃ mahosadha”nti ettha pana “na tveva dadeyya”nti
anya-e0804n0:708_7: sattamīpayogavaseneva vivaraṇaṃ katanti. Evaṃ dajjaṃpadassa vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0804n0:709_0: Idāni parokkhādivasena padakkamo kathiyati. “Dada, dadū. Dadū”ti ca idaṃ “nārado
anya-e0804n0:709_1: iti nāmena, kassapo iti maṃ vidū”tiādīsu vidūsaddena samaṃ. Dade, dadittha, dadaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:710_0: Ettha ca daditthoti idaṃ “sañjagghittho mayā saha. Mā kisittho mayā vinā. Mā naṃ
anya-e0804n0:710_1: kalale akkamittho”tiādīsu “sañjagghittho”tiādīhi samaṃ. Iminā nayena sabbattha labbhamānavasena
anya-e0804n0:711_0: Adadā, adadū. Adade, adadattha. Adadaṃ, adadamha. Adadattha, adadatthuṃ. Adadase,
anya-e0804n0:711_1: adadavhaṃ. Adadiṃ adadamhase. Iti anakārapubbampi rūpaṃ gahetabbaṃ “yesaṃ no na dadamhase”ti
anya-e0804n0:712: Adadi, adaduṃ, adadiṃsu. Adado, adadittha. Adadiṃ, adadimhā. Adadā, adadū. Adadase, adadivhaṃ. Adadaṃ, adadimhe. Ajjatanīsahitarūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:714: “Adadisā, dadissā, adadissaṃsu, dadissaṃsu” iccādi ca sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. Kālātipattisahitarūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:715_0: Aparānipi vattamānādisahitarūpāni bhavanti. Deti, denti. Desi, detha. Demi, dammi,
anya-e0804n0:715_1: dema, damma. Detu, dentu. Dehi, detha. Demi, dammi, dema, damma. Attanopadāni appasiddhāni.
anya-e0804n0:715_2: Sattamīnayo ca parokkhānayo ca appasiddho. Hiyuttanīnayo pana ajjatanīnayo ca koci
anya-e0804n0:715_3: koci pasiddho pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā, sakkā ca “adā, adū, ado, ada”ntiādinā yojetuṃ. Tathā
anya-e0804n0:715_4: hi nayo dissati. Adā dānaṃ purindado. Varañceme ado sakka. Brāhmaṇānaṃ adaṃ gajaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:715_5: Adāsime. Adaṃsu te mamokāsaṃ. Adāsiṃ brāhmaṇe tadāti. “Dassati, dassanti” iccādi
anya-e0804n0:715_6: sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. “Adassā, dassā, adassaṃsu, dassaṃsu, dassiṃsu” iccādi ca sabbaṃ neyyaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:716_0: Tathā ādadāti, ādadanti. Ādadāsi, ādadātha. Ādadāmi, ādadāma. Kaccāyanamate “ādatte”ti
anya-e0804n0:716_1: attanopadaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ “ādadātu, ādadeyya” iccādi sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. Ādetu ādeyya iccādi
anya-e0804n0:716_2: yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Evameva ca “dāpeti, ādāpetī”tiādīnipi yathārahaṃ yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:717_0: Dākucchite gamane. Dāti. Suddāti. Suddo, suddī. Tattha suddoti suddātīti suddo, parapothanādiluddācārakammunā
anya-e0804n0:717_1: dārukammādikhuddācārakammunā ca lahuṃ lahuṃ kucchitaṃ gacchatīti attho. Tathā hi
anya-e0804n0:717_2: su iti sīghatthe nipāto, dā iti garahattho dhātu kucchitagativācakattā. Suddassa bhariyā suddī.
anya-e0804n0:718: Du gatiyaṃ. Davati. Dumo. Ettha ca davati gacchati mūlakkhandhasākhāviṭapapattapallavapupphaphalehi vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇātīti dumo.
anya-e0804n0:719: Desodhane. Sodhanaṃ pariyodāpanaṃ. Dāyati. Dāyanaṃ. Yathā gāyati, gāyanaṃ. Dāyituṃ, dāyitvā, dhātāvayavassekārassa āyādeso. “Dātuṃ, datvā” iccapi rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:720_0: Tatra dātunti sodhetuṃ. Datvāti sodhetvāti attho gahetabbo. Tathā hi “bālo abyatto
anya-e0804n0:720_1: nappaṭibalo anuyuñjiyamāno anuyogaṃ dātu”nti ettha dātunti padassa sodhetunti attho.
anya-e0804n0:720_2: Keci “dānattha”nti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Na hi yo parehi anuyuñjiyati, so
anya-e0804n0:720_3: anuyogaṃ deti nāmāti. Tasmā “ācariyassa anuyogaṃ datvā bārāṇasiṃ paccāgacchī”tiādīsupi
anya-e0804n0:720_4: anuyogaṃ datvāti anuyogaṃ sodhetvāti atthoyeva gahetabbo. Tathā hi pubbācariyehi
anya-e0804n0:720_5: “anuyogadāpanattha”nti etasmiṃ padese esoyevattho vibhāvito. Kathaṃ? Anuyogadāpanatthanti
anya-e0804n0:720_6: anuyogaṃ sodhāpetuṃ. Vimaddakkhamañhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto atthato anuyogaṃ sodheti
anya-e0804n0:720_7: nāma, anuyuñjanto ca naṃ sodhāpeti nāmāti. Idampi ca tehi vuttaṃ. Dātunti sodhetuṃ.
anya-e0804n0:720_8: Keci “dānattha”nti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Na hi yo sīhanādaṃ nadati, so eva
anya-e0804n0:720_9: tattha anuyogaṃ detīti. Samantapaṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇa saṃvaṇṇanāyampi pubbācariyehi
anya-e0804n0:720_10: “dānaṃ datvāti taṃ cetanaṃ pariyodāpetvā”ti sodhanattho vutto. Dullabhā ayaṃ nīti
anya-e0804n0:721_0: De pālane. Dīyati. Dānaṃ, uddānaṃ dāyituṃ, dāyitvā. Tattha dānanti duggatito dāyati
anya-e0804n0:721_1: rakkhatīti dānaṃ, dānacetanā. Uddānanti vuttassa atthassa vakkhamānassa vā vippakiṇṇabhāvena
anya-e0804n0:721_2: nassituṃ adatvā uddhaṃ dānaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ uddānaṃ, saṅgahavacananti attho. Atha vā uddānanti
anya-e0804n0:722: Khāda bhakkhane. Khādati. Khādikā, khādanaṃ, aññamaññakhādikā. Pubbaphalakhādikā, khajjaṃ, khādanīyaṃ, khandhā.
anya-e0804n0:723_0: Tattha khajjanti pūvo. Khādanīyanti pūvaphalāphalādi. “Khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā”ti
anya-e0804n0:723_1: visuṃ bhojanīyassa vacanato khādanaṃ nāma khajjassa vā khādanīyassa vā bhakkhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:723_2: Apica hiṃsāpi “khādana”nti vuccati. Jātijarābyādhidukkhādīhi khajjantīti khandhā,
anya-e0804n0:724: Bada theriye. Thirabhāvo theriyaṃ, yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Badati. Badarī, badaraṃ. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:727: Khada dhitihiṃsāsu ca. Theriyāpekkhāya cakāro. Khadati. Khadiro.
anya-e0804n0:728: Gada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Gadati. Āgadanaṃ, tatho āgado etassāti tathāgato. Suṭṭhu gadatīti sugado.
anya-e0804n0:729: Rada vilekhane. Radati. Radano, rado, dāṭhārado. Atra radanoti danto.
anya-e0804n0:730: Nada abyattasadde. Sīho nadati, paṇadati. Nādo, nadī. Pabbatesu vanādīsu nadatīti nadī. Nada i iti dhātudvayavasena pana “nadantī gacchatīti nadī”tipi nibbacanaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:731_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ yā panesā “nada abyattasadde’ti dhātu tumhehi vuttā, sā kiṃniccamabyattasaddeyeva
anya-e0804n0:731_1: vattati, udāhu katthaci viyattiyampi vācāyaṃ vattatī”ti? Niccamabyattasaddeyeva vattatīti.
anya-e0804n0:731_3: abyattasaddo hotu, “sīho viya ayaṃ puriso nadatī”tiādīsu pana manussabhāsāpi abyattasaddo
anya-e0804n0:731_4: siyāti? Tanna viyattāpi samānā manussabhāsā sīho viyāti evaṃ samupekkhāvasena sīhapadatthassāpekkhanato
anya-e0804n0:731_5: nadasaddena niddisiyati, na purisāpekkhanavasena. Yathā hi valāhakūpamāvasena kathitaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:731_6: “kathañca puggalo gajjitā ca vassitā ca hotī”ti pāḷiyaṃ gajjanaṃ vassanañca puggale
anya-e0804n0:731_8: vattabbameva hoti, evameva nibbhayabhāvena sīhanādasadisiyā vācāya niccharaṇato sīho
anya-e0804n0:731_9: viya nadatīti avibhāvitatthavantena nadasaddena manussabhāsāpi niddisitabbā hoti.
anya-e0804n0:732_0: Ettha ca ambaphalūpamādayopi āharitvā dassetabbā. Na hi pakkāmakatādīni puggalesu
anya-e0804n0:732_1: vijjanti, atha kho ambaphalādīsu eva vijjanti, evaṃ santepi bhagavatā aññenākārena
anya-e0804n0:732_2: sadisattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ambaphalūpamādayo vuttā, evameva nadasaddo abyattasaddabhāvena
anya-e0804n0:732_3: tiracchānagatasaddādīsu eva vattabbopi atthantaravibhāvanatthaṃ “sīho viya nadatī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:732_4: manussabhāsāyampi rūḷhiyā vutto, na sabhāvato. Tathā hi sabhāvato nadasaddenapi vassitasaddādīhipi
anya-e0804n0:732_5: manussabhāsā niddisitabbā na hotīti. Yadi evaṃ –
anya-e0804n0:735_0: Ettha kasmā vassitasaddena manussabhāsā niddisiyatīti? Saccaṃ manussabhāsāpi vassitasaddena
anya-e0804n0:735_1: niddiṭṭhā dissati, evaṃ santepi sā “suvijānaṃ siṅgālānaṃ, sakuṇānañca vassita”nti
anya-e0804n0:735_2: vassitasaddavasena payogassa vacanato tadanurūpaṃ niddisituṃ arahatīti mantvā vassitasaddasadisī
anya-e0804n0:735_3: niddiṭṭhā. Na hi “manusso vassatī”tiādinā visuṃ payogā dissanti, “sakuṇo vassati,
anya-e0804n0:735_4: kūjatī”tiādinā pana payogā dissanti, tasmā “saṅgāmaṃ otaritvāna, sīhanādaṃ nadi kuso”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:735_5: viya yathārahaṃ attho gahetabbo. Evaṃ nadadhātu sabhāvato abyattasaddeyeva hoti,
anya-e0804n0:740: Khadda daṃsane. Daṃsanamiha dantasukatakattikā kriyā abhidhīyate. Sabhāvattā dhātuyā sādhanappayogasamavāyī. Khaddati.
anya-e0804n0:741_0: Adi bandhane. Andati. Andu. Andusaddopanettha itthiliṅgo gahetabbo pāḷiyaṃ itthiliṅgappayogadassanato
anya-e0804n0:741_1: “seyyathāpi vāseṭṭha ayaṃ aciravatī nadī pūrā udakassa samatittikā kākapeyyā, atha
anya-e0804n0:741_2: puriso āgaccheyya pāratthiko pāragavesī pāragāmī pāraṃ taritukāmo, so orimatīre daḷhāya
anya-e0804n0:741_3: anduyā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanabandho”ti. Tatra andūti yaṃ kiñci bandhanaṃ vā. “Yathā
anya-e0804n0:741_4: andughare puriso”ti hi vuttaṃ. Bandhanaviseso vā, “andubandhanādīni chinditvā palāyiṃsū”ti
anya-e0804n0:741_5: hi vuttaṃ. Apica andanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena andu viyātipi andu, pañca kāmaguṇā.
anya-e0804n0:741_6: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “ime kho vāseṭṭha pañca kāmaguṇā ariyassa vinaye andūtipi bandhanantipi
anya-e0804n0:741_7: vuccantī”ti. Niggahītāgamavasenāyaṃ dhātu vuttā. Katthaci pana vigataniggahītāgamopi
anya-e0804n0:741_8: hoti, taṃ yathā? “Avijjā bhikkhave pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā anvadeva
anya-e0804n0:741_9: ahirika”nti pāḷi. Ettha anuandati anubandhatīti anvadi. Anvadi eva anvadevāti kitaviggaho
anya-e0804n0:741_10: sandhiviggaho ca veditabbo. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anvadevāti anubandhamānamevā”ti
anya-e0804n0:741_11: vuttaṃ, taṃ avijjamahirikaṃ anubandhamānameva hotīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:743: Ettha indoti adhipatibhūto yo koci. So hi indati paresu issariyaṃ pāpuṇātīti indoti vuccati. Apica indoti sakko. Sakkassa hi anekāni nāmāni –
anya-e0804n0:751: Evaṃ anekāni nāmāni. Ekopi hi attho anekasaddappavattinimittatāya anekanāmo. Tenāha bhagavā –
anya-e0804n0:752_0: Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno magho nāma māṇavo ahosi, tasmā
anya-e0804n0:752_1: “maghavā”ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno pure dānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:752_2: adāsi, tasmā “purindado”ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno
anya-e0804n0:752_3: sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ adāsi, tasmā “sakko”ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto
anya-e0804n0:752_4: samāno āvāsaṃ adāsi, tasmā “vāsavo”ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo sahassaṃ
anya-e0804n0:752_5: atthānaṃ muhuttena cinteti, tasmā “sahassakkho”ti vuccati. Sakkassa mahāli devānamindassa
anya-e0804n0:752_6: sujā nāma asurakaññā pajāpati, tasmā “sujampatī”ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo
anya-e0804n0:752_7: devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāreti, tasmā “devānamindo”ti vuccatīti.
anya-e0804n0:754_0: Tathā hi yena pavattinimittena tāvatiṃsādhipatimhi indasaddo pavatto, na tena tattha
anya-e0804n0:754_1: sakkādisaddā pavattā, atha kho aññena. Tathā yena sammādiṭṭhiyaṃ paññāsaddo pavatto,
anya-e0804n0:754_2: na tena tattha vijjādisaddā. Yena sampayuttadhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamabhāvena uppannadhammasmiṃ
anya-e0804n0:754_3: cittasaddo pavatto, na tena tattha viññāṇādisaddā. Na hi vinā kenaci pavattinimittena
anya-e0804n0:754_4: saddo pavattatīti. Ekopi attho sammutyattho ca paramattho ca anekasaddappavttinimittatāya
anya-e0804n0:755_0: Ettha siyā “nāmānīti vadatha, kiṃ nāmaṃ nāmā”ti. Vuccate – īdise ṭhāne atthesu saddappavattinimittaṃ
anya-e0804n0:755_1: “nāma”nti gahitaṃ, yaṃ “liṅga”ntipi vuccati. Tathā hi “nāma”nti ca “liṅga”nti ca
anya-e0804n0:755_2: saddopi vuccati, “aññaṃ sobhanaṃ nāmaṃ pariyesissāmi. Liṅgañca nippajjate”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:755_4: vuccati “nāmagottaṃ na jīrati. Sataliṅgo”tiādīsu viya. Iti nāmasaddenapi liṅgasaddenapi
anya-e0804n0:755_5: saddappavattinimittassa kathanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saddappavattinimittañca nāma lokasaṅketasiddho
anya-e0804n0:755_6: taṃtaṃvacanatthaniyato sāmaññākāravisesoti gahetabbaṃ. So evaṃbhūtoyeva sāmaññākāraviseso
anya-e0804n0:755_7: nāma paññattīti pubbācariyā vadanti. So hi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe saddaṃ nāmeti tassa
anya-e0804n0:755_8: tassa atthassa nāmasaññaṃ karotīti nāmaṃ, pakārehi ñāpanato paññatti ca. Saviññattivikārassa
anya-e0804n0:755_9: pana saddassa sammutiparamatthasaccānaṃ pakārehi ñāpanato paññattibhāve vattabbameva
anya-e0804n0:755_10: natthi. Saddasseva hi ekantena paññattibhāvo icchitabbo “niruttipaṭisambhidā parittārammaṇā”ti
anya-e0804n0:755_12: ca pāḷidassanato. Idha pana saddappavattinimittādhikārattā nāmavasena attho pakāsito.
anya-e0804n0:755_13: Evaṃ anekavidhassa sāmaññākāravisesoti pubbācariyehi gahitassa nāmapaññattisaṅkhātassa
anya-e0804n0:755_14: saddappavattinimittassa vasena ekopi ñeyyattho anekaliṅgoti gahetabbo. Tenāha āyasmā
anya-e0804n0:758: Evaṃ sabbābhidhānesupi iminā nayena yathārahaṃ attho vibhāvetabbo nayaññūhi.
anya-e0804n0:759: Vidi avayave. Vindati. Yadi abhidhānamatthi, “vindo”ti dissati. Yathā kaṇḍati. Kaṇḍo.
anya-e0804n0:760: Khidi avayaveti candaviduno vadanti. Tesaṃ mate “khindatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:761: Nidi kucchāyaṃ. Kucchāsaddo garahattho. Nindati. Nindā.
anya-e0804n0:765: Avaṇṇo aguṇo nindā, garahā ayasopi ca;
anya-e0804n0:766: Asiloko akitti ca, asilāghā ca atthuti.
anya-e0804n0:767_0: Nanda samiddhiyaṃ. Akammikā dhātu. Nandati puttehi puttimā. Nandāya nuna maraṇena.
anya-e0804n0:767_1: Nandasi sirivāhana. Nandanaṃ vanaṃ. Abhisaddayoge panāyaṃ sakammakopi. Abhinandanti
anya-e0804n0:768: Sirīva rūpiniṃ disvā, nanditaṃ āsi taṃ kulaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:769: Tena nandāti me nāmaṃ, sundaraṃ pavaraṃ ahu.
anya-e0804n0:770: Rammaṃ veḷuvanaṃ yena, na diṭṭhaṃ sugatālayaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:771: Na tena nandanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, iti maññe mahesayaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:774: Cadi hilādane dittiyañca. Hilādanaṃ sukhanaṃ. Ditti sobhā. Candati. Candano, cando.
anya-e0804n0:775_0: Ettha ca candanassapi anekāni nāmāni – candanaṃ, gandhasāro, malayajo, suvaṇṇacandanaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:775_1: haricandanaṃ, rattacandanaṃ, gosītacandanaṃ. Candayati hilādayati sītaguṇasamaṅgitāya
anya-e0804n0:775_2: sattānaṃ paliḷāhaṃ vūpasamentaṃ sukhaṃ uppādetīti candanaṃ. Candoti somo, sopi candayati
anya-e0804n0:775_3: hilādayati sītaguṇasampattiyā attano pabhāya sattānaṃ pariḷāhaṃ vūpasamento sukhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:775_4: uppādetīti candoti vuccati. Atha vā candati dibbati siriyā virocatīti cando. Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0804n0:775_5: pana “chandaṃ janetīti cando”ti vuttaṃ. Tassāpi anekāni nāmāni –
anya-e0804n0:776: Cando nakkhattarājā ca, indu somo nisākaro;
anya-e0804n0:777: Candimā mā nisānātho, osadhī so nisāpati.
anya-e0804n0:778: Uḷurājā sasaṅko ca, himaraṃsi sasīpi ca;
anya-e0804n0:781: Sudhaṃ sudhi dhūpi yūpa-rasmi ceva khamākaro;
anya-e0804n0:782: Nakkhatteso ca rajanī-karo subbhaṃsu eva ca.
anya-e0804n0:784: Kadi kaladi avhāne rodane ca. Kandati, pakkandati. Pakkanduṃ, kandanto, kalandako.
anya-e0804n0:787: Khanda gatisosanesu. Khandati. Khando. Khando nāma eko devo, yo “kumāro sattidharo”ti ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:789: Sidi sītiye. Sītiyaṃ sītibhāvo. Sindati. Sosindo, sotatto.
anya-e0804n0:790: Vanda abhivādanathutīsu. Vandati, abhivandati. Abhivandanā, vandanaṃ, vandako.
anya-e0804n0:791: Ettha pana vandatīti padassa namassati thometi vāti attho. Tathā hi suttantaṭīkākāro “vandeti vandāmi thomemi vā”ti āha.
anya-e0804n0:792: Bhadi kallāṇe sokhiye ca. Kallāṇaṃ kalyāṇaṃ, sokhiyaṃ sukhino bhāvo, sukhamiccevattho. Bhandati. Bhandako, bhaddo, bhadro.
anya-e0804n0:794_0: Ettha pana mandoti aññāṇīpi bāladārakopi vuccati. Tattha aññāṇī mandati aññāṇabhāvena
anya-e0804n0:794_1: appasaṃsitabbampi puggalaṃ thometīti mando. Mandati amoditabbaṭṭhānepi modatīti mando.
anya-e0804n0:794_2: Mandati dānasīlādipuññakriyāsu pamajjatīti mando. Mandati attano ca paresañca hitāhitaṃ
anya-e0804n0:794_3: acintento khādanīyabhojanīyādīhi attano kāyaṃ sañjātamedaṃ kurumāno supatīti mando.
anya-e0804n0:794_4: Mandati ayuttaṃ paresaṃ kriyaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanena gacchati gaṇhātīti mando. Atha
anya-e0804n0:794_5: vā mandati punappunaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena gabbhaṃ gacchatīti mando. Vuttañhi
anya-e0804n0:794_6: bhagavatā “punappunaṃ gabbhamupeti mando”ti. Bāladārako pana mandati yuttāyuttamajānanto
anya-e0804n0:794_7: uttānaseyyaṃparivattanaseyyaṃ vā supatīti mando. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n0:798: Idaṃ dadāma te nātha, saraṇaṃ hohi nāyakā”ti
anya-e0804n0:799_0: Vuttaṃ, iti uttānasayanato paṭṭhāya yāva mandadasakaṃ, tāva “mando”ti “dārako”ti
anya-e0804n0:799_1: daṭṭhabbo. Appatthavācakopi pana mandasaddo hoti, so pāṭipadikattā idha nādhippeto,
anya-e0804n0:799_2: atha vā mandati appabhāvena gacchati pavattatīti nipphannapāṭipadikavasenapi gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:800: Muda hāse. Hasanaṃ hāso tuṭṭhi. Modati, pamodati. Sammodati. Sammodako. Sammodamānā gacchanti muditā. Mudā.
anya-e0804n0:801: Hada karīsossagge. Karīsossaggo nāma karīsassa ossajjanaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Hadati. Uhadati. Hadano.
anya-e0804n0:802_0: Ettha ca “yesaṃ no santhate dārakā uhadantipi ummihantipī”ti ayaṃ pāḷi nidassanaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:802_1: tatra uhadantipīti vaccampi karonti. Ummihantipīti passāvampi karonti. Pacchimapadassattho
anya-e0804n0:802_2: miha secaneti dhātuvasena daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṃ pana curādigaṇepi vattati dvigaṇikattā.
anya-e0804n0:802_3: Imasmiñhi ṭhāne “mutteti ohadeti cā”ti cariyāpiṭakapāḷippadeso nidassanaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0804n0:802_4: muttetīti passāvaṃ karoti. Ohadetīti karīsaṃ vissajjeti.
anya-e0804n0:803: Uda mode kīḷāyañca. Udati. Udānaṃ. Udaggo.
anya-e0804n0:804_0: Tattha udānanti kenaṭṭhena udānaṃ? Udānanaṭṭhena. Kimidaṃ udānanaṃ nāma? Pībhivegasamuṭṭhāpito
anya-e0804n0:804_1: udāhāro. Yathā hi yaṃ telādi minitabbavatthu mānaṃgahetuṃ na sakkoti, vissanditvā
anya-e0804n0:804_2: gacchati, taṃ “avaseko”ti vuccati. Yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, ajjhottharitvā
anya-e0804n0:804_3: gacchati, taṃ “ogho”ti vuccati, evameva yaṃ pītivegasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ vitakkavipphāraṃ
anya-e0804n0:804_4: hadayaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti, so adhiko hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā vacīdvārena nikkhamanto
anya-e0804n0:805: Kuda khuda guda kīḷāyameva. Kodati. Khodati. Godati.
anya-e0804n0:806: Sūda paggharaṇe. Sūdati. Suttaṃ. Sūdo. Rañño sūdā mahānase.
anya-e0804n0:807_0: Ettha ca suttanti sūdati dhenu viya khīraṃ atthe paggharāpetīti suttaṃ, tepiṭakaṃ
anya-e0804n0:807_1: buddhavacanaṃ. Sakammikadhātuttā pana “paggharāpetī”ti kāritavasena attho kathetuṃ
anya-e0804n0:807_2: labbhati. Tathā hi “karotī”ti padassa “nipphādetī”ti attho kathetuṃ labbhati. Sūdoti
anya-e0804n0:807_3: bhattakāro. Yo “āḷāriko, odaniko, sūpakāro, rasako”ti ca vuccati. Sūdati “evañcevañca
anya-e0804n0:807_4: kate khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sugandhaṃ manāpaṃ surasañca bhavissatī”ti randhanakriyāya
anya-e0804n0:809: Hilādi sukhe ca. Cakāro pubbatthāpekkhako. Hilādati. Hilādanaṃ, hilādo, mettāsahāyakatasattamahāhilādo.
anya-e0804n0:811: Mida snehe. Sneho nāma vasāsaṅkhāto sneho pītisnehoti duvidho. Idha pana vasāsaṅkhāto sneho adhippeto, medati medo.
anya-e0804n0:812_0: Ettha ca medatīti medasahito bhavati ayaṃ purisoti attho. Medo nāma thūlassa sakalasarīraṃ
anya-e0804n0:812_1: pharitvā kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito patthinnasineho, so vaṇṇena haliddivaṇṇo
anya-e0804n0:812_2: hoti. Kārite “medeti medayatī”ti rūpāni. Tathā hi “te imaṃ kāyaṃ balaṃ gāhenti nāma
anya-e0804n0:812_3: brūhenti nāma medenti nāmā”ti pāḷi dissati. Tattha medentīti sañjātamedaṃ karontīti
anya-e0804n0:812_4: attho. Imissā pana dhātuyā divādigaṇaṃ pattāya pītisinehatthe “mejjatī”ti suddhakatturūpaṃ
anya-e0804n0:812_5: bhavati. Curādigaṇaṃ pana pattāya “medeti medayatī”ti suddhakatturūpāni bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:814: Sanda pasavane. Pasavanaṃ sandanaṃ avicchedappavatti. Sandati udakaṃ. Mahanto puññābhisando.
anya-e0804n0:815: Ettha ca puññābhisandoti puññappavāho, puññanadītipi vattuṃ yujjati.
anya-e0804n0:816: Madda maddane. Maddabhi, pamaddati. Mārasenappamaddano. Kaṇṭakaṃ maddati.
anya-e0804n0:821_0: Sīda visaraṇagatyāvasānesu. Visaraṇaṃ vippharaṇaṃ. Gatyāvasānaṃ gamanassa avasānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:821_1: osānaṃ abhāvakaraṇaṃ, nisīdananti attho. Sīdati, lābūni sīdanti. Saṃsīdati, osīdati,
anya-e0804n0:821_2: pasīdati, vippasīdati. Pasādo. Pasanno. Vippasanno. Pasādako. Pasādito. Pāsādo. Osīdāpako.
anya-e0804n0:821_3: Kusīto. Āsīno. Nisinno. Nisinnako. Sannisīvesu pakkhisu. Nisīdanaṃ, nisinnaṃ. Nisajjā.
anya-e0804n0:821_4: Gonisādo, upanisā. Sīdeti. Sīdayati. Sīdāpeti. Sīdāpayati. Pasādeti. Nisīdituṃ. Nisīdāpetuṃ,
anya-e0804n0:821_5: nisādetuṃ, nisīdāpeti, nisīdāpetvā. Ucchaṅge maṃ nisādetvā, pitā atthānusāsati. Nisīditvātipi
anya-e0804n0:821_6: pāṭho. Nisīditvā. Nisīditvāna. Nisīdituna. Nisīdiya. Nisīdiyāna. Saṃsīditvā. Avasīditvā. Osīditvā.
anya-e0804n0:822_0: Tattha kusītoti vīriyenādhigantabbassa atthassa alābhato kucchitenākārena sīdatīti
anya-e0804n0:822_1: kusīto. Atha vā sayampi kucchitenākārena sīdati aññepi sīdāpeti taṃ nissāya aññesaṃ
anya-e0804n0:822_2: sīdanassa sambhavatoti kusīto. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
anya-e0804n0:825_0: Kusītoti cettha dassa tattaṃ “sugato”ti ettha viya “satasmīti hotī”ti ettha viya
anya-e0804n0:825_1: ca. Tathā hi sīdatīti sataṃ, aniccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Iminā ucchedadiṭṭhi vuttā.
anya-e0804n0:825_2: Sataiti cettha avibhattiko niddeso. Sannisīvesūti parissamavinodanatthaṃ sabbaso
anya-e0804n0:825_3: nisīdantesu, vissamamānesūti attho, dakārassa vakāraṃ katvā niddeso. Nisīdananti
anya-e0804n0:825_4: nisīdanakriyā. Mañcapīṭhādikaṃ vā āsanaṃ. Tañhi nisīdanti etthāti nisīdananti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:825_5: Nisinnanti nisīdanakriyā eva. Ettha pana “gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite
anya-e0804n0:825_6: tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti. Mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho maññe tayā nisinnanti kukkuccaṃ
anya-e0804n0:825_7: upadahatītiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo. Ettha hi gamanaṃ gabhaṃ, ṭhānaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:825_8: nisīdanaṃ nisannaṃ, supanaṃ suttaṃ, jāgaraṇaṃ jāgaritaṃ, bhāsanaṃ bhāsitanti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:825_9: Nisajjāti nisīdanā. Gonisādoti gonisajjanā. Upanisāti upanisīdati phalaṃ etthāti
anya-e0804n0:825_10: upanisā, kāraṇaṃ. Nisādetunti nisīdāpetuṃ. Nisādetvāti nisīdāpetvā.
anya-e0804n0:826: Bhāve napuṃsako ñeyyo, nisinnanti ravo pana;
anya-e0804n0:830: Nida neda kucchāsannikarisesu. Kucchā garahā. Sannikarisaṃ vohāraviseso. Nidati. Nedati.
anya-e0804n0:831: Bundi nisāne. Nisānaṃ tejanaṃ tikkhatā. Bundati. Bondi.
anya-e0804n0:832_0: Ettha ca bondīti sarīraṃ. Tañhi bundāni tikkhāni pisuṇapharusavācādīni vā paññāvīriyādīni
anya-e0804n0:832_1: vā ettha santīti bondīti vuccati, saññogaparattepi ukārassokārādeso, pāpakalyāṇajanavasenesa
anya-e0804n0:833: “Nāhaṃ puna na ca puna, na cāpi apunappunaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:836: Kāyo dehaṃ sarīrañca, vapu bimbañca viggahaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:837: Bondi gattaṃ tanu ceva, attabhāvo tathūpadhi;
anya-e0804n0:839_0: Vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Vadati, vajjati. Vadeti, ovadati, ovadeti, paṭivadati. Abhivadati,
anya-e0804n0:839_1: anuvadati, upavadati, apavadati. Nivadati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni. Tattha “vajjantu
anya-e0804n0:839_2: bhonto amma”nti pāḷidassanato vajjatīti padaṃ vuttaṃ. Keci pana garū “vajjetī”ti
anya-e0804n0:839_3: rūpaṃ icchanti, taṃ upaparikkhitvā yuttañce gahetabbaṃ, “upāsako bhikkhuṃ vadeti.
anya-e0804n0:839_4: Tena yogena janakāyaṃ, ovadeti mahāmunī”ti ca dassanato vadeti ovadetīti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:840: Ovādeti, vādayati, vādāpeti, vādāpayati. Vajjento, vajjayanto, imāni hetukattupadāni.
anya-e0804n0:841_0: Kamme “vadiyati, ovadiyati, vajjiyati. Vadiyamāno, vajjamāno, ovadiyamāno, ovajjamāno
anya-e0804n0:841_1: na karoti sāsanaṃ” iccādīni bhavanti. “Vādo, ovādo, paṭivādo, pavādo, abhivādanaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:841_2: anuvādo, upavādo, apavādo, vivādo, nivādanaṃ, vajjaṃ, vadanaṃ” iccevamādīni nāmikapadāni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:842: “Vadituṃ, vaditvā, vivaditvā” iccevamādīni ca tumantādīni padāni.
anya-e0804n0:843_0: Tattha vādoti kathā. Vaditabbaṃ vattabbanti vajjaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Vacanaṃ. Etena saccavajjena,
anya-e0804n0:843_1: samaṅginī sāmikena homīti ettha hi vacanaṃ “vajja”nti vuccati. Vadanti etenāti vadanaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:844: Vadanaṃ lapanaṃ tuṇḍaṃ, mukha massañca ānanaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:846: Tatra vadatīti pitā puttaṃ vadati. Apica vadatīti bherī vadati, nādaṃ muñcatīti attho. Esa nayo vajjatīti etthāpi.
anya-e0804n0:847: Tatrāyaṃ padamālā, vadati, vadanti. Vadasi, vadatha. Vadāmi, vadāma. Vadate, vadante. Vadase, vadavhe. Vade, vadamhe.
anya-e0804n0:848: Vadatu, vadantu. Vadāhi, vada, vadatha. Vadāmi, vadāma. Vadataṃ, vadantaṃ. Vadassu, vadavho. Vade, vadāmase.
anya-e0804n0:849: Vajjati, vajjanti. Vajjasi, vajjatha. Vajjāmi, vajjāma. Vajjate, vajjante. Vajjase, vajjavhe. Vajje, vajjamhe.
anya-e0804n0:850_0: Vajjatu, vajjantu. Vajjāhi, vajja, vajjatha. Vajjāmi, vajjāma. Vajjataṃ, vajjantaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:850_1: Vajjassu, vajjavho. Vajje, vajjāmhase. Imā dve padamālā vadadhātussa vajjādesavasena
anya-e0804n0:850_2: vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atrāyaṃ sukhumatthavinicchayo, “mānussakā ca dibbā ca, tūriyā
anya-e0804n0:850_3: vajjanti tāvade”ti pāḷi. Ettha vajjantīti idaṃ suddhakattupadaṃ taddīpakattā. Kiṃ viya?
anya-e0804n0:852: Nadantu bheī sannaddhā, vaggū vadantu dundubhī”ti
anya-e0804n0:853_0: Ettha “udīrayantu vadantu”ādīni viya. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vajjantīti vajjiṃsūti
anya-e0804n0:853_1: atītavacane vattamānavacanaṃ veditabba”nti suddhakattuvasena vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ, tasmā
anya-e0804n0:854: “Saṅkhā ca paṇavā ceva, athopi diṇḍimā bahū;
anya-e0804n0:856_0: Ettha pana vajjantīti hetukattupadaṃ taddīpakattā. Tañca kho vaṇṇasandhivisayattā
anya-e0804n0:856_1: vādayantīti kāritapadarūpena siddhaṃ. Tathā hi “vādayantī”ti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0804n0:856_2: yakāre pare saralopo kato, dyakārasaññogassa jjakāradvayaṃ pubbakkharassa rassattañca
anya-e0804n0:856_3: bhavati. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vajjantīti vādayantī”ti hetukattuvasena vivaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:856_4: Tathā hi “devatā nabhe accherakaṃ bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā antalikkhe etāni
anya-e0804n0:856_5: saṅkhapaṇavādīni tūriyāni vādayantī”ti hetukattuvasena attho gahetabbo bhavati, tasmā
anya-e0804n0:856_6: īdisesu ṭhānesu vadassa vajjādeso na bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:857_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ “antalikkhamhi vajjanti, disvānaccherakaṃ nabhe”ti etthāpi “vajjantī”ti
anya-e0804n0:857_1: padaṃ suddhakattupadameva, na hetukattupadaṃ “vajjantīti vādayantī”ti vivaraṇe katepi,
anya-e0804n0:857_2: tathā hi “ye kecime diṭṭhiparibbasānā, “idameva sacca’nti vivādayantī”ti ca “evampi
anya-e0804n0:857_3: viggayha vivādayantī”ti ca evamādīsu vadantipadena samānatthaṃ “vādayantī”ti padañca
anya-e0804n0:857_4: sāsane diṭṭha”nti? Tanna, “disvā”ti dassanakriyāvacanato. Na hi saṅkhapaṇavādīnaṃ
anya-e0804n0:857_5: pāṭihāriyādidassanaṃ upapajjati dassanacittassa abhāvatoti. Saccaṃ, tathāpi –
anya-e0804n0:860: Ettha viya upacaritattā upapajjateva dassanavacanaṃ. Tasmā “vajjantīti vādayantī”ti vivaraṇaṃ suddhakattuvasena katanti? Tanna, heṭṭhā –
anya-e0804n0:863_0: Iminnā gāthāya “vādentīti vādayanti devatā”ti sapāṭhasesassa atthavivaraṇassa hetukattuvasena
anya-e0804n0:863_1: katattā. Athāpi vadeyyuṃ “saṅkhā ca paṇavā ceva, athopi diṇḍimā bahū’ti paccattavacanavasena
anya-e0804n0:863_2: vuttattā vajjantīti padaṃ kammavācakapada”nti ce? Tampi na, kammavasena vivaraṇassa
anya-e0804n0:863_3: akatattā, kattuvasena pana katattāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:864_0: Ayamettha vinicchayo veditabbo. Dvigaṇiko vadadhātu bhūvādigaṇiko ca curādigaṇiko
anya-e0804n0:864_1: ca. So hi bhūvādigaṇe vattanto “vadati vajjatī”ti suddhakatturūpāni janetvā “vādeti,
anya-e0804n0:864_2: vādayati, vādāpeti, vādāpayatī”ti cattāri hetukatturūpāni janeti, curādigaṇe pana
anya-e0804n0:864_3: “vādeti, vādayatī”ti suddhakatturūpāni janetvā “vādāpeti, vādāpayatī”ti ca dve hetukatturūpāni
anya-e0804n0:864_4: janeti, tasmā sāsane “vādenti vādayantī”ti suddhakattupadāni dissanti. “Vadeyya,
anya-e0804n0:864_5: vadeyyuṃ” iccādi sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. “Vajjeyya, vajjeyyuṃ” iccādi ca sabbaṃ neyyaṃ vajjādesavasena.
anya-e0804n0:865_0: Atha vā vadeyya, vadeyyuṃ, vajjuṃ. Pitā mātā ca te dajjunti padamiva. Ettha ca “vajjuṃ
anya-e0804n0:865_1: vā te na vā vajjuṃ, natthi nāsāya rūhanā”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Vadeyyuṃ vāna vadeyyuṃvāti
anya-e0804n0:865_2: attho. Vadeyyāsi, vajjāsi, vajjesi iccapi. Vutto vajjāsi vandanaṃ. Vajjesi kho tvaṃ
anya-e0804n0:865_3: vāmūraṃ. Vadeyyātha, vajjātha. Ammaṃ arogaṃ vajjātha. Vadeyyāmi, vajjāmi, vadeyyāma,
anya-e0804n0:865_4: vajjāma. Vadetha, vaderaṃ. Vadetho, vadeyyāvho, vajjāvho. Vadeyyaṃ, vajjaṃ, vadeyyāmhe,
anya-e0804n0:865_5: vajjāmhe. Pubbe viya idhāpi yakāre pare saralopo daṭṭhabbo. Aññānipi upaparikkhitvā gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:866_0: Idāni parokkhādirūpāni kathayāma. Vada, pāvada, yathā babhuva. Dakāralope “pāva”
anya-e0804n0:866_1: itipi rūpaṃ bhavati, “paṭipaṃ vadehi bhaddante”ti ettha “paṭipa”nti padaṃ viya. Tathā
anya-e0804n0:866_2: hi “yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāva” iti pāḷi dissati. Ettha pasaddo upasaggo dīghaṃ katvā
anya-e0804n0:866_3: vutto “pāvadati pāvacana”ntiādīsu viya, pāvāti ca idaṃ atītavacanaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0804n0:866_4: pana atītavacanaṃ idanti jānantopi garu vattamānavacanavasena “pāvāti vadatī”ti vivaraṇamakāsi
anya-e0804n0:867_0: Āyasmāpi ca sāriputto niddese “yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāvā”ti padaṃ nikkhipitvā ātumā
anya-e0804n0:867_1: vuccati attā, sayameva pāvāti sayameva attānaṃ pāvadati, “ahamasmi sīlasampanno”ti
anya-e0804n0:867_2: vā “vatasampanno”ti vāti vattamānavacanena atthaṃ niddisi. Atha vā pāvāti idaṃ na
anya-e0804n0:867_3: kevalaṃ vadadhātuvaseneva nipphannaṃ, atha kho udhātuvasenapi. Tathā hi idaṃ papubbassa
anya-e0804n0:867_4: usadde iti dhātussa payoge ukārassa okārādesaṃ katvā tato parokkhābhūte akāre pare
anya-e0804n0:867_5: okārassa āvādesaṃ tato ca sandhikiccaṃ katvā sijjhati, tasmā udhātussa vadadhātuyā
anya-e0804n0:867_6: samānatthattā tannipphannarūpassa ca vadadhātuyā nipphannarūpena samānarūpattā “sayameva
anya-e0804n0:868_0: Idāni vicchinnā padamālā ghaṭīyati. Vada, vaduṃ. Vade, vadittha, vadaṃ, vadimha.
anya-e0804n0:868_1: Vadittha, vadire. Vadittho, vadivho. Vadiṃ, vadimhe. Pāvada, pāva iccapi. Pāvadu.
anya-e0804n0:868_2: Pāvade, pāvadittha. Pāvadaṃ, pāvadimha. Pāvadittha, pāvadire. Pāvadittho, pāvadivho.
anya-e0804n0:868_3: Pāvadiṃ, pāvadimhe. Tathā “vajja, vajju” iccādīni parokkhārūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:870: “Avadi, vadi, avaduṃ, vaduṃ, avadiṃsu, vadiṃsu. Avajji, vajji” iccādīni ajjatanīrūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:872_0: “Avadissā, vadissā, avajjissā, vajjissā” iccādīni kālātipattirūpāni. Sesāni sabbānipi
anya-e0804n0:872_1: yathāsambhavaṃ vitthāretabbāni. Yā panettha vadadhātu viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ vuttā, sā
anya-e0804n0:872_2: katthaci “vadantaṃ ekapokkharā. Bherivādako”tiādīsu abyattasaddepi vattati upacaritavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:873_0: Vida ñāṇe. Ñāṇaṃ jānanaṃ. Vidati. Vedo. Vidū. Kārite “vedeti. Vedayati. Sayaṃ abhiññā
anya-e0804n0:873_1: sacchikatvā pavedeti. Vedayanti ca te tuṭṭhiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho”ti payogā. Tattha
anya-e0804n0:873_2: pavedetīti bodheti ñāpeti pakāseti. Vedoti vidati sukhumampi kāraṇaṃ ājānātīti vedo,
anya-e0804n0:873_3: paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. “Vedehamunī”ti ettha hi ñāṇaṃ vedoti vuccati. Vedoti vā vedaganthassapi
anya-e0804n0:873_4: nāmaṃ vidanti jānanti etena uccāritamattena tadādhāraṃ puggalaṃ “brāhmaṇo aya”nti,
anya-e0804n0:873_5: vidanti vā etena brāhmaṇā attanā kattabbakiccanti vedo. So pana iruvedayajuvedasāmavedavasena
anya-e0804n0:873_6: tividho. Āthabbaṇavedaṃ pana paṇītajjhāsayā na sikkhanti parūpaghātasahitattā. Tasmā
anya-e0804n0:873_7: pāḷiyaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū”ti vuttaṃ. Eteyeva “chando, manto, sutī”ti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:878: Vidūti paṇḍitamanusso. So hi yathāsabhāvato kammañca phalañca kusalādibhede ca dhamme vidatīti “vidū”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:879: Ruda assuvimocane, sakammikavasenimissā attho gahetabbo. Rodati, rudati iccapi. Ruṇṇaṃ. Ruditaṃ. Rodanaṃ. Rodanto. Rodamāno. Rodantī. Rodamānā. Rudamukhā. Rudaṃ. Rudanto.
anya-e0804n0:880_0: Tattha rodatīti kiṃ rodati? Mataṃ puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā rodati. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi “nāhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:880_1: bhante etaṃ rodāmi, yaṃ maṃ bhante bhagavā evamāha”. Ayaṃ panettha attho – “yaṃ maṃ
anya-e0804n0:880_2: bhante bhagavā evamāha, ahaṃ etaṃ bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ na parodāmi na paridevāmi
anya-e0804n0:880_3: na anutthunāmī’ti evaṃ sakammikavasenattho veditabbo, na assumuñcanamattena.
anya-e0804n0:881: ‘Mataṃ vā amma rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
anya-e0804n0:882: Jīvantaṃ amma passanti, kasmā maṃ amma rodasī’ti
anya-e0804n0:883_0: Ayañcettha payogo”ti idamaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ. Idaṃ pana ṭīkāvacanaṃ – “yathā sakammakā
anya-e0804n0:883_1: dhātusaddā atthavisesavasena akammakā honti ‘vibuddho puriso vibuddho kamalasaṇḍo’ti,
anya-e0804n0:883_2: evaṃ atthavisesavasena akammakāpi sakammakā hontīti dassetuṃ ‘na paridevāmi na anutthunāmī’ti
anya-e0804n0:883_3: āha. Anutthunasaddo sakammakavasena payujjati ‘purāṇāni anutthuna’ntiādīsu. Ayañcettha
anya-e0804n0:883_4: payogoti iminā gāthāya anutthunanaṃ rudanaṃ adhippetanti dassetī”ti.
anya-e0804n0:884_0: Dalidda duggatiyaṃ. Dukkhassa gati patiṭṭhāti duggatīti ayaṃ attho “apāyaṃ duggatiṃvinipātaṃ
anya-e0804n0:884_1: nirayaṃ upapajjatī”tiādīsu yujjati, idha pana idaṃ atthaṃ aggahetvā añño attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:884_2: Kathaṃ duggatīti? Dukkhena kicchena gati gamanaṃ annapānādilābho duggatīti. Daliddati.
anya-e0804n0:884_3: Daliddo, daliddī, dāliddiyaṃ. Tattha daliddatīti sabbaṃ icchiticchitaṃ paraṃ yācitvā
anya-e0804n0:884_4: eva dukkhena adhigacchati, na ayācitvāti attho. Duliddoti duggatamanusso. Daliddīti
anya-e0804n0:884_5: duggatā nārī. Daliddassa bhāvo dāliddiyaṃ. Ettha ca sabbameva “daliddatī”ti lokikappayogadassanato
anya-e0804n0:884_6: “daliddatī”ti kriyāpadaṃ vibhāvitaṃ. Sāsane pana taṃ kriyāpadaṃ na āgataṃ, “daliddo
anya-e0804n0:884_7: daliddī”ti nāmapadāniyeva āgatāni. Anāgatampi taṃ “nāthatī”ti padamiva sāsanānulomattā
anya-e0804n0:884_8: gahetabbameva. Garū pana kaccāyanamatavasena dala duggatimhīti duggativācakadaladhātuto
anya-e0804n0:885: Tuda byathane. Tudati, vitudati. Kammani “tujjati, vitujjamāno, vedanābhibhunno”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:890: Nuda peraṇe. Peraṇaṃ cuṇṇikaraṇaṃ pisanaṃ, nudati, panudati. Panudanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:891: Vidi lābhe. Vindati. Uṭṭhātā vindate dhanaṃ. Govindo.
anya-e0804n0:892: Khadi parighāte. Parighātaṃ samantato hananaṃ. Khandati.
anya-e0804n0:895_0: Dhā dhāraṇe. Dadhāti, vidadhāti. Yaṃ paṇḍito nipuṇaṃ saṃvidheti. Nidhiṃ nidheti.
anya-e0804n0:895_1: Nidhi nāma nidhīyati. Tāva sunihito santo. Yato nidhiṃ parihari. Nidahati. Kuhiṃ
anya-e0804n0:895_2: deva nidahāmi. Paridahati. Yo vattaṃ paridahissati. Dhassati. Paridhassati. Bāloti
anya-e0804n0:895_3: paraṃ padahati. Sakyā kho ambaṭṭha rājānaṃ ukkākaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahanti. Saddahati tathāgatassa
anya-e0804n0:895_4: bodhiṃ. Saddhā, saddahanā, saddhātabbaṃ, saddahitabbaṃ, saddhāyiko, paccayiko. Saddheyyavacasā
anya-e0804n0:895_5: upāsikā. Saddahituṃ, saddahitvā. Visesādhānaṃ. Sotāvadhānaṃ. Sotaṃ odahati. Ohitasoto.
anya-e0804n0:895_6: Sotaṃ odahitvā. Maccudheyyaṃ, māradheyyaṃ, nāmadheyyaṃ, dhātu, dhātā, vidhātā. Vidhi.
anya-e0804n0:895_7: Abhidhānaṃ, abhidheyyaṃ, nidhānavatī vācā, ādhānagāhī, sandhi. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:896: Vipubbo dhā karotyatthe, abhipubbo tu bhāsane;
anya-e0804n0:898_0: Imasmā pana dhādhātuto pubbassa api iccupasaggassa akāro kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ pappoti,
anya-e0804n0:898_1: kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ na pappoti. Atra lopo vuccate, dvāraṃ pidahati, dvāraṃ pidahanto,
anya-e0804n0:898_2: pidahituṃ, pidahitvā, evaṃ akāralopo bhavati. Dvāraṃ apidahitvā, evaṃ akāralopo na
anya-e0804n0:898_3: bhavati. Ettha hi akāro apiupasaggassa avayavo na hoti. Kinti ce? Paṭisedhatthavācako
anya-e0804n0:898_4: nipātoyeva, upasaggāvayavo pana adassanaṃ gato, ayaṃ niccālopo. Evaṃ dhādhātuto pubbassa
anya-e0804n0:898_5: api iccupasaggassa akāro kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ pappoti, kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ na pappoti.
anya-e0804n0:898_6: Idaṃ acchariyaṃ idaṃ abbhutaṃ. Yatra hi nāma bhagavato pāvacane evarūpapopi nayo
anya-e0804n0:898_7: sandissati viññūnaṃ hadayavimhāpanakaro, yo ekasmiṃyeva dhātumhi ekasmiṃyeva upasagge
anya-e0804n0:898_8: ekasmiṃyevatthe kvaci lopālopavasena vibhajituṃ labbhati. Idāni mayaṃ sotūnaṃ paramakosallajananatthaṃ
anya-e0804n0:898_9: tadubhayampi ākāraṃ ekajjhaṃ karontā tadākāravatiṃ jinavarapāḷiṃ ānayāma –
anya-e0804n0:899: “Gaṅgaṃ me pidahissanti, na taṃ sakkomi brāhmaṇa;
anya-e0804n0:900: Apidhetuṃ mahāsindhuṃ, taṃ kathaṃ so bhavissati;
anya-e0804n0:901: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito.
anya-e0804n0:904: Dhu gatitheriyesu. Gati gamanaṃ, theriyaṃ thirabhāvo. Dhavati. Dhuvaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:905_0: Ettha ca dhuvanti thiraṃ. “Nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo”tiādīsu viya, tasmā
anya-e0804n0:905_1: dhuvanti thiraṃ kiñci dhammajātaṃ. Atha vā dhuvanti idaṃ gatitheriyatthavasena nibbānasseva
anya-e0804n0:905_2: adhivacanaṃ bhavitumarahati. Tañhi jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokādito muccitukāmehi dhavitabbaṃ
anya-e0804n0:905_3: gantabbanti dhuvaṃ, uppādavayābhāvena vā niccasabhāvattā dhavati thiraṃ sassataṃ
anya-e0804n0:905_4: bhavatīti dhuvaṃ. Yañhi sandhāya bhagavatā “dhuvañca vo bhikkhave desessāmi dhuvagāminiñca
anya-e0804n0:905_5: paṭipada”nti vuttaṃ. Dhuvasaddo “vacanaṃ dhuvasassata”nti ettha thire vattati. “Dhuvañca
anya-e0804n0:905_6: bhikkhave desessāmī”ti ettha nibbāne. “Dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasī”ti ettha pana ekaṃse
anya-e0804n0:906: Dhū vidhūnane. Ūkārassa ūvattaṃ. Dhūvati. Dhūvitā, dhūvitabbaṃ. Rassatte “dhuto, dhutavā” iccapi rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:908_0: Ettha ca dhenūti dhayati pivati ito khīraṃ potakoti dhenu, “godhenu, assadhenu, migadhenū”ti
anya-e0804n0:908_1: dhenusaddo sāmaññavasena sapotikāsu tiracchānagatitthīsu vattati, evaṃ santepi yebhuyyena
anya-e0804n0:908_2: gāviyaṃ vattati. Tathā hi “satta dhenusate datvā”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n0:909_0: Sidhu gatiyaṃ sedhati, nisedhati, paṭisedhati. Siddho, pasiddho, nisiddho, paṭisiddho,
anya-e0804n0:909_1: paṭisedhito, paṭisedhako, paṭisedho, paṭisedhituṃ, paṭisedhitvā. Idha acinteyyabalattā
anya-e0804n0:909_2: upasaggānaṃ taṃyoge sidhudhātussa nānappakārā atthā sambhavanti, aññesampi evameva.
anya-e0804n0:910: Sidhu satthe maṅgalye ca. Satthaṃ sāsanaṃ, maṅgalyaṃ pāpavināsanaṃ vuddhikāraṇaṃ vā. Sedhati. Siddho, pasiddho, pasiddhi.
anya-e0804n0:911_0: Dadha dhāraṇe. Janassa tuṭṭhiṃ dadhateti dadhi. Dhakārassa hakāratte “dahatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:911_1: Ayaṃ itthī imaṃ itthiṃ ayyikaṃ dahati. Ime purisā imaṃ purisaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahanti.
anya-e0804n0:912: Edha vuddhiyaṃ lābhe ca. Edhati. Edho, sukhedhito. Gambhīre gādhamedhati.
anya-e0804n0:913: Ettha ca edhoti edhati. Vaḍḍhati etena pāvakoti edho. Indanaṃ, upādānaṃ. Sukhedhitoti sukhena edhito, sukhasaṃvaḍḍhitoti attho. Gādhamedhatīti gādhaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ edhati labhati.
anya-e0804n0:914: Baddha saṃharise. Saṃhariso vinibaddhakriyā. Baddhati, vinibaddhati. Vinibaddhā.
anya-e0804n0:915: Gādha patiṭṭhānissayagandhesu. Gādhati. Gādhaṃ kattā. Gambhīrato agādhaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:916: Bādha viloḷane bādhati, vibādhati. Ābādho. Ābādhati cittaṃ viloḷetīti ābādho.
anya-e0804n0:918: Bandha bandhane bandhati. Bandhanako, bandho, bandhāpito, paṭibandho, bandhanaṃ, bandho, sambandhanaṃ, sambandho, pabandho, bandhu.
anya-e0804n0:919_0: Tattha bandhananti bandhanti satte etenāti bandhanaṃ, saṅkhalikādi. “Ayaṃ amhākaṃ
anya-e0804n0:919_1: vaṃso”ti sambandhitabbaṭṭhena bandhu, theragāthāsaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “pemabandhanena bandhū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:920: Dadhi asīghacāre. Asīghacāro asīghappavatti. Dandhati. Dandho, dandhapañño. Yo dandhakāle tarati, taraṇīye ca dandhati.
anya-e0804n0:921: Vaddha vaddhane. Vaddhati. Vaddhi, vuddhi, vaddho, vuddho, jātivuddho, guṇavuddho, vayovuddho.
anya-e0804n0:923: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatiṃ.
anya-e0804n0:928_0: Medha hiṃsāyaṃ saṅgame ca. Medhati. Medhā, medhāvī. Atra medhāti asani viya siluccaye
anya-e0804n0:928_1: kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā. Medhati vā siriyā sīlādīhi ca sappurisadhammehi saha
anya-e0804n0:928_2: gacchati na ekikā hutvā tiṭṭhatīti medhā, paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n0:933: Vuttaṃ. Medhāvīti dhammojapaññāya ca samannāgato puggalo.
anya-e0804n0:934: Sadhu madhu unde. Sadhati. Madhati. Madhu.
anya-e0804n0:935_0: Budha bodhane. Bodhati. Buddho. Abhisambuddhāno. Sambuddhaṃ. Asambuddhaṃ. Bodhi.
anya-e0804n0:935_1: Divādigaṇepi ayaṃ dissati. Tatrahi “bujjhatī”ti rūpaṃ, idha pana “bodhatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:935_2: “Yo nindaṃ apabodhatī”ti pāḷi dissati. Kārite pana “bodheti” iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:936: Yudha sampahāre. Yodhati. Yodho. Yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhena. Yuddhaṃ. Caraṇāyudho, caraṇāvudho vā. Āvudhaṃ. Divādigaṇikassa panassa “yujjhatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:937: Dīdhi dittivedhanesu. Dīdhati. Dīdhiti. Ettha ca dīdhitīti rasmi. Anekāni hi rasmināmāni.
anya-e0804n0:938: Rasmi ābhā pabhā raṃsi, ditti bhā ruci dīdhiti;
anya-e0804n0:939: Marīci juti bhāṇva’su, mayūkho kiraṇo karo;
anya-e0804n0:943_0: Nī naye. Neti, nayati, vineti. Vineyya hadaye daraṃ. Āneti. Ānayati. Netā. Vinetā.
anya-e0804n0:943_1: Nāyako. Neyyo. Veneyyo. Venayiko. Vinīto puriso. Nīyamāne pisācena, kinnu tāta udikkhati.
anya-e0804n0:943_2: Nīyanto. Nettaṃ. Netti. Bhavanetti samūhatā. Nettiko. Udakañhi nayanti nettikā. Nettā.
anya-e0804n0:943_3: Nette ujuṃ gate sati. Nayo. Vinayo. Āyatanaṃ. Netuṃ. Vinetuṃ. Netvā. Vinetvā iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:944_0: Tattha nettanti samavisamaṃ dassentaṃ attabhāvaṃ netīti nettaṃ, cakkhu. Nettīti nenti
anya-e0804n0:944_1: etāya satteti netti, rajju. Bhavanettīti bhavarajju, taṇhāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tāya hi sattā
anya-e0804n0:944_2: goṇā viya gīvāya bandhitvā taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ niyyanti, tasmā bhavanettīti vuccati. Nettikāti
anya-e0804n0:944_3: kassakā. Nettāti gavajeṭṭhako yūthapati. Nayoti nayanaṃ gamanaṃ nayo, pāḷigati. Atha
anya-e0804n0:944_4: vā tattha tattha netabboti nayo, sadisabhāvena netabbākāro. Nīyatīti nayo, tathattanayādi.
anya-e0804n0:945_0: Tathā hi chabbidho nayo tathattanayo pattinayo desanānayo antadvayavivajjananayo
anya-e0804n0:945_1: acinteyyanayo adhippāyanayoti. Tesu tathattanayo antadvayavivajjananayena nīyati,
anya-e0804n0:945_2: pattinayo acinteyyanayena, desanānayo adhippāyanayena nīyati. Etthādimhi tividho
anya-e0804n0:945_3: nayo kammasādhanena nīyatīti “nayo”ti vuccati, pacchimo pana tividho nayo karaṇasādhanena
anya-e0804n0:945_4: nīyati etena tathattādinayattayamiti “nayo”ti vuccati. Imasmiṃ atthe papañciyamāne
anya-e0804n0:946: Aparopi catubbidho nayo ekattanayo nānattanayo abyāpāranayo evaṃdhammatānayoti.
anya-e0804n0:947_0: Vineti satte ettha, etenāti vā vinayo. Kāyavācānaṃ vinayanatopi vinayo. Āyatananti
anya-e0804n0:947_1: anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ atīva āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati, tāva nayateva
anya-e0804n0:948: Ayaṃ panettha atthuddhāro. “Āyatananti assānaṃ kambojo āyatanaṃ, gunnaṃ dakkhiṇāpatho āyatana”nti ettha sañjātiṭṭhānaṃ āyaanaṃ nāma. “Manorame āyatane, sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā.
anya-e0804n0:949_0: Chāyaṃ chāyatthino yanti, phalatthaṃ phalabhojino”ti ettha samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. “Pañcimāni
anya-e0804n0:949_1: bhikkhave vimuttāyatanānī”ti ettha kāraṇaṃ. Aññepi pana payogā yata patiyataneti ettha pakāsitā.
anya-e0804n0:952: Thana pana dhana sadde. Thanati. Panati. Dhanati.
anya-e0804n0:954_0: Ettha ca yobbanibhāve ṭhitattā rūpavilāsena kanati dippati virocatīti kaññā. Atha
anya-e0804n0:954_1: vā kaniyati kāmiyabhi abhipatthiyati purisehītipi kaññā, yobbanitthī. Kanakanti kanati,
anya-e0804n0:954_2: kanīyatīti vā kanakaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ. Suvaṇṇassa hi anekāni nāmāni.
anya-e0804n0:955: Suvaṇṇaṃ kanakaṃ hemaṃ, kañcanaṃ haṭakampi ca;
anya-e0804n0:958: Vana sana sambhattiyaṃ. Vanati. Vanaṃ. Sanati.
anya-e0804n0:959: Tattha vananti. Taṃ sambhajanti mayūrakokilādayo sattāti vanaṃ, araññaṃ. Vanati sambhajati saṃkilesapuggalanti vanaṃ, taṇhā.
anya-e0804n0:963: Ettha ca “kasmā te eko bhujo janati, eko te na janatī bhujo”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha janatīti sunati saddaṃ karoti.
anya-e0804n0:964: Khanu avadāraṇe khanati. Sukhaṃ. Dukkhaṃ. Khato āvāṭo.
anya-e0804n0:965_0: Tattha sukhanti suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ khanatīti sukhaṃ. Duṭṭhu khanati kāyikacetasikasukhanti
anya-e0804n0:965_1: dukkhaṃ. Aññamaññapaṭipakkhā hi ete dhammā. Dvidhā cittaṃ khanatīti vā dukkhaṃ. Curādigaṇavasena
anya-e0804n0:965_2: pana “sukhayatīti sukhaṃ, dukkhayatīti dukkha”nti nibbacanāni gahetabbāni. Samāsapaavasena
anya-e0804n0:965_3: “sukaraṃ khamassāti sukhaṃ, dukkaraṃ khamassāti dukkha”nti nibbacanānipi vividhā
anya-e0804n0:968_0: Hana hiṃsāgatīsu. Ettha pana hiṃsāvacanena pharusāya vācāya pīḷanañca daṇḍādīhi paharaṇañca
anya-e0804n0:968_1: gahitaṃ, tasmā hana hiṃsāpaharaṇagatīsūti attho gahetabbo. Tathā hi “rājāno coraṃ
anya-e0804n0:968_2: gahetvā haneyyuṃ vā bandheyyuṃ vā”ti. Pāṭhassa atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇentehi “haneyyunti potheyyuñceva
anya-e0804n0:968_3: chindeyyuñcā”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca chedanaṃ nāma hatthapādādichedanaṃ vā sīsacchedavasena
anya-e0804n0:968_4: māraṇaṃ vā. Hanassa vadhādeso ghātādeso ca bhavati, hanti hanati, hananti. Hanasi,
anya-e0804n0:969_0: Hiṃsādayo cattāro atthā labbhanti. “Hanti hatthehi pādehī”ti ettha pana hantīti paharatīti
anya-e0804n0:969_1: attho. “Kuddho hi pitaraṃ hanti. Vikkosamānā tibbāhi, hanti nesaṃ varaṃ vara”nti.
anya-e0804n0:969_2: Ettha hantīti mārentīti attho. “Vadhati, vadheti, ghāteti” iccapi rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:969_3: Tattha “vadhati na rodati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodatī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:969_4: vadho paharaṇaṃ. Pāṇaṃ vadheti. Pāṇavadho. “Esa vadho khaṇḍahālassa. Satte ghātetī”ti
anya-e0804n0:970_0: “Upāhanaṃ, vadhū”ti ca ettha hanavadhasaddatthogamanaṃ. “Purisaṃ hanati. Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:970_1: paṭihanati” iccādīni kattupadāni. Devadatto yaññadattena haññati. Tato vātātape ghore,
anya-e0804n0:970_3: padaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ, iccādīni kammapadāni. Hantā. Hato. Vadhako. Vadhū. Āghāto.
anya-e0804n0:970_4: Upaghāto. Ghātako. Paṭigho. Saṅgho. Byaggho. Sakuṇagghi. Hantuṃ, hanituṃ, hantvā,
anya-e0804n0:970_5: hanitvā. Vajjhetvā, vadhitvā iccādīni sanāmikāni tumantādipadāni.
anya-e0804n0:971_0: Tattha upāhananti taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ upahananti upagacchanti tato ca āhananti āgacchanti
anya-e0804n0:971_1: etenāti upāhanaṃ. Vadhūti kilesavasena sunakhampi upagamanasīlāti vadhū, sabbāsaṃ
anya-e0804n0:971_2: itthīnaṃ sādhāraṇametaṃ. Atha vā vadhūti suṇisā. Tathā hi “tena hi vadhu yadā utunī
anya-e0804n0:971_3: ahosi, pupphaṃ te uppannaṃ, atha me āroceyyāsī”ti ettha vadhūti suṇisā vuccati. Sā
anya-e0804n0:971_4: pana “ayaṃ no puttassa bhariyā”ti sassusasurehi adhigantabbā jānitabbāti vadhūti
anya-e0804n0:971_5: vuccati. Gatyatthānaṃ katthaci buddhiyatthakathanato ayamattho labbhateva. “Suṇhā,
anya-e0804n0:971_6: suṇisā, vadhū” iccete pariyāyā. Saṅghoti bhikkhusamūho. Samaggaṃ kammaṃ samupagacchatīti
anya-e0804n0:971_7: saṅgho, suṭṭhu vā kilese hanti tena tena maggāsinā māretītipi saṅgho, puthujjanāriyavasena
anya-e0804n0:971_8: vuttānetāni. Vividhe satte āhanati bhuso ghātetīti byaggho. So eva “viyaggho, vaggho”ti
anya-e0804n0:971_9: ca vuccati. Aparampi puṇḍarīkoti tassa nāmaṃ. Dubbale sakuṇe hantīti sakuṇagghi,
anya-e0804n0:971_10: seno, ayaṃ pana hanadhātu divādigaṇe “paṭihaññatī”ti akammakaṃ kattupadaṃ janeti.
anya-e0804n0:971_11: Tathā hi “buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatī”tiādikā pāḷiyo dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:972_0: Ana pāṇane. Pāṇanaṃ sasanaṃ. Anati. Ānaṃ, pānaṃ. “Tattha ānanti assāso. Pānanti passāso.
anya-e0804n0:972_1: Etesu assāsoti bahi nikkhamanavāto. Passāsoti anto pavisanavāto”ti vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0804n0:972_2: vuttaṃ, suttantaṭṭhakathāsu pana uppaṭipāṭiyā āgataṃ. Tattha yasmā sabbesampi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:972_3: mātukucchito nikkhamanakāle paṭhamaṃ abbhantaravāto bahi nikkhamati, pacchā bāhiravāto
anya-e0804n0:972_4: sukhumaṃ rajaṃ gahetvā abbhantaraṃ pavisanto tāluṃ āhacca nibbāyati, tasmā vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0804n0:972_5: “assāsoti bahi nikkhamanavāto, passāsoti anto pavisanavāto”ti vuttaṃ. Etesu dvīsu
anya-e0804n0:972_6: nayesu vinayanayena anto uṭṭhitasasanaṃ assāso, bahi uṭṭhitasasanaṃ passāso. Suttantanayena
anya-e0804n0:972_7: pana bahi uṭṭhahitvāpi anto sasanato assāso. Anto uṭṭhahitvāpi bahi sasanato passāso.
anya-e0804n0:972_8: Ayameva ca nayo “assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena
anya-e0804n0:972_9: cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti, “passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:972_10: satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti
anya-e0804n0:972_11: iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti imāya pāḷiyā sametīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:973_0: Dhana dhaññe. Dhananaṃ dhaññaṃ, siripuññapaññānaṃ sampadāti attho. Dhātuattho hi
anya-e0804n0:973_1: yebhuyyena bhāvavasena kathiyati ṭhapetvā vakkarukkhataceti evamādippabhedaṃ. Yathā
anya-e0804n0:973_2: bhāvatthe vattamānena yapaccayena saddhiṃ nakārassa yyakāraṃ katvā thenanaṃ theyyanti
anya-e0804n0:973_3: vuccati, evamidha yapaccayena saddhiṃ nakārassa ññakāraṃ katvā dhananaṃ dhaññanti
anya-e0804n0:973_4: vuccati. Dhanino vā bhāvo dhaññaṃ, tasmiṃ dhaññe. Dhanti, dhanati. Dhanitaṃ. Dhaññaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:973_5: Yasmā pana dhaññasaddena siripuññapaññāsampadā gahitā, tasmā “dhaññapuññalakkhaṇasampannaṃ
anya-e0804n0:973_6: puttaṃ vijāyī”tiādīsu dhaññasaddena siripaññāva gahetabbā puññassa visuṃ vacanato.
anya-e0804n0:975: Ye te dakkhanti vadanaṃ, dhaññā te narapuṅgava.
anya-e0804n0:977: Ye pāde paṇamissanti, tepi dhaññā guṇandhara.
anya-e0804n0:980_0: Evamādīsu pana dhaññasaddena puññasampadā gahetabbā, puññasampadāya vā saddhiṃ siripaññāsampadāpi
anya-e0804n0:980_1: gahetabbā. Idamettha nibbacanaṃ “dhaññaṃ siripuññapaññāsampadā etesaṃ atthīti dhaññā”ti.
anya-e0804n0:980_2: “Dhaññaṃ maṅgalasammata”nti ettha tu “uttamaratanaṃ ida”nti dhanāyitabbaṃ saddhāyitabbanti
anya-e0804n0:980_3: dhaññaṃ, sirisampannaṃ puññasampannaṃ paññāsampannantipi attho yujjati. “Dhaññaṃ
anya-e0804n0:980_4: dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpa”nti ca ādīsu “natthi dhaññasamaṃ dhana”nti vacanato dhanāyitabbanti
anya-e0804n0:980_5: dhaññaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Pubbaṇṇaṃ. Apica osadhivisesopi dhaññanti vuccati. Dhanasaddassa
anya-e0804n0:980_6: ca pana samāsavasena “adhano, niddhano”ti ca natthi dhanaṃ etassāti atthena daliddapuggalo
anya-e0804n0:980_7: vuccati. “Nidhanaṃ yātī”tiettha tu kampanatthavācakassa dhūdhātussa vasena vināso
anya-e0804n0:982: Cine maññanāyaṃ. Aluttantoyaṃ dhātu, yathā gile, yathā ca mile. Cināyati, ocināyati. “Sabbo taṃ jano ocināyatū”ti idamettha pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Ocināyatati avamaññatūti.
anya-e0804n0:987: Pā pāne. Pānaṃ pivanaṃ. “Pāti, pānti. Pātu, pāntu” iccādi yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:988: Khippaṃ gīvaṃ pasārehi, na te dassāmi jīvitaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:989: Ayañhite mayā rūḷho, saro pāssati lohitanti.
anya-e0804n0:990_0: Atra hi pāssatīti pivissati. “Pāssati, pāssanti. Pāssasi, pāssatha. Pāssāmi, pāssāma”
anya-e0804n0:990_1: iccādinā, “apassā, apassaṃsu” iccādinā ca nayena sesaṃ sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ nayaññūhi.
anya-e0804n0:990_2: Ko hi samattho sabbāni buddhavacanasāgare vicitrāni vippakiṇṇarūpantararatanāni uddharitvā
anya-e0804n0:990_3: dassetuṃ, tasmā sabbāsupi dhātūsu saṅkhepena gahaṇūpāyamattameva dassitaṃ. Pivati,
anya-e0804n0:990_4: pivanti. Pivaṃ, pivanto, pivamāno, pivaṃ bhāgirasodakaṃ. Kārite kumāraṃ khīraṃ pāyeti.
anya-e0804n0:990_5: Muhuttaṃ taṇhāsamanaṃ, khīraṃ tvaṃ pāyito mayā. Kamme pīyati, pītaṃ. Tumādīsu “pātuṃ,
anya-e0804n0:990_6: pivituṃ, pitvā, pivitvā, pāyetvā” iccādīni yojetabbāni. Aññesupi ṭhānesu pāḷinayānurūpena
anya-e0804n0:991: Pā rakkhaṇe. Pāti. Nipāti. Pitā, gopo.
anya-e0804n0:993_0: Vippoti brāhmaṇo. So hi vippeti pūreti visiṭṭhena veduccāraṇādinā attano brāhmaṇakammena
anya-e0804n0:993_1: lokassa ajjhāsayaṃ attano ca hadaye vedānīti vippoti vuccati. “Jāto vippakule aha”nti
anya-e0804n0:993_2: ettha hi brāhmaṇo “vippo”ti vuccati. Tassa kulaṃ vippakulanti.
anya-e0804n0:994: Pū pavane. Pavati. Putto, puññaṃ. Ettha puttoti attano kulaṃ pavati sodhetīti putto. Kiyādigaṇaṃ pana patvā “punātī”ti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1005_0: Ayaṃ pāḷi nidassanaṃ. “Puttī, dhītā, duhitā, attajā”ti iccete pariyāyā. Evaṃ atrajāti
anya-e0804n0:1005_1: itthivācakassa itthiliṅgassa dassanato sutasaddādīsupi itthiliṅganayo labbhamānālabbhamānavasena
anya-e0804n0:1005_2: upaparikkhitabbo. Tathā hi loke “vesso, suddo, naro, kiṃpuriso” iccādīnaṃ yugaḷabhāvena
anya-e0804n0:1005_3: “vessī, suddī, nārī, kiṃpurisī”tiādīni itthivācakāni liṅgāni dissanti. “Puriso pumā”
anya-e0804n0:1005_4: iccādīnaṃ pana yugaḷabhāvena itthivācakāni itthiliṅgāni na dissanti. Puññanti ettha
anya-e0804n0:1005_5: pana attano kārakaṃ pavati sodhetīti puññaṃ. Kiyādigaṇaṃ pana patvā punātīti puññanti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1008: Paraṃ pujjabhavaṃ janetīti puññaṃ. Sadā pūjitaṃ vā janetīti puññaṃ. Janaṃ attakāraṃ punātīti puññaṃ. Asesaṃ apuññaṃ punātīti puññaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1011_0: Pe gatiyaṃ. Peti, penti. Pesi, petha. Idha bhikkhave ekacco assakhaḷuṅko pehīti vutto
anya-e0804n0:1011_1: viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchato paṭisakkati, piṭṭhito rathaṃ paṭivatteti.
anya-e0804n0:1012_0: Pe vuddhiyaṃ payati. Pāyo, apāyo. Ettha apāyoti natthi pāyo vuddhi etthāti apāyo.
anya-e0804n0:1012_1: Ayadhātuvasenapi attho netabbo, ayato vuddhito, sukhato vā apetoti apāyo, nirayatiracchānayonipettivisayaasurakāyā.
anya-e0804n0:1013: Pe sosane. Pāyati, payati vā. Nipako. Ettha nipako nipayati visoseti paṭipakkhaṃ, tato vā attānaṃ nipāti rakkhatīti nipako, sampajāno.
anya-e0804n0:1016: Evaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo ve mā upaccagā.
anya-e0804n0:1022: Gupa gopanajigucchanesu. Gopati, jigucchati. Jigucchaṃ, jigucchamāno. Jegucchī. Jigucchitvā iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:1024: Kapu sāmatthiye. Idaṃ amhākaṃ kappati. Netaṃ amhesu kappati.
anya-e0804n0:1025: Kapa karuṇāyaṃ. Kapati. Kapaṇo, kāpaññaṃ. Tattha kapatīti karuṇāyati, kāpaññanti kapaṇabhāvo.
anya-e0804n0:1026: Sapa akkose. Sapati. Sapatho, abhisapatho, abhisapito, sapanako.
anya-e0804n0:1027: Vapa bījanikkhepe. Bījaṃ vapati. Vāpako. Vāpitaṃ dhaññaṃ. Vuttaṃ bījaṃ purisena. Bījaṃ vappati. Vappamaṅgalaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1028: Supa sayane. Supati. Sukhaṃ supanti munayo, ye itthīsu na bajjhare. Sutto puriso, supanaṃ, suttaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1029: Khipa peraṇe. Peraṇaṃ cuṇṇikaraṇaṃ pisanaṃ. Khepati. Khepako.
anya-e0804n0:1030: Khipa abyattasadde. Khipati. Khipitasaddo. Yadā ca dhammaṃ desento, khipi lokagganāyako.
anya-e0804n0:1031: Khipa chaḍḍano. Khipati, ukkhipati, vikkhipati, avakhipati, saṃkhipati. Khittaṃ, ukkhittaṃ, pakkhittaṃ, vikkhittaṃ iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:1032: Opa niṭṭhubhane. Niṭṭhubhanaṃ kheḷapātanaṃ. Opati. Osadhaṃ saṅkharitvā mukhe kheḷaṃ opi.
anya-e0804n0:1033: Lipi upalepe. Lepati. Littaṃ paramena tejasā.
anya-e0804n0:1036_0: Nidapi nidampane. Nidampanaṃ nāma sassarukkhādīsu vīhisīsaṃ vā varakasīsaṃ vā acchinditvā
anya-e0804n0:1036_1: khuddakasākhaṃ vā abhañjitvā yathāṭhitameva hatthena gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bījamattasseva
anya-e0804n0:1036_2: vā paṇṇamattasseva vā gahaṇaṃ. Puriso vīhisīsaṃ nidampati, rukkhapattaṃ nidampati.
anya-e0804n0:1037: Tapa dittiyaṃ. Ditti virocanaṃ. Divā tapatiādicco.
anya-e0804n0:1038: Tapa ubbege. Ubbego utrāso bhīrutā. Tapati, uttapati. Ottappaṃ, ottappiyaṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1039: Tapa dhūpa santāpe. Tapati. Tapodhanaṃ, ātāpo. Ātāpī. Ātapaṃ. Dhūpati, sandhūpano, kamme tāpiyati. Dhūpiyati. Bhāve tāpanaṃ, tāpo, paritāpo, santāpo. Dhūpanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1042_0: Puppha vikasane. Akammako cāyaṃ sakammako ca. Pupphati. Pupphaṃ, pupphanaṃ, pupphito,
anya-e0804n0:1042_1: pupphituṃ, pupphitvā. Pupphanti pupphino dumā. Thalajā dakajā pupphā, sabbe pupphanti
anya-e0804n0:1042_2: tāvade. Mañjūsako nāma rukkho yattakāni udake vā thale vā pupphāni, sabbāni pupphati.
anya-e0804n0:1044: Dapha daphi vappha gatiyaṃ. Daphati. Damphati. Vapphati.
anya-e0804n0:1052: Pabba vabba mabba kabba khabba gabba sabba cabba gatiyaṃ. Pabbati. Vabbati. Mabbati. Kabbati. Khabbati. Gabbati. Sabbati. Cabbati.
anya-e0804n0:1053: Abba sabba hiṃsāyañca. Gatyāpekkhāya cakāro. Abbati. Sabbati.
anya-e0804n0:1055: Lubi tubi addane. Lumbati. Tumbati. Lumbinīvanaṃ. Udakatumbo. Athopi dve ca tumbāni.
anya-e0804n0:1056_0: Cubi vadanasaṃyoge. Puttaṃ muddhani cumbati. Mukhe cumbati. Ettha siyā “yadi vadanasaṃyoge
anya-e0804n0:1056_1: cubidhātu vattati, kathaṃ ambudharabinducumbitakūṭoti ettha avadane aviññāṇake pabbatakūṭe
anya-e0804n0:1056_2: ambudharabindūnaṃ cumbanaṃ vutta”nti? Saccaṃ, taṃ pana cumbanākārasadisenākārena
anya-e0804n0:1056_3: sambhavaṃ cetasi ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ, yathā adassanasambhavepi dassanasadisenākārena
anya-e0804n0:1056_4: sambhūtattā “rodante dārake disvā, ubbiddhā vipulā dumā”ti acakkhukānampi rukkhānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1056_5: dassanaṃ vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi cumbanākārasadisenākārena sambhūtattā avadanānampi ambudharabindūnaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1056_6: cumbanaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabhāvato pana aviññāṇakānaṃ dassanacumbanādīni ca natthi, saviññāṇakānaṃyeva
anya-e0804n0:1056_7: tāni hontīti. Ayaṃ nayo kamu padavikkhepetiādīsupi netabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1057_0: Ubbi tubbi thubbi dubbi dhubbi hiṃsatthā. Ubbati. Tubbati. Thubbati. Dubbati. Dubbā.
anya-e0804n0:1057_1: Dhubbati. Ettha dubbāti dabbatiṇaṃ, yaṃ “tiriyā nāma tiṇajātī”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1057_2: Ettha ca dubbāti itthiliṅgaṃ, dabbanti napuṃsakaliṅganti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1060_0: Pubba pabba sabba pūraṇe. Pubbati. Pabbati. Sabbati. Etta siyā “nanu bho pubbasabbasaddā
anya-e0804n0:1060_1: sabbanāmāni, kasmā panete dhātucintāyaṃ gahitā”ti? Vuccate – sabbanāmesu ca tumantādivirahitesu
anya-e0804n0:1060_2: ca nipātesu upasaggesu ca dhātucintā nāma natthi, imāni pana sabbanāmāni na honti.
anya-e0804n0:1060_3: Kevalaṃ sutisāmaññena sabbanāmāni viya upaṭṭhahanti, tena te tabbhāvamuttattā dhātucintāyaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1060_4: pubbācariyehi gahitā “pubbati sabbatī”ti payogadassanatoti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā buddhavacane
anya-e0804n0:1060_5: etāni rūpāni na santīti? Anāgamanabhāvena na santi, na avijjamānabhāvena. Kiñcāpi
anya-e0804n0:1060_6: buddhavacanesu etāni rūpāni na santi, tathāpi porāṇehi anumatā purāṇabhāsāti gahetabbāni,
anya-e0804n0:1060_7: yathā “nāthatīti nātho”ti ettha “nāthatī”ti rūpaṃ buddhavacane avijjamānampi gahetabbaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1060_8: hoti, evaṃ imānipi. Tasmā vohāresu viññūnaṃ kosallatthāya sāsane avijjamānāpi sāsanānurūpā
anya-e0804n0:1060_9: lokikappayogā gahetabbāti “pubbati sabbatī”ti rūpāni gahitāni. Esa nayo aññesupi ṭhānesu veditabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1062: Kabba khabba gabba dabbe. Dabbo ahaṅkāro. Kabbati. Khabbati. Gabbati.
anya-e0804n0:1063: Abi dabi sadde. Ambati. Ambā, ambu. Dambati.
anya-e0804n0:1064_0: Labi avasaṃsane. Avasaṃsanaṃ avalambanaṃ. Lambati, vilambati, byālambati. Nīce co’lambate
anya-e0804n0:1064_1: sūriyo. Ālambati. Ālambanaṃ, tadālambanaṃ, tadālambaṇaṃ, tadālambaṃ vā. Lābu. Alābu
anya-e0804n0:1067: Bhā dittiyaṃ. Cando bhāti, pañhā maṃ paṭibhāti. Ratti vibhāti. Bhāṇu, paṭibhānaṃ. Vibhātā ratti.
anya-e0804n0:1068: Bhī bhaye. Bhāyati. Bhayaṃ, bhayānako, bhīmo, bhīmaseno, bhīru, bhīruko, bhīrukajātiko. Kārite “bhāyeti, bhāyayati, bhāyāpeti, bhāyāpayatī”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:1070: Sumbha bhāsane ca. Cakāro hiṃsāpekkhako. Sumbhati. Sumbho. Kusumbho.
anya-e0804n0:1071: Ettha sumbhoti āvāṭo. “Sumbhaṃ nikkhanāhī”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ. Kusumbhoti khuddakaāvāṭo, “pabbatakandarapadarasākhāparipūrā kusumbhe paripūrentī”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1072: Abbha vabbha mabbha gatiyaṃ. Abbhati. Abbho. Vabbhati. Mabbhati.
anya-e0804n0:1073_0: Ettha abbhoti megho. So hi abbhati anekasatapaṭalo hutvā gacchatīti “abbho”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1073_1: “Vijjumālī satakkakū”ti vuttaṃ. Satakkakūti ca anekasatapaṭalo. Ettha ca abbhasaddo
anya-e0804n0:1073_2: tiliṅgiko daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi ayaṃ “abbhuṭṭhitova sa yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti
anya-e0804n0:1073_3: ettha pulliṅgo. “Abbhā, mahikā, dhūmo, rajo, rāhū”ti ettha itthiliṅgo. “Abbhāni candamaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1075: Megho valāhako laṅghi, jīmūto ambudo ghano;
anya-e0804n0:1077: Yabha methune. Mithunassa janadvayassa idaṃ kammaṃ methūnaṃ, tasmiṃ methune yabhadhātu vattati. Yabhati. Yābhassaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1078_0: Ettha ca “methuna”nti esā sabbhivācā, lajjāsampannehi puggalehi vattabbabhāsābhāvato.
anya-e0804n0:1078_1: Tathā hi “methuno dhammo na paṭisevitabbo”ti ca “na me rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti
anya-e0804n0:1078_2: methuno”ti ca sobhane vācāvisaye ayaṃ bhāsā āgatā. “Yabhatī”tiādikā pana bhāsā “sikharaṇī”tiādikā
anya-e0804n0:1078_3: bhāsā viya asambhivācā. Na hi hirottappasampanno lokiyajanopi īdisiṃ vācaṃ bhāsati.
anya-e0804n0:1078_4: Evaṃ santepi adhimattukkaṃsagatahirottappopi bhagavā mahākaruṇāya sañcoditahadayo
anya-e0804n0:1078_5: lokānukampāya parisamajjhe abhāsi. Aho tathāgatassa mahākaruṇāti.
anya-e0804n0:1081: Byathayo gāmadhammo ca, yābhassaṃ mohanaṃ rati.
anya-e0804n0:1085: Debha abhi dabhi sadde. Debhati. Ambhati. Ambho. Dambhati.
anya-e0804n0:1086: Ettha ca ambho vuccati udakaṃ. Tañhi nijjīvampi samānaṃ oghakālādīsu vissandamānaṃ ambhati saddaṃ karotīti ambhoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1088: Pānīyaṃ udakaṃ toyaṃ, jalaṃ pāto ca ambu ca;
anya-e0804n0:1089: Dakaṃ kaṃ salilaṃ vāri, āpo ambho papampi ca.
anya-e0804n0:1090: Nīrañca kepukaṃ pāni, amataṃ elameva ca,
anya-e0804n0:1092: Ettha ca “vālaggesu ca kepuke. Pivitañca tesaṃ bhusaṃ hoti pānī”tiādayo payogā dassetabbā.
anya-e0804n0:1093: Thabhi khabhi paṭibaddhe thambhati, vitthambhati. Khambhati, vikkhambhati. Thambho. Thaddho, upatthambho. Upatthambhinī. Vikkhambho. Vikkhambhitakileso.
anya-e0804n0:1094: Jabha jabhi gattavināme. Jabhati. Jambhati, vijambhati. Vijambhanaṃ, vijambhitā. Vijambhanto, vijambhamāno, vijambhito.
anya-e0804n0:1098_0: Ettha gabbhoti mātukucchipi vuccati kucchigataputtopi. Tathā hi “yamekarattiṃ paṭhamaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1098_1: gabbhe vasati māṇavo”ti ettha mātukucchi “gabbho”ti vuccati. “Gabbho me deva patiṭṭhito.
anya-e0804n0:1098_2: Gabbho ca patito chamā”ti ca ettha pana kucchigataputto. Apica gabbhoti āvāsaviseso.
anya-e0804n0:1099: Rabha rābhasse. Āpubbo rabha hiṃsākaraṇavāyamanesu. Rābhassaṃ rābhasabhāvo. Taṃsamaṅgino pana pāḷiyaṃ “caṇḍā ruddhā rabhasā”ti evaṃ āgatā.
anya-e0804n0:1100_0: Tattha rabhasāti karaṇuttariyā. Rabhati, ārabhati, samārabhati, ārambhati. Rabhaso.
anya-e0804n0:1100_1: Ārambho. Samārambho, ārabhanto. Samārabhanto. Āraddhaṃ me vīriyaṃ. Sārambhaṃ. Anārambhaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1100_2: Sārambho te na vijjati. Pakāraṇārambho. Vīriyārambho. Ārabhituṃ. Ārabhitvā. Ārabbha.
anya-e0804n0:1101: Ettha vīriyārambhoti vīriyasaṅkhāto ārambho. Ārambhasaddo kamme āpattiyaṃ kriyāya vīriye hiṃsāya vikopaneti anekesu atthesu āgato.
anya-e0804n0:1104_0: Ettha hi kammaṃ ārambhoti āgataṃ. “Ārambhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”ti ettha āpatti.
anya-e0804n0:1104_1: “Mahāyaññā mahārambhā, na te honti mahapphallā”ti ettha yūpussāpanādikriyā. “Ārambhatha
anya-e0804n0:1104_2: nikkamatha, yuñjatha buddhasāsane”ti ettha vīriyaṃ. “Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1104_3: ārambhantī”ti ettha hiṃsā. “Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato hotī”ti ettha
anya-e0804n0:1107: Labha lābhe. Labhati, labbhati. Lābho, laddhaṃ, alattha, alatthuṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1108: Subha dittiyaṃ. Sobhati. Sobhā, sobhanaṃ, sobhito.
anya-e0804n0:1109: Khubha sañcalane. Khobhati, saṅkhobhati. Hatthināge padinnamhi, khubbhittha nagaraṃ tadā. Khobhā, saṅkhobho.
anya-e0804n0:1112_0: Lubha vimohane. Lobhati, palobhati. Thullakumārīpalobhanaṃ. Kārite pana “lobheti,
anya-e0804n0:1112_1: palobheti, palobhetvā”ti rūpāni bhavanti. Divādigaṇaṃ pana patvā giddhiyatthe “lubbhatī”ti rūpaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:1114: Rubhi nivāraṇe. Rumbhati, sannirumbhati. Sannirumbho, sannirumbhitvā.
anya-e0804n0:1115: Ubha ubbha umbha pūraṇe. Ubhati. Ubbhati. Umbhati. Ubhanā. Ubbhanā. Umbhanā. Obho. Keṭubhaṃ. Ubbhaṃ. Kumbho. Kumbhī. Kārite “obheti. Ubbheti. Umbhetī”ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:1116_0: Tattha keṭubhanti kriyākappavikappo kavīnaṃ upakāriyasatthaṃ. Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1116_1: kiṭeti gameti kriyādivibhāgaṃ, taṃ vā anavasesapariyādānato keṭento gamento obheti
anya-e0804n0:1116_2: pūretīti keṭutaṃ kiṭaubhadhātuvasena. Ubbhati ubbheti pūretīti ubbhaṃ, pūraṇanti
anya-e0804n0:1116_3: attho. Cariyāpiṭakepi hi īdisī saddagati dissati, taṃ yathā? “Mahādānaṃ pavattesi,
anya-e0804n0:1116_4: accubbhaṃ sāgarūpama”nti. Tattha ca accubbhanti ativiya yācakānaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ pūraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1116_5: Akkhumbhantipi pāṭho. Kumbhoti kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ, tena ubbhetabboti kumbho, so eva
anya-e0804n0:1116_6: itthiliṅgavasena kumbhī. Ettha ca “kumbhī dhovati onato”ti payogo.
anya-e0804n0:1121: Mā māne sadde ca. Māti. Mātā. Ettha mātāti janikā vā cūḷamātā vā mahāmātā vā.
anya-e0804n0:1122: Mū bandhane. Mavati. Kiyādigaṇassa panassa “munātī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1124_0: Ettha medhāti paññā. Sā hi sukhumampi atthaṃ dhammañca khippameva meti ca dhāreti
anya-e0804n0:1124_1: cāti medhāti vuccati. Ettha pana metīti gaṇhāti. Tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vuttaṃ “asani
anya-e0804n0:1124_2: viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā, khippaṃ gahaṇadhāraṇaṭṭhena vā medhā”ti.
anya-e0804n0:1124_3: Saṅgamatthavācakassa pana medhadhātussa vasena medhati sīlasamādhiādīhi saddhammehi
anya-e0804n0:1124_4: siriyā ca saṅgacchatīti medhāti attho gahetabbo. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:1127: Omā sāmatthiye. Sāmatthiyaṃ samatthabhāvo. Aluttantoyaṃ dhātu, omāti, omanti.
anya-e0804n0:1128: Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “omāti bhante bhagavā iddhiyā manomayena kāyena brahmalokaṃ upasaṅkamitu”nti. Tattha omātīti pahoti sakkoti.
anya-e0804n0:1129: Timu addabhāve. Addabhāvo tintabhāvo. Temati. Tinto, temiyo. Temitukāmā temiṃsu.
anya-e0804n0:1130: Ettha temiyoti evaṃnāmako kāsirañño putto bodhisatto. So hi rañño ceva mahājanassa ca hadayaṃ temento addabhāvaṃ pāpento sītalabhāvaṃ janento jātoti “temiyo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1131: Nitami kilamane. Nitammati. Hadayaṃ dayhate nitammāmi.
anya-e0804n0:1132: Camu chamu japu jhamu umu jimu adane. Camati. Camū. Camūti senā. Chamati. Jamati. Jhamati. Umati. Jemati.
anya-e0804n0:1133_0: Kamu padavikkhepe. Padavikkhepo padasā gamanaṃ. Idaṃ pana vohārasīsamattaṃ vacanaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1133_1: tasmā “nāssa kāye aggi vā visaṃ vā satthaṃ vā kamatī”tiādīsu apadavikkhepatthopi
anya-e0804n0:1133_2: gahetabbo. Kamati. Caṅkamati, atikkamati. Abhikkamati. Paṭikkamati. Pakkamati. Parakkamati.
anya-e0804n0:1133_3: Vikkamati. Nikkamati. Saṅkamati. Saṅkamanaṃ. Saṅkanti. Kamanaṃ. Caṅkamanaṃ. Atikkamo.
anya-e0804n0:1133_4: Abhikkamo. Paṭikkamo. Pakkamo. Vikkamo. Nikkamo. Atikkanto puriso. Abhikkantā ratti.
anya-e0804n0:1133_5: Nikkhamati. Abhinikkhamati. Kārite nikkhāmeti. Aññānipi yojetabbāni. Yasmā panāyaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1133_6: dhātu curādigaṇaṃ patvā icchākanti yatthesu vattati, tasmā tepi atthe upasaggavisesite
anya-e0804n0:1133_7: katvā idha abhikkantasaddassa atthuddhāraṃ vattabbampi avatvā upari curādigaṇeyeva kathessāma.
anya-e0804n0:1134: Yamu uparame. Uparamo viramanaṃ. Yamabhi. Yamo. “Pare ca na vijānanti, mayamettha yamāmase”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ. Tattha yamāmaseti uparamāma, nassāma, marāmāti attho.
anya-e0804n0:1135: Nama bahutte sadde. Bahutto saddo nāma uggatasaddo. Namati.
anya-e0804n0:1136: Ama dama hamma mima chama gatimhi. Amati. Damati. Hammati. Mimati. Chamati. Chamā.
anya-e0804n0:1137_0: Chamāti pathavī. Chamāsaddo itthiliṅgo daṭṭhabbo, “na chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa
anya-e0804n0:1137_1: agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti ca “chamāyaṃ parivattāmi vāricarova
anya-e0804n0:1137_2: ghamme”ti ca payogadassanato. So ca kho sattahi aṭṭhahi vā vibhattīhi dvīsu ca vacanesu
anya-e0804n0:1138_0: Dhama saddaggisaṃ yogesu. Dhamadhātu sadde ca mukhavātena saddhiṃ aggisaṃyoge ca
anya-e0804n0:1138_1: vattati. Tattha paṭhamatthe “saṅkhaṃ dhamati. Saṅkhadhamako. Bheriṃ dhamati. Bheridhamako.
anya-e0804n0:1138_2: Dhame dhame nātidhame”ti payogo. Dutiyatthe “aggiṃ dhamati. Samuṭṭhāpeti attānaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1140_0: Namu namane. Namati. Namo. Nataṃ, namanaṃ. Nati. Namaṃ. Namamāno. Namanto. Namito.
anya-e0804n0:1140_1: Nāmaṃ. Nāmitaṃ. Namituṃ. Natvā, natvāna. Namitvā, namitvāna, namituna. Kārite “nāmeti,
anya-e0804n0:1140_2: nāmayati. Nāmetvā. Nāmayitvā”ti rūpāni bhavanti. Tatra hi “namati namitvā”ti evaṃpakārāni
anya-e0804n0:1140_3: padāni namanatthe vandanāyañca daṭṭhabbāni, “namo natvā”ti evaṃpakārāni pana vandanāyameva.
anya-e0804n0:1145_0: Ettha namoti padaṃ nipātesupi labbhati. Tena hi paccattopayogavacanāni abhinnarūpāni
anya-e0804n0:1145_1: dissanti “devarāja namo tyatthu. Namo katvā mahesino”ti. Upasaggehipi ayaṃ yojetabbā
anya-e0804n0:1146: Khamu sahane. Khamati. Khanti. Khamo, khamanaṃ, evaṃ bhāve. Kattari pana “khantā. Khamitā. Khamo hoti sītassapi uṇhassapī”ti payogā.
anya-e0804n0:1152: Gamu gatiyaṃ. Gacchati. Gamako. Gato. Gati. Gamanaṃ. Kārite “gameti, gamayati, gacchāpetī”tiādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:1153_0: Ramu kīḷāyaṃ. Ramati. Viramati. Paṭiviramati. Uparamati. Ārati. Virati. Paṭivirati.
anya-e0804n0:1153_1: Uparati. Veramaṇi. Viramaṇaṃ. Rati. Ramaṇaṃ. Rato. Ārato virato paṭivirato. Uparato, uparamo. Ārāmo.
anya-e0804n0:1155: Dhīratthu taṃ visaṃ vantaṃ, yamahaṃ jīvitakāraṇā;
anya-e0804n0:1156: Vantaṃ paccāvamissāmi, mataṃ me jīvitā varaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1157_0: Tattha vammikoti vamatīti, vantakoti, vantussayoti, vantasinehasambandhoti vammiko.
anya-e0804n0:1157_1: So hi ahinakulaundūragharagoḷikādayo nānappakāre pāṇake vamatīti vammiko. Upacikāhi
