anya-e0804n0:1157_2: vantakoti vammiko. Upacikāhi vamitvā mukhatuṇḍakena ukkhittapaṃsucuṇṇena kaṭippamāṇenapi
anya-e0804n0:1157_3: porisappamāṇenapi ussitoti vammiko. Upacikāhi vantakheḷasinehena ābaddhatāya sattasattāhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1157_4: deve vassantepi na vippakirayati, nidāghepi tato paṃsumuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ muṭṭhinā
anya-e0804n0:1157_5: pīḷiyamāne sinehova nikkhamati, evaṃ vantasinehasambandhoti vammiko.
anya-e0804n0:1158_0: Ettha pana “bhagavā, himavā”tiādīni padāni na kevalaṃ vantupaccayavaseneva nipphādetabbāni,
anya-e0804n0:1158_1: atha kho vamudhātuvasenapi nipphādetabbāni, tenāha visuddhimaggakārako “yasmā pana
anya-e0804n0:1158_2: tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ gamanamanena vantaṃ, tasmā “bhavesu vantagamano’ti vattabbe
anya-e0804n0:1158_3: bhavasaddato bhakāraṃ, gamanasaddato gakāraṃ, vantasaddato vakārañca dīghaṃ katvā
anya-e0804n0:1158_4: ādāya bhagavāti vuccati, yathā loke ‘mehanassa khassa mālā’ti vattabbe mekhalā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1159_0: Ettha, siyā “visamamidaṃ nidassanaṃ, yena ‘mehanassa khassa mālā’ti ettha mekārakhakāralākārānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1159_1: kamato gahaṇaṃ dissati, “bhavesu vantagamano’ti ettha pana bhakāravakāragakārānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1159_2: kamato gahaṇaṃ na dissatī”ti? Saccaṃ, idha pana “aggāhito, vijjācaraṇasampanno”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:1159_3: viya guṇasaddassa paranipātavasena “bhavesu gamanavanto”ti vattabbepi evamavatvā
anya-e0804n0:1159_4: saddasatthe yebhuyyena guṇasaddānaṃ pubbanipātabhvassa icchitattā saddasatthavidūnaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1159_5: kesañca viññūnaṃ manaṃ tosetuṃ “bhagavā”ti pade akkharakkamaṃ anapekkhitvā atthamattanidassanavasena
anya-e0804n0:1159_7: vuttaṃ. Īdisasmiñhi ṭhāne “āhitaggī”ti vā “aggāhito”ti vā “chinnahattho”ti vā “hatthacchinno”ti
anya-e0804n0:1159_8: vā padesu yathā tathā ṭhitesupi atthassa ayutti nāma natthi aññamaññaṃ samānatthattā tesaṃ saddānaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1160_0: Vedajātotiādīsu pana ṭhānesu atthevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ visuddhimagge “bhagavā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1160_1: padassa vamudhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā, taṭṭīkāyampi ca dassitā “bhage vamīti
anya-e0804n0:1160_2: bhagavā. Bhāge vamīti bhagavā”ti. Nibbacanaṃ pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ – bhagasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1160_3: siriṃ issariyaṃ yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayīti bhagavā.
anya-e0804n0:1160_4: Atha vā bhāni nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṃ gacchanti pavattantīti bhagā, sineruyugandharauttarakuruhimavantādibhājanalokā,
anya-e0804n0:1163_0: Tathā khandhāyatanadhātādibhede dhammakoṭṭhāse sabbaṃ papañca sabbaṃ yogaṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1163_1: ganthaṃ sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ samucchinditvā amataṃ dhātuṃ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri
anya-e0804n0:1163_2: anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvamīti bhagavā. Atha vā sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje
anya-e0804n0:1163_3: hīnappaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri anapekkho
anya-e0804n0:1165: Kaṇhasukkā yato vantā, tatopi bagavā mato.
anya-e0804n0:1166_0: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana himavāti padassa vamudhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā. Tathā
anya-e0804n0:1166_1: hi sambhavajātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “himavāti himapātasamaye himayuttoti himavā. Gimhakāle
anya-e0804n0:1166_2: himaṃ vamatīti himavā”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “himavā”ti padassa vamudhātuvasenapi
anya-e0804n0:1166_3: nipphatti dassitā, ayaṃ nayo īdisesu ṭhānesupi netabbo. “Guṇavāgaṇavā”tiādīsu pana
anya-e0804n0:1166_4: na netabbo. Yadi nayeyya, “guṇavā gaṇavā”ti padānaṃ “nigguṇo parihīnaguṇo”ti evamādiattho
anya-e0804n0:1166_5: bhaveyya, tasmā ayaṃ nayo sabbatthapi na netabbo. Ettha siyā “yadi “bhagavā’tiādipadānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1166_6: vamudhātuvasena nipphatti hoti, kathaṃ “bhagavanto, bhagavanta”ntiādīni sijjhantī”ti?
anya-e0804n0:1166_7: Yathā “bhagavā”ti padaṃ niruttinayena sijjhati, tathā tānipi teneva sijjhanti. Acinteyyo
anya-e0804n0:1166_8: hi niruttinayo kevalaṃ atthayuttipaṭibandhamattova, atthayuttiyaṃ sati nipphādetumasakkuṇeyyānipi
anya-e0804n0:1166_9: rūpāni aneneva sijjhanti. Ettha ca yaṃ niruttilakkhaṇaṃ āharitvā dassetabbaṃ siyā,
anya-e0804n0:1166_10: taṃ upari rūpanipphādanādhikāre udāharaṇehi saddhiṃ pakāsessāma.
anya-e0804n0:1171: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññunaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1176: Ito paraṃ avaggantā, missakā ceva dhātuyo;
anya-e0804n0:1179_0: Yā gatipāpuṇesu. Yāti, yanti. Yātu, yantu. Yeyya, yeyyuṃ, anupariyeyyuṃ. Yathāsambhavaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1179_1: padamālā yojetabbā. Yanto puriso. Yantī itthī. Yantaṃ kulaṃ. Yānaṃ, upayānaṃ, uyyānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1179_2: iccādīni. Divādigaṇikassa panassa “yāyati, yāyantī”tiādīni rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:1180_0: Tatra yānantiādīsu yanti etenāti yānaṃ, rathasakaṭādi. Upayanti etena issarassa vā
anya-e0804n0:1180_1: piyamanāpassa vā santikaṃ gacchantīti upayānaṃ, paṇṇākāraṃ. “Upayānāni me dajjuṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1180_2: rājaputta tayi gate”ti ettha hi paṇṇākārāni “upayānānī”ti vuccanti. Sampannadassanīyapupphaphalāditāya
anya-e0804n0:1180_3: uddhaṃ olokentā yanti gacchanti etthāti uyyānaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1181_0: Byā ummīsane. Byāti, byanti. Byāsi, byātha. Byāmi, byāma. Yathāsambhavaṃ padamālā
anya-e0804n0:1181_1: yojetabbā. Tatra panāyaṃ pāḷi “yāva byāti nimmīsati, tatrāpi rasatibbayo”ti. Tattha
anya-e0804n0:1181_2: yāva byātīti yāva ummīsati, purāṇabhāsā esā, ayañhi yasmiṃ kāle bodhisatto cūḷabodhiparibbājako
anya-e0804n0:1182: Yu missane gatiyañca. Yoti, yavati. Āyu, yoni.
anya-e0804n0:1183_0: Tattha “āyū”ti āsaddo upasaggo. Āyavanti missībhavanti sattā etenāti āyu. Atha vā
anya-e0804n0:1183_1: āyavanti āgacchanti pavattanti tasmiṃ sati arūpadhammāti āyu. Tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1183_2: vuttaṃ “āyavanaṭṭhena āyu. Tasmiñhi sati arūpadhammā āyavanti āgacchanti pavattanti,
anya-e0804n0:1183_3: tasmā āyūti vuccatī”ti. “Āyu, jīvitaṃ, pāṇo” iccete pariyāyā lokavohāravasena. Abhidhammavasena
anya-e0804n0:1183_4: pana “ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā jīvitindriyaṃ” iccetepi teheva saddhiṃ pariyāyā. Yonīti
anya-e0804n0:1183_5: aṇḍajādīnaṃ aṇḍajādīhi saddhiṃ yāya missībhāvo hoti, sā yoni. Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1183_6: “yavanti ettha sattā ekajātisamanvayena aññamaññaṃ missakā hontīti yoni” iti. Ettha
anya-e0804n0:1183_7: ca yonisaddassa atthuddhāro nīyate. Yonīti khandhakoṭṭhāsassapi kāraṇassapi passāvamaggassapi
anya-e0804n0:1183_8: nāmaṃ. “Catasso nāgayoniyo. Catasso supaṇṇayoniyo”ti ettha hi khandhakoṭṭhāso yoni
anya-e0804n0:1183_9: nāma. “Yoni hesā bhūmija phalassa adhigamāyā”ti ettha kāraṇaṃ. “Na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1183_10: brūmi, yonijaṃ mattisambhava”nti ettha passāvamaggo. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:1188: Ettha sahabyoti saha byeti saha pavattatīti sahabyo, sahāyo, ekabhavūpago vā. Tathā hi “tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapanno”tiādīsu ekabhavūpago “sahabyo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1189: Haya gatiyaṃ. Hayati. Hayo. Hayoti asso. So hi hayati sīghaṃ gacchatīti hayoti vuccati. Imāni panassa nāmāni –
anya-e0804n0:1190: Asso turaṅgo turago, vājī vāho hayopi ca;
anya-e0804n0:1191: Tabbhedā sindhavo ceva, gojo assataropi ca.
anya-e0804n0:1193: Ghoṭako tu khaḷuṅkasso, vaḷavoti ca vuccati;
anya-e0804n0:1196_0: Aya vaya paya maya taya caya raya gatiyaṃ. Ayati. Vayati. Payati. Mayati. Tayati.
anya-e0804n0:1196_1: Cayati. Rayati. Ayo, samayo, vayo, payo, rayo. Mayatayacayadhātūnaṃ nāmikapadāni upaparikkhitabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:1197_0: Tattha ayoti kāḷalohaṃ, ayati nānākammārakiccesu upayogaṃ gacchatīti ayo. Vayoti
anya-e0804n0:1197_1: paṭhamavayādiāyukoṭṭhāso, vayati parihāniṃ gacchatīti vayo. Payoti khīrassapi udakassapi
anya-e0804n0:1197_2: nāmaṃ, payati janena pātabbabhāvaṃ gacchatīti payo. Rayoti vego, yo “javo”tipi vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:1197_3: tasmā rayanaṃ javanaṃ rayo. Ettha samayasaddassa atthuddhāro vuccate aha nibbacanena. Samayasaddo –
anya-e0804n0:1199: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati.
anya-e0804n0:1200_0: Tathā hi “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu
anya-e0804n0:1200_1: samavāyo attho. “Ekova kho bhikkhave khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:1200_3: “Samayopi kho te bhaddāli appaṭividdho ahosī”tiādīsu hetu. “Tena samayena uggāhamāno
anya-e0804n0:1200_4: paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme
anya-e0804n0:1201: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
anya-e0804n0:1203_0: Ādīsu paṭilābho. “Sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā”tiādīsu pahānaṃ. “Dukkhassa
anya-e0804n0:1203_1: pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”tiādīsu paṭivedho. Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1203_2: jotakamattattā tassa tassa atthassa vācako samayasaddo evāti samayasaddassa atthuddhārepi
anya-e0804n0:1204_0: Tattha sahakārīkāraṇatāya sannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo. Sameti samāgacchati
anya-e0804n0:1204_1: maggabrahmacariyaṃ ettha tadādhārapuggaloti samayo, khaṇo. Samenti ettha, etena vā
anya-e0804n0:1204_2: saṅgacchanti dhammā sahajātadhammehi uppādādīhi vāti samayo, kālo. Dhammappavattimattatāya
anya-e0804n0:1204_3: atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena
anya-e0804n0:1204_4: rūpena vohariyatīti. Samaṃ, saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo,
anya-e0804n0:1204_5: samūho, yathā “samudāyo”ti. Avayavasahāvaṭṭhānameva hi samūho. Paccayantarasamāgame
anya-e0804n0:1204_6: eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo, hetu, yathā “samudayo”ti. Sameti
anya-e0804n0:1204_7: saṃyojanabhāvato sambandhā eti attano visaye pavattati, daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā saṃyuttā
anya-e0804n0:1204_8: ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo, diṭṭhi. Diṭṭhisaṃyojanena
anya-e0804n0:1204_9: hi sattā ativiya bajjhanti. Samiti saṅgati samodhānanti samayo, paṭilābho. Samassa
anya-e0804n0:1204_10: nirodhassa yānaṃ, sammā vā yānaṃ apagamo appavattīti samayo, pahānaṃ. Ñāṇena abhimukhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1204_11: sammā etabbo adhigantabboti samayo, dhammānaṃ aviparīto sabhāvo, abhimukhabhāvena
anya-e0804n0:1204_12: sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti samayo. Yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodho. Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
anya-e0804n0:1205_0: Nanu ca atthamattaṃ pati saddā abhinivisantīti na ekena saddena aneke atthā abhidhīyantīti?
anya-e0804n0:1205_1: Saccametaṃ saddavisese apekkhite. Saddavisese hi apekkhamāne ekena saddena anekatthābhidhānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1205_2: na sambhavati. Na hi yo kālattho samayasaddo, soyeva samūhādiatthaṃ vadati. Ettha
anya-e0804n0:1205_3: pana tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ samaya saddavacanīyatā sāmaññamupādāya anekatthatā samayasaddassa
anya-e0804n0:1205_4: vuttā. Evaṃ sabbattha atthuddhāre adhippāyo veditabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1206: Ito yāto ayato ca, nipphattiṃ samudīraye;
anya-e0804n0:1208: Ito yāto ayato ca, samānatthehi dhātuhi;
anya-e0804n0:1210: Naya rakkhaṇe ca. Cakāro gatipekkhako. Nayati. Nayo. Nayoti nayanaṃ gamananti nayo, pāḷigati. Nayanti vā rakkhanti atthaṃ etenāti nayo, tathattanayādi.
anya-e0804n0:1212_0: Dayāti mettāpi vuccati karuṇāpi. “Dayāpanno”ti ettha hi mettā “dayā”ti, mettacittataṃ
anya-e0804n0:1212_1: āpannoti hi attho. “Adayāpanno”ti ettha pana karuṇā “dayā”ti vuccati. Nikkaruṇataṃ
anya-e0804n0:1212_2: āpannoti hi attho. Evaṃ dayāsaddassa mettākaruṇāsu pavatti veditabbā. Tathā hi abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1212_3: vuttaṃ “dayāsaddo yattha yattha pavattati, tattha tattha adhippāyavasena yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1212_4: Dayāsaddo hi anurakkhaṇatthaṃ antonītaṃ katvā pavattamāno mettāya ca karuṇāya ca pavattatī”ti.
anya-e0804n0:1213_0: Vacanattho panettha evaṃ veditabbo – dayati dadāti sattānaṃ abhayaṃ etāyāti dayā.
anya-e0804n0:1213_1: Dayati gacchati vibhāgaṃ akatvā pāpakalyāṇajanesu samaṃ vattati, sītena samaṃ pharantaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1213_2: rajomalañca pavāhentaṃ udakamivātipi dayā, mettā. Dayati vā hiṃsati kāruṇikaṃ yāva
anya-e0804n0:1213_3: yathādhippetaṃ parassa hitanipphattiṃ na pāpuṇāti, tāvāti dayā. Dayati anuggaṇhāti
anya-e0804n0:1213_4: pāpajanampi sajjano etāyātipi dayā. Dayati attano sukhampi pahāya khedaṃ gaṇhāti
anya-e0804n0:1213_5: sajjano etāyāti dayā. Dayanti gaṇhanti etāya mahābodhisattā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhārakaraṇakāle
anya-e0804n0:1213_6: hatthagatampi arahattaphalaṃ chaḍḍetvā saṃsārasāgarato satte samuddharitukāmā anassāsakaraṃ
anya-e0804n0:1213_7: atibhayānakaṃ mahantaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ, pacchimabhave ca saha amatadhātupaṭilābhena
anya-e0804n0:1213_8: anekaguṇasamalaṅkataṃ sabbaññutaññāṇañcātipi dayā, karuṇā. Karuṇāmūlakā hi sabbe buddhaguṇā.
anya-e0804n0:1214_0: Aparo nayo – dayanti anurakkhanti satte etāya, sayaṃ vā anudayati, anudayamattameva
anya-e0804n0:1214_1: vā etanti dayā, mettā ceva karuṇā ca. Kiñci payogamettha kathayāma “seyyathāpi gahapati
anya-e0804n0:1214_2: gijjho vā kaṅko vā kulalo vā maṃsapesiṃ ādāya dayeyya. Puttesu maddī dayesi, sassuyā
anya-e0804n0:1214_3: sasuramhi ca. Dayitabbo rathesabha”. Tattha dayeyyāti uppatitvā gaccheyya, gatyatthavasenetaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1214_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dayesīti mettacittaṃ kareyyāsi. Dayitabboti piyāyitabbo. Ubhayampetaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1214_5: vivaraṇaṃ rakkhaṇatthaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā adhippāyatthavasena katanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1216: Pūyī visaraṇe duggandhe ca. Pūyati. Pūto, pūtavā. Pūtimacchaṃ kusaggena, yo naro upanayhati.
anya-e0804n0:1219: Phāyi pāyi vuddhiyaṃ. Phāyati. Phīto, phatavā.
anya-e0804n0:1220_0: Tattha tatavantupaccayā, yakāralopo, dhātvantassa sarassa ikārādeso ca daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1220_1: Esa nayo “pūto pūtavā”tiādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ daṭṭhabbo. Pāyati. Pāyo. Apāyo. Ettha
anya-e0804n0:1220_2: ca natthi pāyo vuddhi etthāti apāyo. Atha vā pana ayato sukhato apetoti apāyotipi
anya-e0804n0:1220_3: nibbacanīyaṃ. Apāyoti ca nirayo tiracchānayoni pettivisayo asurakāyoti cattāro apāyā.
anya-e0804n0:1221_0: Tāyu santānapālanesu. Tāyati. Tāyanaṃ. Divādigaṇe pana tā pālaneti dhātuṃ passatha,
anya-e0804n0:1221_1: tassa “tāyati tāṇa”nti rūpāni. Ubhayesaṃ kriyāpadaṃ samaṃ. Akārayakārapaccayamatteneva
anya-e0804n0:1222_0: Cāyu pūjānisāmanesu. Pūjā pūjanā. Nisāmanaṃ olokanaṃ savanañca vuccati. “Iṅgha maddi
anya-e0804n0:1222_1: nisāmehi. Nisāmayatha sādhavo”ti ca ādīsu hi olokanasavanāni nisāmanasaddena vuttāni.
anya-e0804n0:1222_2: Apica ñāṇena upaparikkhaṇampi nisāmanamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Cāyati, apacāyati. Anagāre
anya-e0804n0:1222_3: pabbajite, apace brahmacāriye. Ye vuddhamapacāyanti. Apacitiṃ dasseti. Niccaṃ vuddhāpacāyino.
anya-e0804n0:1226: Ri santāne. Reti. Reṇu. Reṇūti rajo.
anya-e0804n0:1227: Ru gatiyaṃ rosane ca. Ravati, viravati.
anya-e0804n0:1228: Ru sadde. Roti, ravati. Ravo, uparavo. Rutamanuññaṃ ruciyā ca piṭṭhi. Rutanti ravanaṃ rutaṃ, saddo.
anya-e0804n0:1229: Re sadde. Rāyati. Rā. Ratti. Ettha ca rāti saddo. Rattīti nisāsaṅkhāto sattānaṃ saddassa vūpasamakālo. Rā tiyyati ucchijjati etthāti ratti.
anya-e0804n0:1230: Brū viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Api hantvā hato brūti.
anya-e0804n0:1231: Bravīti, brunti. Brūsi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūte, bruvante. Brūse, bruvhe. Bruve, brumhe.
anya-e0804n0:1232: Brūtu, bruvitu, bruvantu. Brūhi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūtaṃ, bruvantaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1233: Ettha ca ambaṭṭhasutte “puna bhavaṃ gotamo bruvitū”ti pāḷidassanato “bruvitū”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sabbatthāpi upaparikkhitvā nayo gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1234: Bruveyya, bruve, bruveyyuṃ. Bruveyyāsi, bruveyyātha. Bruveyyāmi, bruveyyāma. Bruvetha, bruveraṃ. Bruvetho, bruveyyāvho. Bruveyyaṃ. Bruveyyāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:1235: Pabrūti. Anubrūti. Pabrūtu, anubrūtu. Pabruveyya, anubruveyya. Evaṃ sabbattha paanuupasaggehipi yathāsambhavaṃ padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0804n0:1236: Āha, āhu. Brave, bravittha, bravire. Bravittho, bravivho. Braviṃ, bravimhe. Parokkhāvasena vuttāni.
anya-e0804n0:1237: Abravā, abravū. Abravo, abravattha. Abravaṃ, abravamhā. Abravattha, abravatthuṃ. Abravase, abravhaṃ. Abraviṃ, abravimhase. Hiyyattanīvasena vuttāni.
anya-e0804n0:1238: Abravi, abravuṃ. Abravo, abravittha. Abraviṃ, abravimhā. Abravā, abravū. Abravase, abravivhaṃ. Abravaṃ, abravimhe. Ajjatanīvasena vuttāni.
anya-e0804n0:1239: Bruvissati, bruvissanti. Abravissā, abravissaṃsu. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ netabbaṃ. Kammapadaṃ appasiddhaṃ. Sace pana siyā, “brūyatī”ti siyā “luyati, lūyatī”ti padāni viya.
anya-e0804n0:1240: Jīra brūhane. Brūhanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ. Jīrati. Jīraṃ. Jīramāno. Jīraṇaṃ. Appassutāyaṃ puriso, balibaddova jīrati.
anya-e0804n0:1241_0: Pūra pūraṇe. Pūrati. Pūratova mahodadhi. Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā. Pūrituṃ, pūritvā,
anya-e0804n0:1241_1: pūraṃ, pūritaṃ. Puṇṇaṃ, paripuṇṇaṃ. Sampuṇṇaṃ, pūraṇaṃ. Pūraṇo kassapo. Kārite “pāramiyo
anya-e0804n0:1241_2: pūreti, pūrayati, pūrāpeti, pūrāpayati. Pūretvā, pūrayitvā, pūrāpetvā, pūrāpayitvā,
anya-e0804n0:1244: Sara gatiyaṃ. Sarati, visarati, ussarati. Ussāraṇā. Saro. Saṃsāro iccādīni. Tattha saroti rahado. Saṃsāroti vaṭṭaṃ, yo “bhavo”tipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1245: Cara caraṇe. Carati, vicarati, anucarati, sañcarati.
anya-e0804n0:1246: Cara gatibhakkhanesu. Carati, vicarati, anucarati, sañcarati, paṭicarati. Cariyā. Caritā. Cāro. Vicāro. Anuvicāro. Upavicāro. Caraṇaṃ. Cārako. Ocarako. Brahmacariyaṃ iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:1247_0: Tattha caratīti gacchati, bhakkhati vā. Tathā hi caranti padassa gacchanto khādanto
anya-e0804n0:1247_1: cāti atthaṃ vadanti garū. Paṭicaratīti paṭicchādeti. Cārakoti taṃpavesitānaṃ sattānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1247_2: sukhaṃ carati bhakkhatīti cārako, rodho. Ocarakoti adhocārī. Brahmacariyanti dānampi
anya-e0804n0:1247_3: veyyāvaccampi sikkhāpadampi brahmavihāropi dhammadesanāpi methunaviratipi sadārasantosopi
anya-e0804n0:1247_4: uposathopi ariyamaggopi sakalaṃ sāsanampi ajjhāsayopi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1256: Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1262: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
anya-e0804n0:1263: Tena pāṇi kāmadado, tena pāṇi madhussavo;
anya-e0804n0:1264: Tena me brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī”ti
anya-e0804n0:1265_0: Imasmiṃ aṅkurapetavatthumhi veyyāvaccaṃ “brahmacariya”nti vuttaṃ. “Idaṃ kho taṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0804n0:1265_1: tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī”ti imasmiṃ tittirajātake sikkhāpadaṃ “brahmacariya”nti
anya-e0804n0:1265_2: vuttaṃ. “Taṃ kho pana pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya…pe… yāvadeva
anya-e0804n0:1265_5: vuttā. “Pare abrahmacārī bhavissanti, mayamettha brahmacārino bhavissāmā”ti sallekhasutte
anya-e0804n0:1269: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti
anya-e0804n0:1273_0: Evaṃ nimijātake avītikkamavasena kato uposatho “brahmacariya”nti vutto. “Idaṃ kho
anya-e0804n0:1273_1: pana pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya…pe… ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
anya-e0804n0:1273_3: iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāvadeva manussehi suppakāsita”nti
anya-e0804n0:1279: Sadāresu ca santoso, ariyamaggo ca sāsanaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:1283_0: Ettha ca saroti saddopi vuccati usupi. Saraṇanti sarati upatāpeti hiṃsati saraṇagatānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1283_1: teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāpaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiṃ parikilesañcāti saraṇaṃ, buddhādiratanattayaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1283_2: Atha vā saddhā pasannā manussā “amhākaṃ saraṇamida”nti saranti cintenti, taṃ tattha
anya-e0804n0:1283_3: ca vācaṃ niccharanti gacchanti cātipi saraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1284_0: Sara cintāyaṃ. Sarati, susarati iccapi payogo. Appakkharānañhi bahubhāvo aññathābhāvo
anya-e0804n0:1284_1: ca hoti, yathā “dve, duve, taṇhā tasiṇā, pamhaṃ, pakhuma”nti. Anussarati, paṭissarati.
anya-e0804n0:1284_2: Saranti etāya sattā, sayaṃ vā sarati, saraṇamattameva vā etanti sati. Anussati, paṭissati.
anya-e0804n0:1285_0: Dvara saṃvaraṇe. Saṃvaraṇaṃ rakkhaṇā. Dvarati. Dvāraṃ. Dvisaddūpapadaaradhātuvasenapi
anya-e0804n0:1285_1: idaṃ rūpaṃ sijjhati. Tatrimāni nibbacanāni – dvaranti saṃvaranti rakkhanti etenāti
anya-e0804n0:1285_2: dvāraṃ, atha vā dve kavāṭā aranti gacchanti pavattanti etthātipi dvāranti. Gehadvārampi
anya-e0804n0:1285_3: kāyadvārādīnipi upāyopi dvāranti vuccati. Pāḷiyaṃ tu “dvāraṃ dvārā”ti ca itthinapuṃsakavasena
anya-e0804n0:1285_4: dvārasaddo vutto. Tathā hi “dvārampi surakkhitaṃ hotī”ti ca “dvārāpesā”ti ca tassa dviliṅgatā vuttā.
anya-e0804n0:1286: Gara ghara secane. Garati. Gharati. Gharaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1288_0: Tara plavanasaraṇesu. Tarati. Taraṇaṃ. Titthaṃ. Tiṇṇo. Uttiṇṇo. Otiṇṇo iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:1288_1: Tattha taraṇaṃ vuccati nāvā, tarati udakapiṭṭhe plavati, taranti uttaranti vā nadiṃ etenāti atthena.
anya-e0804n0:1289: Nāvā plavo taraṃ poto, taraṇaṃ uttaraṃ tathā;
anya-e0804n0:1291: Tara sambhame. Sambhamo anavaṭṭhānaṃ. Tarati. Tarito. Turaṅgo.
anya-e0804n0:1292: Ettha ca “so māsakhettaṃ tarito avāsari”nti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha taritoti turito sambhamanto. Avāsarinti upagacchiṃ upavisiṃ vā.
anya-e0804n0:1293_0: Jara roge. Ettha jararogoyeva “rogo”ti adhippeto payogavasena. Jarasaddassa hi jararoge
anya-e0804n0:1293_1: pavattaniyamanatthaṃ “roge”ti vuttaṃ. Tena añño rogo idha rogasaddena na vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1293_2: Jarati. Jaro. Sajjaro. Pajjararogo. Jarena pīḷitā manussā. Yattha tu ayaṃ vayohānivācako,
anya-e0804n0:1293_3: tattha payoge “jīrati, jarā”ti cassa rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:1294: Dara bhaye. Darati. Darī. “Bīlāsayā darīsayā”ti nidassanaṃ. Tattha darīti bhāyitabbaṭṭhena darī.
anya-e0804n0:1295: Dara ādarānādaresu. Darati, ādarati, anādarati. Ādaro, anādaro.
anya-e0804n0:1296_0: Ettha ca daratīti daraṃ karotīti ca anādaraṃ karotīti ca attho. Yathā hi ārakāsaddo
anya-e0804n0:1296_1: dūrāsannavācako, tathāyampi daradhātu ādarānādaravācako daṭṭhabbo. Darasaddo ca kāyadarathe
anya-e0804n0:1297: Ādittaṃ vata maṃ santaṃ, ghatasittaṃva pāvakaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:1298: Vārinā viya osiñci, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye dara”nti
anya-e0804n0:1299_0: Ettha kāyadarathe cittadarathe ca vattati. “Vītaddaro vītasoko vītasallo, sayaṃ abhiññāya
anya-e0804n0:1299_1: abhāsi buddho”ti ettha pana kilesadarathe vattati. Vītaddaroti hi aggamaggena sabbakilesānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1301_0: Ettha naroti puriso. So hi narati netīti naro. Yathā paṭhamapakatibhūto satto datarāya
anya-e0804n0:1301_1: pakatiyā seṭṭhaṭṭhena puri uccāṭṭhāne seti pavattatīti purisoti vuccati, evaṃ nayanaṭṭhena
anya-e0804n0:1301_2: naroti vuccati. Puttabhātubhūtopi hi puggalo mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ netuṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0804n0:1301_3: pageva itaro itarāsaṃ. Nārīti narena yogato, narassāyanti vā nārī. Aparampettha narasaddassa
anya-e0804n0:1301_4: nibbacanaṃ, nariyati sakena kammena niyyatīti naro, satto manusso vā. “Kammena niyyateo
anya-e0804n0:1301_5: loko”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tattha narasaddassa tāva purisavacane “narā ca atha nāriyo”ti
anya-e0804n0:1301_6: nidassanaṃ. Sattamanussavacane pana “buddho ayaṃ edisako naruttamo. Āmoditā naramarū”ti
anya-e0804n0:1301_7: ca nidassanaṃ, tasmā “naroti puriso, naroti satto, naroti manusso”ti tattha tattha
anya-e0804n0:1302_0: Hara haraṇe. Haraṇaṃ pavattanaṃ. Harati. Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. Vihāsi. Vihaṃsu. Viharissati.
anya-e0804n0:1302_1: Appamatto vihissati. Voharati. Saṃvoharati. sabbo harati vā. Rūpiyasaṃvohāro, rūpiyasabbohāro
anya-e0804n0:1302_2: vā. Pāṭihāriyaṃ. Pītipāmojjahāro. Vihāro. Vohāro. Abhihāro. Cittaṃ abhinīharati.
anya-e0804n0:1302_3: Sāsane viharaṃ, viharanto, viharamāno. Vihātabbaṃ, viharituṃ. Viharitvā. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:1303_0: Tattha pāṭihāriyanti samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1303_1: pavattetabbanti pāṭihāriyaṃ. Paṭīti hi ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti etassa atthaṃ bodheti
anya-e0804n0:1303_2: “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo”tiādīsu viya. Vihāroti ṭhānanisajjādinā
anya-e0804n0:1303_3: viharanti etthāti vihāro, bhikkhūnaṃ āvāso. Viharaṇaṃ vā vihāro, viharaṇakriyā. Vohāroti
anya-e0804n0:1304: Yo hi koci manussesu, vohāraṃ upajīvati;
anya-e0804n0:1305: Evaṃ vāseṭṭha jānāti, vāṇijo so nabrāhmaṇo”ti.
anya-e0804n0:1306_0: Ayaṃ byavahāravohāro nāma. “Saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro”ti ayaṃ paṇṇattivohāro
anya-e0804n0:1306_1: nāma. Tathā tathā voharanti parāmasantīti ayaṃ vacanavohāro nāma. “Aṭṭha ariyavohārā,
anya-e0804n0:1306_2: aṭṭha anariyavohārā”ti ayaṃ cetanāvohāro nāma. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0804n0:1309_0: Hara apanayane. Apanayanaṃ nīharaṇaṃ. Dosaṃ harati. Nīharati. Nīhāro, pariharati.
anya-e0804n0:1309_1: Parihāro. Rajoharaṇaṃ. Sabbadosaharo dhammo. Bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhe
anya-e0804n0:1309_2: titthiye haratīti pāṭihāriyaṃ. Mattāvaṇṇabhedenettha “pāṭiheraṃ pāṭihīraṃ pāṭihāriya”nti
anya-e0804n0:1310_0: Hara ādāne. Adinnaṃ harati. Harissati. Hāhiti iccapa. “Kharājinaṃ para suñca, khārikājañca
anya-e0804n0:1310_1: hāhitī”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ. Āharati, avaharati, saṃharati, apaharati, upaharati,
anya-e0804n0:1310_2: paharati, sampaharati, samāharati. Manoharo pāsādo. Parassaharaṇaṃ. Āhāro, avahāro,
anya-e0804n0:1310_3: saṃhāro, upahāro, sampahāro, samāhāro. Hariyyati, āhariyyati. Āhariyyanti. Āhaṭaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1310_4: harituṃ, āharituṃ, āharitvā, āharitvāna. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:1311: Dhara dharaṇe. Dharaṇaṃ vijjamānatā. Dharati. Dharate satthusāsanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1313: Khara khaye. Kharati. Kharaṇaṃ. Nakkharanti na khiyyantīti akkharāni. Nakkharanti na nassantīti nakkhattānīti porāṇā.
anya-e0804n0:1314: Jāgaraniddakkhaye jāgarati. Jāgaro, jāgaraṇaṃ, jāgaraṃ. Dīghā jāgarato ratti. Jāgaramāno. Ayañca dhātu tanādigaṇaṃ patvā “jāgaroti, paṭijāgarotī”ti rūpāni janeti.
anya-e0804n0:1315: Īra vacane gatikampanesu ca. Īrati. Īritaṃ. Eritaṃ. Samīraṇo. Jinerito dhammo. Kuppanti vātassapi eritassa.
anya-e0804n0:1316: Tattha samīraṇoti vāto. So hi samīrati vāyati, samīreti ca rukkhasākhāpaṇṇādīni suṭṭhu kampetīti “samīraṇo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1317: Hare lajjāyaṃ. Aluttantoyamekāranto dhātu, gile pītikkhayeti dhātu viya. Harāyati. Harāyanaṃ. Aṭṭīyāmi harāyāmi.
anya-e0804n0:1318: Ettha harāyatīti lajjati, hiriṃ karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:1319: Para pālanapūraṇesu. “Parati, paramo”timassa rūpāni, nara nayaneti dhātussa “narati naro”ti rūpāni viya.
anya-e0804n0:1320_0: Tattha paratīti pāleti, pūrati vā. Suddhakattuvasenidaṃ padaṃ vuttaṃ. Hetukattuvasena
anya-e0804n0:1320_1: hi “pāreti pārayatī”tiādīni rūpāni bhavanti. Paramoti pālako pūrako vā. Ettha ca
anya-e0804n0:1320_2: “pāramī”ti padaṃ etassatthassa sādhakaṃ. Tathā hi pāramīti parati, pāreti cāti paramo,
anya-e0804n0:1320_3: dānādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ pālako pūrako ca mahābodhisatto. Paramassa idaṃ, paramassa vā bhāvo,
anya-e0804n0:1320_4: kammaṃ vā pāramī, dānādikriyā. Garūhi pana “pūretīti paramo, dānādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ pūrako
anya-e0804n0:1322: Gira niggiraṇo. Niggiraṇaṃ paggharaṇaṃ. Girati, giri.
anya-e0804n0:1323_0: Ettha girīti pabbatā, yo ‘selo”tiādīhi anekehi nāmehi kathiyati. So hi sandhisaṅkhātehi
anya-e0804n0:1323_1: pabbehi citattā pabbamassa atthīti pabbato. Himavamanādivasena jalassa sārabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1325: Pabbato acalo selo, nago giri mahīdharo;
anya-e0804n0:1328_0: Tatra saroti surati īsati devissariyaṃ pāpuṇāti virocati cāti suro. Sundarā rā vācā
anya-e0804n0:1328_1: assāti vā suro, devo. Devābhidhānāni divādigaṇe pakāsessāma. Asuroti devo viya na
anya-e0804n0:1328_2: surati na īsati na virocati cāti asuro. Surānaṃ vā paṭipakkho mittapaṭipakkhā amittā
anya-e0804n0:1328_3: viyāti asuro, dānavo, yo “pubbadevo”tipi vuccati. Tathā hi kumbhajātake vuttaṃ –
anya-e0804n0:1333: Sagāthāvaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “na suraṃ pivimha, na suraṃ pivimhā’ti āhaṃsu, tato paṭṭhāya asurā nāma jātā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1335: Asuro pubbadevo ca, dānavo devatāri tu;
anya-e0804n0:1337: Pāko iti tu yaṃ nāmaṃ, ekassa asurassa tu;
anya-e0804n0:1339: Kura sadde akkose ca. Kurati. Kuraro, kurarī. Kummo, kummī.
anya-e0804n0:1340: Khura chedane vilekhane ca. Khurati. Khuro.
anya-e0804n0:1343: Pura aggagamane. Aggagamanaṃ nāma padhānagamanaṃ, paṭhamameva gamanaṃ vā. Purati. Puraṃ, purī. Avāpurati. Avāpuretaṃ amatassa dvāraṃ. Avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya gacchati.
anya-e0804n0:1344_0: Tattha puranti rājadhānī. Tathā hi “nagaraṃ puraṃ purī rājadhānī”ti ete pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n0:1344_1: “Eso āḷāriko poso, kumārī puramantare”tiādīsu pana gehaṃ “pura”nti vuccati. Padhānatāya
anya-e0804n0:1344_2: purato purato gamanena gantabbanti puraṃ, rājadhānī ceva gehañca. Avāpuraṇanti avāpuranti
anya-e0804n0:1344_3: vivaranti dvāraṃ etenāti avāpuraṇaṃ, yaṃ “kuñcikā”tipi “tāḷo”tipi vuccati. Avāpuratītiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:1345: Phara pharaṇe. Pharaṇaṃ nāma byāpanaṃ gamanaṃ vā. Samaṃ pharati sītena. Āhāratthaṃ pharati. Pharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1347_0: Garūti mātāpitādayo gāravayuttapuggalā. Te hi garanti uggacchanti uggatā pākaṭā hontīti
anya-e0804n0:1347_1: garūti vuccanti. Apica pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya bhāriyaṭṭhena garūti vuccanti. Garusaddo
anya-e0804n0:1347_2: “idamāsanaṃ atra bhavaṃ nisīdatu, bhavañhi me aññataro garūna”nti ettha mātāpitūsu
anya-e0804n0:1347_3: dissati. “Sanarāmaralokagaru”nti ettha sabbalokācariye sabbaññumhi. Apica garusaddo
anya-e0804n0:1347_4: aññesvatthesupi dissati. Sabbametaṃ ekato katvā atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:1351_0: Keci panācariyā “garu garū”ti ca dvidhā gahetvā bhāriyavācakatte garusaddo ṭhito.
anya-e0804n0:1351_1: Ācariyavācakatte pana gurusaddoti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Pāḷivisaye hi sabbesampi
anya-e0804n0:1351_2: yathāvuttānaṃ atthānaṃ vācakatte garusaddoyeva icchitabbo, akārassa ākārabhāve “gārava”nti
anya-e0804n0:1351_3: savuddhikassa taddhitantapadassa dassanato. Sakkaṭabhāsāvisaye pana gurusaddoyeva
anya-e0804n0:1351_4: icchitabbo, ukārassa vuddhibhāve aññathā taddhitantapadassa dassanato.
anya-e0804n0:1352_0: Mara pāṇacāge. Marati. Mattuṃ. Maritvā. Hetukattari “puriso purisaṃ māreti, mārayati.
anya-e0804n0:1352_1: Puriso purisena purisaṃ mārāpeti, mārāpayati. Puriso purisaṃ māretuṃ māretvā” iccādīni
anya-e0804n0:1352_2: rūpāni. Macco. Maru. Maraṇaṃ, maccu. Maṭṭu. Māro.
anya-e0804n0:1353_0: Tattha mattunti marituṃ. Tathā hi alīnasattujātake “yo mattumicche pituno pamokkhā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1353_1: pāḷi dissati. Maccoti maritabbasabhāvatāya “macco”ti laddhanāmo satto. Marūti dīghāyukopi
anya-e0804n0:1353_2: samāno maraṇasīloti maru, devo. Maraṇanti cuti.
anya-e0804n0:1354: Maraṇaṃ antako maccu, hindaṃ kālo ca maṭṭu ca;
anya-e0804n0:1355: Nikkhepo cuti cetāni, nāmāni maraṇassa ve.
anya-e0804n0:1356: Māroti sattānaṃ kusalaṃ māretīti māro, kāmadevo.
anya-e0804n0:1358: Māro namuci kaṇho ca, vasavatti pajāpati;
anya-e0804n0:1360: Kandappo ca ratipati, kāmo ca kusumāyudho.
anya-e0804n0:1361: Aññe aññānipi nāmāni vadanti, tāni sāsanānulomāni na hontīti idha na dassitāni. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana “māro, namuci, kaṇho, pamattabandhū”ti cattārova nāmāni āgatāni.
anya-e0804n0:1362: Ettha ca māroti devaputtamārena saddhiṃ pañca mārā kilesamāro khandhamāro abhisaṅkhāramāro maccumāro devaputtamāroti.
anya-e0804n0:1367: Dara dāhe. Kāyo darati. Daro, daratho.
anya-e0804n0:1368: Tira adhogatiyaṃ. Tirati. Tiracchāno, tiracchā vā.
anya-e0804n0:1369: Ara gatiyaṃ. Arati. Atthaṃ, attho, utu.
anya-e0804n0:1370: Ettha atthaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ. Taṃ taṃ sattakiccaṃ arati vattetīti utu.
anya-e0804n0:1373: Lā ādāne. Lāti. Lānaṃ, garuḷo, sīhaḷo, rāhulo, kusalaṃ, bālo, mahallako, mahallikā.
anya-e0804n0:1374_0: Tatra garuḷoti garuṃ lāti ādadāti gaṇhātīti garuḷo, yo “supaṇṇo, dijādhipo, nāgāri,
anya-e0804n0:1374_1: karoṭī”ti ca vuccati. Sīhaḷoti sīhaṃ lāti ādadāti gaṇhātīti sīhaḷo, pubbapuriso.
anya-e0804n0:1374_2: Tabbaṃse jātā etarahi sabbepi sīhaḷā nāma jātā.
anya-e0804n0:1375_0: Rāhulotiādīsu pana rāhu viya lāti gaṇhātīti rāhulo, ko so? Sikkhākāmo āyasmā rāhulabhaddo
anya-e0804n0:1375_1: buddhaputto. Tassa hi jātadivase suddhodanamahārājā “puttassa me tuṭṭhiṃ nivedethā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1375_2: uyyāne kīḷantassa bodhisattassa sāsanaṃ pahiṇi. Bodhisatto taṃ sutvā “rāhu jāto bandhanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1375_3: jāta”nti āha. Puttassa hi jāyanaṃ rāhuggaho viya hoti. Taṇhākilissanatāpādanato bāḷhena
anya-e0804n0:1375_4: ca saṅkhalikādibandhanena bandhaṃ viya hoti muccituṃ appadānatoti “rāhu jāto bandhanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1375_5: jāta”nti āha. Rājā “kiṃ me putto avacā”ti pucchitvā taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “ito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0804n0:1375_6: me nattā ‘rāhulo’ tveva hotū”ti āha, tato paṭṭhāya kumāro rāhulo nāma jāto.
anya-e0804n0:1376_0: Mahāpadānasuttaṭīkāyañhi “rāhu jāto”ti ettha “rāhūti rāhuggaho”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana
anya-e0804n0:1376_1: “rāhulo”ti vacanassatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ adhippāyatthavasena vuttaṃ. Na hi kevalo
anya-e0804n0:1376_2: “rāhū”ti saddo “rāhuggaho”ti atthaṃ vadati, atha kho jātasaddasambandhaṃ labhitvā
anya-e0804n0:1376_3: vadati. Tathā hi “rāhu jāto”ti bodhisattena vuttavacanassa “rāhuggaho jāto”ti atthौ
anya-e0804n0:1376_4: bhavati, tasmā suddhodanamahārājā “mama nattā rāhu viya lātīti rāhuloti vattabbo”ti
anya-e0804n0:1377_0: Keci pana “rāhulo jāto bandhanaṃ jāta”nti paṭhanti, katthaci potthake ca likhanti,
anya-e0804n0:1377_1: taṃ na sundaraṃ, atthassa ayuttito ṭīkāya ca saddhiṃvirocato. Na hi “rāhulo”ti kumārassa
anya-e0804n0:1377_2: nāmaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppannaṃ, pacchāyeva pana uppannaṃ ayyakena dinnattā, tasmā tadā bodhisattena
anya-e0804n0:1377_3: “rāhulo jāto”ti vattuṃ na yujjati. Yathā hi anabhisitte arājini puggale “mahārājā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1377_4: vohāro nappavattati. Ṭīkāyañca “rāhūti rāhuggaho”ti vuttaṃ. Athāpi tesaṃ siyā “rāhulo
anya-e0804n0:1377_5: jāto bandhanaṃ jāta”nti padassa vijjamānattā eva ṭīkāyaṃ “rāhuggaho”ti bhāvavasena
anya-e0804n0:1377_6: lāsaddena samānattho ādānattho gahasaddo vuttoti evampi nupapajjati, “rāhulānaṃ jātaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1377_7: bandhanaṃ jāta”nti pāṭhassa vattabbattā. Rāhuloti hi idaṃ padaṃ “sīhaḷo”ti padaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1377_8: viya dabbavācakaṃ, na kadācipi bhāvavācakaṃ, tasmā “rāhulo jāto bandhanaṃ jāta”nti
anya-e0804n0:1377_9: etaṃ ekaccehi duropitaṃ pāṭhaṃ aggahetvā “rāhu jāto bandhanaṃ jāta”nti ayameva pāṭho
anya-e0804n0:1377_10: gahetabbo, sārato ca paccetabbo suparisuddhesu anekesu potthakesu diṭṭhattā, porāṇehi
anya-e0804n0:1378_0: Ayaṃ panettha sādhippāyā atthappakāsanā – rāhu jātoti bodhisatto puttassa jātasāsanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1378_1: sutvā saṃvegappatto “idāni mama rāhu jāto”ti vadati, muccituṃ appadānavasena mama
anya-e0804n0:1378_2: gahaṇatthaṃ rāhu uppannoti hi attho. Bandhanaṃ jātanti iminā “mama bandhanaṃ jāta”nti
anya-e0804n0:1378_3: vadati. Tathā hi ṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ “rāhūti rāhuggaho”ti. Tattha rāhuggahoti gaṇhātīti
anya-e0804n0:1378_4: gaho, rāhu eva gaho rāhuggaho, mama gāhako rāhu jātoti attho. Atha vā gahaṇaṃ gaho,
anya-e0804n0:1378_5: rāhuno gaho rāhuggaho, rāhuggahaṇaṃ mama jātanti attho. Putto hi rāhusadiso. Pitā
anya-e0804n0:1379_0: Ekacce pana “rāhulotveva hotū”ti imaṃ padesaṃ disvā “rāhu jāto”ti vutte iminā na
anya-e0804n0:1379_1: sameti, “rāhulo jāto”ti vutteyeva pana sametīti maññamānā evaṃ pāṭhaṃ paṭhanti likhanti
anya-e0804n0:1379_2: ca, tasmā so anupaparikkhitvā paṭhito duropito pāṭho na gahetabbo, yathāvutto porāṇako
anya-e0804n0:1379_3: porāṇācariyehi abhimato pāṭhoyeva āyasmantehi gahetabbo atthassa yuttito, ṭīkāya
anya-e0804n0:1380_0: Tattha kusalanti kucchitānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ sānato tanukaraṇato ñāṇaṃ kusaṃ nāma,
anya-e0804n0:1380_1: tena kusena lātabbaṃ pavattetabbanti kusalaṃ. Bāloti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikasaṅkhāte
anya-e0804n0:1380_2: dve anatthe devadattakokālikādayo viya lāti ādadātīti bālo. Imāni pana taṃnāmāni –
anya-e0804n0:1381: Bālo avidvā añño ca, aññāṇī avicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0804n0:1383: Eḷamūgo ca nippañño, dummedhī avidū mago;
anya-e0804n0:1384: Aviññū andhabālo ca, duppañño ca aviddasu.
anya-e0804n0:1385: Mahallakoti mahattaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti mahallako, jiṇṇapuriso. Imānissa nāmāni –
anya-e0804n0:1386: Jiṇṇo mahallako vuddho, buddho vuḍḍho ca kattaro;
anya-e0804n0:1387: Thero cāti ime saddā, jiṇṇapaññattiyo siyuṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1391: Imāni pana nāmāni itthiyā itthiliṅgavasena vattabbāni –
anya-e0804n0:1392: Jiṇṇā mahallikā vuddhī, buddhī vuḍḍhī ca kattarā;
anya-e0804n0:1393: Therī cāti ime saddā, nāmaṃ jiṇṇāya itthiyā;
anya-e0804n0:1394: Dala phala visaraṇe. Dalati. Phalati. Dalito rukkho. Phalito bhūmibhāgo.
anya-e0804n0:1395_0: Ala bhūsane. Alati. Alaṅkāro, alaṅkato, alaṅkataṃ. “Sālaṅkānanayogepi, sālaṅkānanavajjitā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1395_1: imissañhi kavīnaṃ kabbaracanāyaṃ alaṅkasaddo bhūsanavisesaṃ vadati. Keci panettha
anya-e0804n0:1395_2: ala bhūsanapariyāpanavāranesūti dhātuṃ paṭhanti, “alatī”ti ca rūpaṃ icchanti. Mayaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1395_3: pana aladhātussa pariyattinivāraṇatthavācakattaṃ na icchāma payogādassanato. Nipātabhūto
anya-e0804n0:1395_4: pana alaṃsaddo pariyattinivāraṇatthavācako dissati “alametaṃ sabbaṃ. Alaṃ me tena rajjenā”tiādīsu.
anya-e0804n0:1396: Mīla nimelane. Mīlati, nimīlati, ummīlati. Nimīlanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1400_0: Ettha sīlanti sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ visuddhimagge “sīlanti kenaṭṭhena sīlaṃ?
anya-e0804n0:1400_1: Sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ, kimidaṃ sīlanaṃ nāma? Samādhānaṃ vā kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena
anya-e0804n0:1400_2: avippakiṇṇatāti attho. Upadhāraṇaṃ vā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhānavasena ādhārabhāvoti
anya-e0804n0:1400_3: attho. Etadeva hi ettha atthadvayaṃ saddalakkhaṇavidū anujānanti. Aññe pana ‘siraṭṭho
anya-e0804n0:1400_4: sīlaṭṭho, sītalaṭṭho sīlaṭṭho’ti evamādinā nayenettha atthaṃ vaṇṇentī”ti. Tattha
anya-e0804n0:1400_5: “atthadvayaṃ saddalakkhaṇa vidū anujānantī”ti idaṃ “sīla samādhimhi sīla upadhāraṇe”ti
anya-e0804n0:1400_6: dvigaṇikassa sīladhātussa atthe sandhāya vuttaṃ. Imassa hi curādigaṇaṃ pattassa upadhāraṇe
anya-e0804n0:1400_7: “sīleti, sīlayatī”ti rūpāni bhavanti, upadhāretītipi tesaṃ attho. Idha pana bhūvādigaṇikattā
anya-e0804n0:1400_8: samādhānatthe “sīlatī”ti rūpaṃ bhavati, samādhiyatīti tassa attho. Punapi ettha sotūnaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1400_9: sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ nibbacanāni vuccante. Sīlati samādhiyati kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena
anya-e0804n0:1400_10: na vippakiratīti sīlaṃ. Atha vā sīlanti samādahanti cittaṃ etenāti sīlaṃ. Imāni bhūvādigaṇikavasena
anya-e0804n0:1400_11: nibbacanāni. Curādigaṇikavasena pana sīleti kusale dhamme upadhāreti patiṭṭhābhāvena
anya-e0804n0:1400_12: bhuso dhāretīti sīlaṃ. Sīlenti vā etena kusale dhamme upadhārenti bhuso dhārenti
anya-e0804n0:1402: Kūla āvaraṇe. Kulati. Kūlaṃ. Vahe rukkhe pakūlaje. Kūlaṃ bandhati. Nadīkūle vasāmahaṃ. Kūlati āvarati udakaṃ bahi nikkhamituṃ na detīti kūlaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1403: Sūla rujāyaṃ. Sūlati. Sūlaṃ. Kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti.
anya-e0804n0:1404: Tūla nikkarīse. Nikkarīsaṃ nāma karīsamattenapi aminetabbato lahubhāvoyeva. Tūlati. Tūlaṃ bhaṭṭhaṃva māluto.
anya-e0804n0:1406_0: Mūla patiṭṭhāyaṃ mūlati. Mūlaṃ. Mūlasaddo “mūlāni uddhareyya antamaso ussīranāḷimattānipī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:1406_2: kāle chāyā pharati, nivāte paṇṇāni patanti, ettāvatā rukkhamūla”ntiādīsu samīpe. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:1409: Phala nibbattiyaṃ. Rukkho phalati. Rukkhaphalāni bhuñjantā. Mahapphalaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ. Sotāpattiphalaṃ. Tattha phalanti mahānibbattikaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1410: Phala bhede. Phalati. Muddhā te phalatu sattadhā. Pādā phaliṃsu. Tattha phalatūti bhajjitu.
anya-e0804n0:1411: Phala abyattasadde. Asanī phalati. Dveme bhikkhave asaniyā phalantiyā na santasanti. Phalantiyāti saddaṃ karontiyā.
anya-e0804n0:1413: Phulla vikasanabhedesu. Phullati. Phullaṃ. Phullito kiṃsuko. Suphullitamaravindavanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1418: Velu celu kelu khelu pelu belu selu sala tila gatiyaṃ. Velati. Celati. Kelati. Khelati. Pelati. Belati. Selati. Salati. Tilati. Celaṃ, belako. Ettha celanti vatthaṃ. Pelakoti saso.
anya-e0804n0:1419: Khala calane. Khalati. Khalo. Khaloti dujjano asādhu asappuriso pāpajano.
anya-e0804n0:1420_0: Khala sañcinane. Khalati. Khalaṃ. Khalanti vīhiṭṭhapanokāsabhūtaṃ bhūmimaṇḍalaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1420_1: Tañhi khalanti sañcinanti rāsiṃ karonti ettha dhaññānīti khalanti vuccati. “Khalaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1420_2: sālaṃ pasuṃ khettaṃ, gantā cassa abhikkhaṇa”nti payogo.
anya-e0804n0:1421: Gila ajjhoharaṇe. Gilati. Gilamakkhaṃ puriso na bujjhati.
anya-e0804n0:1422: Gala adane. Galati. Galo. Galanti adanti ajjhoharanti etenāti galo. Galoti gīvā vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1423: Sala salla āsugatiyaṃ. Āsugati sīghagamanaṃ. Salati. Sallati. Sallaṃ. Ettha ca “sallaṃ usu saro sallo kaṇḍo tejano”ti pariyāyā ete.
anya-e0804n0:1425: Gile pītikkhaye. Gilāyati. Gilāno, gelaññaṃ. Gilānoti akallako. Vinayepi hi vuttaṃ “nāhaṃ akallako”ti. Aṭṭhakathāyañca “nāhaṃ akallakoti nāhaṃ gilāno”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1426: Mile gattavināme. Milāyati. Milāyano, milāyanto, milāyamāno.
anya-e0804n0:1427: Kele mamāyane. Mamāyanaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhivasena “mama ida”nti gahaṇaṃ. Kelāyati. Tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyati.
anya-e0804n0:1428: Sala calane saṃvaraṇe ca, vala valla calane ca. Saṃvaraṇāpekkhāyaṃ cakāro. Salati. Kusalaṃ. Valati. Vallati. Vallūro.
anya-e0804n0:1429_0: Tattha kusalanti kucchite pāpadhamme salayati calayati kampeti viddhaṃsetīti kusalaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1429_1: Kucchitaṃ apāyadvāraṃ salanti saṃvaranti pidahanti sādhavo etenāti kusalaṃ. Vallanti
anya-e0804n0:1429_2: saṃvaranti rakkhanti ito kākasenādayo satte akhādanatthāyāti vallūro.
anya-e0804n0:1430: Mala malla dhāraṇe. Malati. Malaṃ. Mallati. Mallo.
anya-e0804n0:1433: Ettha kalāti soḷasabhāgādibhāgo. Kāloti “ettako atkkanto”tiādinā kalitabbo saṅkhātabboti kālo, pubbaṇhādisamayo.
anya-e0804n0:1435: Jala dittiyaṃ. Jalati. Jalaṃ, jalanto, pajjalanto, jalamāno.
anya-e0804n0:1436: Ko eti siriyā jalaṃ. Jalaṃva yasasā aṭṭhā, devadattoti me sutaṃ. Saddhammapajjoto jalito.
anya-e0804n0:1437: Hula calane. Hulati. Halo. Haloti phālo, so hi holeti bhūmiṃ bhindanto mattikakhaṇḍaṃ cāletīti “halo”ti vuccati ukārassa akāraṃ katvā.
anya-e0804n0:1438: Cala kampane. Calati. Calito, acalo. Mahanto bhūmicālo. Calanaṃ, cālo.
anya-e0804n0:1441_0: Thala ṭhāne. Thalati. Thalo. Thaloti nirudakappadeso. Pabbajjānibbānesupi taṃsadisattā
anya-e0804n0:1441_1: tabbohāro. Yathā hi loke udakoghena anottharaṇaṭṭhānaṃ “thalo”ti vuccati, evaṃ kilesoghena
anya-e0804n0:1441_2: anottharaṇīyattā pabbajjā nibbānañca “thalo”ti vuccati, “tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati
anya-e0804n0:1442: Phāla vilekhane. Phālati bhūmiṃ vilekhati bhindatīti phālo.
anya-e0804n0:1444: Bala pāṇane. Iha pāṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ sasanañca. Balati. Balaṃ, bālo.
anya-e0804n0:1445_0: Ettha balanti jīvitaṃ kappenti etenāti balaṃ, kāyabalabhogabalādikaṃ balaṃ. Atha
anya-e0804n0:1445_1: vā balanti sammājīvanaṃ jīvanti etenāti balaṃ, saddhādikaṃ balaṃ. Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1445_2: pana “assaddhiye na kampatīti saddhābala”ntiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ daḷhaṭṭhena balanti vattabbānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1445_3: saddhādīnaṃ akampanabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā dhātūnaṃ atthātisayayogato
anya-e0804n0:1445_5: naṃ baliyantī”ti ettha viya. Bāloti balati assasati ceva passasati cāti bālo, assasitapassasitamattena
anya-e0804n0:1445_6: jīvati, na seṭṭhena paññājīvitenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “balantīti
anya-e0804n0:1445_7: bālā, assasitapassasitamattena jīvanti, na paññājīvitenāti attho”ti. Paññājīvinoyeva
anya-e0804n0:1445_8: hi jīvitaṃ seṭṭhaṃ nāma. Tenāha bhagavā “paññājīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭha”nti.
anya-e0804n0:1447: Kula saṅkhāne bandhumhi ca. Kolati. Kulaṃ, kolo.
anya-e0804n0:1449: Kila pītiya kīḷanesu. Pītassa bhāvo pītiyaṃ yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Kīḷanaṃ kīḷāyeva. Kilati.
anya-e0804n0:1450: Ila kampane. Ilati. Elaṃ, elā. Ettha elaṃ vuccati doso. Kenaṭṭhena? Kampanaṭṭhena. Dosoti cettha aguṇo veditabbo, na paṭigho. “Nelaṅgo setapacchādo”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1451_0: Apica elaṃ vuccati udakaṃ. Tathā hi “elambujaṃ kaṇṭakiṃ vārijaṃ yathā”ti imissā pāḷiyā
anya-e0804n0:1451_1: atthaṃ niddisanto āyasmā sāriputto “elaṃ vuccati udaka”nti āha. Elāti lālā vuccati
anya-e0804n0:1451_2: “elamūgo”ti ettha viya. Apica elāti kheḷo vuccati “sutvā nelapatiṃ vācaṃ, vāḷā panthā
anya-e0804n0:1451_3: apakkamu”nti ettha viya. Ettha nelapatiṃ vācanti kheḷabindunipātavirahitaṃ vacananti
anya-e0804n0:1451_4: attho. Lālākheḷavācakassa tu elāsaddassa aññaṃ pavattinimittaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ. Anekappavattinimittā
anya-e0804n0:1451_5: hi saddā. Kiṃ vā aññena pavattinimittena, ila kampaneti evaṃ vuttaṃ kampanaṃ eva
anya-e0804n0:1451_6: lālākheḷavācakassa elāsaddassa pavattinimittaṃ, tasmā ilanti jigucchitabbabhāvena
anya-e0804n0:1451_7: kampenti hadayacalanaṃ pāpuṇanti janā etthāti elāti attho gahetabbo. Samānapavattinimittāyeva
anya-e0804n0:1451_8: hi saddā lokasaṅketavasena nānāpadatthavācakāpi bhavanti. Taṃ yathā? Hinoti gacchatīti
anya-e0804n0:1451_9: hetu, sappati gacchatīti sappo, gacchatīti goti. Tathā asamānappavattinimittāyeva
anya-e0804n0:1451_10: samānapadatthavācakāpi bhavanti. Taṃ yathā? Rañcatīti rājā, bhūmiṃ pāletīti bhūmipālo,
anya-e0804n0:1451_11: nare indatīti narindoti. Esa nayo sabbatthāpi vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1455: Tila sinehane. Tilati. Tilaṃ, telaṃ, tilo.
anya-e0804n0:1464: Vī pajanakanti asanakhādana gatīsu. Pajanaṃ calanaṃ. Kanti abhiruci. Asanaṃ bhattaparibhogo. Khādanaṃ pūvādibhakkhanaṃ. Gati gamanaṃ. Veti.
anya-e0804n0:1469: Jīva pāṇadhāraṇe. Jīvati. Jīvitaṃ, jīvo, jīvikā. Atthi no jīvikā deva, sā ca yādisakīdisā. Jīvitaṃ kappeti.
anya-e0804n0:1470: Piva miva tiva niva thūliye. Pivati. Pivaro. Mivati. Tivati. Nivati.
anya-e0804n0:1471: Ettha ca pivaroti kacchapo, yo koci vā thūlasarīro. Tathā hi “pivaro kacchape thūle”ti pubbācariyehi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1472: Ava pālane. Avati. Buddho mama avataṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1477: Devu deva devane. Devati ādevati, paridevati, ādevo, paridevo, ādevanā, paridevanā, ādevitattaṃ, paridevitattaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1478: Sevu kevu khevu gevu gilevu mevu milevu secane. Sevati. Kevati. Khevati. Gevati. Gilevati. Mevati milevati.
anya-e0804n0:1480: Dhātu gatisuddhiyaṃ. Dhāvati, vidhāvati. Ādhāvati, paridhāvati. Dhāvako.
anya-e0804n0:1486: Si sevāyaṃ. Sevati. Sevanā, sevako, sevito, sivo, sivaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1491: Si gatibuddhīsu. Seti, atiseti. Atisituṃ, atisitvā, setu.
anya-e0804n0:1492: Sī saye. Sayo supanaṃ. Seti. Sayati. Senaṃ. Sayanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1493: Su gatiyaṃ. Savati. Pasavati. Pasuto, suto.
anya-e0804n0:1494: Ettha sutoti dūto, “vittiñhi maṃ vindati suta disvā”ti “devasuto ca mātalī”ti ca imāni tattha payogāni.
anya-e0804n0:1495: Su savane. Savanaṃ sandanaṃ. Savati. Āsavo.
anya-e0804n0:1496: Sū pasave. Pasavo jananaṃ. Savati, pasavati. Suttaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1497: Ettha pana suttanti atthe savati janetīti suttaṃ, tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ, tadaññampi vā hatthisuttādi suttaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1503: Hiṃsa hiṃsāyaṃ. Hiṃsati. Hiṃsako, hiṃsanā, hiṃsā.
anya-e0804n0:1504: Issa issāyaṃ. Issati. Purisaparakkamassa devā na issanti. Issā, issāyanā.
anya-e0804n0:1505: Namassa vandanānatiyaṃ. Vandanānati nāma vandanāsaṅkhātaṃ namanaṃ, sakammakoyevāyaṃ dhātu, na namudhātu viya sakammako ceva akammako ca. Namassati.
anya-e0804n0:1506: Ghusa sadde. Ghusati, ghosati. Paṭighoso, nigghoso, vacīghoso.
anya-e0804n0:1508: Pusa buddhiyaṃ. Pusati. Poso. Sampīḷe mama posanaṃ. Posananti vaḍḍhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1509: Musa theyye. Thenanaṃ theyyaṃ corikā. Musati. Duddikkho cakkhumusano. Musalo.
anya-e0804n0:1511: Vāsi bhūsa alaṅkāre. Vāsati. Bhūsati, vibhūsati. Bhūsanaṃ, vibhūsanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1514: Ettha pana sīlādayo guṇe esantīti isayo, buddhādayo ariyā tāpasapabbajjāya ca pabbajitā narā. “Isi tāpaso jaṭilo jaṭī jaṭādharo”ti ete tāpasapariyāyā.
anya-e0804n0:1515: Kasa vilekhane. Kasati, kassati. Kassako, ākāso.
anya-e0804n0:1516: Ettha kassakoti kasikārako. Ākāsoti nabhaṃ. Tañhi na kassatīti ākāso. Kasituṃ vilekhituṃ na sakkāti attho. Imāni tadabhidhānāni –
anya-e0804n0:1521: Kasa sisa jasa jhasa vasa masa disa jusa yusa hiṃsatthā. Kasati. Sisati. Jasati. Jhasati. Vasati. Masati. Masako. Omasati, omasavādo. Disati. Jusati. Yūsati.
anya-e0804n0:1522: Tattha omasatīti vijjhati. Omasavādoti paresaṃ sūciyā viya vijjhanavādo. Masakoti makaso.
anya-e0804n0:1523: Bhassa bhassane. Bhassanti kathanaṃ vuccati “āvāso gocaro bhassaṃ. Bhassakāraka”ntiādīsu viya. Bhassati. Bhaṭṭhaṃ. Bhaṭṭhanti bhāsitaṃ, vacananti attho. Ettha pana –
anya-e0804n0:1525: Nijjhattomhi subhaṭṭhena, tvañca me saraṇaṃ bhavā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1526: Pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha nijjhattoti nijjhāpito dhammojapaññāya paññattigato amhi. Subhaṭṭhenāti subhāsitena.
anya-e0804n0:1527: Jisu nisu visu misu vassa secane. Jesati. Nesati. Vesati. Mesati. Devo vassati.
anya-e0804n0:1528: Marisu sahane ca. Cakāro secanāpekkhako. Marisati.
anya-e0804n0:1529: Pusa posane. Posati. Poso. Kammacittautuāhiārehi posiyatīti poso. “Aññepi devo posetī”ti dassanato pana curādigaṇepi imaṃ dhātuṃ vakkhāma.
anya-e0804n0:1530: Pisu silisu pusu palusu usu upadāhe. Pesati. Silesati. Sileso. Posati. Palosati. Osati. Usu.
anya-e0804n0:1533_0: Hasa hasane. Hasati. Assā hasanti, ājānīyā hasanti, pahasati, uhasati. Kārite “hāseti”iccādi,
anya-e0804n0:1533_1: uhasiyamāno, hāso, pahāso, hasanaṃ, pahasanaṃ, hasitaṃ. Hakāralopena mandahasanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1534_0: Tattha uhasatīti avahasati. Udasiyamānoti avahasiyamāno. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi “idha bhikkhuṃ
anya-e0804n0:1534_1: araññagataṃ vā rukkhamūlagataṃ vā suññāgāragataṃ vā mātugāmo upasaṅkamitvā uhasati”
anya-e0804n0:1534_2: iti ca “so mātugāmena uhasiyamāno” iti ca. Hāsoti hasanaṃ vā somanassaṃ vā “hāso
anya-e0804n0:1535: Tusa hasa hisa rasa sadde. Tusati, hasati, hisati, rasati, rasitaṃ. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “bheriyo sabbā vajjantu, vīṇā sabbā rasantu tā” iti.
anya-e0804n0:1540: “Naheva ṭhita nā’sīnaṃ, na sayānaṃ na paddhaguṃ;
anya-e0804n0:1542: Tattha rasatibbayoti so so vayo rasati parihāyati, na vaḍḍhatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:1543: Lasa silesanakīḷanesu. Lasati. Lāso. Lasī ca te nippalitā. Lasi vuccati matthaluṅgaṃ. Nippalitāti nikkhantā.
anya-e0804n0:1544: Nisa samādhimhi. Samādhi samādhānaṃ cittekaggatā. Nesati.
anya-e0804n0:1545: Misa masa sadde rose ca. Mesati. Masati. Meso. Masako.
anya-e0804n0:1547: Sasu hiṃsāyaṃ. Sasati. Satthaṃ. Satthaṃ vuccati asi.
anya-e0804n0:1548_0: Saṃsa thutiyañca. Cakāro hiṃsāpekkhāya. Saṃsati, pasaṃsati. Pasaṃsā, pasaṃsanā. Pasattho
anya-e0804n0:1548_1: bhagavā. Pasaṃsamāno, pasaṃsito, pasaṃsako, pasaṃsitabbo, pasaṃsanīyo, pāsaṃso, pasaṃsitvā iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:1549: Disa pekkhane. Etissā pana nānārūpāni bhavanti – “dissati padissati” iccādi akammakaṃ. “Passati dakkhati”iccādi sakammakaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1550_0: Dissatu, passatu, dakkhatu. Disseyya, passeyya, dakkheyya. Disse, passe, dakkhe.
anya-e0804n0:1550_1: Dissa, passa, dakkha. Adissā, apassā. Addā sīdantare nage. Addakkhā, addakkhuṃ, adassuṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1551_0: Dassissati, passissati, dakkhissati. Adassissā, apassissā, dakkhissā. Evaṃ vattamānapañcamiyādivasena
anya-e0804n0:1551_1: vitthāretabbāni. Kārite “dasseti dassayatī”ti rūpāni. Kamme “passiyati” iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:1552_0: Disā. Passo. Passaṃ. Passitā. Dassetā. Dassanaṃ. Vipassanā, ñāṇadassananti nāmikapadāni.
anya-e0804n0:1552_1: Tadatthe pana tumatthe ca “dakkhitāye”ti rūpaṃ. “Āgatāmha imaṃ dhammasamayaṃ, dakkhitāye
anya-e0804n0:1552_2: aparājitasaṅgha”nti hi pāḷi. Imasmiṃ pana pāḷippadese “dakkhitāye”ti idaṃ tadatthe
anya-e0804n0:1552_3: tumatthe vā catutthiyā rūpaṃ. Tathā hi dakkhitāyeti imassa dassanatthāyāti vā passitunti
anya-e0804n0:1552_4: vā attho yojetabbo. Disātiādīsu pana puratthimādibhedāpi disāti vuccati. Yathāha –
anya-e0804n0:1559: Puttadārā disā pacchā, mittāmaccā ca uttarā;
anya-e0804n0:1561: Etā disā namasseyya, alamatto kule gihī”ti;
anya-e0804n0:1562: Paccayadāyakāpi. Yathāha – “agārino annadapānavatthadā, avhāyikā nampi disaṃ vadantī”ti.
anya-e0804n0:1566_0: Evaṃ disāsaddena vuccamānaṃ attharūpaṃ ñatvā idānissa nibbacanamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1566_1: Dissati candāvaṭṭanādivasena “ayaṃ purimā ayaṃ pacchimā”tiādinā nānappakārato paññāyatīti
anya-e0804n0:1566_2: disā, puratthimadisādayo. Tathā “ime amhākaṃ garuṭṭhāna’ntiādinā passitabbāti disā,
anya-e0804n0:1566_3: mātāpitādayo. Dissanti sakāya puññakriyāya ime dāyakāti paññāyantīti disā, paccayadāyakā.
anya-e0804n0:1566_4: Dissati uppādavayābhāvena niccadhammattā sabbakālampi vijjatīti disā, nibbānaṃ. Passoti
anya-e0804n0:1566_5: kāraṇākāraṇaṃ passatīti passo. Evaṃ passatīti passaṃ. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi –
anya-e0804n0:1569_0: Passatīti passitā. Dassetīti dassitā. Dassananti dassanakriyā. Apica dassananti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1569_1: Tañhi rūpārammaṇaṃ passatīti dassananti vuccati. Tathā “dassanena pahātabbā dhammā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1569_2: vacanato dassanaṃ nāma sotāpattimaggo. Kasmā sotāpattimaggo dassanaṃ? Paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato.
anya-e0804n0:1569_3: Nanu gotrabhū paṭhamataraṃ passatīti? No na passati, disvā kattabbakiccaṃ pana na
anya-e0804n0:1569_4: karoti saṃyojanānaṃ appahānato, tasmā “passatī”ti na vattabbo. Yattha katthaci rājānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1569_5: disvāpi paṇṇākāraṃ datvā kiccanipphattiyā adiṭṭhattā ajjāpi rājānaṃ na passāmīti
anya-e0804n0:1570_0: Vipassanāti aniccādivasena khandhānaṃ vipassanakaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Ñāṇadassananti dibbacakkhupi
anya-e0804n0:1570_1: vipassanāpi maggopi phalampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi sabbaññutaññāṇampi vuccati. “Appamatto
anya-e0804n0:1570_2: samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādhetī”ti ettha hi dibbacakkhu ñāṇadassanaṃ nāma. “Ñāṇadassanāya
anya-e0804n0:1570_3: cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmetī”ti ettha vipassanāñāṇaṃ. “Abhabbā te ñāṇadassanāya
anya-e0804n0:1570_4: anuttarāya sambodhāyā”ti ettha maggo, “ayamañño uttarimanussadhammo alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso
anya-e0804n0:1570_5: adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti ettha phalañāṇaṃ. “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi, akuppā
anya-e0804n0:1570_6: me cetovimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti ettha paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1570_7: “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi sattāhakālaṅkato āḷāro kālāmo”ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Etthetaṃ bhavati –
anya-e0804n0:1574: Daṃsa daṃsane. Daṃsati, vidaṃsati. Danto. Kārite ālokaṃ vidaṃseti.
anya-e0804n0:1576: Saṃsa kathane. Saṃsati. Yo me saṃse mahānāgaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1578: Ettha bādhanaṭṭhena rāgādayopi “kilesā”ti vuccanti dukkhampi. Etesu dukkhavasena –
anya-e0804n0:1581: Payogo veditabbo. Divādigaṇaṃ pana pattassa “kilissatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1583: Ettha ca vasā nāma vilīnasineho. Sā vaṇṇato nāḷikeratelavaṇṇā. Ācāme āsittatelavaṇṇātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0804n0:1585: Bhāsabyattāyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Bhāsati. Bhāsā, bhāsitaṃ, bhātā. Paribhāsati. Paribhāsā, paribhāsako.
anya-e0804n0:1586_0: Tatra bhāsanti atthaṃ etāyāti bhāsā, māgadhabhāsādi. Bhāsitanti vacanaṃ. Vacanattho
anya-e0804n0:1586_1: hi bhāsitasaddo niccaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgo daṭṭhabbo. Yathā “sutvā luddassa bhāsita”nti.
anya-e0804n0:1586_2: Vāccaliṅgo pana bhāsitasaddo tiliṅgo daṭṭhabbo. Yathā “bhāsito dhammo, bhāsitaṃ catusaccaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1586_3: bhāsitā vācā”ti. Pubbe bhāsatīti bhātā, jeṭṭhabhātāti vuttaṃ hoti. So hi pubbe jātattā
anya-e0804n0:1586_4: evaṃ vattuṃlabhati. Kiñcāpi bhātusaddo “bhātikasataṃ, sattabhātaro. Bhātaraṃ kena
anya-e0804n0:1586_5: dosena, dujjāsi dakarakkhino”tiādīsu jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātūsu vattati, tathāpi yebhuyyena
anya-e0804n0:1586_6: jeṭṭhake nirūṭṭho, “bhātā”ti hi vutte jeṭṭhabhātāti viññāyati, tasmā katthaci ṭhāne
anya-e0804n0:1587_0: Nanu ca bho katthaci “jeṭṭhabhātā”ti visesetvā vuttanti? Saccaṃ, taṃ pana bhātāsaddassa
anya-e0804n0:1587_1: kaniṭṭhepi vattanato pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ “jeṭṭhabhātā”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā hi hariṇesu
anya-e0804n0:1587_2: vattamānassa migasaddassa kadāci avasesacatuppadesupi vattanato “hariṇamigo”ti visesetvā
anya-e0804n0:1587_3: vācaṃ bhāsanti, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yathā ca gohatthimahiṃsaacchasūkarasasabiḷārādīsu
anya-e0804n0:1587_6: ettha na gohatthiādīnaṃ cammaṃ vā maṃsaṃ vā viññāyati. Tathā “migamaṃsaṃ khādantī”ti
anya-e0804n0:1587_7: vacanassa gohatthiādīnaṃ maṃsaṃ khādantīti attho na sambhavati, evameva katthaci
anya-e0804n0:1587_8: vināpi jeṭṭhakaiti visesanasaddaṃ “bhātā”ti vutteyeva “jeṭṭhakabhātā”ti attho viññāyatīti.
anya-e0804n0:1587_9: Nanu ca bho “migacammaṃ, migamaṃsa”nti ettha cammamaṃsasaddeheva visesatthādhigamo
anya-e0804n0:1587_10: hotīti? Na hoti, migasaddassa iva cammamaṃsasaddānaṃ sāmaññavasena vattanato, evañca
anya-e0804n0:1587_11: sati kena visesatthādhigamo hotīti ce? Lokasaṅketavasena, tathā hi migasadde ca cammasaddādīsu
anya-e0804n0:1587_12: ca sāmaññavasena vattamānesupi lokasaṅketena paricchinnattā gohatthiādīnaṃ cammādīni
anya-e0804n0:1587_13: na ñāyanti lokena, atha kho hariṇacammādīniyeva ñāyanti. “Saṅketavacanaṃ saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1588: Gilesu anvicchāyaṃ. Punappunaṃ icchā anvicchā. Gilesati.
anya-e0804n0:1590: Jesu nesu esu hesu gatiyaṃ. Jesati. Nesati. Esati. Hesati. Dhātvantassa pana saññogavasena “jessati, nessatī”tiādīnipi gahetabbāni. Jessamāno. Jessaṃ, jessanto. Ettha ca –
anya-e0804n0:1595: Kāsa saddakucchāyaṃ. Kāsati, ukkāsati. Kāso. Kāsaṃ sāsaṃ daraṃ balyaṃ, khīṇamedho nigacchati.
anya-e0804n0:1596: Kāsu bhāsu dittiyaṃ. Dittīti pākaṭatā, virājanatā vā. Kāsati, pakāsati. Pakāsati tejo. Dūre santo pakāsenti. Bhāsati. Pabhāsati midaṃ byamhaṃ. Pakāso. Kāsu obhāso.
anya-e0804n0:1597: Tatra pakāsatīti pakāso, pākaṭo hotīti attho. Tucchabhāvena puñjabhāvena vā kāsati pakāsati pākaṭā hotīti kāsu. “Kāsu” iti āvāṭopi vuccati rāsipi.
anya-e0804n0:1599: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kiṃkāsuyā karissasī”ti
anya-e0804n0:1600_0: Ettha hi āvāṭo kāsu nāma. “Aṅgārakāsuṃ apare phuṇanti, narā rudantā paridaḍḍhagattā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1600_1: ettha rāsi. Kārite – pakāsetīti pakāsako. Obhāsetīti obhāsako. Kamme pakāsiyatīti
anya-e0804n0:1600_2: pakāsito. Evaṃ bhāsito. Bhāve – kāsanā. Saṅkāsanā. Pakāsanā. Tumantāditte “pakāsituṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1600_3: pakāsetuṃ, obhāsituṃ, obhāsetuṃ. Pakāsitvā, pakāsetvā, obhāsitvā, obhāsetvā”ti rūpāni
anya-e0804n0:1600_4: bhavanti. Taddhite bhāsu etassa atthīti bhāsuro, pabhassaro yo koci. Bhāsuroti vā
anya-e0804n0:1600_5: kesarasīho. Imasmiṃ atthe bhāsusaddo “rāja dittiya”nti ettha rājasaddo viya virājanavācako
anya-e0804n0:1600_6: siyā, tasmā rūpasiriyā virājanasampannatāya bhāsu virājanatā etassa atthīti bhāsuroti nibbacanaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1601: Nāsu rāsu sadde. Nāsati. Rāsati. Nāsā, nāsikā.
anya-e0804n0:1602_0: Tatra nāsāti hatthisoṇḍāpi nāsāti vuccati “sace maṃ nāganāsūrū, olokeyya pabhāvatī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:1602_1: viya. Manussādīnaṃ nāsikāpi nāsāti vuccati “yo te hatthe ca pāde ca, kaṇṇanāsañca
anya-e0804n0:1602_2: chedayī”tiādīsu viya. Nāsanti abyattasaddaṃ karonti etāyāti nāsā. Nāsā eva nāsikā.
anya-e0804n0:1602_3: Yattha nibbacanaṃ na vadāma, tattha taṃ suviññeyyattā appasiddhattā vā na vuttanti
anya-e0804n0:1602_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ, avuttampi payogavicakkhaṇehi upaparikkhitvā yojetabbaṃ. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:1608: Bhisi bhaye. Bhiṃsati. Bhiṃsanako. Tadāsi yaṃ bhiṃsanakaṃ. Bhesmākāyo.
anya-e0804n0:1609: Āsisi icchāyaṃ. Āpubbo sisi icchāyaṃ vattati. Āsisati. Āsisateva puriso. Āsisanā. Āsisattaṃ. Āsisanto, āsisamāno, āsamāno. “Suggatimāsamānā”ti pāḷi ettha nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1611: Ghusī kantikaraṇe. Īkārantoyaṃ, tena ito na niggahītāgamo. Ghusati.
anya-e0804n0:1613: Dhaṃsu gatiyaṃ. Dhaṃsati. Rajo nuddhaṃsati uddhaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1615: Kusa avhāne rodane ca. Kosati, pakkosati. Pakkosako, pakkosito, pakkosanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1616: Kassa gatiyaṃ. Kassati, parikassati. Paṭikassati. Mūlāya paṭikasseyya. Paṭikasseyyāti ākaḍḍheyya, mūlāpattiyaṃyeva patiṭṭhāpeyyāti attho.
anya-e0804n0:1617: Asa dityādānesu ca. Cakāro gatipekkhako. Asati.
anya-e0804n0:1622: Pasa bādhanaphassanesu. Pasati. Pāso, nāgapāso, hatthapāso.
anya-e0804n0:1623: Lasa kantiyaṃ. Lasati, abhilasati, vilasati. Lāso, vilāso, vilasanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1626: Tisa tittiyaṃ. Titti tappanaṃ paripuṇṇatā suhitatā. Tisati. Titti.
anya-e0804n0:1627: Vasa nivāse. Vasati, vasiyati, vacchati. Vatthu, vatthaṃ, parivāso, nivāso, āvāso, upavāso, uposatho, vippavāso, cirappavāsī, cirappavuttho, vasitvā, vattuṃ, vasituṃ iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:1628_0: Atra upavāsoti annena vajjito vāso upavāso. Uposathoti upavasanti etthāti uposatho,
anya-e0804n0:1628_1: upavasanti sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho. Ayaṃ panettha atthuddhāro
anya-e0804n0:1628_3: aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato kho visākhe uposatho upavuttho”tiādīsu sīlaṃ. “Suddhassa ve sadā
anya-e0804n0:1628_4: phaggu, suddhassuposatho sadā”tiādīsu upavāso. “Uposatho nāma nāgarājā”tiādīsu paññatti.
anya-e0804n0:1631: Sasa pāṇane. Sasati. Satova assasati, satova passasati. Saso, sasanaṃ. Assāso passāso assasanto passasanto.
anya-e0804n0:1633_0: Ettha atthīti ākhyātapadaṃ. Na atthi khīrā brāhmaṇī. Atthitā, atthibhāvo, “yaṃ kiñci
anya-e0804n0:1633_1: ratanaṃ atthī”tiādīsu viya nipātapadaṃ. Tasmā atthīti padaṃ ākhyātanipātavasena duvidhanti
anya-e0804n0:1633_2: veditabbaṃ. Asaiti avibhattikaṃ nāmikapadaṃ. Ettha ca “asasmīti hotī”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1633_3: Tattha atthīti asa, niccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Iminā sassatadiṭṭhi vuttā.
anya-e0804n0:1634_0: Tatrāyaṃ padamālā – “atthi, santi. Asi, attha. Asmi, asma, amhi, amha” iccetāni pasiddhāni.
anya-e0804n0:1634_1: “Atthu, santu. Āhi, attha. Asmi, asma amhi, amha” iccetāni ca, “siyā, assa, siyuṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1634_2: assu, siyaṃsu. Assa, assatha. Siyaṃ, assa, assāma” iccetāni ca pasiddhāni.
anya-e0804n0:1635_0: Ettha pana “tesañca kho bhikkhave samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ…pe… siyaṃsu dve bhikkhū
anya-e0804n0:1635_1: abhidhamme nānāvādā”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha siyaṃsūti bhaveyyuṃ. Abhidhammeti visiṭṭhe dhamme.
anya-e0804n0:1636_0: Idāni siyāsaddassa atthuddhāro pabhedo ca vuccate. Siyāti ekaṃse ca vikappane ca
anya-e0804n0:1636_1: “pathavīdhātu siyā ajjhattikā, siyā bāhirā”ti ekaṃse. “Siyā aññatarassa bhikkhuno
anya-e0804n0:1637_0: Siyāti ekamārakhyātapadaṃ, ekamabyayapadaṃ. Ākhyātatte ekavacanantaṃ, abyayatte yathāpāvacanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1637_1: “Puttā matthi dhanā matthī”ti ettha atthīti abyayapadamiva ekavacanantampi bahuvacanantampi
anya-e0804n0:1637_2: bhavati. Tassākhyātatte payogoviditova. Abyayatte pana “sukhaṃ na sukhasahagataṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1637_3: siyā pītisahagata”nti “ime dhammā siyā parittārammaṇā”ti ca ekavacanabahuvacanappayogā
anya-e0804n0:1637_4: veditabbā. Ettha dhātuyā kiccaṃ natthi. Parokkhāyaṃ “itiha asa itiha asā”ti dassanato
anya-e0804n0:1637_5: asa iti padaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Hiyyattanīrūpāni appasiddhāni. Ajjataniyā pana “āsi, āsiṃsu,
anya-e0804n0:1637_6: āsuṃ. Āsi, āsittha. Āsiṃ, āsimhā” iccetāni pasiddhāni. Bhavissantiyā “bhavissati,
anya-e0804n0:1637_7: bhavissanti” iccādīni. Kālātipattiyā “abhavissā, abhavissaṃsu” iccādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:1638: Sāsa anusiṭṭhiyaṃ. Sāsati, anusāsati. Kammantaṃ vo sāsati, sāsanaṃ, anusāsanaṃ, anusāsanī, anusiṭṭhi, satthā, satthaṃ, anusāsako, anusāsikā.
anya-e0804n0:1639_1: vā sāsanaṃ. Tañhi sāsati etena, ettha vāti “sāsana”nti pavuccati. Apica sāsananti
anya-e0804n0:1639_2: “rañño sāsanaṃ pesetī”tiādīsu viya pāpetabbavacanaṃ. Tathā sāsananti ovādo, yo “anusāsanī”ti
anya-e0804n0:1639_3: ca, “anusiṭṭhī”ti ca vuccati. Satthāti tividhayānamukhena sadevakaṃ lokaṃ sāsatīti
anya-e0804n0:1639_4: satthā, diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ satte anusāsatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:1639_5: Satthanti sadde ca atthe ca sāsati ācikkhati etenāti satthaṃ. Kiṃtaṃ? Byākaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1640: Īsa issariye. Issariyaṃ issarabhāvo. Īsati. Vaṅgīso, janapadeso, manujeso.
anya-e0804n0:1641: Tatra vaṅgīsoti vācāya īso issaroti vaṅgīso. Ko so? Āyasmā vaṅgīso arahā. Āha ca sayameva –
anya-e0804n0:1644: Āsa upavesane. Upavesanaṃ nisīdanaṃ “āsane upaviṭṭho saṅgho”ti ettha viya. Āsati. Acchati. Āsīno. Āsanaṃ. Upāsati. Upāsako.
anya-e0804n0:1645: Tattha āsananti āsati nisīdati etthāti āsanaṃ, yaṃ kiñci nisīdanayoggaṃ mañcapīṭhādi.
anya-e0804n0:1646: Kasī gatisosanesu. Īkārantoyaṃ dhātu, tenito na niggahītāgamo. Kasati.
anya-e0804n0:1648: Disī appītiyaṃ. Dhammaṃ dessati. Diso. Diṭṭho. Dessī. Desso. Dessiyo.
anya-e0804n0:1649_0: Tatra disoti ca diṭṭhoti ca paccāmittassādhivacanametaṃ. So hi pare dessati nappiyāyati,
anya-e0804n0:1649_1: parehi vā dessiyati piyo na kariyatīti “diso”ti ca “diṭṭho”ti ca vuccati. Atha vā
anya-e0804n0:1649_2: disoti coro vāpaccāmitto vā. Diṭṭhoti paccāmittoyeva. Atrime payogā –
anya-e0804n0:1650: “Diso disaṃ yaṃ taṃ kayirā, verī vā pana verinaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:1651: Micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, pāpiyo naṃ tato kare”ti ca.
anya-e0804n0:1652: “Disā hi me dhammakathaṃ suṇantū”ti ca, “disā hi me te manusse bhajantu ye dhammamevādapayanti santo”ti ca,
anya-e0804n0:1654: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatī”ti ca.
anya-e0804n0:1655: Dessīti dessanasīlo appiyāyanasīloti dessī. “Dhammakāmo bhavaṃ hoti, dhammadessī parābhavo”ti idamettha payoganidassanaṃ. Dessoti appiyo, tathā dessiyoti. Ettha ca –
anya-e0804n0:1656: “Na me dessā ubho puttā, maddīdevī na dessiyā;
anya-e0804n0:1657: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā piye adāsaha”nti ca,
anya-e0804n0:1658: “Na me sā brāhmaṇī dessā, napi me balaṃ na vijjatī”ti ca,
anya-e0804n0:1659: “Mātā pitā na me dessā, napi dessaṃ mahāyasaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:1660: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā vatamadhiṭṭhahi”nti ca
anya-e0804n0:1661: Payogā. Sabbattha meti ca mayhanti ca sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1663: “Paccamitto ripu diṭṭho, diso verī ca satva’ri;
anya-e0804n0:1664: Amitto ca sapatto ca, evaṃ paṇṇattikārisū”ti.
anya-e0804n0:1666: Bhassa bhassanadittīsu. Bhassanaṃ vacanaṃ. Ditti sobhā. Bhassati. Bhassaṃ, pabhassaraṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1668: Disa atisajjane. Disati, upadisati, sandisati, niddisati, paccādisati, paṭisandisati, uddisati. Deso, uddeso iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:1671_0: Phusa samphasse. Phusati. Phasso, phusanā, samphusanā, samphusitattaṃ. Evarūpo kāyasamphasso
anya-e0804n0:1671_1: ahosi. Phoṭṭhabbaṃ, phusitaṃ. Devo ca ekamekaṃ phusāyati. Phuṭṭhuṃ, phusituṃ, phusitvā,
anya-e0804n0:1671_2: phusitvāna, phusiya, phusiyāna. Phussa phussa byantiṃ karoti.
anya-e0804n0:1672: Tatra phassoti ārammaṇaṃ phusanti etena, sayaṃ vā phusati, phusanamattameva vā etanti phasso, ārammaṇe phusanalakkhaṇo dhammo.
anya-e0804n0:1673: Rusa risa hiṃsāyaṃ. Rosati. Risati. Puriso.
anya-e0804n0:1674: Ettha ca “puṃ vuccati nirayo, taṃ risatīti puriso”ti ācariyā vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:1676: Visa pavesane. Visati, pavisati. Paveso, pavesanaṃ, nivesanaṃ, pavisaṃ. Ettha nivesanaṃ vuccati gehaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1677: Masa āmasane. Masati, āmasati, parāmasati. Parāmāso, parāmasanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1678_0: Ettha parāmāsoti parato āmasatīti parāmāso, aniccādidhamme niccādivasena gaṇhātīti
anya-e0804n0:1678_1: attho. “Parāmāso micchādiṭṭhi kummaggo micchāpatho”tiādīni bahūni vevacanapadāni
anya-e0804n0:1679: Isu icchāyaṃ. Icchati, sampaṭicchati. Sampaṭicchanaṃ, icchā, abhicchā, icchaṃ, icchamāno.
anya-e0804n0:1680: Vesu dāne. Vecchati, pavecchati, paveccheti. Pavecchaṃ, pavecchanto.
anya-e0804n0:1681: Nisa baddhāyaṃ. Baddhāti vinibaddho, ahaṅkārassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Nisati.
anya-e0804n0:1683: Isa pariyesane. Esati. Isi, iṭṭhaṃ, aniṭṭhaṃ, esaṃ, esamāno.
anya-e0804n0:1687: Hā cāge. Jahati, vijahati. Vijahanaṃ, jahituṃ, jahātave, jahitvā, jahāya.
anya-e0804n0:1689_0: Tattha mhayateti sitaṃ karoti. Umhayateti pahaṭṭhākāraṃ dasseti. Vimhayateti vimhayanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1689_1: karoti. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi “na naṃ umhayate disvā. Pekkhitena mhitena ca. Mhitapubbaṃva
anya-e0804n0:1689_2: bhāsati. Yadā umhayamānā maṃ, rājaputtī udikkhati. Umhāpeyya pabhāvatī. Pamhāpeyya pabhāvatī”ti.
anya-e0804n0:1690: Tattha umhayamānāti pahaṭṭhākāraṃ dassetvā hasamānā. Umhāpeyyāti sitavasena pahaṃseyya. Pamhāpeyyāti mahāhasitavasena parihāseyya.
anya-e0804n0:1692: Hu pasajjakaraṇe. Pasajjakaraṇaṃ pakārena sajjanakriyā. Havati. Huto, hutavā, hutāvī, āhuti.
anya-e0804n0:1693_0: Hū sattāyaṃ. Hoti, honti. Hosi, hotha. Homi, homa. Pahoti, pahonti. Pahūtaṃ, pahūtā,
anya-e0804n0:1693_1: kuto pahūtā kalahā vivādā. Honto, hontā, hontaṃ, pahonto. Pacchāsamaṇena hotabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1693_2: Hotuṃ hotuye, pahotuṃ, hutvāna. Vattamānāvibhattirūpādīni. Ettha pasiddharūpāneva gahitāni.
anya-e0804n0:1694: Hotu, hontu. Hosi, hotha. Homi, homa. Pañcamīvibhattirūpāni. Etthāpi pasiddharūpāneva gahitāni.
anya-e0804n0:1695_0: Huveyya, huveyyuṃ. Huveyyāsi, huveyyātha. Huveyyāmi, huveyyāma. Huvetha, huveraṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1695_1: Huvetho, huveyyāvho. Huveyyaṃ, huveyyāmhe. Sattamiyā rūpāni. Ettha pana “upako ājīvako
anya-e0804n0:1695_2: ‘huveyya pāvuso’ti vatvā sīsaṃ okampetvā ummaggaṃ gahetvā pakkamī”ti pāḷiyaṃ huveyyāti
anya-e0804n0:1695_3: padassa dassanato nayavasena ‘huveyya, huveyyu”ntiādīni vuttāni. Hupeyyātipi pāṭho
anya-e0804n0:1695_4: dissati, yathā paccapekkhaṇā. Tabbasena “hupeyya, hupeyyuṃ. Hupeyyāsī”tiādinā vakārassa
anya-e0804n0:1696_0: Aparo nayo – heyya, heyyuṃ. Heyyāsi, heyyātha. Heyyāmi, heyyāma. Hetha, heraṃ. Hetho,
anya-e0804n0:1696_1: heyyāvho. Heyyaṃ, heyyāmhe. Imāni aṭṭhakathānayena gahitarūpāni. Ettha pana “na ca
anya-e0804n0:1696_2: uppādo hoti. Sace heyya, uppādassāpi uppādo pāpuṇeyyā”ti idampi nidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1697_0: Huva, huvu. Huve, huvittha. Huvaṃ, huvimha. Huvittha, hotha iccapi saññogatakāralopena
anya-e0804n0:1697_1: ahosīti attho. Tathāhi “kasirā jīvikā hothā”ti padassatthaṃ vaṇṇentehi “dukkhā no
anya-e0804n0:1697_2: jīvikā ahosī”ti attho vutto. huvire. Huvittho, huvivho. Huviṃ, huvimhe. Parokkhāya rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:1698: Ahuvā, ahuvū. Ahuvo, ahuvattha. Ahuvaṃ, ahuvamha. Ahuvattha, ahuvatthuṃ. Ahuvase, ahuvavhaṃ. Ahuviṃ, ahuvamhase. Hiyyattanīrūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:1699_0: Ettha ahuvamhaseti mayaṃ bhavamhaseti attho. “Akaramhasa te kiccaṃ, yaṃ balaṃ ahuvamhase”ti
anya-e0804n0:1699_1: pāḷiyaṃ pana “ahuva amhase” iti vā padacchedo kātabbo “ahu amhase”ti vā. Pacchimanaye
anya-e0804n0:1699_2: vakārāgamo “ahuvā”ti ca “ahū”ti ca dvinnampi ahosīti attho. Amhanti amhākaṃ. Seti
anya-e0804n0:1699_3: nipātamattaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – amhākaṃ yaṃ balaṃ ahosi, mayaṃ tena balena tava kiccaṃ akaramhāti.
anya-e0804n0:1700_0: Ahosi, ahuṃ, ahesuṃ. Ahuvo, ahuvittha. Ahositthaiccapi. Ahosiṃ, ahuvāsiṃ iccapi,
anya-e0804n0:1700_1: ahosimhā, ahumhā. Ahuvā, ahuvu, ahuvase, ahuvivhaṃ. Ahuvaṃ, ahuṃ iccapi. Ahuvimhe. Ajjataniyā rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:1701_0: Ettha “ahaṃ kevaṭṭagāmasmiṃ, ahuṃ kevaṭṭadārako”ti dassanato “ahu”nti vuttaṃ, ahosinti
anya-e0804n0:1701_1: attho. “Ahaṃ bhadante ahuvāsiṃ pubbe sumedhanāmassa jinassa sāvako”ti dassanato “ahuvāsi”nti
anya-e0804n0:1701_2: iccevattho. Tathā hi anekavaṇṇavimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ imissā pāḷiyā atthaṃ vaṇṇentehi
anya-e0804n0:1702: “Hessati, hehissati, hehiti, hohitī”ti imāni cattāri bhavissantiyā mātikāpadāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:1703_0: Idāni tāni vibhajissāmi – hessāti, hessanti. Hessasi, hessatha. Hessāmi, hessāma.
anya-e0804n0:1703_1: Hessate, hessante. Hessase, hessavhe. Hessaṃ, hessāmhe. Imāni “anāgatamhi addhāne,
anya-e0804n0:1707: Hohiti, hohinti. Hohisi. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Bhavissantiyā rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:1708: Ahuvissā, ahuvissaṃsu. Ahuvissase, ahuvissatha. Ahuvissaṃ, ahuvissamhā. Ahuvissatha, ahuvissisu. Ahuvissase, ahuvissavhe. Ahuvissiṃ, ahuvissāmhase. Kālātipattirūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:1709_0: Vhe avhāyane baddhāyaṃ sadde ca. Avhāyanaṃ pakkosanaṃ. Baddhāti ahaṅkāro, ghaṭṭanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1709_1: vā sārambhakaraṇaṃ vā. Saddo ravo. Vheti, vhāyati, avheti, avhāyati, avhāsi iccapi.
anya-e0804n0:1709_2: Kaccāyano māṇavakosmi rāja, anūnanāmo iti mavhayanti. Āsaddo upasaggova, so saññogaparattā
anya-e0804n0:1709_3: rasso jāto. Avhito. Anavhito tato āgā. Avhā, avhāyanā. Vāraṇavhayanā rukkhā. Kāmavhe
anya-e0804n0:1714_0: Ettha avhetīti sārambhavasena attano visayaṃ dassetuṃ saṅghaṭṭatīti attho. “Samāgate
anya-e0804n0:1714_1: ekasataṃ samagge, avhettha yakkho avikampamāno”ti etthāpi sārambhavasena ghaṭṭanaṃ avhāyanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0804n0:1717: Ettha pana avhāyanti varāvaranti varato varaṃ naccañca gītañca karontiyo sārambhaṃ karontīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1718_0: Pañha pucchāyaṃ. Bhikkhu garuṃ pañhaṃ pañhati. Pañho. Ayaṃ pana pāḷi “paripucchati
anya-e0804n0:1718_1: paripañhati idaṃ bhante kathaṃ imassa ko attho”ti. Pañhasaddo pulliṅgavasena gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1718_2: “Pañho maṃ paṭibhāti, taṃ suṇā”ti yebhuyyena pulliṅgappayogadassanato. Katthaci pana
anya-e0804n0:1718_3: itthiliṅgopi bhavati napuṃsakaliṅgopi. Tathā hi “pañhā mesā kusalehi cintitā. Koṇḍañña
anya-e0804n0:1718_4: pañhāni viyākarohī”ti taddīpikā pāḷiyo dissanti, liṅgavipallāso vā tattha daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1719_0: Pañha icchāyaṃ. Pañhati. Pañho. Ettha ca pañhoti ñātuṃ icchito attho. Idaṃ panettha
anya-e0804n0:1719_1: nibbacanaṃ pañhiyati ñātuṃ icchiyati soti pañhoti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “vissajjitamhi
anya-e0804n0:1719_2: pañhe”ti imissā nettipāḷiyā atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇentena “pañheti ñātuṃ icchite atthe”ti.
anya-e0804n0:1720: Miha secane. Mihati, ummihati. Megho, mehanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1721: Tattha ummihatīti passāvaṃ karoti. Meghoti mihati siñcati lokaṃ vassadhārāhīti megho, pajjunno. Mehananti itthīnaṃ guyhaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1722_0: Daha bhasmīkaraṇe dhāraṇe ca. Āgārāni aggi dahati. Ayaṃ puriso imaṃ itthiṃ ayyikaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1722_1: dahati, mama ayyikāti dhāretīti attho. Imassa purisassa ayaṃ itthī ayyikā hotīti
anya-e0804n0:1722_2: adhippāyo. Atra panāyaṃ pāḷi “sakyā kho ambaṭṭha rājānaṃ ukkākaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahantī”ti.
anya-e0804n0:1722_3: Agginā daḍḍhaṃ gehaṃ, dayhati, dayhamānaṃ. Dassa ḍādese “ḍahatī”ti rūpaṃ. “Ḍahantaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1722_4: bālamanveti, bhasmāchannova pāvako”tiādayo payogā ettha nidassanāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:1727: Bahi saddhe ca. Cakāro vuddhāpekkho. Bahati.
anya-e0804n0:1729: Araha maha pūjāyaṃ. Arahati. Arahaṃ, arahā. Mahati.
anya-e0804n0:1731: Tatra nikkilesattā ekantadakkhiṇeyyabhāvena attano katapūjāsakkārādīnaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena arahaṇīyo pūjanīyoti arahā, khīṇāsavo.
anya-e0804n0:1732: Īha cetāyaṃ. Īhati. Īhā. Īhā vuccati vīriyaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1734: Ahi pilahi gatiyaṃ. Ahati. Pilahati, ahi.
anya-e0804n0:1735: Ettha ca ahīti nippādopi samāno ahati gacchati gantuṃ sakkotīti ahi.
anya-e0804n0:1736: Garaha kalaha kucchane. Garahati. Garahā, kalahati, kalaho.
anya-e0804n0:1737: Varaha valaha padhāniye paribhāsanahiṃsādānesu ca. Varahati. Valahati. Varāho.
anya-e0804n0:1738_0: Ettha ca varāhoti sūkaropi hatthīpi vuccati. Tathā hi “eneyyā ca varāhā ca. Mahāvarāhova
anya-e0804n0:1738_1: nivāpapuṭṭho”tiādīsu sūkaro “varāho”ti nāmena vuccati. “Mahāvarāhassa nadīsu jaggato,
anya-e0804n0:1738_2: bhisaṃ ghasamānassā”tiādīsu pana hatthī “varāho”ti nāmena vuccati. Mahāvarāhassāti
anya-e0804n0:1739: Vehu jehu vāhu payatane. Vehati, jehati. Vāhati. Vāhano.
anya-e0804n0:1740: Vāhano vuccati asso. So hi vāhanti saṅgāmādīsu kicce uppanne payatanti vīriyaṃ karonti, etenāti vāhanoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1742: Ūha vitakke. Ūhati, āyūhati, viyūhati, byūhati apohati. Ūhanaṃ, āyūhanaṃ, byūho, apoho.
anya-e0804n0:1743: Tattha ūhatīti vitakketi, āyūhatīti vāyamati, viyūhatīti paṃsuṃ uddharati. Evaṃ byūhatīti etthāpi. Apohatīti chaḍḍeti, atha vā viveceti.
anya-e0804n0:1744: Gāhu viloḷane. Gāhati. Gāho, candaggāho, sūriyaggāho, nakkhattaggāho.
anya-e0804n0:1745: Gaha gahaṇe. Gahati, paggahati. Āhutiṃpaggahissāmi. Paggaho, paggāho.
anya-e0804n0:1747: Saha parisahane. Parisahanaṃ khanti. Sahati. Saho, asaho, asayho.
anya-e0804n0:1750: Guhū saṃvaraṇe. Guhati nigguhati. Guho, guyhako.
anya-e0804n0:1752: Duha papūraṇe. Duhati, dohati. Duyhamānā gāvī.
anya-e0804n0:1753: Diha upacaye. Dehati. Deho. Dehoti sarīraṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1754: Liha assādane. Lehati, palehati. Lehanīyaṃ. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “sunakhā himassa palihiṃsu pāde”ti. Ayaṃ panattho – sunakhā imassa kumārassa pādatale attano jivhāya palihiṃsūti.
anya-e0804n0:1755: Oha cāge. Ohati. Sabbamanatthaṃ apohati. Apoho.
anya-e0804n0:1758: Brūha vaḍḍhane. Uparūpari brūhatīti brahmā. Kārite “vivekamanubrūhetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti payogo.
anya-e0804n0:1759_0: Brahmāti tehi tehi guṇavisesehi brūhitoti brahmā. Brahmāti mahābrahmāpi vuccati tathāgatopi
anya-e0804n0:1759_1: brāhmaṇopi mātāpitaropi seṭṭhampi. “Sahasso brahmā dvisahasso brahmā”tiādīsu hi mahābrahmā
anya-e0804n0:1759_2: “brahmā”ti vuccati. “Brahmāti kho bhikkhave tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana”nti ettha tathāgato.
anya-e0804n0:1764: Ettha brāhmaṇo. “Brahmāti mātāpitaro, pubbācariyāti vuccare”ti ettha mātāpitaro. “Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetī”ti ettha seṭṭhaṃ. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:1766: Tathāgate ca seṭṭhe ca, brahmasaddo pavattatī”ti.
anya-e0804n0:1767: Aparo nayo – brahmāti tividhā brahmāno sammutibrahmāno upapattibrahmāno visuddhibrahmānoti.
anya-e0804n0:1769: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe,
anya-e0804n0:1776_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampatī”ti ca evamādīsu brahmasaddena upapattibrahmā. “Brahmacakkaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1776_1: pavattetī”tiādivacanato brahmanti ariyadhammo vuccati. Tato nibbattā avisesena sabbepi
anya-e0804n0:1776_2: ariyā visuddhibrahmāno nāma paramatthabrahmatāya. Visesato pana “brahmāti kho bhikkhave
anya-e0804n0:1776_3: tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato sammāsambuddho uttamabrahmā nāma sadevake
anya-e0804n0:1776_4: loke brahmabhūtehi guṇehi ukkaṃsapāramippattito. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:1779: Dhimha niṭṭhubhane. Dhimheti. “Paṭivāmagataṃ sallaṃ, passa dhimhāmi lohita”nti pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1787: Kaḷa made kakkasse ca. Kakkassaṃ kassasiyaṃ pharusabhāvo. Kaḷati.
anya-e0804n0:1796: Hīḷa anādare. Hīḷati. Hīḷā, hīḷiko, hīḷito.
anya-e0804n0:1805: Khuḷa bālye ca. Cakāro ghasanāpekkhako. Khuḷati.
anya-e0804n0:1814: Iti bhūvādigaṇe avaggantadhāturūpāni samattāni. Ettāvatā sabbāpi bhūvādigaṇe dhātuyo pakāsitā.
anya-e0804n0:1815_0: Idāni bhūvādigaṇikadhātūnaṃyeva kāci asamānasutikā, kāci asamānantikā. Tāsu kāci
anya-e0804n0:1815_1: samānatthavasena samodhānetvā pubbācariyehi vuttā, tāyeva dhātuyo ekadesena rūpavibhāvanādīhi
anya-e0804n0:1816_0: Hū bhū sattāyaṃ hoti, bhavati. Pahoti, pabhavati. Huveyya pāvuso. Sace uppādo heyya.
anya-e0804n0:1816_1: Ajesi yakkho naravīraseṭṭhaṃ, tatthappanādo tumulo bahūva. Ambā’yaṃ ahuvā pure. Ahu
anya-e0804n0:1816_2: rājā videhānaṃ. Pahūtaṃ me dhanaṃ sakka. Pahūtamariyo pakaroti puññaṃ. Pahūtavitto
anya-e0804n0:1816_3: puriso. Pahūtajivho bhagavā. Piyappabhūtā kalahā vivādā. Pacchāsamaṇena hotabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1816_4: Bhavitabbaṃ. Hotuṃ, hetuye, bhavituṃ. Hutvā, hutvāna. Bhavitvā, bhavitvāna.
anya-e0804n0:1817_0: Ettha pana “atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hetuye”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0804n0:1817_1: nahetuyeti abhavituṃ. Hūdhātuto tuṃpaccayassa tavepaccayassa vā tuye ādeso, ūkārassa
anya-e0804n0:1817_2: ca ekārādeso katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā hetubhāvāya na na sakkātipi attho. Ayaṃ panattho
anya-e0804n0:1817_3: idha nādhippeto, purimoyevattho adhippeto hotissa dhātuno payogabhāvāya udāharitapadassatthabhāvato.
anya-e0804n0:1817_4: Tattha pahotīti idaṃ vatthaṃ vipulabhāvena cīvaraṃ kātuṃ pahoti, no nappahoti. Pahotīti
anya-e0804n0:1817_5: vā puriso arayo jetuṃ sakkoti. Atha vā pahotīti hoti. Pabhavatīti sandati. Pahūtanti
anya-e0804n0:1817_6: vipulaṃ, mahantanti attho. Pahūtavittoti vipulavitto mahaddhano. Pahūtajivhoti suputhulasudīghasumudukajivho,
anya-e0804n0:1818_0: Gamu sappa gatiyaṃ. Gacchati, gamati, ghammati, āgacchati, uggacchati, atigacchati,
anya-e0804n0:1818_1: paṭigacchati, avagacchati, adhigacchati, anugacchati, upagacchati, apagacchati, vigacchati,
anya-e0804n0:1818_3: yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbāni. Sappati, saṃsappati, parisappati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:1819_0: Tattha gamatīti gacchati. Kārite “devadattaṃ gameti gamayatī”ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:1819_1: “Apāyaṃ gametīti apāyagamanīya”nti idamettha nidassanaṃ. Curādigaṇaṃ pattassa āpubbassa
anya-e0804n0:1819_2: imassa “āgameti, āgamayati, āgamento, āgamayamāno”ti suddhakatturūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:1820_0: Tattha āgametīti muhuttaṃ adhivāsetīti attho. Ghammatīti gacchati. Āgacchatīti āyāti.
anya-e0804n0:1820_1: Uggacchatīti uyyāti uddhaṃ gacchati. Atigacchatīti atikkamitvā gacchati. Paṭigacchatīti
anya-e0804n0:1820_2: puna gacchati. Avagacchatīti jānāti. Adhigacchatīti labhati jānāti vā. Anugacchatīti
anya-e0804n0:1820_3: pacchato gacchati. Upagacchatīti samīpaṃ gacchati. Apagacchatīti apeti. Vigacchatīti
anya-e0804n0:1820_4: vigamati. Nigacchatīti labhati. “Yasaṃ poso nigacchatī”ti idaṃ nidassanaṃ. Niggacchatīti
anya-e0804n0:1820_5: nikkhamati. Sappatīti gacchati. Saṃsappatīti saṃsaranto gacchati. Parisappatīti samantato gacchati.
anya-e0804n0:1821_0: Idāni pana viññūnaṃ sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane paramakosallajananatthaṃ sappayogaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1821_1: padamālaṃ kathayāma. Seyyathidaṃ? So gacchati, te gacchanti, gacchare. Tvaṃ gacchasi,
anya-e0804n0:1821_2: tumhe gacchatha. Ahaṃ gacchāmi, mayaṃ gacchāma. So gacchate, te gacchante. Tvaṃ gacchase,
anya-e0804n0:1821_3: tumhe gacchavhe. Ahaṃ gacche, mayaṃ gacchāmhe. Vattamānāya rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:1822_0: So gacchatu, te gacchantu. Tvaṃ gacchāhi, gaccha, gacchassu, tumhe gacchatha. Ahaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1822_1: gacchāmi, mayaṃ gacchāma. So gacchataṃ, te gacchantaṃ. Tvaṃ gacchassu, tumhe gacchavho.
anya-e0804n0:1822_2: Ahaṃ gacche, mayaṃ gacchāmase. Pañcamiyā rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:1823_0: So gaccheyya, gacche, te gaccheyyuṃ. Tvaṃ gaccheyyāsi, tumhe gaccheyyātha. Ahaṃ gaccheyyāmi,
anya-e0804n0:1823_1: mayaṃ gaccheyyāma, gacchemu. So gacchetha, te gaccheraṃ. Tvaṃ gacchetho, tumhe gaccheyyāvho.
anya-e0804n0:1823_2: Ahaṃ gaccheyyaṃ, mayaṃ gaccheyyāmhe. Sattamiyā rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:1824_0: So gaccha, te gacchu. Tvaṃ gacche, tumhe gacchittha, gañchittha. Ahaṃ gacchaṃ, mayaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1824_1: gacchimha, gañchimha. So gacchittha, gañchittha, te gacchire. Tvaṃ gacchittho, tumhe
