anya-e0804n0:1824_2: gacchivho. Ahaṃ gacchiṃ, gañchiṃ, mayaṃ gacchimhe. Parokkhāya rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:1825_0: So agacchā, te agacchū. Tvaṃ agacche, tumhe agacchatha. Ahaṃ agacchaṃ, mayaṃ agacchamhā.
anya-e0804n0:1825_1: So agacchatha, te agacchatthuṃ. Tvaṃ agacchase, tumhe agacchivhaṃ. Ahaṃ agacchaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1826_0: So gacchissati, te gacchissanti. Tvaṃ gacchissasi, tumhe gacchissatha. Ahaṃ gacchissāmi,
anya-e0804n0:1826_1: mayaṃ gacchissāma. So gacchissate, te gacchissante. Tvaṃ gacchissase, tumhe gacchissavhe.
anya-e0804n0:1826_2: Ahaṃ gacchissaṃ, mayaṃ gacchissāmhe. Bhavissantiyā rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:1827_0: So agacchissā, te agacchissaṃsu. Tvaṃ agacchisse, tumhe agacchissatha. Ahaṃ agacchissaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1827_1: mayaṃ agacchissāmhā. So agacchissatha, te agacchissisu. Tvaṃ agacchissase, tumhe
anya-e0804n0:1827_2: agacchissavhe. Ahaṃ agacchissaṃ, mayaṃ agacchissāmhase. Kālātipattiyā rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:1828_0: Tattha ajjataniyā kālātipattiyā ca akārāgamaṃ sabbesu purisesu sabbesu vacanesu labbhamānampi
anya-e0804n0:1828_1: sāsane aniyataṃ hutvā labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi “agacchi, gacchi, agacchissā,
anya-e0804n0:1828_2: gacchissā”tiādinā dve dve rūpāni dissanti. Gamati, gamanti. Gamatu, gamantu. Gameyya.
anya-e0804n0:1829_0: Idāni parokkhāhiyyattanajjatanīsu viseso vuccate – so puriso maggaṃ ga, sā itthī
anya-e0804n0:1829_1: ghara’māga. Te maggaṃ gu, tā ghara’māgu. Ekārassa akārādesaṃ tvaṃ maggaṃ ga, tvaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1829_2: ghara”māga. Tumhe maggaṃ guttha, tumhe ghara’māguttha. Ahaṃ maggaṃ gaṃ, ahaṃ ghara’māgaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1829_3: Ahaṃ taṃ purisaṃ anvagaṃ, mayaṃ maggaṃ gumha, mayaṃ gharaṃ āgumha, mayaṃ taṃ purisaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1830: “So maggaṃ agamā, te maggaṃ agamū” iccādi hiyyattaniyā rūpaṃ. “So agami, te agamuṃ, te guṃ” iccādi ajjataniyā rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1831_0: Idāni tesaṃ padarūpāni pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ kiñci suttaṃ kathayāma – “sopāgā samitiṃ
anya-e0804n0:1831_1: vanaṃ. Athettha pañcamo āgā. Āguṃ devā yasassino. Māhaṃ kākova dummedho, kāmānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1831_2: vasamanvagaṃ. Agamā rājagahaṃ buddho. Vaṅkaṃ agamu pabbataṃ. Brāhmaṇā upagacchu ma”nti evamādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:1832: Ga gu ga guttha gaṃ gumha, agu agamu agamuṃ;
anya-e0804n0:1834_0: Idāni nāmikapadāni vuccante – gato, gantā, gacchaṃ, gacchantī, gacchantaṃ kulaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1834_1: sahagataṃ, gati, gamanaṃ, gamo, āgamo, avagamo, gantabbaṃ, gamanīyaṃ, gammaṃ, gammamānaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1834_2: gamiyamānaṃ, go, mātugāmo, hiṅgu, jagu, indagū, medhago iccādīni, kārite – gacchāpeti,
anya-e0804n0:1834_3: gacchāpayati, gaccheti, gacchayati, gammeti. Kamme – gammati, gamiyati, adhigammati,
anya-e0804n0:1834_4: adhigamiyati. Tumantāditte “gantuṃ, gamituṃ, gantvā, gantvāna, gamitvā, gamitvāna,
anya-e0804n0:1834_5: gamiya, gamiyāna, gamma, āgamma, āgantvā, adhigamma, adhigantvā” iccādīni. Sappadhātussa
anya-e0804n0:1834_6: pana “sappo, sappinī, pīṭhasappī, sappi” iccādīni rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:1835_0: Tattha sahagatasaddo tabbhāve vokiṇṇe nissaye ārammaṇe saṃsaṭṭheti imesu atthesu
anya-e0804n0:1835_1: dissati. Tattha “yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandirāgasahagatā”ti tabbhāve veditabbo,
anya-e0804n0:1835_2: nandirāgabhūtāti attho. “Yāyaṃ bhikkhave vīmaṃsā kosajjasahagatā kosajjasampayuttā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1835_3: vokiṇṇe veditabbo, antarantarā uppajjamānena kosajjena vokiṇṇāti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0804n0:1835_5: nissāya aṭṭhikasaññaṃ bhāvetvā paṭiladdhanti attho. “Lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā
anya-e0804n0:1835_6: samāpattīnaṃ arūpasahagatānaṃ vā”ti ārammaṇe, rūpārūpārammaṇānanti attho. “Idaṃ sukhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1835_7: imāya pītiyā sahagataṃ sahajātaṃ sampayutta”nti saṃsaṭṭhe, imissā pītiyā saṃsaṭṭhanti
anya-e0804n0:1838: Gatīti gatigati nibbattigabhi ajjhāsayagati vibhavagati nipphattigati ñāṇagatīti bahuvidhā gati nāma.
anya-e0804n0:1839_0: Tattha “taṃ gatiṃ pecca gacchāmī”ti ca “yassa gatiṃ na jānanti, devā gandhabbamānusā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1839_1: ca ayaṃ gatigatināma. “Imesaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlavantānaṃ neva jānāmi gatiṃvā
anya-e0804n0:1839_2: agatiṃvā”ti ayaṃ nibbattigati nāma. “Evaṃ kho te ahaṃ brahme gatiñca jānāmi jutiñca
anya-e0804n0:1839_3: jānāmī”ti ayaṃ ajjhāsayagati nāma. “Vibhavo gati dhammānaṃ, nibbānaṃ arahato gatī”ti
anya-e0804n0:1839_4: ayaṃ vibhavagati nāma. “Dve gatiyo bhavanti anaññā”ti ayaṃ nipphattigati nāma. “Taṃ
anya-e0804n0:1839_5: tattha gatimā dhibhimā”ti ca “sundaraṃ nibbānaṃ gato”ti ca ayaṃ ñāṇagati nāma. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:1842: Gacchatīti go. Mātuyā samabhāvaṃ missībhāvañca gacchati pāpuṇātīti mātugāmo. Rogaṃ hiṃsantaṃ gacchatīti hiṅgu.
anya-e0804n0:1846_0: Jagūti cutito jātiṃ gacchatīti jagu. Indriyena gacchatīti indagū. Atha vā indabhūtena
anya-e0804n0:1846_1: kammunā gacchatīti indagu. “Hindagū”tipi pāḷi. Tattha hindanti maraṇaṃ. Taṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0804n0:1846_2: hindagū. Sabbametaṃ sattādhivacanaṃ, liṅgato pulliṅgaṃ. Medhagoti attano nissayañca
anya-e0804n0:1846_3: parañca medhamāno hiṃsamāno gacchati pavattatīti medhago, kalaho. “Tato sammanti
anya-e0804n0:1846_4: medhagā”ti ettha hi kalaho medhagasaddena bhagavatā vutto. Gamitvāti ettha –
anya-e0804n0:1848: Tato vinesi bhagavā, gantvā gantvā tahiṃ tahi”nti
anya-e0804n0:1849_0: Ayaṃ pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Sappoti sappatīti sappo, saṃsappanto gacchatīti attho. Tenāha
anya-e0804n0:1849_1: āyasmā sāriputto “yo kāme parivajjeti, sappasseva padāsiro”ti imissā pāḷiyā niddese
anya-e0804n0:1849_2: “sappo vuccati ahi. Kenaṭṭhena sappo? Saṃsappanto gacchatīti sappo. Bhujanto gacchatīti
anya-e0804n0:1849_3: bhujago. Urena gacchatīti urago. Pannasiro gacchatīti pannago. Sarīrena sappatīti
anya-e0804n0:1849_4: sarīsapo. Bile sayatīti bilāsayo. Dāṭhā tassa āvudhoti dāṭhāvudho. Visaṃ tassaghoranti
anya-e0804n0:1849_5: ghoraviso. Jivhā tassa duvidhāti dujivho. Dvīhi jivhāhi rasaṃ sāyatīti dvirasaññū”ti.
anya-e0804n0:1849_6: Sappinīti uragī. Pīṭhasappīti pīṭhena sappati gacchatīti pīṭhasappī, paṅguḷo. Sappīti
anya-e0804n0:1849_7: yo na paribhuñjati, tassa balāyuvaḍḍhanatthaṃ sappati gacchati pavattatīti sappi, ghataṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1850: Sakka ṭeka laṅgha gatyattā. Sakkati, nisakkati, parisakkati. Nisakko, parisakkanaṃ. Ṭekati. Ṭīkā. Laṅghati, ullaṅghati, olaṅghati, laṅghako, ullaṅghikā pīti.
anya-e0804n0:1851: Ke re ge sadde. Kāyati. Rāyati. Gāyati. Jātakaṃ. Rā. Gītaṃ. Kāyituṃ. Rāyituṃ, gāyituṃ. Kāyitvā. Rāyitvā. Gāyitvā.
anya-e0804n0:1852_0: Tattha jātakanti jātaṃ bhūtaṃ atītaṃ attano caritaṃ kāyati katheti bhagavā etenāti
anya-e0804n0:1852_1: jātakaṃ. Jātakapāḷi hi idha jātakanti vuttaṃ. Aññatra pana jātaṃ evaṃ jātakanti gahetabbā.
anya-e0804n0:1852_2: Tathā hi jātakasaddo pariyattiyampi vattati “itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhamma”ntiādīsu,
anya-e0804n0:1852_3: jātiyampi vattati “jātakaṃ samodhānesī”tiādīsu. Rā vuccati saddo. Gītanti gāyanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1853: Khe je se khaye. Khāyati. Jāyati. Sāyati. Khayaṃ gacchatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:1854_0: Ettha pana siyā “nanu ca bho khāyatīti padassa khādatīti vā paññāyatīti vā attho
anya-e0804n0:1854_1: bhavati, tathā jāyatīti padassa nibbattatīti attho, sāyatīti padassa rasaṃ assādetīti
anya-e0804n0:1854_2: attho, evaṃ sante bho kasmā idha evaṃ attho tumhehi kathiyatī”ti? Saccaṃ, dhātūnantu
anya-e0804n0:1854_3: anekatthattā evaṃ attho kathetuṃ labbhati. Tathā hi “appassutāyaṃ puriso, balibaddova
anya-e0804n0:1854_4: jīratī”ti ettha jīratīti ayaṃ saddo jaraṃ pāpuṇātīti atthaṃ avatvā vaḍḍhatīti atthameva
anya-e0804n0:1855: Gu ghu ku u sadde. Gavati. Ghavati. Kavati. Avati.
anya-e0804n0:1856: Khu ru ku sadde. Khoti. Roti. Koti.
anya-e0804n0:1857: Cu ju pu plu gā se gatiyaṃ. Cavati. Javati. Pavati. Plavati. Gāti. Seti. Cavanaṃ, cuti. Javanaṃ, javo. Pavanaṃ, plavanaṃ. Gānaṃ. Setu. Poto. Plavo.
anya-e0804n0:1858_0: Ettha gānanti gamanaṃ. Pototi pavati gacchati udake etenāti poto, nāvā. Tathā plavati
anya-e0804n0:1858_1: na sīdatīti plavo, nāvā eva. “Bhinnaplavo sāgarasseva majjhe”ti hi jātakapāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n0:1859: Dhe the saddasaṅghātesu. Dhāyati. Thāyati. Bhāve – dhiyati, thiyati. Itthī. Thī.
anya-e0804n0:1860: De te pālane. Dāyati. Dayā. Tāṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1862: Ati adi bandhane. Antati. Andati. Antaṃ. Andu.
anya-e0804n0:1863: Jutasubha ruca dittiyaṃ. Jotati. Sobhati. Rocati, virocati.
anya-e0804n0:1864: Aka aga kuṭilāyaṃ gatiyaṃ. Akati. Agati.
anya-e0804n0:1866: Sala hula cala kampane. Salati. Hulati. Calati. Kusalaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1867_0: Ettha ca kucchite pāpake dhamme salayatīti kusalaṃ, hetukattuvasenidaṃ nibbacanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1867_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “kucchite pāpake dhamme salayanti calayanti kampenti
anya-e0804n0:1867_2: viddhaṃsentīti kusalā”ti hetukattuvasena attho kathito. Idaṃ saladhātuvasena kusalasaddassa
anya-e0804n0:1867_3: nibbacanaṃ. Aññesampi dhātūnaṃ vasena kusalasaddassa nibbacanaṃ bhavati. Tathā hi
anya-e0804n0:1867_4: aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ aññānipi nibbacanāni dassitāni. Kathaṃ? “Kucchitena vā ākārena sayantīti
anya-e0804n0:1867_5: kusā, te akusaladhammasaṅkhāte kuse lunanti chindantīti kusalā. Kucchitānaṃ vā sānato
anya-e0804n0:1867_6: tanukaraṇato ñāṇaṃ kusaṃ nāma, tena kusena lātabbāti kusalā, gahetabbā pavattetabbāti
anya-e0804n0:1867_7: attho. Yathā vā kusā ubhayabhāgagataṃ hatthappadesaṃ lunanti, evamimepi uppannānuppannabhāvena
anya-e0804n0:1867_8: ubhayabhāgagataṃ kilesapakkhaṃ lunanti, tasmā kusā viya lunantītipi kusalā”ti. Evaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1867_9: aññānipi nibbacanāni dassitāni. Tatra “dhammā” iti padāpekkhaṃ katvā tadanurūpaliṅgavacanavasena
anya-e0804n0:1867_10: “kusalā”ti niddeso kato, idha pana sāmaññaniddesavasena “kusala”nti napuṃsakekavacananiddeso
anya-e0804n0:1867_11: amhehi kato. Puññavācako hi kusalasaddo ārogyavācako ca ekantena napuṃsakaliṅgo,
anya-e0804n0:1867_12: itaratthavācako pana tiliṅgiko, yathā kusalo phasso, kusalā vedanā. Kusalaṃ cittanti.
anya-e0804n0:1867_13: Kusalasaddo imasmiṃ bhūvādigaṇe lādhātusaladhātuvasena nipphattiṃ gatoti veditabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1869: Vitthārato ca saṅkhepā, bhūvādīnaṃ gaṇo mayā;
anya-e0804n0:1874: Tyādyantāni ca rūpāni, syānyantāni ca sabbaso.
anya-e0804n0:1883: Tumantāni ca rūpāni, tvādyantāni ca viññūnaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:1893: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1901_0: Rudhi āvaraṇe. Rudhidhātu āvaraṇe vattati. Ettha āvaraṇaṃ nāma pidahanaṃ vā parirundhanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1901_1: vā palibuddhanaṃ vā harituṃ vā appadānaṃ, sabbametaṃ vaṭṭati. Rundhati, rundhiti,
anya-e0804n0:1901_2: rundhīti, rundheti, avarundheti. Kammani – maggo purisena rundhiyati. Rodho, orodho,
anya-e0804n0:1901_3: virodho, paṭivirodho, viruddho, paṭiviruddho, pariruddho. Rundhituṃ, parirundhituṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1902_0: Tatra rodhoti cārako. So hi rundhati pavesitānaṃ kurūrakammantānaṃ sattānaṃ gamanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1902_1: āvaratīti rodhoti vuccati. Orodhoti rājubbarī, sā pana yathākāmacāraṃ carituṃ appadānena
anya-e0804n0:1902_2: orundhiyati avarundhiyatīti orodho. Virodhoti ananukūlatā. Paṭivirodhoti punappunaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1902_3: ananukūlatā. Viruddhoti virodhaṃ āpanno. Paṭiviruddhoti paṭisattubhāvena virodhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1902_4: āpanno. Pariruddhoti gahaṇatthāya samparivārito. Vuttañhi “yathā arīhi pariruddho,
anya-e0804n0:1903: Muca mocane. Migaṃ bandhanā muñcati. Muñcanaṃ, mocanaṃ. Dukkhappamocanaṃ, moco.
anya-e0804n0:1904: Mocoti cettha aṭṭhikakadalīrukkho. Muñcituṃ. Muñcitvā. Kārite “moceti, mocetuṃ, mocetvā”tiādīni.
anya-e0804n0:1905: Rica virecane. Riñcati. Riñcanaṃ, virecanaṃ, vireko, virecako. Riñcituṃ. Riñcitvā.
anya-e0804n0:1906_0: Sica paggharaṇe. Udakena bhūmiṃ siñcati. Puttaṃ rajje abhisiñci. Abhiseko. Muddhābhisitto
anya-e0804n0:1906_1: khattiyo. Siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvaṃ, sittā te lahumessati. Sittaṭṭhānaṃ. Siñcituṃ. Siñcitvā.
anya-e0804n0:1907_0: Yuja yoge. Yuñjati, anuyuñjati. Kammani “yuñjiyatī”ti rūpāni. Keci “yuñjate”ti icchanti.
anya-e0804n0:1907_1: Yuñjanaṃ, saṃyogo, anuyogo, bhāvanānuyutto, saññogo, saññojanaṃ, atthayojanā. Dīghaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1907_2: santassa yojanaṃ. Yuñjituṃ, anuyuñjituṃ. Anuyuñjitvā. Yojeti. Tattha saṃyojananti
anya-e0804n0:1911_0: Bhuja pālanabyavaharaṇesu. Pālanaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ. Byavaharaṇaṃ ajjhoharaṇaṃ. Bhuñjati,
anya-e0804n0:1911_1: paribhuñjati, saṃbhuñjati. Dāsaparibhogena paribhuñji. Kārite “bhojeti bhojayatī”tiādīni
anya-e0804n0:1911_2: rūpāni. Bhojanaṃ, sambhogo, mahibhujo, gāmabhojako, upabhogo, paribhogo. Bhutto odano
anya-e0804n0:1911_3: bhavatā. Sace bhutto bhaveyyāhaṃ. Odanaṃ bhutto bhuttavā bhuttāvī. Tumantāditte “bhuñjituṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1911_4: paribhuñjituṃ, bhojetuṃ, bhojayituṃ, bhuñjitvā, bhuñjitvāna, bhuñjiya, bhuñjiyāna,
anya-e0804n0:1911_5: bhojetvā, bhojetvāna, bhojayitvā, bhojayitvāna” iccādīni parisaddādīhi visesitabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:1912_0: Tatra bhuñjatīti bhattaṃ bhuñjati, bhojanīyaṃ bhuñjati. Tathā hi “khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1912_1: vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Apica kadāci khādanīyepi “bhuñjatī”ti vohāro
anya-e0804n0:1912_2: dissati. “Phalāni khuddakappāni, bhuñja rāja varāvara”nti hi vuttaṃ. Paribhuñjatīti
anya-e0804n0:1912_3: cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati, piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjati, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ paribhuñjati,
anya-e0804n0:1912_4: paṭisevatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Teneva ca paṭisevatīti paribhuñjatīti attho saṃvaṇṇiyati.
anya-e0804n0:1912_5: Apica “kāme bhuñjatī”ti ca “pañcakāmaguṇe paribhuñjatī”ti ca dassanato pana bhuñjanaparibhuñjanasaddā
anya-e0804n0:1912_6: paṭisevanatthena katthaci samānatthāpi hontīti avagantabbā. Saṃbhuñjatīti sambhogaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1912_7: karoti, ekato vāsaṃ karotīti attho. Ettha siyā “nanu ca bho atra bhujadhātu pālanabyavaharaṇesu
anya-e0804n0:1912_8: vutto, so kathaṃ ettakesupi atthesu vattatī”ti? Vattateva, anekatthā hi dhātavo,
anya-e0804n0:1912_9: te upasaggasahāye labhitvāpi anekatthatarāva honti. Ito paṭṭhāya tumantādīni rūpāni
anya-e0804n0:1912_10: na vakkhāma. Yattha pana viseso dissati, tattha vakkhāma.
anya-e0804n0:1914: Bhidi vidāraṇe. Bhindati. Anāgatatthe vattabbe “bhejjissati, bhindissatī”ti dvidhā bhavanti rūpāni. Pāpake akusale dhamme bhindatīti bhikkhu. Tenāha –
anya-e0804n0:1915: “Na tena bhikkhu so hoti, yāvatā bhikkhate pare;
anya-e0804n0:1916: Visaṃ dhammaṃ samādāya, bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā.
anya-e0804n0:1919_0: Idañca khīṇāsavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, sekkhaputhujjanasamaṇāpi yathāsambhavaṃ “bhikkhū”ti
anya-e0804n0:1919_1: vattabbataṃ pāpuṇantiyeva. Saṅghaṃ bhindatīti saṅghabhedako. Devadattena saṅgho bhinno,.
anya-e0804n0:1919_2: Bhindiyatīti bhinnoti hi nibbacanaṃ. Na te kaṭṭhāni bhinnāni. Bhindatīti bhettā.
anya-e0804n0:1920_0: Chidi dvedhākaraṇe. Chindatīti chedako, evaṃ chettā. Kese chettuṃ vaṭṭati. Chindiyatīti
anya-e0804n0:1920_1: chinno. Chinnopi rukkho punadeva rūhati. Idaṃ pana bhidichididvayaṃ divādigaṇaṃ patvā
anya-e0804n0:1920_2: “bhijjati chijjatī”ti suddhakattuvācakaṃ rūpadvayaṃ janeti, tasmā “bhijjatīti bhinno”tiādinā
anya-e0804n0:1921: Tadi hiṃsānādaresu. Tandati. Tandī, taddu. Taddati kacchu.
anya-e0804n0:1922: Udi pasavakiledanesu. Pasavanaṃ sandanaṃ. Kiledanaṃ tindatā. Undati. Undūro, samuddo.
anya-e0804n0:1923: Vida lābhe. Vindati. Govindo, vitti. Ettha vittīti anubhavanaṃ, vedanā vā.
anya-e0804n0:1924: Vida tuṭṭhiyaṃ. Vindati, nibbindati. Nibbindanaṃ. Virajjati. Nibbindo kāmaratiyā. Vitti, vittaṃ, vedo. Labhati atthavedaṃ dhammavedaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1925_0: Ettha vittīti somanassaṃ. “Vitti hi maṃ vindati suta disvā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Vittanti
anya-e0804n0:1925_1: vittijananattā vittasaṅkhātaṃ dhanaṃ. Vedoti ganthopi ñāṇampi somanassampi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1925_2: “Tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū”tiādīsu hi gantho “vedo”ti vuccati. “Brāhmaṇaṃ vedagumabhijaññā
anya-e0804n0:1925_3: akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asatta”ntiādīsu ñāṇaṃ. “Ye vedajātā vicaranti loke”tiādīsu somanassaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1926: Vedaganthe ca ñāṇe ca, somanasse ca vattati;
anya-e0804n0:1928: Lipa limpane. Limpati, limpako. Avalepo. Avalepoti ahaṅkāro.
anya-e0804n0:1929: Lupa acchedane. Lumpati. Vilumpako, vilutto vilopo.
anya-e0804n0:1931: Yadā caññe vilumpanti, so vilutto vilumpatīti.
anya-e0804n0:1932_0: Pisa cuṇṇane. Piṃsati. Pisako. Pisuṇā vācā. Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “attano piyabhāvaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1932_1: parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ yāya vācāya bhāsati, sā pisuṇā vācā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ niruttilakkhaṇena
anya-e0804n0:1934: Ahiṃsakoti me nāmaṃ, hiṃsakassa pure sato;
anya-e0804n0:1935: Ajjāhaṃ saccanāmomhi, na naṃ hiṃsāmi kiñcanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1936: Hiṃsitabbaṃ kiṃsatīti sīho. Ādiantakkharavipallāsavasena saddasiddhi, yathā “kantanaṭṭhena takka”nti. Vihesako, vihesanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1937: Sumbha pahāre. Yo no gāvova sumbhati. Parisumbhati. Sumbhoti. Atrime pāḷito payogā –
anya-e0804n0:1940: Datvā ca no pakkamati, bahudukkhaṃ anappaka”nti ca,
anya-e0804n0:1942_0: Aññattha pana aññāpi vuttā. Tā idha anupapattito na vuttā. Kecettha maññeyyuṃ, yathā
anya-e0804n0:1942_1: bhūvādigaṇe “saki saṅkāyaṃ khaji gativekalle”tiādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ paṭiladdhavaggantabhāvassa
anya-e0804n0:1942_2: niggahītāgamassa vasena “saṅkati khañjatī”ti rūpāni bhavanti, tathā imasmiṃ rudhādigaṇe
anya-e0804n0:1942_3: “muca mocane kati chedane”tiādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ paṭiladdhavaggantabhāvassa niggahītāgamassa
anya-e0804n0:1942_4: vasena “muñcati kantatī”tiādīni rūpāni bhavanti. Evaṃ sante ko imesaṃ tesañca visesoti?
anya-e0804n0:1942_5: Ettha vuccate – ye bhūvādigaṇasmiṃ anekassarā asaṃyogantā ikārantavasena niddiṭṭhā,
anya-e0804n0:1942_6: te ākhyātattañca nāmikattañca patvā suddhakattuhetukattuvisayesu ekantato niggahītāgamena
anya-e0804n0:1942_7: nipphannarūpā bhavanti, na katthacipi tesaṃ vinā niggahītāgamena rūpappavatti dissati.
anya-e0804n0:1942_8: Taṃ yathā? Saṅkati, saṅkā, khañjati, khañjo iccādi. Ayaṃ anekassarānaṃ ikārantavasena
anya-e0804n0:1943_0: Ye ca rudhādigaṇasmiṃ anekassarā asaṃyogantvā akārantavasena vā ukārantavasena vā
anya-e0804n0:1943_1: niddiṭṭhā, te ākhyātattaṃ patvā suddhakattuvisayeyeva ekantato niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā
anya-e0804n0:1943_2: bhavanti, na hetukattuvisaye. Nāmikattaṃ pana sahaniggahītāgamena vinā ca niggahītāgamena
anya-e0804n0:1943_3: nipphannarūpā bhavanti. Yattha vinā niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā, tattha sasaṃyogarūpāyeva
anya-e0804n0:1943_4: bhavanti. Taṃ yathā? Muñcati, muñcāpeti, moceti, mocāpeti. Chindāpeti. Chedeti, chedāpeti.
anya-e0804n0:1943_5: Chindanaṃ, chedo. Muñcanaṃ, mocanaṃ. Kantati, kantanaṃ, sallakatto. Piṭṭhimaṃsāni
anya-e0804n0:1943_6: attano, sāmaṃ ukkacca khādasi iccādīni. Tattha ukkaccāti ukkantitvā, chinditvāti attho.
anya-e0804n0:1944_0: Nanu ca bho evaṃ sante ākhyātanāmikabhāvaṃ patvā suddhakattuhetukattuvisayesu ekantato
anya-e0804n0:1944_1: paṭiladdhaniggahītāgamehi saki khaji ādīhiyeva rudhādigaṇikehi bhavitabbaṃ, na pana
anya-e0804n0:1944_2: mucachidiādīhīti? Tanna, mucachidiādīhiyeva rudhādigaṇikehi bhavitabbaṃ rucadhātuyā
anya-e0804n0:1944_3: samānagatikattā, tathā hi yathā “rundhissa, rundhayati, rundhāpeti, rundhanaṃ, rodho,
anya-e0804n0:1944_4: virodho”tiādīsu niggahītāgamāniggahītāgamavasena dvippakārāni rūpāni dissanti, tathā
anya-e0804n0:1945_1: lakkhaṇaṃ vuttanti? Saccaṃ, taṃ pana kriyāpadattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yadi ca nāmikapadattampi
anya-e0804n0:1945_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ bhaveyya, “virodho”tiādīnaṃ dassanato vāsaddaṃ pakkhipitvā vattabbaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1945_3: siyā, na ca vāsaddaṃ pakkhipitvā vuttaṃ, tena ñāyati kriyāpadattaṃyeva sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e0804n0:1946_0: Nanu ca bho evaṃ sante sakikhajiādīnaṃ niccaṃ saniggahītāgamakriyāpadattaṃyeva sandhāya
anya-e0804n0:1946_1: “rudhādito niggahītapubbañcā”ti idaṃ vuttanti sakkā mantunti? Na sakkā, sakikhajiādīnaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1946_2: rudhadhātuyā asamānagatikattā nāmikatte dvippakārassa asambhavato. Tathā hi yesaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1946_3: yā nāmikatte niggahītāgamāniggahītāgamavasena dvippakāravantatā, sā eva tesaṃ rudhādigaṇabhāvassa
anya-e0804n0:1946_4: lakkhaṇaṃ. Tañca sakikhajiādīnaṃ natthi. “Saṅkā khañjo”tiādinā hi nāmatte ekoyeva
anya-e0804n0:1946_5: pakāro dissati saniggahītāgamo, “kamu padavikkhepe”iccādīnaṃ pana “kamo, kamanaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1946_7: abbhāsavisaye pavattattā sā dvippakāravantatā rudhādigaṇabhāvassa lakkhaṇaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0804n0:1946_8: tasmā abbhāsavisaye pavattaṃ niggahītāgamaṃ vajjetvā yā dvippakāravantatā, sāyeva
anya-e0804n0:1946_9: rudhādigaṇikabhāvassa lakkhaṇanti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo atīva sukhumo
anya-e0804n0:1947: Rudhādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:1951_0: Divu kīḷāvijigisābyavahārajutithutikantigatisattīsu. Ettha ca kīḷāti laḷanā, vihāro
anya-e0804n0:1951_1: vā. Laḷanāti ca laḷitānubhavanavasena ramaṇaṃ. Vihāro iriyāpathaparivattanādinā vattanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1951_2: Vijigisāti vijayicchā. Byavahāroti vohāro. Jutīti sobhā. Thutīti thomanā. Kantīti
anya-e0804n0:1951_3: kamanīyatā. Gatīti gamanaṃ. Sattīti sāmatthiyaṃ. Imesu atthesu divudhātu vattati.
anya-e0804n0:1952_0: Ettha devoti tividhā devā sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti. Tesu mahāsammatakālato
anya-e0804n0:1952_1: paṭṭhāya lokena “devā”ti sammatattā rājarājakumārādayo sammutidevā nāma. Devaloke
anya-e0804n0:1952_2: upapannā upapattidevā nāma. Khīṇāsavā visuddhidevā nāma. Vuttampi cetaṃ “sammutidevā
anya-e0804n0:1952_3: nāma rājāno deviyo kumārā. Upapattidevā nāma bhummadeve upādāya taduttaridevā. Visuddhidevā
anya-e0804n0:1953_0: Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ – dibbanti kāmaguṇajhānābhiññācittissariyādīhi kīḷanti,
anya-e0804n0:1953_1: tesu vā viharantīti devā. Dibbanti yathābhilāsitaṃ visayaṃ appaṭighātena gacchantīti
anya-e0804n0:1953_2: devā. Dibbanti yathicchitanipphādane sakkontīti devā. Atha vā taṃtaṃbyasananittharaṇatthikehi
anya-e0804n0:1953_3: saraṇaṃ parāyaṇanti devanīyā abhitthavanīyāti devā. Sobhāvisesayogena kamanīyāti vā devā.
anya-e0804n0:1954_0: Ettha ca thutikanti atthā kammasādhanavasena daṭṭhabbā, kīḷādayo cha atthā kattusādhanavasena.
anya-e0804n0:1954_1: Keci pana “divu kīḷāvijigisābyavahārajutithutigatīsū”ti paṭhanti. Keci “gatī”ti padaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1954_2: vihāya “jutithutīsū”ti paṭhanti. Keci “thutī”ti padaṃ vihāya “jutigatīsū”ti paṭhanti,
anya-e0804n0:1954_3: keci pana divudhātuṃ “sattithutika”ntiatthepi icchanti. Tenāha abhidhammassa anuṭīkākāro
anya-e0804n0:1955_0: Idaṃ pana yathāvuttesu sammutidevādīsu paccekaṃ nibbacanaṃ – dibbanti kīḷanti attano
anya-e0804n0:1955_1: visaye issariyaṃ karontīti devā, rājāno. Dibbanti kīḷanti pañcahi kāmaguṇehi, paṭipakkhe
anya-e0804n0:1955_2: vā vijetuṃ icchanti, voharanti ca lokassa yuttāyuttaṃ, jotanti paramāya sarīrajutiyā,
anya-e0804n0:1955_3: thomiyanti tabbhāvatthikehi, kāmiyanti daṭṭhuṃ sotuñca sobhāvisesayogena, gacchanti
anya-e0804n0:1955_4: ca yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ appaṭihatagamanena, sakkonti ca ānubhāvasampattiyā taṃtaṃkiccaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1955_5: nipphādetunti devā, cātumahārājikādayo. Kīḷanti paramāya jhānakīḷāya, vijetuṃ icchanti
anya-e0804n0:1955_6: paṭipakkhaṃ, paramasukhumañāṇavisesavisayaṃ atthañca voharanti, jotanti sabbakilesadosakalusābhāvā
anya-e0804n0:1955_7: paramavisuddhāya ñāṇajutiyā, thomiyanti ca viññātasabhāvehi paramanimmalaguṇavisesayogato,
anya-e0804n0:1955_8: kāmiyanti ca anuttarapuññakkhettatāya daṭṭhuṃ sotuṃ pūjituñca, gacchanti ca amatamahānibbānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1955_9: apaccāgamanīyāya gatiyā, sakkonti ca cittācāraṃ ñatvā te te satte hite niyojetuṃ
anya-e0804n0:1956_0: Devasadda “viddhe vigatavalāhake deve”tiādīsu ajaṭākāse āgato. “Devo ca thokaṃ thokaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1956_1: phusāyatī”tiādīsu meghe. “Ayañhi deva kumāro”tiādīsu khattiye. “Ahaṃ deva sakalajambudīpe
anya-e0804n0:1956_2: aññassa rañño santike kiñci bhayaṃ na passāmī”tiādīsu issarapuggale. “Pañcahi kāmaguṇehi
anya-e0804n0:1956_3: samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti devo maññe”tiādīsu upapattideve. “Devātidevaṃ naradammasārathi”ntiādīsu visuddhideve āgato.
anya-e0804n0:1957_0: Devīti rājabhariyāpi devadhītāpi “devī”ti vuccati. Devassa bhariyāti hi devī, sāpi
anya-e0804n0:1957_1: atthato “dibbatīti devī”ti vattabbā, yathā “bhikkhatīti bhikkhunī”ti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1958_0: Devatāti devaputtopi brahmāpi devadhītāpi. “Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya
anya-e0804n0:1958_1: ruttiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā”tiādīsu hi devaputto “devatā”ti vutto “devoyeva devatā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1958_2: katvā, tathā “tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā, brahmā vimānā abhinikkhamitvā”tiādīsu brahmāno.
anya-e0804n0:1960: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā”ti-
anya-e0804n0:1963: Devo suro ca vibudho, nijjaro amaro maru;
anya-e0804n0:1966: Khi khaye. Khiyati. Khayo. Khiyanaṃ. Rāgakkhayo.
anya-e0804n0:1967: Khi nivāse kodhahiṃsāsu ca. Khiyati. Na gacchasi yamakkhayaṃ. Nāgadānena khiyanti.
anya-e0804n0:1968: Tattha khiyatīti nivasati. Yamakkhayanti yamanivesanaṃ. Khiyantīti kujjhanti hiṃsanti vā.
anya-e0804n0:1969: Ghā gandhopādāne. Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyituṃ ghāyitvā.
anya-e0804n0:1970_0: Ruca rocane. Rocanaṃ ruci. Bhattaṃ me ruccati. Bhattampitassa na ruccati. Pabbajjā
anya-e0804n0:1970_1: mama ruccati. Ruccituṃ, ruccitvā. Keci pana imasmiṃ divādigaṇe “ruca dittimhī”ti
anya-e0804n0:1970_2: paṭhanti. Taṃ na yuttaṃ katthacipi dittisaṅkhātasobhanatthavācakassa rucadhātuno
anya-e0804n0:1970_3: “ruccatī”ti rūpābhāvato. Tasmā evaṃ sallakkhetabbaṃ, dittirucīnaṃ vācako rucadhātu
anya-e0804n0:1970_4: bhuvādigaṇiko. Tassa hi “rocati, virocati. Ekattamuparocita”nti rūpāniyeva bhavanti,
anya-e0804n0:1970_5: na “ruccatī”ti rūpaṃ. Ruciyāyeva vācako pana divādigaṇikopi hoti curādigaṇikopi.
anya-e0804n0:1970_6: Tassa hi divādigaṇikakāle “gamanaṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti rūpaṃ. Curādigaṇikakāle “kiṃ
anya-e0804n0:1970_7: nu jātiṃ na rocesī”ti rūpaṃ. Āpubbo ce ācikkhane vattati, “āroceti, ārocayatī”ti rūpāni dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:1971: Muca mokkhe. Dukkhato muccati. Saddhāya adhimuccati. Mutti, vimutti, adhimutti, muccamāno.
anya-e0804n0:1972: Uca samavāye. Uccati. Oko, ūkā, ukkā.
anya-e0804n0:1973: Okoti udakampi āvāsopi. “Okapuṇṇehi cīvarehī”ti ca, “vārijova thale khitto, okamokatamubbhato”ti cettha payogo. Ūkāti sīse nibbattakimiviseso.
anya-e0804n0:1974_0: Ukkāti dīpikādayo vuccanti. “Ukkāsu dhāriyamānāsū”ti hi āgataṭṭhāne dīpikā “ukkā”ti
anya-e0804n0:1974_1: vuccati. “Ukkaṃ bandheyya, ukkaṃ bandhitvā, ukkāmukhaṃ ālimpeyyā”ti āgataṭṭhāne aṅgārakapallaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1974_2: “Kammārānaṃ yathā ukkā, anto jhāyati no bahī”ti āgataṭṭhāne kammāruddhanaṃ. “Evaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1974_3: vipāko ukkāpāto bhavissatī”ti āgataṭṭhāne vātavego “ukkā”ti vuccati. “Saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṃ
anya-e0804n0:1974_4: gahetvā ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyyā”ti āgataṭṭhāne suvaṇṇakārānaṃ mūsā “ukkā”ti veditabbā. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0804n0:1978: Che chedane. Chiyati, chiyanti. Avacchitaṃ, avacchātaṃ. Chetvāna moḷiṃ varagandhavāsitaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1979: Saja saṅge. Saṅgo laganaṃ. Sajjati. Sajjanaṃ, sajjito, satto.
anya-e0804n0:1980: Yuja samādhimhi. Samādhānaṃ samādhi, kāyakammādīnaṃ sammāpayogavasena avippakiṇṇatāti attho. Yujjati. Yogo, yogī.
anya-e0804n0:1983: Passāmi vo’ha’mattānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu”nti
anya-e0804n0:1984: Vacanato avassaṃ kātuṃ yujjati upapajjatīti yogoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1985_0: Ranja rāge. Rajjati. Virajjati. Rajjamāno, rajjaṃ, rajjanto, rāgo, virāgo, rajjanaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:1985_1: virajjanaṃ, rajanīyaṃ. Upasaggavasena añño attho bhavati. Samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati,
anya-e0804n0:1986: Tattha virāgoti virajjanti ettha saṃkilesadhammāti virāgo, nibbānaṃ maggo ca.
anya-e0804n0:1987: Vijī bhayacalanesu. Vijjati, saṃvijjati. Saṃvego, saṃvejanīyaṃ. Ubbijjati. Ubbego, ubbiggahadayo.
anya-e0804n0:1988: Luja vināse. Lujjatīti loko. Lopo, lutti, lujjanaṃ, lutto.
anya-e0804n0:1989: Ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ. Ṭhāyati. Ṭhāyī, ṭhiti, ṭhānaṃ, ṭhito, tatraṭṭho, tiṭṭhaṃ, kappaṭṭhāyī, āsabhaṭṭhānaṭṭhāyī.
anya-e0804n0:1992: Pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Lāpaṃ gocaraṭṭhāyinanti ca. Tattha ṭhāyāmīti tiṭṭhāmi.
anya-e0804n0:1993: Ḍigatiyaṃ. Ḍiyati. Ḍemāno. Ḍino vā. “Ucce sakuṇa ḍemāna, pattayāna vihaṅgama. Vajjesi kho tvaṃ vāmūru”nti nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1995: Tā pālane. Tāyati. Aghassa tātā. So nūna kapaṇo tāto, ciraṃ rujjati assame. Tāṇaṃ, parittaṃ, gottaṃ. Tvaṃ khosi upāsaka katakalyāṇo katabhīruttāṇo.
anya-e0804n0:1996: Tatra parittanti mahātejavantatāya samantato sattānaṃ bhayaṃ upaddavaṃ upasaggañca tāyati rakkhatīti parittaṃ, gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:1997: Nata gattavināme. Gattavināmo gattavikkhepo. Naccati. Naccaṃ. Nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto.
anya-e0804n0:1998: Dā sodhane. Dāyati. Dānaṃ. Anuyogadāpanatthaṃ. Anuyogaṃ datvā. Dānaṃ datvā.
anya-e0804n0:1999: Dā supane. Dāyati. Niddāyati. Niddāyanaṃ, niddāyamāno, niddāyanto.
anya-e0804n0:2000_0: Dādāne. Puriso dānaṃ dāyati. Āpubbo gahaṇe. Adinnaṃ ādiyati. Sīlaṃ samādiyati. Kamme
anya-e0804n0:2000_1: – purisena dānaṃ dīyati, adinnaṃ ādiyati. Kārite – ādapeti, samādapeti, ādapayati,
anya-e0804n0:2002: Ettha ca parittanti samantato khaṇḍitattā parittaṃ. Appamattakañhi gomayapiṇḍaṃ parittanti vuccati. Tasmā parittanti appakassa nāmaṃ kāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa appesakkhattā.
anya-e0804n0:2003: Dā suddhiyaṃ. Dāyati. Vodāyati. Vodānaṃ. Akammakoyaṃ dhātu. Tathā hi “vodāyati sujjhati etenāti vodānaṃ, samathavipassanā”ti nettisaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2005: Tatra dīnoti parikkhīṇañātidhanādibhāvena dukkhito. Ādīnavotiādīnaṃ dukkhaṃ vāti adhigacchati etenātiādīnavo, doso.
anya-e0804n0:2007: Bhidi bhijjane. Bhijjanadhammaṃ bhijjati. Bhijjatīti bhinno. Bhijjanaṃ bhedo.
anya-e0804n0:2008: Chidi chijjane. Suttaṃ chijjati. Chijjatīti chinno. Evaṃ chiddaṃ. Chijjanaṃ chedo.
anya-e0804n0:2009: Khidi dīniye. Dīnabhāvo dīniyaṃ, yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Khijjati, khinno, akhinnamati, khedo, khedaṅgato lokahitāya nātho.
anya-e0804n0:2010: Ettha khedaṅgatoti kāyikadukkhasaṅkhātaṃ parissamaṃ patto, dukkhamanubhavīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:2011_0: Pada gatiyaṃ. Pajjati. Maggaṃ paṭipajjati. Paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjati. Addhānamaggappaṭipanno
anya-e0804n0:2011_1: hoti, phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati. Āpattiṃ āpajjati. Akammakampi bhavati, tesaṃ adhammo
anya-e0804n0:2012: Ettha ca pajjoti maggo. Byagghapajje saddulapathe jātoti byagghapajjo, evaṃnāmako kulaputto. Sampadiyati ñāpiyati dhammo etenāti sampadāyo, akkhātā.
anya-e0804n0:2013: Vida sattāyaṃ. Sattā vijjamānākāro. Vijjati, saṃvijjati. Jātavedo, vijjā, avijjā, vidito.
anya-e0804n0:2014_0: Tattha jātavedoti aggi. So hi jātova vedayati dhūmajāluṭṭhānena paññāyati, tasmā
anya-e0804n0:2014_1: jātavedoti vuccati. Vijjāti dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ viditaṃ karotīti vijjā, ñāṇaṃ. Avijjāti
anya-e0804n0:2014_2: khandhānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ, āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññaṭṭhaṃ, saccānaṃ tathaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:2014_3: indriyānaṃ adhipatiyaṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti avijjā. Dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2014_4: catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti avijjā, moho.
anya-e0804n0:2015_0: Mada ummāde. Ummādo nāma muyha naṃ vā sativippavāso vā cittavikkhepo vā. Majjati,
anya-e0804n0:2015_1: pamajjati. Matto, surāmadamatto. Matto ahaṃ mahārāja. Puttamaṃsāni khādayiṃ. Mattahatthī, pamatto, ummatto.
anya-e0804n0:2016: Appamādo amataṃ padaṃ, pamādo maccuno padaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:2017: Appamattā na miyyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā.
anya-e0804n0:2018: Mida sinehane. Mejjati. Mettā, metti, mittaṃ, mitto.
anya-e0804n0:2019: Antaradhā adassane. Antarapubbo dhādhātu vijjamānassa vatthuno adassane vattati. Antaradhāyati. Antaradhānaṃ, antaradhāyanto. Sā devatā antarahitā. Antarāpidhāyati.
anya-e0804n0:2020: Budha avagamane. Avagamanaṃ jānanaṃ. Bujjhati, buddho, buddhi, buddhaṃ, bodho, bodhi. Bujjhitā saccāni. Sakalaṃ buddho, buddhavā, vibodheti, bodhetā, buddho, vibuddho iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:2021_0: Tatra buddhoti bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho. Atha vā pāramitāparibhāvitāya
anya-e0804n0:2021_1: paññāya sabbampi ñeyyaṃ abujjhīti buddho. Keci pana kammenapi buddhasaddassa siddhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2021_2: icchantā evaṃ nibbacanaṃ karonti “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavāti adhigataguṇavisesehi
anya-e0804n0:2021_3: khīṇāsavehi bujjhitabboti buddho”ti. Vitthāro pana niddese vuttanayena gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:2021_4: Buddhīti bujjhatīti buddhi. Evaṃ buddhaṃ bodho bodhi ca. Atha vā bujjhanaṃ buddhi.
anya-e0804n0:2021_5: Evaṃ bodho bodhi ca, sabbametaṃ paññāyādhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2022_0: Idāni bodhisaddassa atthuddhāraṃ vadāma. Bodhīti hi rukkhopi maggopi sabbaññutaññāṇampi
anya-e0804n0:2022_1: nibbānampi evaṃpaṇṇattiko puggalopi vuccati, tathā hi “bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti
anya-e0804n0:2022_2: ca, “antarā ca bodhiṃ antarā ca gaya”nti ca āgataṭṭhāne rukkho bodhīti vuccati. “Catūsu
anya-e0804n0:2022_3: maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne maggo. “Pappoti bodhiṃ varabhūri sumedhaso”ti āgataṭṭhāne
anya-e0804n0:2022_4: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. “Patvāna bodhiṃ amataṃ asaṅkhata”nti āgataṭṭhāne nibbānaṃ. “Bodhi
anya-e0804n0:2022_5: bhante rājakumāro bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī”ti “ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccatī”ti
anya-e0804n0:2024: Rukkhe magge ca nibbāne, ñāṇe sabbaññutāya ca;
anya-e0804n0:2027_0: Ettha ca koci payogo tumantādīni ca rūpāni vuccante – “guyhamatthamasambuddhaṃ, sambodhayati
anya-e0804n0:2027_1: yo naro. Paraṃ sambuddhumarahati. Bujjhituṃ, buddhuṃ, bujjhitvā, bujjhitvāna, bujjhituna,
anya-e0804n0:2027_2: buddhiya, buddhiyāna, buddhā, buddhāna” iti bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:2028: Tatra asambuddhanti parehi aññātaṃ, “asambodha”ntipi pāṭho, paresaṃ bodhetuṃ ayuttanti attho. Sambuddhunti saṃbujjhituṃ. Buddhāti bujjhitvā, evaṃ buddhānāti etthāpi.
anya-e0804n0:2029_0: Keci pana “nāmarūpaparicchede ‘bodhimaggena budhvā’ti ca, “budhvā bodhitale yamāha
anya-e0804n0:2029_1: sugato’ti ca dhakāravakārasaññogavato padassa dassanato tvāpaccayantabhāvato ca dhakāravakārasaṃyogavasena
anya-e0804n0:2029_2: “budhvā”ti padasiddhi icchitabbā”ti vadanti, taṃ tādisassa padarūpassa buddhavacane
anya-e0804n0:2029_3: adassanato ca, buddhavacanassa ananukūlatāya ca, parisuddhe ca porāṇapotthake vakārasaṃyogavigatassa
anya-e0804n0:2029_4: “bodhimaggena buddhā”tica, “buddhā bodhitale”ti ca padassa dassanato na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2029_5: Tathā hi na tādiso pāṭho buddhavacanassa anukūlo hotīti. Na hi buddhavacane vassasatampi
anya-e0804n0:2029_6: vassasahassampi pariyesantā tādisaṃ vakāradhakārasaññogapadaṃ passissanti. Evaṃ “budhvā”ti
anya-e0804n0:2029_7: padarūpassa buddhavacanassa ananukūlatā daṭṭhabbā. Tañhi sakkaṭaganthe kataparicayabhāvena
anya-e0804n0:2029_8: vañcitehi vidūhi icchitaṃ, na saddhammanītividūhi. Ettha imāni nidassanapadāni veditabbāni –
anya-e0804n0:2030: Ko maṃ viddhā nilīyati. Laddhā macco yadicchati. Laddhāna pubbāpariyaṃ visesaṃ, adassanaṃ maccurājassa gacche.
anya-e0804n0:2033_0: Tattha viddhāti vijjhitvā. Laddhāti labhitvā. Laddhānāti labhitvāna. Diṭṭhāti disvā.
anya-e0804n0:2033_1: Iti “viddhā laddhā laddhāna diṭṭhā”ti padāni tvāpaccayena saddhiṃ gatānipi saññogavasena
anya-e0804n0:2033_2: vakārapaṭibaddhāni na honti, tasmā “buddhā buddhāna” iccetānipi “laddhā laddhāna”
anya-e0804n0:2033_3: iccādīni viya parihīnavakārasaññogāni eva gahetabbāni. Ye “budhvā”ti rūpaṃ icchanti
anya-e0804n0:2033_4: paṭhanti ca, maññe te tvāpaccayo vañceti, tena te vañcanaṃ pāpuṇanti, tasmā tādisaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2033_5: rūpaṃ aggahetvā yo saddanītiyaṃ saddavinicchayo vutto, soyeva āyasmantehi sārato paccetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:2034_0: Budha bodhane. Sakammakākammakoyaṃ dhātu. Tathā hi bodhanasadduccāraṇena jānanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2034_1: vikasanaṃ niddakkhayo ca gahito, tasmā “budha ñāṇe, budha vikasane, budha niddakkhaye”ti
anya-e0804n0:2034_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Bujjhati bhagavā, dhamme bujjhati, pabujjhati, padumaṃ bujjhati. Puriso
anya-e0804n0:2035: Saṃdhā sandhimhi. Saṃpubbo dhādhātu sandhimhi vattati. Nevassa maddī bhākuṭi, na sandhiyati na rodati. Na sandhiyatīti idaṃ aññehi pakaraṇehi asādhāraṇaṃ divādirūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2036: Dhanu yācane. Mātā hi tava irandhati, vidharassa hadayaṃ dhaniyyati. Idampi asādhāraṇaṃ divādirūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2038: Yudha sampahāre. Yujjhati. Yodho, yuddhaṃ, caraṇāyudho, yakārassa vakārabhāve “āvudha”nti rūpaṃ. Tatra caraṇāyudhoti kukkuṭo.
anya-e0804n0:2039: Kudha kope. Kujjhati. Kodho, kujjhanā, kujjhitattaṃ. Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati.
anya-e0804n0:2040: Sudha soceyye. Soceyyaṃ sucibhāvo. Sujjhati. Suddhi, visuddhi, sujjhanaṃ, suddho, visuddho, parisuddho. Kārite “sodheti, sodhako” iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:2042: Radha hiṃsāyaṃ. Rajjhati, virajjhati, aparajjhati. Aparādho.
anya-e0804n0:2043: Rādha sādha saṃsiddhiyaṃ. Rādhayati, sādhayati. Ārādhanaṃ, sādhanaṃ. Saparahitaṃ sādhetīti sādhu, sappuriso. Accantaṃ sādhetabbanti sādhu, laddhakaṃ sundaraṃ dānasīlādi.
anya-e0804n0:2044: Vidha vijjhane. Vijjhati. Paṭivijjhati. Khaṇa viddha, vidhu, vijjhanako, viddho, paṭividdho, vijjhanaṃ, vedho, paṭivedho, vijjhitvā, viddhā, viddhāna. Ko maṃ viddhā nilīyati.
anya-e0804n0:2045: Idha vuddhiyaṃ. Ijjhati, samijjhati. Iddhi, ijjhanaṃ, samijjhanaṃ, iddho. Tattha iddhīti ijjhanaṃ iddhi. Ijjhanti vā sattā etāya iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi.
anya-e0804n0:2046: Gidhu abhikaṅkhāyaṃ. Gijjhati, gijjho. Gaddho. Gaddhabādhipubbo. Kāmagiddho na jānāsi. Gedho.
anya-e0804n0:2047: Rudhi āvaraṇe. Rujjhati, virujjhati, paṭivirujjhati. Virodhako, viruddho. Rodho, virodho, paṭivirodho, anuvirodho.
anya-e0804n0:2048: Anuvidhā anukaraṇe. Anuvipubbo dhādhātu anukriyāyaṃ vattati. Puriso aññassa purisassa kriyaṃ anuvidhīyati tatrāyaṃ pāḷi –
anya-e0804n0:2052: Anurudha kāme. Kāmo icchā. Anupubbo rudhadhātu icchāyaṃ vattati. Anuruddho, anurodho. Anusmāti kiṃ virodho.
anya-e0804n0:2053: Tattha anuruddhoti anurujjhati paṇītaṃ paṇītaṃ vatthuṃ kāmetīti anuruddho. Anurodhoti anukūlatā. Ayaṃ pāḷi “so uppannaṃ lābhaṃ anurujjhati, alābhe paṭivirujjhatī”ti.
anya-e0804n0:2054: Byadha tāḷane. Byajjhati. Byādho. Byādhoti luddho. Taṃ taṃ migaṃ byajjhati tāḷeti hiṃsatīti byādho.
anya-e0804n0:2056: Mana ñāṇe. Maññati, avamaññati, atimaññati. Seyyādivasena maññatīti māno. “Maññanā, maññitattaṃ, māno, ahaṅkāro, unnati, ketu, paggaho, avalepo”ti pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n0:2057_0: Jana janane. Sakammakoyaṃ dhātu. “Jaññatī”timassa rūpaṃ, karotīti attho. Kārite –
anya-e0804n0:2057_1: janesi phussatī mamaṃ. Janayati, sukhaṃ janeti, janayatīti janako, pitā, yo koci
anya-e0804n0:2057_2: vā nibbattetā. Puthu kilese janetīti puthujjano. Tattha “janeti janayatī”ti rūpāni
anya-e0804n0:2057_3: curādigaṇaṃ patvā suddhakatturūpāni bhavanti. Karotīti hi tesaṃ attho. Hetukattuvasenapi
anya-e0804n0:2058_0: Janī pātubhāve. Īkārantoyaṃ akammako dhātu, vipubbo ce, sakammako. Putto jāyati,
anya-e0804n0:2058_1: jāto. Puthu kilesā jāyanti etthāti puthujjano. Jananaṃ jāti, “sañjāti, nibbatti,
anya-e0804n0:2058_2: abhinibbatti, khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo”ti pariyāyā. Itthī puttaṃ vijāyati, itthī puttaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2058_3: vijātā. So puriso vijātamātuyāpi amanāpo. Upavijaññā itthī. Kārite “jāpeti, jāpayati.
anya-e0804n0:2059_0: Hana hiṃsāyaṃ. Idha hiṃsāvacanena ghaṭṭanaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Saddo sotamhi haññati. Paṭihaññati.
anya-e0804n0:2059_1: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokile sote paṭihaññati. Imāni kattupadāni. Bhūvādigaṇaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2059_2: pana patvā “lohena ve haññati jātarūpaṃ, na jātarūpena hananti loha”nti pāḷiyaṃ “haññatī”ti
anya-e0804n0:2059_3: padaṃ kammapadaṃ, jātarūpaṃ lohena kammārehi haññatīti attho. “Hanantī”ti padaṃ kattupadaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:2059_4: lohaṃ jātarūpena kammārā hanantīti hi attho. Ettha hananaṃ paharaṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2060: Rūpa ruppane. Ruppanaṃ kuppanaṃ ghaṭṭanaṃ pīḷanaṃ. Ruppati. Rūpaṃ, ruppanaṃ. Imassa pana “rūpa rūpakriyāya”nti curādigaṇe ṭhitassa “rūpeti rūpayatī”ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:2061_0: Tattha rūpanti kenaṭṭhena rūpaṃ? Ruppanaṭṭhena rūpaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “kiñca
anya-e0804n0:2061_1: bhikkhave rūpaṃ? Ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā ‘rūpa’nti vuccati. Kena ruppati? Sītenapi
anya-e0804n0:2061_2: ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppati, jighacchāyapi ruppati, pipāsāyapi ruppati, ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassenapi
anya-e0804n0:2061_3: ruppati, ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā ‘rupa’nti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0804n0:2062_0: Tattha ruppatīti kuppati ghaṭṭiyati pīḷiyati, bhijjatīti attho. Bhijjatīti vikāraṃ
anya-e0804n0:2062_1: āpajjati, vikārāpatti ca sītādisannipāte visadisarūpappavattiyeva. Ettha ca kuppatīti
anya-e0804n0:2062_2: etena kattuatthe rūpapadasiddhiṃ dasseti, ghaṭṭiyati pīḷiyatīti etehi kammatthe.
anya-e0804n0:2062_3: Kopādikriyāyeva hi ruppanakriyāti, so pana kattubhūto kammabhūto ca attho bhijjamāno
anya-e0804n0:2062_4: nāma hotīti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṃ “bhijjatīti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2063_0: Atha vā ruppatīti rūpanti kammakattutthe rūpapadasiddhi vuttā. Vikāro hi ruppananti
anya-e0804n0:2063_1: vuccati, teneva bhijjatīti atthoti kammakattutthena bhijjatīti saddena atthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0804n0:2063_2: Tattha yadā kammatthe “ruppatī”ti padaṃ, tadā “sītenā”tiādi kattuatthe karaṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2063_3: Yadā pana “ruppatī”ti padaṃ kattuatthe kammakattuatthe vā, tadā hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2064_0: Rūpasaddo khandha bhava nimitta paccaya sarīra vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu atthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n0:2064_1: Ayañhi “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”nti ettha rūpakkhandhe vattati. “Rūpūpapattiyā
anya-e0804n0:2064_2: maggaṃ bhāvetī”ti ettha rūpabhave. “Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhārūpāni passatī”ti
anya-e0804n0:2064_3: ettha kasiṇanimitte. “Sarūpā bhikkhave uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no arūpā”ti
anya-e0804n0:2064_4: ettha paccaye. “Ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti ettha sarīre. “Cakkhuñca
anya-e0804n0:2064_5: paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti ettha vaṇṇe. “Rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno”ti
anya-e0804n0:2065: Khandhe bhave nimitte ca, sarīre paccayepi ca;
anya-e0804n0:2067: Kupa kope. Kuppati. Kuppanti vātassapi eritassa. Kopo, pakopo. Vacīpakopaṃ rakkheyya.
anya-e0804n0:2074_0: Lubha giddhiyaṃ. Lubbhati. Attanoyeva jaṇṇukaṃ olubbha tiṭṭhati. Lubbhanaṃ, lobho,
anya-e0804n0:2074_1: lubbhitvā, lubbhitvāna, lubbhiya, lubbhiyāna, olubbhitvā, olubbhitvāna, olubbhiya,
anya-e0804n0:2075_0: Tattha lobhoti lubbhanti tena sattā, sayaṃ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti
anya-e0804n0:2075_1: lobho. Ettha pana “lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṃ rāgo taṇhā tasiṇā mucchā ejā vanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2076: Khubha sañcalane. Khubbhati, saṃkhubbhati. Khubbhitthanagaraṃ. Saṅkhobho. Kārite – khobheti, khobhayati.
anya-e0804n0:2077: Samu upasame. Cittaṃ sammati, upasammati, vūpasammati, samaṇo, santi, santo.
anya-e0804n0:2078_0: Ettha samaṇoti sammati santacitto bhavatīti samaṇo. Kāritavasena pana kilese sameti
anya-e0804n0:2078_1: upasametīti samaṇoti nibbacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi “yaṃ sametīti idaṃ ariyaṃ. Samayatītidha
anya-e0804n0:2079: Samu khede nirodhe ca. Khedo. Kilamanaṃ. Nirodho abhāvagamanaṃ. Addhānamaggappaṭipannassa kāyo sammati. Aggi sammati. Santo.
anya-e0804n0:2080_0: Santasaddo “dīghaṃ santassa yojana”ntiādīsu kilantabhāve āgato. “Ayañca vitakko ayañca
anya-e0804n0:2080_1: vicāro santā honti samitā”tiādīsu niruddhabhāve. “Adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro
anya-e0804n0:2080_2: duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto”tiādīsu santañāṇagocaratāyaṃ. “Upasantassa sadā
anya-e0804n0:2080_3: satīmato”tiādīsu kilesavūpasame. “Santo have sabbhi pavedayantī”tiādīsu sādhūsu.
anya-e0804n0:2080_4: “Pañcime bhikkhave mahācorā santo saṃvijjamānā”tiādīsu atthibhāve. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:2084: Damu damane. Dammati. Danto, damo, damanaṃ. Kārite “cittaṃ dameti, damayatī”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:2085_0: Tattha damoti indriyasaṃvarādīnaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ. “Saccena danto damasā upeto. Vedantagū
anya-e0804n0:2085_1: vusitabrahmacariyo”ti ettha hi indriyasaṃvaro “damo”ti vutto. “Yadi saccā damā cāgā,
anya-e0804n0:2085_2: khantyā bhiyyodha vijjatī”ti ettha paññā “damo”ti vuttā. “Dānena damena saṃyamena
anya-e0804n0:2085_3: saccavajjenā”ti ettha uposathakammaṃ “damo”ti vuttaṃ. “Damupasamenā”ti ettha khanti
anya-e0804n0:2088: Yā gatipāpuṇesu. Yāyati, yāyanti. Pariyāyo. Yāyamāno mahārājā, addā sīdantare nage. Yāyanto. Yāyantamanuyāyati. Yātānuyāyī. Yāyituṃ, yāyitvā iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:2089_0: Ettha pariyāyasaddassa atthuddhāro vuccate, pariyāyasaddo vāradesanākāraṇesu samantato
anya-e0804n0:2089_1: gantabbaṭṭhāne ca sadise ca vattati. “Kassa nu kho ānanda ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo
anya-e0804n0:2089_2: ovaditu”ntiādīsu hi vāre vattati. “Madhupiṇḍikapariyāyotinaṃ dhārehī”tiādīsu desanāyaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2089_3: “Imināpi kho te rājañña pariyāyena evaṃ hotū”tiādīsu kāraṇe. “Pariyāyapatho”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:2089_4: samantato gantabbaṭṭhāne. “Kopasaddo khobhapariyāyo”tiādīsu sadise vattati. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0804n0:2093: Vilī vilīnabhāve. Sappi vilīyati. Kārite vilāpayati.
anya-e0804n0:2095: Sivu tantasantāne. Sibbati, saṃsibbati. Sibbaṃ, sibbanto. Kārite – sibbeti, sibbayati, sibbāpeti, sibbāpayati.
anya-e0804n0:2099: Sā antakammani. Siyati anavasesato mānaṃ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasanti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2100: Sā assādane. Rasaṃ sāyati. Sāyitaṃ, sāyanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2101: Si pāṇippasave. Sūyati, pasūyati. Pasūtā gāvī.
anya-e0804n0:2104_0: Kilisa upatāpe. Kilissati, saṃkilissati. Kileso, saṃkileso. Ikāralope klissati kleso
anya-e0804n0:2104_1: iccādīni. Apica malīnatāpi kilisasaddena vuccati, kiliṭṭhavatthaṃ paridahati. “Cittena
anya-e0804n0:2106: Līsa appībhāve. Lissati. Leso. “Lisa lesane”tipi paṭhanti ācariyā.
anya-e0804n0:2107: Tasa pipāsāyaṃ. Tassati, paritassati. Paritassanā, tasiṇā, tasito.
anya-e0804n0:2108: Dusa dosane. Dussati. Doso, dosanaṃ, dosito.
anya-e0804n0:2109: Dusa appītiyaṃ. Dussati, padussati. Doso, padoso, duṭṭho, paduṭṭho, dūsako, dūsito, dūsanā.
anya-e0804n0:2110: Asu khepe. Khepo khipanaṃ. Assati. Nirassatiādiyati ca dhammaṃ. Issāso.
anya-e0804n0:2111: Ettha ca nirassatīti chaḍḍeti satthāraṃ tathā dhammakkhānādīni. Issāsoti usuṃ assati khipatīti issāso, dhanuggaho.
anya-e0804n0:2113_0: Ettha ca yena vinayakammena “nissāya te vatthabba”nti niyassiyati bhajāpiyatīti niyaso
anya-e0804n0:2113_1: bālaṃ, taṃ niyasakammaṃ nāma. “Karohi me yakkha niyasakamma”nti ettha pana niggahakammaṃ niyasakammaṃ nāma.
anya-e0804n0:2115: Vasa sadde. Sakuṇo vassati. Adhamo migajātānaṃ, siṅgālo tāta vassati. Maṇḍūko vassati.
anya-e0804n0:2116: Nasa adassane. Nassanadhammaṃ nassati. Panassati. Vinassati. Nassa vasali, cara pire vinassa. Naṭṭho, vinaṭṭho. Kārite – nāseti, nāsayati.
anya-e0804n0:2117_0: Susa sosane. Paṇṇaṃ sussati. Kārite – vāto paṇṇaṃ soseti, sosayati. Kamme – vātena
anya-e0804n0:2117_1: paṇṇaṃ sosiyati. Bhāve kriyāpadamappasiddhaṃ. Soso, sukkhaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ. Sussaṃ, sussanto. Sussamāno dahado.
anya-e0804n0:2118: Tusa tuṭṭhiyaṃ. Tussati, santussati. Santuṭṭhi, santoso, tosanaṃ, tuṭṭhabbaṃ, tussitabbaṃ, tusitā. Kārite “toseti” iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:2119_0: Hā parihāniyaṃ. Hāyati, parihāyati. Hāyanti tattha vaḷavā. Bhāve “bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2119_1: vā lomahaṃso vā, so pahīyissatī”ti ca “rāgo pahīyatī”ti ca rūpaṃ. Kamme kriyāpadamappasiddhaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2119_2: “Rāgo pahīyatī”ti idaṃ pana “hā cāge”ti vuttassa bhūvādigaṇikadhātussa rūpaṃ “rāgaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2120: Naha bandhane. Nayhati. Upanayhati. Sannayhati. Sannāho. Sannaddho.
anya-e0804n0:2121_0: Muha vecitte. Muyhati, sammuyhati, pamuyhati. Moho, pamoho. Mūḷho. Momūho puriso.
anya-e0804n0:2121_1: Momūhaṃ cittaṃ. Kārite – moheti. Pamohako. Ettha ca momūhoti avisadatāya momūho, mahāmūḷhoti attho.
anya-e0804n0:2123_0: Nhā soceyye. Nhāyati, appakkharānaṃ bahubhāve nahāyati. Nahāyitvā, nhāyitvā. Nahānaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:2123_1: nhānaṃ. Sīsaṃ nhāto. Ettha ca sīsaṃ nhātoti sīsaṃ dhovitvā nhātoti attho gahetabbo
anya-e0804n0:2124: Siniha pītiyaṃ. Siniyhati. Sinehako, sinehito, siniddho. Putte sineho ajāyatha. Ikāralopena sneho. Tathā hi “nisnehamabhikaṅkhāmī”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n0:2125: Viriḷa lajjāyaṃ codane ca. Viriḷito. Lajjāvasena attho pasiddho, na codanāvasena. Tathā hi “viriḷitoti lajjito”ti atthasaṃvaṇṇakā garū vadanti “lajjanākārappatto”ti ca.
anya-e0804n0:2126: Divādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:2130_0: Su savane. “Suṇoti, suṇāti. Suṇiṃsu. Paṭissuṇi, paṭissuṇiṃsu. Assosi, assosuṃ. Paccassosi,
anya-e0804n0:2130_1: paccassosuṃ” iccādīni, “suṇissati, sossati” iccādīni ca bhavanti. Abbhāsavisaye “sussūsati,
anya-e0804n0:2130_2: sussūsā” iccādīni. Anabbhāsavisaye – sāvako, soto, suṇaṃ, suṇanto, suṇamāno, suyyamāno,
anya-e0804n0:2130_3: savanaṃ, sutaṃ. Asuyitthāti vā sutaṃ. Sutavā, sotaṃ, soṇo, suṇituṃ, sotuṃ. Suṇitvā,
anya-e0804n0:2130_4: suṇiya, suṇiyāna, sutvā, sutvāna. Kārite – sāveti, sāvayati. Kamme – saddo suyyati,
anya-e0804n0:2131_0: Tattha sāvakoti antevāsiko, so duvidho āgatapphalo anāgatapphalo ca, tattha āgatapphalo
anya-e0804n0:2131_1: savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātoti “sāvako”ti vuccati, itaro garūnaṃ ovādaṃ suṇātīti
anya-e0804n0:2132: Ettha sutasaddassa atthuddhāraṃ vadāma saddhiṃ sotasaddassa atthuddhārena. Sutasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca anupapadena, sutasaddo ca –
anya-e0804n0:2135_0: Tathā hi “senāya pasuto”tiādīsu gacchantoti attho. “Sutadhammassa passato”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:2135_2: attho. “Ye jhānappasutā dhīrā”tiādīsu anuyuttāti attho. “Tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappaka”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:2135_3: upacitanti attho. “Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññāta”ntiādīsu saddoti attho. “Bahussuto
anya-e0804n0:2139_1: saddaṃ sutvā”tiādīsu sotaviññāṇe. “Dibbāya sotadhātuyā”tiādīsu ñāṇasote. “Yāni sotāni
anya-e0804n0:2139_2: lokasminti, yāni etāni sotāni mayā kittitāni pakittitāni ācikkhitāni desitāni paññapitāni
anya-e0804n0:2139_3: paṭṭhapitāni vivaritāni vibhattāni uttānīkatāni pakāsitāni. Seyyathidaṃ? Taṇhāsoto
anya-e0804n0:2139_4: diṭṭhisoto kilesasoto duccaritasoto avijjāsoto”tiādīsu pañcasu dhammesu. “Addasā
anya-e0804n0:2139_5: kho bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”ntiādīsu udakadhārāyaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2139_6: “Ariyassetaṃ āvuso aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacanaṃ, yadidaṃ soto”tiādīsu ariyamagge.
anya-e0804n0:2139_7: “Purisassa ca viññāṇasotaṃ pajānāti ubhayato abbocchinnaṃ idhaloke patiṭṭhitañca
anya-e0804n0:2140: Soṇoti sunakho. So hi sāmikassa vacanaṃ suṇātīti soṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:2142: Sunakho sārameyyo ca, suṇo sūno ca kukkuro;
anya-e0804n0:2143: Soṇo svāno suvāno ca, sāḷuro migadaṃsano.
anya-e0804n0:2145: Sunakhī kukkurī sī’ti, ime itthīsu vattare.
anya-e0804n0:2148: Kukkuroti ayaṃ tattha, bālakāle ravena ve;
anya-e0804n0:2150_0: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā kukkurajātake “ye kukkurā rājakulamhi vaḍḍhā, koleyyakā
anya-e0804n0:2150_1: vaṇṇabalūpapannā”tiimasmiṃpadese evamatthaṃ vaṇṇayiṃsu “ye kukkurāti ye sunakhā.
anya-e0804n0:2150_2: Yathā hi taruṇopi passāvo pūtimuttanti tadahujātopi siṅgālo “jarasiṅgālo’ti, komalāpi
anya-e0804n0:2150_3: gaḷācīlatā ‘pūtilatā’ti, suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi kāyo ‘pūtikāyo’ti vuccati, evameva vassasatikopi
anya-e0804n0:2150_4: sunakho ‘kukkuro’ti vuccati, tasmā mahallakā kāyūpapannāpi te ‘kukkurā’tveva vuttā”ti.
anya-e0804n0:2152: Saka sāmatthiye. Samatthabhāvo sāmatthiyaṃ, yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Sakkuṇāti, sakkuṇanti. Asakkhi. Sakkhissati. Sakko. Sakkī.
anya-e0804n0:2153_0: Ettha sakkoti devarājā. So hi parahitaṃ sakahitañca kātuṃ sakkuṇātīti sakko. Apica
anya-e0804n0:2153_1: sakyakulajāto yo kocipi. Tathā hi “atha kho mahānāmo sakko”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Bhagavantañca
anya-e0804n0:2153_2: piṅgiyo maṃ sakka samuddharāhīti ālapi. Sakyā vata bho kumārā paramasakyā vata bho
anya-e0804n0:2153_3: kumārā”ti vacanamupādāya sabbepi sakyakule jātā “sakyā”ti ca “sākiyā”ti ca “sakkā”ti
anya-e0804n0:2153_4: ca vuccanti. Ettha svādittepi anekassaradhātuto ekova uṇāpaccayo hoti, na ṇu ṇāpaccayāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2154: Khī khaye. Khīṇoti. Khīṇāti. Khīṇā jāti. Khīṇo. Ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo.
anya-e0804n0:2156: Ci caye. Ṇakārassa nakārattaṃ. Pākāraṃ cinoti. Citaṃ kusalaṃ. Ceto puggalo.
anya-e0804n0:2158: Rādha sādha saṃsiddhiyaṃ. Rādhuṇāti. Sādhuṇāti. Rādhanaṃ. Ārādhanaṃ. Sādhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2159: Pī pītiyaṃ. Pīṇoti, pīṇāti. Pīti, piyo.
anya-e0804n0:2160: Apa pāpuṇe sambhu ca. Pāpuṇoti, pāpuṇāti. Patto. Sabbaññutaṃ satthā patto. Sampatto yamasādhanaṃ. Sambhuṇāti, na kiñci atthaṃ abhisambhuṇāti. Sambhuṇanto, abhisambhuṇamāno.
anya-e0804n0:2161_0: Tattha pattoti pasaddo upasaggo “pappotī”ti ettha pasaddo viya. Tathā hi “patto”ti
anya-e0804n0:2161_1: ettha pāpuṇīti atthe papubbassa apadhātussa pakāre lutte tapaccayassa dvibhāvo bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:2161_2: Tattha na abhisambhuṇātīti na sampāpuṇāti, na sādhetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0804n0:2162: Khipa khepe. Khipuṇāti. Khippaṃ. Khippanti macchapañjaro.
anya-e0804n0:2165_0: Ettha ca sabbaguyhesu nimiyati pakkhipiyatīti mitto. “Mitto have sattapadena hotī”ti
anya-e0804n0:2165_1: vacanaṃ pana vohāravasena vuttaṃ, na atthavasena. Vucceyya ce, yo koci avissāsiko
anya-e0804n0:2165_2: attano paṭiviruddhopi ca mitto nāma bhaveyya, na cevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañca pana daṭṭhabbaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2165_4: aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpakaraṇamattena mitto nāma hotīti vattabbaṃ. Kiṃkāraṇā? Daḷhavissāso
anya-e0804n0:2165_5: mitto nāma na bhaveyyāti mittassa guṇapasaṃsāvasena evaṃ vutta”nti.
anya-e0804n0:2166: Vu saṃvaraṇe. Vuṇoti, vuṇāti, saṃvuṇoti, saṃvuṇāti. Paṇḍito sīlasaṃvuto.
anya-e0804n0:2167: Su abhisave. Abhisavo nāma pīḷanaṃ manthanaṃ sandhānaṃ sinhānaṃ vā. Suṇoti, suṇāti.
anya-e0804n0:2170: Na hi nūnāyaṃ sā khujjā, labhati jivhāya chedanaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:2173: Vusa pāgabbiye. Pāgabbiyaṃ nāma kāyavācāmanehi pagabbabhāvo. Vusuṇāti.
anya-e0804n0:2176: Ettha pana asamānantattepi samānatthānaṃ samodhānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:2177_0: Tika tiga sagha dikkha kivi ciri jiri dāsa du hiṃsāyaṃ. Tikuṇāti. Tiguṇāti. Saghuṇāti.
anya-e0804n0:2177_1: Dikkhuṇāti. Kivuṇāti. Ciruṇāti. Jiruṇāti. Dāsuṇāti. Duṇoti, duṇātīti rūpāni hiṃsāvācakāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:2178: Suvādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:2182_0: Kī dabbavinimaye. Dabbavinimayo kayavikkayavasena bhaṇḍassa parivattanaṃ. Kiṇāti,
anya-e0804n0:2182_1: kiṇanti. Vikkiṇāti, vikkiṇanti. Ketuṃ, kiṇituṃ. Vikketuṃ, vikkiṇituṃ. Kiṇitvā, vikkiṇitvā.
anya-e0804n0:2182_2: Kītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ. Kayo, vikkayo. Vikkiṇeyya haneyya vā.
anya-e0804n0:2183: Khi gatiyaṃ. Khiṇāti. Atikhiṇo saro. Khaṃ, khāni. Nakārassa ṇakārattaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2184_0: Tattha khiṇātīti gacchati. Atikhinoti atigato. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “senti cāpātikhiṇāva,
anya-e0804n0:2184_1: purāṇāni anutthuna”nti. Tattha cāpātikhiṇā’ti cāpato atikhiṇā atigatā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2184_2: pana “cāpātikhiṇāti cāpato atikhiṇā cāpā vinimuttāti attho”ti padatthavivaraṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0804n0:2184_3: tampi gatatthaññeva sandhāya adhippāyatthavasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tatra khanti
anya-e0804n0:2184_4: saggo. So hi katapuññehi gantabbattā “kha”nti vuccati. Khānīti saggā.
anya-e0804n0:2185_0: Ci caye. Puññaṃ cināti. Pākāraṃ cināti. Pāramiyo vicināti, vicinati ca. Pupphaṃ ocināti,
anya-e0804n0:2185_1: ocinati vā. Pacināti. Pacinitvā. Citaṃ kusalaṃ. Cayo sañcayo. Cito pākāro. Cinātīti
anya-e0804n0:2185_2: ceto, iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakī. Yo satto puññasañcayo. “Sañcayo rāsi samūho piṇḍo gaṇo saṅgho
anya-e0804n0:2186_0: Ji jaye. Jināti, vijināti, jiniyati. Jetā, jino. Jito māro. Māraṃ jito. Jitavā, jitāvī,
anya-e0804n0:2186_1: jitabbo, jeyyo, jayanaṃ, jitaṃ, vijitaṃ, jayo, parājayanaṃ, parājayo. Yassa jitaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2186_2: nāvajīyati. Jitamassa noyāti koci loke. Jayo hi buddhassa sirīmato ayaṃ, mārassa
anya-e0804n0:2187_0: Tattha jetāti jinātīti jetā, yo koci puggalo. Ajinīti jino, sabbaññū dhammarājā.
anya-e0804n0:2187_1: Kiṃ so ajini? Pāpake akusale dhamme mārādiarayo ca. Iti pāpake akusale dhamme mārādayo
anya-e0804n0:2187_2: ca arayo ajinīti jino. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
anya-e0804n0:2188: “Mādisā ve jinā honti, ye pattā āsavakkhayaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:2189: Jitā me pāpakā dhammā, tasmāhaṃ upaka jino”ti,
anya-e0804n0:2191_0: Jinasaddo hi kevalo sabbaññumhi pavattati, sopapado pana paccekabuddhādīsu tamhi
anya-e0804n0:2191_1: ca yathārahaṃ pavattati. “Paccekajino, odhijino, anodhijino, vipākajino, avipākajino”ti
anya-e0804n0:2192: Ji jāniyaṃ. Jināti, na jināti na jāpaye, jino rathassaṃ maṇikuṇḍale ca, putte ca dāre ca tatheva jino. Jino dhanañca dāse ca.
anya-e0804n0:2193_0: Ñā avabodhane. Jānāti, ñāyati, nāyati. Animittā na nāyare. Jaññā so yadi hāpaye.
anya-e0804n0:2193_1: Mā maṃ jaññūti icchati. “Ime amhāka”nti ñātabbaṭṭhena ñāti, ñātako. Ñātimittā suhajjā
anya-e0804n0:2193_2: ca. Ñātako no nisinnoti. Ñātabbaṃ ñeyyaṃ, saṅkhāravikāralakkhaṇanibbānapaññattidhammā.
anya-e0804n0:2193_3: Īdisesu ṭhānesu ñeyyasaddo ekantena napuṃsako, vāccaliṅgatte sabbaliṅgiko, yathā?
anya-e0804n0:2193_4: Ñeyyo phasso. Ñeyyā vedanā. Ñeyyaṃ cittaṃ. Ñeyyo puriso, ñeyyā itthī, ñeyyaṃ dhananti ca.
anya-e0804n0:2194: Thu abhitthave. Thunāti. Abhitthunāti. Thuti, abhitthuti. Thavanā, abhitthavanā, thuto, abhitthuto.
anya-e0804n0:2202_0: Ettha mittaddūti mittaṃ dunāti hiṃsati dubbhatīti mittaddu. Atra “vedā na tāṇāya
anya-e0804n0:2202_1: bhavanti tassa, mittadduno bhūnahuno narassā”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Dumoti duniyati
anya-e0804n0:2202_2: gehasambhārādiatthāya hiṃsiyati chindiyati, paṇṇapupphādiatthikehi vā paṇṇapupphādiharaṇena pīḷiyatīti dumo.
anya-e0804n0:2203: Dhū kampane. Dhunāti. Dhūmo, dhonā, dhono, dhuto. Dhunanto vākacīrāni, gacchāmi ambare tadā.
anya-e0804n0:2204_0: Tattha dhūmoti dhunāti kampatīti dhūmo. Dhūmasaddo kodhe taṇhāya vitakke pañcasu
anya-e0804n0:2204_1: kāmaguṇesu dhammadesanāyaṃ pakatidhūmeti imesu atthesu vattati. “Kodho dhūmo bhasmāni
anya-e0804n0:2204_2: mosavajja”nti ettha hi kodhe vattati. “Icchā dhūmāyito sadā”ti ettha taṇhāyaṃ. “Tena
anya-e0804n0:2204_3: kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhagavato avidūre dhūmāyanto nisinno hotī”ti ettha vitakke.
anya-e0804n0:2207: Rajo ca dhūmo ca mayā pakāsito,
anya-e0804n0:2209: Ettha pañcasu kāmaguṇesu. “Dhūmaṃ kattā hotī”ti ettha dhammadesanāyaṃ. “Dhajo rathassa paññāno, dhūmo paññānamaggino”ti ettha pakatidhūme. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0804n0:2212_0: Dhonāti paññā. Vuttañhetaṃ niddese “dhonā vuccati paññā, yā paññā pajānanā sammādiṭṭhi,
anya-e0804n0:2212_1: kiṃkāraṇā dhonāti vuccati paññā? Yaṃ tāya paññāya kāyaduccaritaṃ dhutañca dhotañca
anya-e0804n0:2212_2: sandhotañca niddhotañca, vacīduccaritaṃ manoduccaritaṃ dhutañca dhotañca sandhotañca
anya-e0804n0:2212_3: niddhotañca. Taṃkāraṇā dhonā vuccati paññā. Atha vā sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiṃ dhutā
anya-e0804n0:2212_4: ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca, taṃkāraṇā dhonā vuccati paññā”ti. “Dhonassa
anya-e0804n0:2212_5: hi natthi kuhiñci loke, pakappitā diṭṭhi bhavābhavesū”ti ayamettha pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2212_6: Atra dhonā assa atthīti dhono, tassa dhonassāti nibbacanaṃ. Dhātūnamanekatthatāya
anya-e0804n0:2213_0: Muna ñāṇe. Munāti. Monaṃ, muni. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne dhātuyā ākhyātatte ekantena antalopo
anya-e0804n0:2213_1: bhavati. Sobhitattheragāthāyaṃ pana anāgatavacane ukārassa vuddhivasena “ahaṃ monena
anya-e0804n0:2213_2: monissa”nti rūpantarañca dissati. Tattha monissanti jānissaṃ. Nāmatte antalopo na
anya-e0804n0:2213_3: hoti. Tattha monanti kiñcāpi “na monena muni hotī”ti ettha tuṇhībhāvo “mona”nti vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:2213_4: tathāpi idha “ñāṇe”ti vacanato na so adhippeto, ñāṇamevādhippetaṃ, tasmā moneyyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2213_5: maggañāṇamonampi gahetabbaṃ. Munīti munāti jānāti hitāhitaṃ paricchindatīti muni.
anya-e0804n0:2213_6: Atha vā khandhādiloke tulaṃ āropetvā minanto viya “ime ajjhattikā khandhā, ime bāhirā”tiādinā
anya-e0804n0:2213_7: nayena ime ubho atthe munātīti muni. Tenāha bhagavā –
anya-e0804n0:2215: Yo ca tulaṃva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
anya-e0804n0:2216: Pāpāni parivajjeti, sa muni tena so muni;
anya-e0804n0:2217: Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti.
anya-e0804n0:2218_0: Aparāpettha bhavati atthavibhāvanā. Munīti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, kāyamoneyyādīsu vā
anya-e0804n0:2218_1: aññataraṃ, tena samannāgatattā puggalo “munī”ti vuccati. So panesa agāriyamuni anagāriyamuni
anya-e0804n0:2218_2: sekkhamuni asekkhamuni paccekamuni munimunīti anekavidho. Tattha agāriyamunīti gihipi
anya-e0804n0:2218_3: āgataphalo viññātasāsano. Anagāriyamunīti tathārūpova pabbajito. Sekkhamunīti satta
anya-e0804n0:2218_4: sekkhā. Asekkhamunīti khīṇāsavo. Paccekamunīti paccekabuddho. Munimunīti sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0804n0:2218_5: Tathā hi āyasmāpi sāriputto āha “munīti vuccati tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti.
anya-e0804n0:2219: Pū pavane. Pavanaṃ sodhanaṃ. Punāti. Puññaṃ, putto, dantapoṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2220_0: Ettha ca puññanti attano kārakaṃ punāti sodhetīti puññaṃ. Atha vā yattha sayaṃ uppannaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2220_1: taṃsantānaṃ punāti visodhetīti puññaṃ. Kintaṃ? Sucaritaṃ kusalakammaṃ. Sakammikattā
anya-e0804n0:2220_2: dhātussa kāritavasena atthavivaraṇaṃ labbhati. Puttoti attano kulaṃ punāti sodhetīti
anya-e0804n0:2220_3: putto. Evañca sati hīnajaccānaṃ caṇḍālādīnaṃ putto nāma na bhaveyyāti na vattabbaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2220_4: saddānamatthakathanassa nānappakārena pavattito, tasmā attano pitu hadayaṃ pūretīti
anya-e0804n0:2220_5: puttoti evamādināpi nibbacanaṃ gahetabbameva. Nānādhātuvasenapi hi padāni siddhiṃ samupagacchanti.
anya-e0804n0:2221_0: Putto ca nāma atrajo khetrajo antevāsiko dinnakoti catubbidho. Tattha attānaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0804n0:2221_1: jāto atrajo nāma. Sayanapīṭhe pallaṅke ureti evamādīsu nibbatto khetrajo nāma. Santike
anya-e0804n0:2221_2: sippuggaṇhanako antevāsiko nāma. Posāpanatthāya dinno dinnako nāma dantapoṇanti dante
anya-e0804n0:2222_0: Pī tappanakantīsu. Piṇātīti pīti. Ettha ca pītīti pīṇanaṃ pīti, tappanaṃ kantīti
anya-e0804n0:2222_1: ca vuttaṃ hoti. Idaṃ bhāvavasena nibbacanaṃ. Idaṃ pana hetukattuvasena piṇayatīti
anya-e0804n0:2223_0: Sā panesā khuddakāpīti khaṇikāpīti okkantikāpīti ubbegāpīti pharaṇāpītīti pañcavidhā
anya-e0804n0:2223_1: hoti. Tattha khuddakāpīti sarīre lomahaṃsanamattameva kātuṃ sakkoti. Khaṇikāpīti
anya-e0804n0:2223_2: khaṇe khaṇe vijjuppādasadisā hoti. Okkantikāpīti samuddatīraṃ vīci viya kāyaṃ okkamitvā
anya-e0804n0:2223_3: okkamitvā bhijjati. Ubbegāpīti balavatī hoti kāyaṃ uddhaggaṃ katvā ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇā
anya-e0804n0:2223_4: hoti. Pharaṇāpītiyā pana uppannāya sakalasarīraṃ dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya mahatā
anya-e0804n0:2223_5: udakoghena pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anupariphuṭaṃ hoti, evaṃ pañcavidhā pīti,
anya-e0804n0:2223_6: sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇattā “piṇātī”ti pītīti suddhakattuvasenapi vattuṃ yujjati. Ettha
anya-e0804n0:2223_7: “piyāyati, pitā, piyo, pemo”tiādīni pīdhātuyā eva rūpāni. Tattha “puttaṃ piyāyatīti
anya-e0804n0:2223_8: pitā”ti vadanti. Piyāyitabboti piyo. Pemanaṃ pemo.
anya-e0804n0:2224: Mā parimāṇe. Mināti. Mānaṃ, parimāṇaṃ, mattaṃ, mattā, mano, vimānaṃ, minitabbaṃ, metabbaṃ, chāyā metabbā. Īdisesu ṭhānesu anīyapaccayo na labbhati.
anya-e0804n0:2225_0: Ettha manoti ekāya nāḷiyā ekāya ca tulāya minamāno viya ārammaṇaṃ mināti paricchindatīti
anya-e0804n0:2225_1: mano. Visesato miniyate paricchindiyateti vimānaṃ, devānaṃ puññabalena nibbattabyamhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2225_2: devaniketaṃ. Yaṃ vimānaṃ upasobhitaṃ, pabhāsatimidaṃ byamhanti ca ādinā thomiyati.
anya-e0804n0:2227_0: Ettha mīnoti maccho. Macchassa hi “mīno maccho ambujo vārijo vāricaro”ti anekāni
anya-e0804n0:2227_1: nāmāni. Visesanāmāni pana “amaro khaliso candakulo kandaphali indaphali indavalo
anya-e0804n0:2227_2: kuliso vāmi kuṅkutalo kaṇḍiko sakulo maṅguro siṅgī satavaṅko rohito pāṭhīno kāṇo
anya-e0804n0:2227_3: savaṅko pāvuso” iccevamādīni, “timi timiṅgalo” iccevamādīni ca bhavanti. Kumīnanti
anya-e0804n0:2227_4: kucchitenākārena macche minanti hiṃsanti etenāti kumīnaṃ, macchabandhanapañjaro.
anya-e0804n0:2227_5: So pana pāḷiyaṃ kumīnasaddena vuccati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n0:2232: Ettha munīti attano cittaṃ munāti mavati bandhati rāgadosādivasaṃ gantuṃ na detīti muni.
anya-e0804n0:2233: Ri gatidesanesu. Rikāti. Reṇu. Nakārassa ṇattaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2234: Lī silese. Lināti, nilināti. Līnaṃ, sallīnaṃ, paṭisallānaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2235_0: Vī tantasantāne. Vatthaṃ vināti. Iminā suttena cīvaraṃ vināhi. Kamme – idaṃ kho āvuso
anya-e0804n0:2235_1: cīvaraṃ maṃ uddissa viyyati. Vītaṃ. Suvītaṃ. Appakaṃ hoti vetabbaṃ. Kārite “vāyāpeti,
anya-e0804n0:2235_2: tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpessāmā’ti cīvaraṃ vāyāpesuṃ” iccevamādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:2236: Vī hiṃsāyaṃ. Vināti. Veṇu. Veṇūti vaṃso.
anya-e0804n0:2237: Lū chedane. Lunāti. Loṇaṃ, kusalaṃ, bālo, lūto.
anya-e0804n0:2238_0: Ettha ca loṇanti lunāti vītarasabhāvaṃ vināseti sarasabhāvaṃ karotīti loṇaṃ, lavaṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2238_1: Kuso viya hatthappadesaṃ akusaladhamme lunātīti kusalaṃ, anavajjaiṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇo
anya-e0804n0:2238_2: dhammo. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike dve atthe lunātīti bālo, avidvā. Lūtoti makkaṭako
anya-e0804n0:2238_3: vuccati. Tassa hi suttaṃ “lūtasutta”nti vadanti. Yūsaṃ pātuṃ paṭaṅgamakkhikādīnaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2240_0: Ettha sīmāti sinīyate samaggena saṅghena kammavācāya bandhiyateti sīmā. Sā duvidhā
anya-e0804n0:2240_1: baddhasīmā abaddhasīmāti. Tāsu abaddhasīmā mariyādakaraṇavasena “sīmā”ti veditabbā.
anya-e0804n0:2240_2: Sināti bandhati kese moḷikaraṇavasena etthāti sīsaṃ. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:2242: Su hiṃsāyaṃ. Suṇāti. Parasu. Paraṃ suṇanti hiṃsanti etenāti parasu.
anya-e0804n0:2244: Ettha asananti āhāro. So hi asiyati bhuñjiyatīti “asana”nti vuccati. “Asnātha khādatha pivathā”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2246: Ettha ca kilesoti rāgādayopi dukkhampi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:2253: Kiyādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:2261: Idāni gahādigaṇo vuccate. Ettheke evaṃ maññanti.
anya-e0804n0:2264: Yato ppaṇhā parā heyyuṃ, dhātuto jinasāsane;
anya-e0804n0:2265: Tepi aññe na vijjanti, aññatra gahadhātuyā.
anya-e0804n0:2267: Pakkhipiṃsu gaṇe evaṃ, na vadiṃsu gahādikaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2268: Na tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ dhīro, gaṇheyya suvicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0804n0:2269: Yato kaccāyane vutto, gahādīnaṃ gaṇo visuṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2270: “Gahādito ppaṇhā” iti, lakkhaṇaṃ vadatā hi so;
anya-e0804n0:2272: Sace visuṃ gahādīnaṃ, gaṇo nāma na labbhati;
anya-e0804n0:2274: “Gahato ppaṇhā” icceva, vattabbaṃ atha vā pana;
anya-e0804n0:2276: Yasmā tathā na vuttañca, na katañcekalakkhaṇaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:2277: Tasmā ayaṃ visuṃyeva, gaṇo icceva ñāyati.
anya-e0804n0:2283: Sappayogaṃ gahādīnaṃ, gaṇaṃ vakkhāmi me suṇa.
anya-e0804n0:2284_0: Gaha upādāne. Upādānaṃ gahaṇaṃ, na kilesupādānaṃ. Upasaddo hettha na kiñci atthavisesaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2284_1: vadati. Atha vā kāyena cittena vā upagantvā ādānaṃ gahaṇaṃ upādānanti samīpattho
anya-e0804n0:2284_2: upasaddo. Katthaci hi upasaddo ādānasaddasahito daḷhaggahaṇe vattati “kāmupādāna”ntiādīsu.
anya-e0804n0:2284_3: Idha pana daḷhaggahaṇaṃ vā hotu sithilaggahaṇaṃ vā, yaṃ kiñci gahaṇaṃ upādānameva,
anya-e0804n0:2284_4: tasmā gahadhātu gahaṇe vattatīti attho gahetabbo. Gheppati, gaṇhāti vā. Pariggaṇhāti,
anya-e0804n0:2284_5: paṭiggaṇhāti, adhigaṇhāti, paggaṇhāti, niggaṇhāti. Padhānagaṇhanako. Gaṇhituṃ, uggaṇhituṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2284_6: Gaṇhitvā, uggaṇhitvā. Aññathāpi rūpāni bhavanti. Ahaṃ jāliṃ gahessāmi. Gahetuṃ. Gahetvā.
anya-e0804n0:2284_7: Uggāhako, saṅgāhako, ajjhogāḷho. Kārite “gaṇhāpeti, gaṇhāpayati, aññataraṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2284_8: uggaṇhāpenti, saddhiṃ amaccasahassena gaṇhāpetvā. Upajjhaṃ gāhāpetabbo. Upajjhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2284_9: gāhāpetvā. Gāheti, gāhayati, gāhāpessati. Gāhāpayanti sabbhāvaṃ. Gāhako, gāhetvā”
anya-e0804n0:2284_10: iccādīni. Kammani – gayhati, saṅgayhati, gaṇhiyati vā. Tathā hi “gaṇhiyanti uggaṇhiyantī”ti
anya-e0804n0:2284_11: niddesapāḷi dissati. “Gehaṃ, gāho, pariggaho, saṅgāhako, saṅgahetā” iccādīni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:2285_0: Tatra akārānantaratyantapadānaṃ “gheppati, gheppanti. Gheppasī”ti ca “gaṇhati, gaṇhanti.
anya-e0804n0:2285_1: Gaṇhasī”ti ca ādinā nayena sabbāsu vibhattīsu sabbathā padamālā yojetabbā. Ākārekārānantaratyantapadānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2285_2: “gaṇhāti gaṇhāpetī”tiādinā yathāsambhavaṃ padamālā yojetabbā vajjetabbaṭṭhānaṃ vajjetvā.
anya-e0804n0:2286_0: Imāni pana pasiddhāni kānici ajjatanīrūpāni “aggahī mattikāpattaṃ. Aggahuṃ, aggahiṃsu,
anya-e0804n0:2286_1: aggahesu”nti. Bhavissantīādīsu gahessati, gahessanti. Sesaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2287_0: Usa dāhe. Dāho uṇhaṃ. Usati dahatīti uṇhaṃ. Uṇhasaddo “uṇhaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjatī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:2287_1: dabbamapekkhati, “sītaṃ uṇhaṃ paṭihanatī”tiādīsu pana guṇaṃ uṇhabhāvassa icchitattā.
anya-e0804n0:2288: Tasa vipāsāyaṃ. Taṇhā. Kenaṭṭhena taṇhā? Tassati paritassatīti atthena.
anya-e0804n0:2289: Jusi pītisevanesu. Juṇho samayo. Kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇhe, yadā vāyati māluto.
anya-e0804n0:2290: Tattha juṇhoti joseti lokassa pītiṃsomanassañca uppādetīti juṇho.
anya-e0804n0:2291: Juta dittiyaṃ. Juṇhā ratti. Jotati sayaṃ nippabhāpi samānā candatārakappabhāsenapi dibbati virocati sappabhā hotīti juṇhā.
anya-e0804n0:2292: Sā tanukaraṇe. Saṇhavācā. Siyati tanukariyati, na pharusabhāvena kakkasā kariyatīti saṇhā.
anya-e0804n0:2293: So antakammani. Saṇhaṃ, ñāṇaṃ. Siyati sayaṃ sukhumabhāvena atisukhumampi atthaṃ antaṃ karoti nipphattiṃ pāpetīti saṇhaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2294: Tija nisāne. Nisānaṃ tikkhatā. Tiṇho parasu. Titikkhatīti tiṇho.
anya-e0804n0:2295_0: Si sevāyaṃ. Attano hitamāsīsantehi seviyateti sippaṃ, yaṃ kiñci jīvitahetu sikkhitabbaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2295_1: sippāyatanaṃ. Apica sippanti aṭṭhārasa mahāsippāni – suti sūramati byākaraṇaṃ chandoviciti
anya-e0804n0:2295_2: nirutti jotisatthaṃ sikkhā mokkhañāṇaṃ kriyāvidhi dhanubbedo hatthisikkhā kāmatantaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2295_3: assalakkhaṇaṃ purāṇaṃ itihāso nīti takko vejjakañcāti.
anya-e0804n0:2296: Ku kucchāyaṃ. Kucchā garahā. Kaṇhā dhammā. Kaṇho puriso.
anya-e0804n0:2297_0: Tattha kaṇhāti apabhassarabhāvakaraṇattā paṇḍitehi kucchitabbā garahitabbāti kaṇhā,
anya-e0804n0:2297_1: akusaladhammā. Kāḷavaṇṇattā suvaṇṇavaṇṇādikaṃ upanidhāya kucchitabbo ninditabboti
anya-e0804n0:2299: Kaṇhe bhūmippadesasmiṃ, na mayhaṃ manaso piyo”ti ca,
anya-e0804n0:2308: Ākhyātatte ca nāmatte, ṇhāsaddo usato tathā.
anya-e0804n0:2311_0: Ettha pana kiñcāpi sāsane “taṇhāyatī”ti kriyāpadampi dissati, tathāpi tassa “pabbatāyati,
anya-e0804n0:2311_1: mettāyatī”tiādīni viya nāmasmā vihitassa āyapaccayassa vasena siddhattā kriyāpadattepi
anya-e0804n0:2311_2: ṇhāpaccayo mukhyato labbhatīti na sakkā vattuṃ. “Taṇhāyatī”ti hi idaṃ ṇhāpaccayavatā
anya-e0804n0:2311_3: tasadhātuto nipphannataṇhāsaddasmā parassa āyapaccayassa vasena nipphannaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0804n0:2311_4: kiñcāpi rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṃ “vāsiphalaṃ tāpetvā udakaṃ vā khīraṃ
anya-e0804n0:2311_5: vā uṇhāpetī”ti imasmiṃ padese “uṇhāpetī”ti hetukattuvācakaṃ kriyāpadaṃ dissati, tathāpi
anya-e0804n0:2311_6: tassa ṇhāpaccayavatā usadhātuto nipphannauṇhāsaddato vihitassa kāritasaññassa ṇāpepaccayassa
anya-e0804n0:2311_7: vasena nipphannattā kriyāpadattepi ṇhāpaccayo mukhyato labbhatīti na sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2311_8: “Uṇhāpetī”ti idaṃ vuttappakārauṇhāsaddato ṇāpepaccayavasena nipphannaṃ, etasmiṃ diṭṭhe
anya-e0804n0:2312_1: kattupadampi nayato diṭṭhameva hoti kattukāritapadānaṃ ekadhātumhi upalabbhamānattā,
anya-e0804n0:2312_2: yathā? Gaṇhati, gaṇhāpeti, gacchati, gacchāpetīti, tasmā “usa dāhe”ti dhātussa “uṇhatī”ti
anya-e0804n0:2312_3: rūpaṃ upalabbhatīti mantvā “uṇhatīti uṇha”nti nibbacanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Iti ppapaccayo
anya-e0804n0:2312_4: gahato ca aññato ca ekadhā labbhati, ṇhāpaccayo pana gahato usato ca dvidhā aññato
anya-e0804n0:2312_5: ekadhā labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiñcāpettha evaṃ niyamo vutto, tathāpi sāṭṭhakathe
anya-e0804n0:2312_6: tepiṭake buddhavacane aññānipi ekekassa dhātussa nāmikapadāni dve dve kriyāpadāni
anya-e0804n0:2312_7: vicinitabbāni. Yena pana buddhavacanānurūpena nayena gahādigaṇe ādisaddena tasadhātādayo
anya-e0804n0:2312_8: amhehi gahitā, imasmā nayā añño nayo pasatthataro natthi, ayameva pasatthataro, tasmā
anya-e0804n0:2312_9: ayaṃ nīti sāsanaṭṭhitiyā āyasmantehi sādhukaṃ dhāretabbā vācetabbā ca.
anya-e0804n0:2313: Gahādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:2317_0: Tanu vitthāre. Tanoti. Āyatanaṃ, tanu. Kammani “taniyyati, taniyyanti. Vitaniyyatī”ti
anya-e0804n0:2317_1: rūpāni. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “yathā hi āsabhaṃ cammaṃ, pathabyā vitaniyyatī”ti. Garū pana
anya-e0804n0:2317_2: “patāyate, pataññatī”ti rūpāni vadanti. Tanituṃ, tanitvāna. Tumantādirūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:2318_0: Tattha āyatananti āyabhūte dhamme tanoti vitthāretīti āyatanaṃ. Tanūti sarīraṃ. Tañhi
anya-e0804n0:2318_1: kalalato paṭṭhāya kammādīhi yathāsambhavaṃ taniyyati vitthāriyati mahattaṃ pāpiyatīti
anya-e0804n0:2318_2: “tanū”ti vuccati. “Tanu vapu sarīraṃ puṃ kāyo deho”tiādayo sarīravācakā saddā. Sarīraṃ
anya-e0804n0:2318_3: khandhapañcakaṃ. Yañhi mahājano sarīranti vadati, taṃ paramatthato khandhapañcakamattameva,
anya-e0804n0:2318_4: na tato attā vā attaniyaṃ vā upalabbhati. “Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanuttakaraṃ sakadāgāmimaggacitta”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:2318_5: pana tanusaddo appatthavācako, appatthavācakassa ca tassa kriyāpadaṃ na passāma,
anya-e0804n0:2318_6: tasmā nipātapadena tena bhavitabbaṃ. Tanusaddo nipātapadanti vuttaṭṭhānampi na passāma,
anya-e0804n0:2319: Tanoti, tanonti. Tanosi, tanotha. Tanomi, tanoma. Tanute, tanunte. Tanuse, tanuse, tanuvhe. Tane, tanumhe. Sesaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2320_0: Tanotu, tanontu. Taneyya, tane, taneyyuṃ. Vitana, vitanu. Atanā, atanu. Ammāya patanu
anya-e0804n0:2320_1: kesā. Atani, ataniṃsu. Tanissati, tanissanti. Atanissā, atanissaṃsu. Kammani “taniyyati,
anya-e0804n0:2321: Saka sattiyaṃ. Satti samatthabhāvo. Sakkoti sakko. Viññāpetuṃ asakkhi. Sakkhissasi. Sakkhati. Tvampi amma pabbajituṃ sakkhissasi. Sakkate jarāya paṭikammaṃ kātunti pāḷi.
anya-e0804n0:2322_0: Tattha sakkoti devarājā. So hi atthānaṃ sahassampi muhuttena cintanasamatthatāya
anya-e0804n0:2322_1: saparahitaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti “sakko”ti vuccati. Aññatra pana dhātūnaṃ avisaye taddhitavasena
anya-e0804n0:2322_2: sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ adāsīti sakkoti evampi atthaṃ gahetvā sakkasaddo niruttinayena sādhetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:2322_3: Vuttañhi bhagavatā “sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno sakkaccaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2322_4: dānaṃ adāsi, tasmā ‘sakko’ti vuccatī”ti. Sakkonto. Sakkontī. Sakkontaṃ kulaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2325: Tiṇu adane. Tiṇoti. Tiṇaṃ. Ettha tiṇanti yavasaṃ. Tañhi tiṇiyate tiṇabhakkhehi goṇādīhi adiyate khādiyateti tiṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2327: Hanu apanayane. Apanayanaṃ anālāpakaraṇaṃ nibbacanatākaraṇaṃ. Hanoti. Hanute.
anya-e0804n0:2329: Manu bodhane. Manoti. Manute. Mano. Manaṃ. Mānasaṃ. Manusso. Mānavo. Māṇavo.
anya-e0804n0:2330_0: Ettha manoti manute bujjhatīti mano, evaṃ manaṃ. Imesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ manasaddānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2330_1: “yasmiṃ mano nivisati. Santaṃ tassa manaṃ hotī”tiādīsu punnapuṃsakaliṅgatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0804n0:2330_2: Mānasanti rāgopi cittampi arahattampi. “Antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti
anya-e0804n0:2330_3: ettha hi rāgo mānasaṃ. “Cittaṃ mano mānasa”nti ettha cittaṃ. “Appattamānaso sekkho,
anya-e0804n0:2330_4: kālaṃ kayirā jane suto”ti ettha arahattaṃ. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:2333_0: Tattha sampayuttamanasi bhavoti rāgo mānaso. Mano eva mānasanti katvā cittaṃ mānasaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2333_1: Anavasesato mānaṃ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasaṃ. Tannibbattattā pana arahattassa
anya-e0804n0:2333_2: mānasatā daṭṭhabbā. Manūti satto. “Yena cakkhupasādena, rūpāni manu passatī”ti ettha
anya-e0804n0:2333_3: hi “manū”ti satto vutto. Atha vā manūti paṭhamakappikakāle manussānaṃ mātāpibhuṭṭhāne
anya-e0804n0:2333_4: ṭhito manunāmako puriso, yo sāsane “mahāsammatarājā”ti vutto. So hi sakalalokassa
anya-e0804n0:2333_5: hitaṃ kātuṃ manute jānātīti “manū”ti vuccati. Yathābalaṃ attano hitaṃ manute jānātīti
anya-e0804n0:2333_6: manusso, manassa vā ussannattā manusso. Atha vā vuttappakārassa manuno apaccaṃ manusso.
anya-e0804n0:2333_7: Evaṃ mānavo māṇavo ca, nakārassa hi ṇakāre kate “māṇavo”ti rūpaṃ sijjhati. Keci panāhu
anya-e0804n0:2333_9: pana māṇavasaddo kucchitamūḷhāpaccavacano”ti, taṃ vīmaṃsitvā yuttañce, gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:2333_10: na panettha vattabbaṃ “māṇavasaddassa atthuddhāravacane idaṃ vacanaṃ virujjhatī”ti
anya-e0804n0:2334_1: imasmiṃ padese aṭṭhakathācariyehi “subhoti so kira dassanīyo ahosi pāsādiko, tenassa
anya-e0804n0:2334_2: aṅgasubhatāya ‘subho’tveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. ‘Māṇavo’ti pana taṃ taruṇakāle vohariṃsu,
anya-e0804n0:2334_3: so mahallakakālepi teneva vohārena vohariyatī”ti evaṃ muddhajaṇakārassa māṇavasaddassa
anya-e0804n0:2334_4: attho pakāsito, taṭṭīkāyampi garūhi “yaṃ apaccaṃ kucchitaṃ muddhaṃ vā, tattha loke
anya-e0804n0:2334_5: māṇavavohāro, yebhuyyena ca sattā daharakāle muddhadhātukā hontīti vuttaṃ ‘taruṇakāle
anya-e0804n0:2334_6: vohariṃsū”ti, evaṃ muddhajaṇakārassa māṇavasaddassa attho pakāsito. Idāni māṇavasaddassa
anya-e0804n0:2334_7: atthuddhāro bhavati, māṇavoti sattopi coropi taruṇopi vuccati. “Coditā devadūtehi,
anya-e0804n0:2334_8: ye pamajjanti māṇavā”tiādīsu hi satto “māṇavo”ti vutto. “Māṇavehi saha gacchanti
anya-e0804n0:2334_9: katakammehipi akatakammehipī”tiādīsu coro. “Ambaṭṭho māṇavo”tiādīsu taruṇo “māṇavo”ti vutto.
anya-e0804n0:2336: Ettha āpoti appoti taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ vissaratīti āpo.
anya-e0804n0:2337: Mā parimāṇe. Minoti. Upamā, upamānaṃ, vimānaṃ. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:2338_0: Ettha ca yā accantaṃ na minoti na vicchindati, sā mānassa samīpe vattatīti upamā
anya-e0804n0:2338_1: yathā “goṇo viya gavajo”ti. Upamānanti upamā eva. Tathā hi “vītopamānamappamāṇamanāthanātha”nti.
anya-e0804n0:2338_2: Ettha vītopamānanti imassa vītopamaṃ, nirupamanti attho. Atha vā upamānanti upametabbākāro
anya-e0804n0:2338_3: “sīho viya bhagavā”ti. Ettha hi sīho upamā, bhagavā upameyyo tejoparakkamādīhi upametabbattā,
anya-e0804n0:2338_4: tejoparakkamādayo upametabbākāro. Ettha pana sātisayattā kiñcāpi sīhassa tejādīhi
anya-e0804n0:2338_5: bhagavato tejādiupametabbākāro natthi, tathāpi hīnūpamāvasena “sīho viya bhagavā”ti
anya-e0804n0:2338_6: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vimānanti utusamuṭṭhānattepi kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānattā kammena
anya-e0804n0:2339_0: Kara karaṇe. “Karoti, kayirati, kubbati, krubbati, pakaroti, upakaroti, apakaroti,
anya-e0804n0:2339_1: paṭikaroti, nirākaroti, paṭisaṅkharoti, abhisaṅkharoti” iccevamādīni kattari bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:2339_2: Kamme pāḷinayavasena ikārāgamaṭṭhāne yakārassa dvebhāvo. Tasmiṃyevaṭhāne rayakārānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2339_3: vipariyāye sati na dvebhāvo. Tathā īkārāgamaṭṭhāne “kariyyati, kayirati, karīyati,
anya-e0804n0:2339_4: kayyati, pakarīyati, pakariyyati, paṭisaṅkhariyyati, abhisaṅkhariyyati” iccevamādīni kammani bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:2340_0: Ettha ca kayiratīti padaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu dissati kattari kamme ca. Tesa kattuvasena
anya-e0804n0:2340_1: “puriso kammaṃ kayiratī”ti yojetabbaṃ, kammavasena pana ayaṃ pāḷi “kuṭi me kayirati
anya-e0804n0:2340_2: adesitavatthukā”ti. Tattha ca kattuvasena vuttaṃ kattupadaṃ yirapaccayena siddhaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2340_3: Kammavasena pana vuttaṃ kammapadaṃ ikārāgamassa ādiantabhūtānaṃ rayakārānaṃ vipariyāyenāti
anya-e0804n0:2340_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārāpayatī”ti cattāri kāritarūpāni, yāni
anya-e0804n0:2341_0: Idāni pana padamālā vattabbā, tatra paṭhamaṃ “kubbatī”ti padasseva padamālaṃ yojessāma
anya-e0804n0:2341_1: sabbāsu vibhattīsu ekākārena yojetabbattā. “Karotī”ti okārānantaratyantapadassa pana
anya-e0804n0:2341_2: “kāretī”ti ekārānantaratyantapadassa ca padamālaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ pacchā yojessāma
anya-e0804n0:2342: Tatra kubbati, kubbanti. Kubbasi, kubbatha. Kubbāmi, kubbāma. Kubbate, kubbante. Kubbase, kubbavhe. Kubbe, kubbamhe. Vattamānāvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:2343: Pañcamiyādīnaṃ vasena pana kubbatu, kubbantu. Kubbeyya, kubbeyyuṃ. Sesaṃ “bhavati, bhavantī”ti vuttanayānusārena sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2344_0: “Kariyatī”tiādīnipi a kārānantaratyantapadāni evameva yojetabbāni. Ettha ca “kubbati,
anya-e0804n0:2344_1: kubbanti. Kubbasī”tiādinā vuttā ayaṃ padamālā pāḷinayadassanato edisī vuttā. Saddasatthavidū
anya-e0804n0:2344_2: pana sāsanikā saddasattheyeva ādaraṃ katvā “kubbati, kubbasī”ti evaṃpakārāni rūpāni
anya-e0804n0:2344_3: pāḷiyaṃ natthīti maññantā na icchanti. Tehi saddasatthe viya pāḷiyampi “asanto nānukubbantī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:2344_4: okārapaccayassādesabhūto ukāro sareyeva pare vakāraṃ pappotīti maññamānā “kubbanti,
anya-e0804n0:2344_6: pāḷiyaṃ natthīti na icchanti. Mayaṃ pana pāḷinayadassanato tāni rūpāni icchāma. Atra
anya-e0804n0:2344_7: sotārānaṃ kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṃ kiñci pāḷinayaṃ vadāma – “sīlavanto na kubbanti, bālo
anya-e0804n0:2344_8: sīlāni kubbatī”ti ca, “kasmā bhavaṃ vijanamaraññanissito, tapo idha krubbatī”ti ca,
anya-e0804n0:2344_9: “pharusāhi vācāhi pakrubbamāno”ti ca. Īdisesu pana ṭhānesu akārāgamo kātabbo. Acinteyyo
anya-e0804n0:2344_10: hi pāḷinayo, yebhuyyena saddasatthanayavidūro ca. Tathā hi yathā “agginiṃ sampajjalitaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2344_11: pavisantī”ti pāḷigatidassanato “aggini, agginī, agginayo. Agginiṃ, agginī, agginayo.
anya-e0804n0:2344_12: Aggininā”ti padamālā kātabbā hoti, evameva “bālo sīlāni kubbatī”ti pāḷigatidassanato
anya-e0804n0:2345_0: Yathā ca “bahumpetaṃ asabbhi jātavedā”ti pāḷigatidassanato “santo sabbhīhi saddhiṃ
anya-e0804n0:2345_1: sataṃ dhammo na jaraṃ upetīti pavedayantī”ti aṭṭhakathāgatidassanato ca “sabbhi,
