anya-e0804n0:2908_0: Tattha dhammoti anekavidhesu dhammesu lokuttaro uppādito sacchikato ca catūsu apāyesu
anya-e0804n0:2908_1: saṃsāre vā satte apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo. Atha vā sotāpannādīhi ariyehi dhāriyati,
anya-e0804n0:2908_2: nu puthujjanehītipi dhammo. Catubhūmiko pana sakalakkhaṇaṃ dhāretīti dhammo. Kakkhaḷattādinā
anya-e0804n0:2908_3: phusanādinā santiādinā sakasakabhāvena paṇḍitehi dhāriyati sallakkhiyatītipi dhammo.
anya-e0804n0:2908_4: Tepiṭako pana pāḷidhammo sakatthaparatthādibhee atthe dhāretīti dhammo. Keci tu vidū
anya-e0804n0:2908_5: “pāpake akusale dhamme dhunāti kampeti viddhaṃsetīti dhammo”ti dhūdhātuvasenapi nibbacanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2908_6: vadanti, taṃ maggadhamme atīva yujjati, phalanibbānapariyattidhammesu pana pariyāyena yujjati.
anya-e0804n0:2909_1: suttaṃ geyya”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ dissati. “Hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu hetumhi.
anya-e0804n0:2910: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
anya-e0804n0:2911: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”nti
anya-e0804n0:2912: Ādīsu guṇe. “Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti. Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharatī”tiādīsu nissattanijjīvatāyaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2913_1: yapaccayuppannādīsu dissati. Ayañhi “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā”tiādīsu sabhāve dissati.
anya-e0804n0:2915: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socatī”ti
anya-e0804n0:2917: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
anya-e0804n0:2918: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:2919_1: dhammā, saṅghādisesā dhammā”tiādīsu āpattiyaṃ. “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti suttaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2919_2: geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇa”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ. “Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti. Dhammesu
anya-e0804n0:2920_1: diṭṭhappayogo. Tathā hi “idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī”tiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ dissati.
anya-e0804n0:2920_3: samādhimhi. “Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo”ti evamādīsu paññāyaṃ. “Jātidhammānaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0804n0:2920_4: sattāna”nti evamādīsu pakatiyaṃ. “Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāri”nti evamādīsu puññe.
anya-e0804n0:2920_5: “Cattāro pārājikā dhammā”tiādīsu āpattiyaṃ. “Kusalā dhammā”tiādīsu ñeyye. Evaṃ dhammasaddappavattivisayā
anya-e0804n0:2920_6: vividhā aṭṭhakathācariyehi dassitā, tattha tattha pana ādisaddena yuttivisayādayo
anya-e0804n0:2920_7: ca atthā gahetabbā. Tathā hi dhammasaddo –
anya-e0804n0:2921: “Nesa dhammo mahārāja, yaṃ tvaṃ gaccheyya ekako;
anya-e0804n0:2922: Ahampi tena gacchāmi, yena gacchasi khattiyā”ti
anya-e0804n0:2923_0: Ādīsu yuttiyaṃ vattati. “Manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:2923_1: visaye. “Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upetī”ti ettha nibbāne vattati. Tatra yā nissattatā,
anya-e0804n0:2923_2: sā eva nijjīvatā. Yo ca hetu, so eva paccayo.
anya-e0804n0:2926: Sabhāve ceva paññāyaṃ, puññe paññattiyampi ca.
anya-e0804n0:2930: Keci pana dhammasaddassa pavattivisayānaṃ dasadhāva paricchedaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:2931: Ñeyyamagge ca nibbāne, sabhāve atha jātiyaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:2934: Tatra atthuddhāroti samānasaddavacanīyānaṃ atthānaṃ uddharaṇaṃ atthuddhāro.
anya-e0804n0:2937_0: Pāla rakkhaṇe. “Rakkhaṇaṃ, tāṇaṃ, gopanaṃ, avanaṃ, pālanaṃ, rakkhā, rakkhaṇā, gutti”
anya-e0804n0:2937_1: iccete pariyāyā. Pāleti, pālayati. Pālako, buddhapālo. Ambapālī gaṇikā. Samo bhavatu
anya-e0804n0:2938_0: Ettha pāḷīti atthaṃ pāletīti pāḷi, lassa ḷattaṃ. Atha vā antodakaṃ rakkhaṇaṭṭhena
anya-e0804n0:2938_1: mahato taḷākassa thirā mahatīti pāḷi viyāti pāḷi, pariyattidhammo. Aparo nayo pakaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2938_2: ukkaṭṭhānaṃ sīlādiatthānaṃ bodhanato sabhāvaniruttibhāvato buddhādīhi bhāsitattā
anya-e0804n0:2941_2: paṭipāṭiyā nisīdiṃsūti attho. Imasmiṃ panatthe dhātuyā kiccaṃ natthi. Pāṭipadiko
anya-e0804n0:2942: Tila sinehane. Teleti, telayati. Telaṃ, tilo, tilaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2943_0: Tattha tiloti tilagaccho. Tilanti tapphalaṃ. Tato pana nikkhanto sineho telaṃ. So
anya-e0804n0:2943_1: hi “tilānaṃ idanti tela”nti vuccati. Yadi evaṃ “sāsapatela”ntiādivacanaṃ na yujjeyyāti?
anya-e0804n0:2943_2: No na yujjati, “tilasinehane”ti evaṃ vuttāya tiladhātuyā sāmaññato yassa kassaci
anya-e0804n0:2943_3: sinehassa vacanato. Tena “sāsapatelaṃ, madhukatela”ntiādayo sāsane payogā dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:2943_4: Mayaṃ pana tiladhātuvasena nipphannānaṃ tilagacchatapphalavācakānaṃ “tilo, tila”nti
anya-e0804n0:2943_5: saddarūpānaṃ pakāsanamukhena “tilānaṃ idanti tela”nti vadāma, na pana tena vacanena
anya-e0804n0:2943_6: sāsapādīnaṃ sinehassa atelattaṃ vadāma. Atha kiñcarahīti ce? Taddhitavidhāne viññunaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2943_7: kosallatthaṃ tilasaddaṃ paṭicca “tilānaṃ idanti tela”nti vadāma. Sinehasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0804n0:2943_8: sāsapādīnaṃ telassa vacanaṃ na jahāma, tasmā udāharaṇappakāsane “tilo, tilaṃ, tela”nti
anya-e0804n0:2943_9: avatvā “telaṃ, tilo, tila”nti amhehi vuttaṃ. Idañhi vacanaṃ telassa sāmaññato sinehe
anya-e0804n0:2943_10: pavattiṃ dīpeti. Teneva ca sāsane “tilatelaṃ, sāsapatela”ntiādinā visesavacanampi
anya-e0804n0:2943_11: dissatīti niṭṭhametthāvagantabbaṃ. Apica telasaddo yebhuyyena tilatele vattati, yathā
anya-e0804n0:2944: Jala apavāraṇe. Jāleti, jālayati. Jālaṃ, jālā. Jālanti macchajālaṃ. Jālāti aggijālā.
anya-e0804n0:2945: Khala soceyye. Soceyyaṃ sucibhāvo. Khāleti, khālayati. Pakkhāleti, pakkhālayati.
anya-e0804n0:2946: Tala patiṭṭhāyaṃ. Tāleti, tālayati. Tālo, talaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2947: Ettha tāloti tiṇarājarukkho. Talanti pāṇitalabhūmitalādi. Tañhi tālayati patiṭṭhāti ettha vatthujātanti talaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2949: Dula ukkhepe. Ukkhepo uddhaṃ khipanaṃ. Doleti, dolayati. Dolā.
anya-e0804n0:2950: Ettha ca doliyati ukkhipiyati yattha nipanno dārako, yathānipannako vāti dolā.
anya-e0804n0:2952: Mīla nimīlane. Mīleti, mīlayati. Mīlanaṃ, ummīlanaṃ, nimīlanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2953: Mūla rohane. Mūleti, mūlayati. Mūlaṃ. Esā hi yadā patiṭṭhāyaṃ vattati, tadā bhūvādigaṇikā, “mūlatī”ti cassā rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2954: Tattha mūlanti mūlayati rūhati rukkhādi etenāti mūlaṃ. Atha vā mūlayati chinnopi koci etena acchinnena punadeva rūhatīti mūlaṃ. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0804n0:2960: Kala pila khepe. Kāleti, kālayati. Kālo. Pileti, pilayati.
anya-e0804n0:2961: Ettha kāloti samayopi maccupi. Tatra samayo tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āyuṃ kālayati khepeti divase divase appaṃ appaṃ karotīti kāloti vuccati. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
anya-e0804n0:2964_0: Maccu pana kālayati tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ khepeti samucchedavasena nāsetīti
anya-e0804n0:2964_1: kāloti vuccati. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “kāloti maccu. Kālayati sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2964_2: nāsetīti kālo. Kālena maccunā kato nāsitoti kālakato”ti. “Maraṇaṃ hindaṃ maccu maṭṭu
anya-e0804n0:2969: Dala vidāraṇe. Dāleti, dālayati, padāleti, padālayati. Kudālo.
anya-e0804n0:2970: Kala gatisaṅkhyānesu. Kāleti, kālayati. Kālo, kalā. Kalāti avayavo. Sā hi kālayitabbā saṅkhāyitabbāti kalā.
anya-e0804n0:2971: Sīla upadhāraṇe. Upadhāraṇaṃ bhuso dhāraṇaṃ, patiṭṭhāvasena ādhārabhāvo. Sīleti, sīlayati. Sīlaṃ, sīlanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2972_0: Ettha sīlanti sīleti upadhāreti taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ apāyesu uppattinivāraṇavasena
anya-e0804n0:2972_1: bhuso dhāretīti sīlaṃ. Atha vāsīliyati upacāriyati sappurisehi hadayamaṃsantaraṃ
anya-e0804n0:2972_2: upanetvā dhāriyatīti sīlaṃ. Sīlananti bhūvādigaṇe avippakiṇṇatāsaṅkhātaṃ samādhānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2972_3: vuccati. Tattha “sīlatī”ti rūpaṃ, idha pana ādhārabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ upadhāraṇaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:2972_4: Ettha ca “sīleti, sīlayatī”ti rūpāni. Aṭṭhakathāsu hi “kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhāvasena
anya-e0804n0:2973: Vela kālopadese. Veleti, velayati. Velā. Keci “vela iti dhātusaddo na hotī”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ, porāṇehi saddasatthavidūhi “velayatī”ti rūpassa dassitattā.
anya-e0804n0:2974_0: Pala mūla lavanapavanesu. Lavanaṃ chedanaṃ, pavanaṃ sodhanaṃ. Pāleti, pālayati. Palaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2974_1: Palaṃ nāma mānaviseso. Lokassa vimatiṃ pāleti lunāti sodheti cāti palaṃ. Mūleti,
anya-e0804n0:2974_2: mūlayati. Saddasatthavidū pana “mūlayati kedāraṃ, mūlayati dhañña”nti payogaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:2975: Thūla paribrūhane. Paribrūhanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ. Thūleti, thūlayati. Thūlo puriso. Thūlā javena hāyanti.
anya-e0804n0:2976: Pala gatiyaṃ. Paleti, palayati. Atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkhaṃ. Paleti rasamādāya. Yathā suttaguḷaṃ yattakehi suttehi veṭhitaṃ, tattakehi eva palayati.
anya-e0804n0:2977_0: Ciṅgula paribbhamane. Ciṅguleti, ciṅgulayati. Ciṅgulayitvā. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “yāvatikā
anya-e0804n0:2977_1: abhisaṅkhārassa gati, tāvatikaṃ gantvā ciṅgulayitvā bhūmiyaṃ papatī”ti. Tattha ciṅgulayitvāti paribbhamitvā.
anya-e0804n0:2980: Divu parikūjane. Parikūjanaṃ gajjanaṃ. Deveti, devayati. Devo ca paridevitvā. Devoti megho.
anya-e0804n0:2981: Divu addane. Addanaṃ gandhapisananti vadanti. Deveti, devayati.
anya-e0804n0:2985_0: Pusa posane. Poseti, posayati. Imāni rūpāni kiñcāpi bhūvādigaṇikaṃ “posetī”ti rūpaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2985_1: paṭicca hetukatturūpāni viya dissanti, tathāpi “aññepi devo posetī”tiādikassa curādigaṇikarūpassa
anya-e0804n0:2985_2: dassanato suddhakattuvasena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ubhinnaṃ pana kāritaṭṭhāne “posāpeti,
anya-e0804n0:2992: Punsa abhimaddane. Nakāro niggahītatthaṃ. Puṃseti, puṃsayati. Napuṃsako. Dhātunakārassa lope “poso” iccapi rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:2993_0: Tattha na puṃsakoti itthibhāvapumbhāvarahito puggalo. So hi puriso viya sātisayaṃ
anya-e0804n0:2993_1: paccāmitte na puṃseti abhimaddanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti napuṃsakoti vuccati. Keci pana
anya-e0804n0:2993_2: “na pumā, na itthī”ti napuṃsakoti vacanatthaṃ vadanti. Tathā hi saddasatthavidū taṃ
anya-e0804n0:2995: Rusa rosane. Rosanaṃ kopakaraṇaṃ. Roseti, rosayati. Roso. Rosoti kodho.
anya-e0804n0:2998: Daṃsa daṃsane. Daṃseti, daṃsayati. Daṃsano. Daṃsanoti danto. Daṃsanti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā etenāti daṃsano.
anya-e0804n0:2999: Dasi dassane ca. Cakāro daṃsanaṃ apekkhati. Daṃseti, daṃsayati. Vidaṃseti, vidaṃsayati sūriyo ālokaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3000: Tassa santajjane. Tasseti, tassayati puriso core.
anya-e0804n0:3001: Vassu sattibandhane. Sattibandhanaṃ samatthatākaraṇaṃ. Vasseti, vassayati.
anya-e0804n0:3002: Jasa tāḷane. Tāḷanaṃ paharaṇaṃ. Jāseti, jāsayati.
anya-e0804n0:3003: Pasa bandhane. Pāseti, pāsayati. Pāso. Pāsanti bandhanti satte etenāti pāso, sakuṇapāsādi.
anya-e0804n0:3004: Ghusi visaddane. Visaddanaṃ ugghosanaṃ. Ghoseti, ghosayati. Ghoso.
anya-e0804n0:3005_0: Lasa silyayoge. Silyayogo lāsiyaṃ nāṭakanāṭanaṃ recakadānaṃ. Lāseti, lāsayati. Lāsento,
anya-e0804n0:3005_1: lāsentī. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “vādentiyāpi lāsenti, naccantiyāpi lāsenti, lāsentiyāpi naccantī”ti.
anya-e0804n0:3005_2: Tattha lāsentīti yā uplavamānā viya uṭṭhahitvā lāsiyanāṭakaṃ nāṭenti, recakaṃ denti.
anya-e0804n0:3006: Bhūsa alaṅkāre. Bhūseti, bhūsayati. Vibhūseti, vibhūsayati. Bhūsanaṃ, vibhūsanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3007: Vasa sinehanachedāvaharaṇesu. Avaharaṇaṃ corikāya gahaṇaṃ. Vāseti, vāsayati. Vasā.
anya-e0804n0:3008: Tāsa vāraṇe. Vāraṇaṃ nivāraṇaṃ. Tāseti, tāsayati.
anya-e0804n0:3011: Pusa dhāraṇe. Poseti, posayati, ābharaṇaṃ dhāretīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:3012: Tusi pisi kusi dasi bhāsāyaṃ. Tuṃseti, tuṃsayati. Piṃseti, piṃsayati. Kuṃseti, kuṃsayati. Daṃseti, daṃsayati.
anya-e0804n0:3014: Gavesa maggane. Gaveseti, gavesayati. Gavesako, gavesito, gavesanā, gaveṭṭhi.
anya-e0804n0:3015: Vāsa upasevāyaṃ. Vāseti, vāsayati. Vāso, āvāso.
anya-e0804n0:3017: Nivāsa acchādane. Vatthaṃ nivāseti, nivāsayati. Pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā.
anya-e0804n0:3018: Aṃsa saṅghāte. Aṃseti, aṃsayati. Aṃso, aṃsā.
anya-e0804n0:3019: Ettha ca aṃsoti koṭṭhāsopi khandhopi vuccati. Aṃsāti arisarogo.
anya-e0804n0:3021: Rasa assādane. Raseti, rasayati. Raso. Rasiyate assādiyate janehīti raso.
anya-e0804n0:3023: Tattha rasetīti sinehati. Rasoti sineho, sinehasambandho sāmaggirasoti vuccati, yaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇā bhagavantaṃ “arasarūpo samaṇo gotamo”ti avocuṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3024: Siya asabbappayoge. Seseti, sesayati. Seso. Vipubbo atisaye, vipubbo atisaye, vipubbo sisadhātu atisaye vattati, viseseti, visesayati. Viseso, visiṭṭho, visesanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3025_0: Missa sammisse. Misseti, missayati. Sammisseti, sammissayati. Misso, misso, missito,
anya-e0804n0:3025_1: sammissito, sammisso iccādīni. Alambusājātake missāti itthīnaṃ vattabbanāmaṃ, purisehi
anya-e0804n0:3029: Pisa pesane. Peseti, pesayati. Pesako, pesito.
anya-e0804n0:3030: Ghusa sadde. Ghoseti, ghosayati. Ugghosayuṃ bodhimaṇḍe pamoditā. Ghoso.
anya-e0804n0:3031: Disī uccāraṇe. Deseti, desayati. Desako, desetā, desito, desanā.
anya-e0804n0:3032: Vasa acchādane. Vāseti, vāsayati. Nivāseti, nivāsayati. Vatthaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3035: Araha pūjāyaṃ. Araheti, arahayati. Arahā, arahaṃ. “Arahā, khīṇāsavo, asekkho”ti arahato nāmāni.
anya-e0804n0:3038: Varāhoti sūkaropi hatthīpi vuccati. “Eṇeyyā ca varāhā cā”ti ettha hi sūkaro “varāho”ti vutto, “mahāvarāhassa…pe… nadīsu jaggato”ti ettha pana hatthī “varāho”ti.
anya-e0804n0:3041: Maha pūjāyaṃ. Maheti, mahayati. Mahito rājā mahārājā. Vihāramaho, cetiyamaho.
anya-e0804n0:3042: Piha icchāyaṃ. Piheti, pihayati. Pihā, pihālu, apiho, pihanīyā vibhūtiyo.
anya-e0804n0:3043: Kuha vimhāpane. Kuheti, kuhayati. Kuhako. Kuhayati lokavimhāpanaṃ karotīti kuhako. Kuhanā.
anya-e0804n0:3044: Saha parisahane. Parisahanaṃ khanti. Saheti, sahayati. Sahanaṃ. Bhūvādigaṇikassa panassa “sahatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3045: Garaha vinindane. Garaheti, garahayati. Garahā. Bhūvādigaṇikassa panassa “garahatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3048: Taḷa tāḷane. Tāḷeti, tāḷayati. Patāḷeti, patāḷayati. Tāḷaṃ. Tāḷanti kaṃsatāḷādi.
anya-e0804n0:3053: Pīḷa avagāhane. Pīḷeti, pīḷayati. Nippīḷeti, nippīḷayati. Pīḷanako, pīḷito, pīḷā, pīḷanaṃ, nippīḷanako.
anya-e0804n0:3054: Laḷa upasevāyaṃ. Lāḷeti, lāḷayati. Upalāḷeti, upalāḷayati. Bhūvādigaṇaṭṭhāya pana vilāsanatthe vattamānāya etissā “laḷatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3055: Siḷa seḷane. Seḷeti, seḷayati. Seḷento. Ettha seḷetīti seḷitasaddaṃ karoti.
anya-e0804n0:3057: Curādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:3063: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3071_0: Tattha paṭhamo bhūvādigaṇo, dutiyo rudhādigaṇo, tatiyo divādigaṇo, catuttho svādiguṇo,
anya-e0804n0:3071_1: pañcamo kiyādigaṇo, chaṭṭho gahādigaṇo, sattamo tanādigaṇo, aṭṭhamo curādigaṇo, imasmiṃ
anya-e0804n0:3071_2: bhagavato pāvacane aṭṭhavidhā dhātugaṇā bhavanti. Etesu vikaraṇapaccayavasena –
anya-e0804n0:3074: Yapaccayo divādimhā, ṇu ṇā uṇā suvādito;
anya-e0804n0:3075: Kyādito pana nāyeva, ppaṇhā pana gahādito.
anya-e0804n0:3076: Oyirā tu tanādimhā, ṇe ṇayā ca curādito;
anya-e0804n0:3078: Hiyyattanī sattamī ca, vattamānā ca pañcamī;
anya-e0804n0:3081: Aññatra kha cha sādīhi, sahāpi cupalabbhati.
anya-e0804n0:3083: Ḍeti yāti iti eti, avati koti saṅkati.
anya-e0804n0:3084: Bhikkhati pivati pāti, vadeti vadati” iti;
anya-e0804n0:3090: “Suṇoti ca suṇāti ca, vuṇoti ca vuṇāti ca;
anya-e0804n0:3092: “Kināti ca jināti ca, dhunāti ca munāti ca;
anya-e0804n0:3095: Kaṇhaṃ taṇhā ca tiṇhuṇha”-miccādi ca gahādinaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3096: “Tanoti ca karoti ca, kayirati sanoti ca;
anya-e0804n0:3105: Ṭhāsādayo akammā ca, upasaggaṃ vinā vade;
anya-e0804n0:3109: Akammakehi saddhiṃ te, tividhāpi bhavanti hi.
anya-e0804n0:3113: Niyamo natthi so tasmā, na mayā ettha vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:3115: Tiṭṭhānā svādayo evaṃ, ṭhānatopi tidhā matā.
anya-e0804n0:3117: Vaca turādayo na hi, vuddhikā kāritaṃ vinā;
anya-e0804n0:3118: Khi ji iccādayo dhātū, savuddhāvuddhikā matā;
anya-e0804n0:3123: Pā bhādayo jiniccādī, kamato itare siyuṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3128: Puna suddhassarā dhātū, ekassarā ca sattadhā;
anya-e0804n0:3134_0: Tatra “igatiyaṃ, i ajjhayane, u sadde” iccete suddhassarā dhātavo. Yā rā lā iccādayo
anya-e0804n0:3134_1: ekassarā ākārantā. Khijiniiccādayo ekassarā ikārantā. Pīiccādayo ekassarā īkārantā.
anya-e0804n0:3134_2: Khu du ku iccādayo ekassarā ukārantā, bhū hū iccādayo ekassarā ūkārantā. Khe je se
anya-e0804n0:3134_3: iccādayo ekassarā ekārantā. So iccādayo ekassarā okārantā.
anya-e0804n0:3135_0: Kara paca saṅgāma iccādayo anekassarā akārantā, omāiccādayo anekassarā ākārantā,
anya-e0804n0:3135_1: saki iccādayo anekassarā ikārantā. Cakkhī iccādayo anekassarā īkārantā. Andhuiccādayo
anya-e0804n0:3135_2: anekassarā ukārantā. Kakkhū iccādayo anekassarā ūkārantā. Gile mile iccādayo anekassarā
anya-e0804n0:3137: Dhātū suddhassarā ceva, puna cekassarāpi ca;
anya-e0804n0:3138: Kakārantā khakārantā, gantā ghantā ca dhātavo.
anya-e0804n0:3139: Cakārantā chakārantā, jantā jhantā ca ñantakā;
anya-e0804n0:3140: Ṭakārantā ṭhakārantā, ḍantā ḍhantā ca ṇantakā.
anya-e0804n0:3141: Tantā ceva tathā thantā, dantā dhantā ca nantakā;
anya-e0804n0:3142: Pantā phantā bakārantā, bhantā mantā ca yantakā.
anya-e0804n0:3143: Rantā lantā vakārantā, santā hantā ca ḷantakā;
anya-e0804n0:3145: Mate satthussa ḍhaṇaḷā, padādimhi na dissare;
anya-e0804n0:3153: Sahanato hananato, sīhoti hi garū vaduṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3154_0: Tathā hi sīho vātātapādiparissayampi sahati, “kiṃ me bahūhi ghāṭitehī”ti attano gocaratthāya
anya-e0804n0:3154_1: khuddake pāṇe agaṇhanto, “māhaṃ khuddake pāṇe visamagate saṅghātaṃ āpādesī”ti anuddayavasena
anya-e0804n0:3154_2: sahitabbe khuddakasattepi sahati. Hiṃsitabbe pana kāyūpapanne sūkaramahiṃsādayo satte
anya-e0804n0:3154_3: hiṃsati, tasmāpi “sīho”ti vuccati. Yathā pana kantanaṭṭhena ādiantavipallāsato takkaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3154_4: vuccati, evaṃ hiṃsanaṭṭhenapi sīhoti veditabbo. Atha vā sabbiriyāpathesu daḷhavīriyattā
anya-e0804n0:3158: Sahanā ca hiṃsanā ca, tathā sīghajavattato;
anya-e0804n0:3160: Vuttañhi suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saharā ca hananā ca sīghajavattā ca sīho”ti.
anya-e0804n0:3161_0: Idāni tadatthuddhāro vuccate, sīhasaddo “sīho bhikkhave migarājā”tiādīsu migarāje
anya-e0804n0:3161_1: āgato. “Atha kho sīho senāpati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ. “Sīhoti
anya-e0804n0:3161_2: kho bhikkhave tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”tiādīsu tathāgate.
anya-e0804n0:3167_0: Vuttañhetaṃ garūhi “rūpayatīti rūpaṃ, vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3167_1: pakāsetīti attho”ti. Vuttampi cetaṃ “rūpanti kenaṭṭhena rūpaṃ? Ruppanaṭṭhenā”ti.
anya-e0804n0:3167_2: Bhagavatā panetaṃ vuttaṃ “kiñca bhikkhave rūpaṃ vadetha, ruppatīti kho bhikkhave
anya-e0804n0:3167_3: tasmā rūpanti vuccati. Kena ruppati, sītenapi ruppatī”ti vitthāro. Atthuddhāro panassa heṭṭhā vuttova.
anya-e0804n0:3170_0: Ettha hi samuddoti aṭṭhahi acchariyabbhutadhammehi samannāgatattā samuddati attasannissitānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3170_1: macchamakarādīnaṃ pītisomanassaṃ pasavati janetīti samuddo. Ayamasmākaṃ khanti. Aṭṭhakathācariyā
anya-e0804n0:3170_2: pana “samuddanaṭṭhena samuddo, kiledanaṭṭhena tenamanaṭṭhenāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:3170_3: Milindapañhe pana āyasmā nāgaseno “bhante nāgasena samuddo samuddoti vuccati, kena
anya-e0804n0:3170_4: kāraṇena āpaṃ udakaṃ samuddoti vuccatī”ti milindena raññā puṭṭho āha “yattakaṃ mahārāja
anya-e0804n0:3170_5: udakaṃ, tattakaṃ loṇaṃ, yattakaṃ loṇaṃ, tattakaṃ udakaṃ, udakasamattā samuddoti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0804n0:3170_6: Tadā raññā milindena “kallosi bhante nāgasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha hi samaṃ udakena loṇaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3170_7: etthāti samuddoti nibbacanaṃ veditabbaṃ “nīloda”ntiādīsu viya. Tattha bhadantanāgasenamatañca
anya-e0804n0:3170_8: amhākaṃ matañca pakatisamuddaṃ sandhāya vuttattā na virujjhati, aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3170_9: matampi “taṇhāsamuddo”ti ca “samuddopeso”ti ca āgatāni samuddasarikkhakāni ca taṇhācakkhusotādīni
anya-e0804n0:3172: Khanito vāpi dhātumhā, dhāto khaṃpubbatopi vā;
anya-e0804n0:3174_0: Tattha “saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhāpi dukkhā”ti vacanato sayampi dukkhadhammoyeva
anya-e0804n0:3174_1: samāno jātijarābyādhimaraṇadukkhādīhi anekehi dukkhehi khajjati khādiyatīti khandho,
anya-e0804n0:3174_2: teheva dukkhehi khaññati avadāriyatītipi khandho, khaniyati parikhaññatītipi khandho,
anya-e0804n0:3174_3: attena vā attaniyena vā tucchattā khaṃ suññākāraṃ dhāretītipi khandho, rūpakkhandhādi.
anya-e0804n0:3176: Koṭṭhāse ceva aṃse ca, vattatīti vibhāvaye.
anya-e0804n0:3177_0: Vuttañhetaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ – khandhasaddo sambahulesu ṭhānesu
anya-e0804n0:3177_1: nipatati rāsimhi guṇe paṇṇattiyaṃ rūḷhiyanti. “Seyyathāpi bhikkhave mahāsamudde na
anya-e0804n0:3177_2: sukaraṃ udakassa pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ “ettakāni udakāḷhakānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakasatānī’ti
anya-e0804n0:3177_3: vā ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakasahassānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakasatasahassānī’ti vā, atha
anya-e0804n0:3177_4: kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu hi rāsito
anya-e0804n0:3177_5: khandho nāma. Na hi parittakaṃ udakaṃ udakakkhandhoti vuccati, bahukameva vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:3177_6: tathā na parittakaṃ rajo rajakkhandho, na appamattakā gāvo gavakkhandho, na appamattakaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3177_7: balaṃ balakkhandho, na appamattakaṃ puññaṃ puññakkhandhoti vuccati. Bahukameva hi
anya-e0804n0:3177_8: rajo rajakkhandho, bahukā ca gavādayo gavakkhandho, balakkhandho, puññakkhandhoti
anya-e0804n0:3177_9: vuccanti. “Sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho”tiādīsu pana guṇato khandho nāma. “Addasā
anya-e0804n0:3177_10: khā bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”nti ettha paṇṇattito
anya-e0804n0:3177_11: khandho nāma. “Yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho”tiādīsu rūḷhīto
anya-e0804n0:3177_12: khandho nāma. Svāyamidha rāsito adhippeto. Ayañhi khandhaṭṭho nāma piṇḍaṭṭho pūgaṭṭho
anya-e0804n0:3177_13: ghaṭaṭṭho rāsaṭṭho, tasmā rāsilakkhaṇā khandhāti veditabbā. Koṭṭhāsaṭṭhātipi vattuṃ
anya-e0804n0:3177_14: vaṭṭati. Lokasmiñhi iṇaṃ gahetvā codiyamānā “dvīhi khandhehi dassāma, tīhi khandhehi
anya-e0804n0:3177_15: dassāmā”ti vadanti. Iti koṭṭhāsalakkhaṇā khandhātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Evamettha “rūpakkhandhoti
anya-e0804n0:3177_16: rūparāsi rūpakoṭṭhāso, vedanākkhandhoti vedanārāsi vedanākoṭṭhāso”ti iminā nayena
anya-e0804n0:3177_17: attho veditabbo. “Khandhe bhāraṃ. Khandhato otāreti, mahāhanusabhakkhandho”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:3180_0: Vuttampi cetaṃ – āyatanato, āyānaṃ vā tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatananti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3180_1: Cakkhu rūpādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādikiccena
anya-e0804n0:3180_2: āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamantīti vā vuttaṃ hoti. Te ca pana āyabhūte dhamme
anya-e0804n0:3180_3: etāni tananti vitthārentīti vuttaṃ hoti. Idañca anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ atīva
anya-e0804n0:3180_4: āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati, tāva nayanti, pavattayantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0804n0:3180_5: Iti sabbepime dhammā āyatanato, āyānaṃ vā tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatananti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:3181_0: Apica nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhena
anya-e0804n0:3181_1: āyatanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi “loke issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3181_2: āyatananti vuccati. “Suvaṇṇāyatanaṃ rajatāyatana”ntiādīsu ākaro, sāsane pana “manorame
anya-e0804n0:3181_3: āyatane, sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. “Dakkhiṇāpatho gunnaṃ āyatana”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:3181_4: sañjātideso. “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3182_0: Cakkhuādīsu cāpi cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo ca
anya-e0804n0:3182_1: nesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Cakkhādīsu te ākiṇṇā tannissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti cakkhādayo
anya-e0804n0:3182_2: ca nesaṃ ākaro. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ tattha tattha dvārārammaṇavasena
anya-e0804n0:3182_3: samosaraṇato. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ sañjātideso tannissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva uppattito,
anya-e0804n0:3182_4: cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ kāraṇaṃ tesaṃ abhāve abhāvato. Iti nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena
anya-e0804n0:3182_5: samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhenāti imehi kāraṇehi ete dhammā
anya-e0804n0:3182_6: āyatananti vuccanti, tasmā yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṃ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe…
anya-e0804n0:3182_7: dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṃ tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayoti. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0804n0:3183: Nivāso ākaro ceva, jātideso ca kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0804n0:3188_0: Ettha pūretuṃ ayuttaṭṭhena kāyaduccaritādi avindiyaṃ nāma, aladdhabbanti attho, taṃ
anya-e0804n0:3188_1: avindiyaṃ vindatīti avijjā, tabbiparītato kāyasucaritādi vindiyaṃ nāma, taṃ vindiyaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3188_2: na vindatīti avijjā. Khandhānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ, āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:3188_3: saccānaṃ tathaṭṭhaṃ, indriyānaṃ adhipatiyaṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti avijjā. Dukkhādīnaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3188_4: pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti avijjā, antavirahite saṃsāre
anya-e0804n0:3188_6: avijjamānesu itthipurisādīsu javati, vijjamānesupi khandhādīsu na javatīti avijjā.
anya-e0804n0:3189_1: naṃ dhammānaṃ chādanatopi avijjā”ti vuttaṃ, etaṃ na saddatthato vuttaṃ, atha kho
anya-e0804n0:3189_2: avijjāya chādanakiccattā vuttaṃ. Tathā hi abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ –
anya-e0804n0:3190_1: vatthārammaṇāni ‘idaṃ vattu, idamārammaṇa’nti avijjāya ñātuṃ na sakkāti avijjā tappaṭicchādikā
anya-e0804n0:3190_2: vuttā, vatthārammaṇasabhāvacchādanato eva avijjādīnaṃ paṭiccasamuppādabhāvassa, jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3190_4: veditabbanti. Tattha duggatigāmikammassa visesappaccayattā avijjā ‘avindiyaṃ vindatī’ti
anya-e0804n0:3190_5: vuttā, tathā visesapaccayo vindanīyassa na hotīti ‘vindiyaṃ na vindatī’ti ca, attanissitānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3190_6: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ pavattāpanaṃ uppādanaṃ āyatanaṃ, sammohabhāveneva anabhisamayabhūtattā
anya-e0804n0:3190_8: pañcavidhassa niruttilakkhaṇassa vasena tīsupi padesu akāravikārajakāre gahetvā aññesaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3190_9: vaṇṇānaṃ lopaṃ katvā jakārassa ca dutiyassa āgamaṃ katvā avijjāti vuttā”ti.
anya-e0804n0:3195: Tathā hi arahanti aggadakkhiṇeyyattā cīvarādipaccaye arahati pūjāvisesañcāti arahaṃ. Vuttañca –
anya-e0804n0:3200: Tathā so kilesārayo maggena hanīti arahaṃ. Vuttañca –
anya-e0804n0:3203_1: akkhena vijjhitvā vibhavarathe samāyojitaṃ anādikālappavattaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ, tassa
anya-e0804n0:3203_2: so bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakaraṃ
anya-e0804n0:3203_3: ñāṇaparasuṃ gahetvā sabbe are hanītipi arahaṃ. Vuttañca –
anya-e0804n0:3206_0: Tathā attahitaṃ parahitañca paripūretuṃ sammā paṭipajjantehi sādhūhi dūrato rahitabbā
anya-e0804n0:3206_1: pariccajitabbā parihātabbāti rahā, rāgādayo pāpadhammā, na santi etassa rahāti arahaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3206_2: “Araho”ti vattabbe okārassa sānusāraṃ akārādesaṃ katvā “arahaṃ”nti vuttaṃ. Āha ca –
anya-e0804n0:3208: Tesaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnattā, bhagavā arahaṃ mato”ti.
anya-e0804n0:3209: Atha vā khīṇāsavehi sekkhehi kalyāṇaputhujjanehi ca na rahitabbo na pariccajitabbo, te ca bhagavāti arahaṃ. Āha ca –
anya-e0804n0:3214: Rahoti ca gamanaṃ vuccati, natthi etassa raho gamanaṃ gatīsu paccājātīti arahaṃ. Āha ca –
anya-e0804n0:3215: “Raho vā gamanaṃ yassa, saṃsāre natthi sabbaso;
anya-e0804n0:3217_0: Pāsaṃsattā vā bhagavā arahaṃ. Akkharacintakā hi pasaṃsāyaṃ arahasadaṃ vaṇṇenti. Pāsaṃsabhāvo
anya-e0804n0:3217_1: ca bhagavato anaññasādhāraṇo yathābhuccaguṇādhigato sadevake loke suppatiṭṭhito.
anya-e0804n0:3217_2: Iti pāsaṃsattāpi bhagavā arahaṃ. Āha ca –
anya-e0804n0:3220_0: Imāni nibbacanāni “araha pūjāyaṃ, hana hiṃsāyaṃ, raha cāge, rahi gatiya”nti imesaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3220_1: dhātūnaṃ vasena idha vuttāni kilesehi ārakattā “araha”nti ca pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvā
anya-e0804n0:3220_2: “araha”nti ca asappurisānaṃ ārakā dūreti “araha”nti ca sappurisānaṃ ārakā āsanneti
anya-e0804n0:3220_3: “araha”nti ca. Nibbacanāni pana dhātusaddanissitāni na hontīti idha na gahitāni.
anya-e0804n0:3220_4: Pasaṃsā pana atthato pūjā evāti “araha pūjāya”nti dhātussa attho bhavituṃ yuttoti
anya-e0804n0:3220_5: idha amhehi gahitā, aṭṭhakathācariyehi tu arahasaddassa labbhamānavasena sabbepi
anya-e0804n0:3220_6: atthā gahitā dhātunissitā ca adhātunissitā ca. Kathaṃ? –
anya-e0804n0:3221: Ārakattā hatattā ca, kilesārīna so muni;
anya-e0804n0:3223: Na raho karoti pāpāni, arahaṃ tena vuccatīti.
anya-e0804n0:3227: Bhavesu ca rahābhāvā, pāsaṃsā arahaṃ jinoti.
anya-e0804n0:3228: Yathā pana arahaṃsaddassa, evaṃ arahāsaddassāpi nibbacanāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:3231_0: Ettha hi sugatoti sobhanaṃ gataṃ etassāti sugato, sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatoti sugato,
anya-e0804n0:3231_1: sammā gatoti sugato, sammā ca gadatīti sugatoti dhātunissitaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā saddanipphatti
anya-e0804n0:3232_0: “Sobhanagamanattā, sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā, sammā gatattā, sammā ca gadattā sugato.
anya-e0804n0:3232_1: Gamanampi hi gatanti vuccati, tañca bhagavato sobhanaṃ parisuddhamanavajjaṃ. Kiṃ
anya-e0804n0:3232_2: pana tanti? Ariyamaggo, tenesa gamanena khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gatoti sobhanagamanattā sugato”tiādi.
anya-e0804n0:3235_0: Atrimāni nibbacanāni – bhagasaṅkhātā lokiyalokuttarasampattiyo vani bhaji sevīti
anya-e0804n0:3235_1: bhagavā. Somanassakumārattabhāvādīsu carimattabhāve ca bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ issariyaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3235_2: yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayīti bhagavā. Atha vā nakkhattehi
anya-e0804n0:3237: Muto tathā majato ca, mayato munato mito.
anya-e0804n0:3238: Puna mitoti etehi, dhātūhi khalu sattahi;
anya-e0804n0:3243: Mayato vā munato vā, mito vā punapi mito.
anya-e0804n0:3246: Ettha tāva uttamatthavācakaparamasaddavasena pāramīnibbacanaṃ kathessāma. Tato paradhātuvasena, tato parasaddūpapadamudhātādivasena tato pārasaddūpapadamajadhātādivasena.
anya-e0804n0:3247_0: Dānasīlādiguṇavisesayogena sattuttamatāya paramā. Mahābodhisattā bodhisattā, tesaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3247_1: bhāvo, kammaṃ vā pāramī, dānādikriyā. Atha vā parati pāleti pūreti cāti paramo, dānādīnaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3247_2: guṇānaṃ pālako pūrako ca bodhisatto, paramassa ayaṃ, paramassa vā bhāvo, kammaṃ vā
anya-e0804n0:3247_3: pāramī, dānādikriyā. Atha vā paraṃ sattaṃ attani mavati bandhati guṇavisesayogenāti
anya-e0804n0:3247_4: paramo, paraṃ vā adhikataraṃ majjati sujjhati kilesamalatoti paramo, paraṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3247_5: nibbānaṃ mayati gacchatīti paramo, paraṃ vā lokaṃ pamāṇabhūtena ñāṇavisesena idhalokaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3247_6: viya munāti paricchindatīti paramo, paraṃ vā ativiya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano santāne
anya-e0804n0:3247_7: minoti pakkhipatīti paramo, paraṃ vā attabhūtato dhammakāyato aññaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ vā
anya-e0804n0:3247_8: tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ mināti hiṃsatīti paramo, mahāsatto, paramassa ayaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:3247_9: paramassa vā bhāvo, kammaṃ vā pāramī, dānādikriyā.
anya-e0804n0:3248_0: Aparo nayo – pāre nibbāne majjati sujjhati, satte ca majjeti sodhetīti pāramī, mahāpuriso,
anya-e0804n0:3248_1: tassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā pāramitā. Pāre nibbāne satte mavati bandhati yojeīti pāramī,
anya-e0804n0:3248_2: pāraṃ vā nibbānaṃ mayati gacchati, satte ca māyeti gametīti pāramī, munāti vā pāraṃ
anya-e0804n0:3248_3: nibbānaṃ yāthāvato, tattha vā satte minoti pakkhipatīti pāramī, kilesāriṃ vā sattānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3248_4: pāre nibbāne mināti hiṃsatīti pāramī, mahāpuriso, tassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā pāramitā,
anya-e0804n0:3248_5: dānādikriyāva. Iminā nayena pāramīnaṃ saddattho veditabbo.
anya-e0804n0:3252_0: Tattha karuṇāti paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti karuṇā. Kirati paradukkaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3252_1: vikkhipatīti karuṇā. Kaṃ vuccati sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhati vibādhati kāruṇikaṃ na sukhāpetītipi karuṇā.
anya-e0804n0:3255_0: Tattha vijjāti vindiyaṃ kāyasucaritādiṃ vindati yāthāvato upalabhatīti vijjā. Tamokhandhādipadālanaṭṭhena
anya-e0804n0:3255_1: vā attano paṭipakkhaṃ vijjhatīti vijjā. Tato eva attano visayaṃ viditaṃ karotītipi vijjā.
anya-e0804n0:3258: Tattha medhāti sammohaṃ medhati hiṃsatīti medhā. Pāpake vā akusale dhamme medhati hiṃsatītipi medhā. Atha vā –
anya-e0804n0:3263_0: Vacanato pana medhati sīlena siriyā satañca dhammehi saha gacchati, na ekikā hutvā
anya-e0804n0:3263_1: tiṭṭhatītipi medhā. Aparo nayo – sukhumampi atthaṃ dhammañca khippameva meti ca dhāreti
anya-e0804n0:3263_2: cāti medhā, ettha metīti gaṇhātīti attho. Tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vuttaṃ “asani viya
anya-e0804n0:3263_3: siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā, khippaṃ gahaṇadhāraṇaṭṭhena vā medhā”ti.
anya-e0804n0:3266: Ranjanti sattā etthāti ratti, rā saddo tiyyati chijjati etthāti ratti, sattānaṃ saddassa vūpasamakāloti attho.
anya-e0804n0:3267: Mā māne iti soanta, kammanīti cubhohi tu;
anya-e0804n0:3269_0: Tathā hi sattānaṃ āyuṃ mānanto viya siyati antaṃ karotīti māso, cittamāsādayo dvādasa
anya-e0804n0:3269_1: māsā. Seyyathidaṃ? Citto visākho jeṭṭho āsāḷho sāvaṇo bhaddo assayujo kattiko māgasiro
anya-e0804n0:3269_2: phusso māgho phagguṇoti. Tatra citto māso “rammako”ti vuccati. “Yathāpi rammake māse,
anya-e0804n0:3269_3: bahū pupphanti vārijā”ti pāḷi dissati. Bhaddo pana “poṭṭhapādo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:3270_0: Atha vā māsoti aparaṇṇavisesassapi suvaṇṇamāsassapi nāmaṃ. Tattha aparaṇṇaviseso
anya-e0804n0:3270_1: yathāparimite kāle asiyati bhakkhiyatīti māso, itaro pana “mama ida”nti masiyati
anya-e0804n0:3273: Tathā hi taṃ taṃ sattaṃ dhammappavattiñca saṅgamma vadanto viya carati pavattatīti saṃvaccharo.
anya-e0804n0:3277: Tathā hi kilese bhindatīti bhikkhu. Chinnabhinnapaṭadharotipi bhikkhu. Bhikkhanasīlotipi bhikkhu. Saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhati, ikkhanasīloti vā bhikkhu.
anya-e0804n0:3279: Sappurise ca nibbāne, esa saddo pavattati.
anya-e0804n0:3280_0: Atrimāni nibbacanāni – sīdanasabhāve kilese bhindatīti sabbhi, sappuriso, yo “ariyo”tipi
anya-e0804n0:3280_1: “paṇḍito”tipi vuccati. Apica sīdanasabhāvā kilesā bhijjanti etthāti sabbhi, nibbānaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:3280_2: yaṃ “rāgakkhayo”tiādināmaṃ labhati. Tathā hi saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “yasmā nibbānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3280_3: āgamma sīdanasabhāvā kilesā bhijjanti, tasmā taṃ sabbhīti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0804n0:3283: Klesā bhijjanti taṃ tasmā, sabbhīti amataṃ’bravu”nti.
anya-e0804n0:3286: Tathā hi bravantā ettha sīdantīti bhisīti bhisisaddassa sambhavaṃ porāṇā kathayiṃsu.
anya-e0804n0:3289: Sukhanti hi sukhayatīti sukhaṃ. Yassuppajjati, taṃ sukhitaṃ karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ khādatītipi sukhaṃ. Suṭṭu dukkhaṃ khanatītipi sukhaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3292_0: Dukkhanti hi dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ. Yassuppajjati, taṃ dukkhitaṃ karotīti attho. Duṭṭhu
anya-e0804n0:3292_1: sukhaṃ khādatītipi dukkhaṃ. Duṭṭhu sukhaṃ khanatītipi dukkhaṃ. Atha vā dvidhā sukhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3295_0: Tathā hi gandhayatīti gandho, attano vatthuṃ sūcayati “idaṃ sugandhaṃ, idaṃ duggandha”nti
anya-e0804n0:3295_1: pakāseti, paṭicchannaṃ, vā pupphaphalādiṃ “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṃ karonto viya
anya-e0804n0:3295_2: ahosīti attho. Atha vā gandhayati chindati manāpagandho sugandhabhāvena duggandhaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:3295_3: amanāpagandho ca duggandhabhāvena sugandhanti gandho. Ettha pana gandhasaddassa chedanavācakatte –
anya-e0804n0:3297: Avajātaṃ na icchanti, yo hoti kulagandhano”ti
anya-e0804n0:3298_0: Ayaṃ pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Vāyunā vā nīyamāno gacchatīti gandho. Kaccāyanasmiñhi “khādāmagamānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3298_1: khandhandhagandhā”ti khādaamagamiiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ yathākkamaṃ khandha andhagandhādesā
anya-e0804n0:3298_2: vuttā. Atha vā gacchanto dhariyate soti gandho. Vuttañhetaṃ bhadantena buddhadattācariyena
anya-e0804n0:3298_3: veyyākaraṇena niruttinayadassinā “dhariyatīti gacchanto, gandho sūcanatopi vā”ti.
anya-e0804n0:3301_0: Rasoti hi rasanti taṃ assādentīti raso, ramantā taṃ asantītipi raso. Vuttampi cetaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3301_1: “ramamānā na’santīti rasoti paridīpito”ti. Tatrāyamattho – devamanussādayo sattā
anya-e0804n0:3301_2: yasmā ramamānā naṃ dhammajātaṃ asanti bhakkhanti, tasmā taṃ dhammajātaṃ raso nāmāti
anya-e0804n0:3301_3: niruttaññūhi paridīpitoti. Padacchedo pana evaṃ veditabbo –
anya-e0804n0:3302: Naṃ asanti na santīti, padacchedo siyā tahiṃ;
anya-e0804n0:3306: Dhātucintāya ye muttā, anipphannāti te matā;
anya-e0804n0:3310: Tathā hi “gacchatīti go”, iti vuttapadaṃ puna;
anya-e0804n0:3314_0: Seyyathidaṃ? “Viḍūḍabho, tisso, yevāpano, pītaṃ, lohitaṃ” iccevamādīni nāmikapadāni
anya-e0804n0:3314_1: anipphannāni bhavanti. “Nīlaṃ, pītaṃ, yevāpanako” iccādīni pana nīlavaṇṇe pītavaṇṇe.
anya-e0804n0:3314_2: Ke re ge saddeti dhātuvasena āgatattā nīlatīti nīlaṃ, pītatīti pītaṃ, ye vā pana
anya-e0804n0:3314_3: itivacanena bhagavatā kiyate kathiyateti yevāpanakoti nibbacanamarahantīti nipphannānīti
anya-e0804n0:3314_4: vattabbāni. Keci panettha vadeyyuṃ “nanu nīlati pītatītiādīni kriyāpadāni tepiṭake
anya-e0804n0:3314_5: buddhavacane na dissantī”ti? Kiñcāpi na dissanti, tathāpi etarahi avijjamānā purāṇabhāsā
anya-e0804n0:3314_6: esāti gahetabbāni. Yathā hi “nāthatīti nātho”ti ettha kiñcāpi “nāthatī”ti kriyāpadaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3314_7: buddhavacane na dissati, tathāpi nātha yācanopatāpissariyāsīsanesūti dhātuno diṭṭhattā
anya-e0804n0:3314_8: aṭṭhakathācariyā gaṇhiṃsuyeva, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi kriyāpadaparihīno dhātu vucceyya.
anya-e0804n0:3315_0: Kiñca bhiyyo – yathā “yāva byāti nimīsati, tatrāpi rasatibbayo”ti jātakapāḷiyaṃ imasmiṃ
anya-e0804n0:3315_1: buddhuppāde devamanussānaṃ vohārapathe asañcarantaṃ purāṇabhāsābhūtaṃ “byātī”ti kriyāpadampi
anya-e0804n0:3315_2: dissati, tathā “nīlati, pītatī”tiādīhipi purāṇabhāsābhūtehi kriyāpadehi bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3315_3: Tattha yāva byātīti yāva ummīsati. Ayañhi tasmiṃ kāle vohāro, yasmiṃ kāle bodhisatto
anya-e0804n0:3315_4: cūḷabodhi nāma paribbājako ahosi. Yathā pana viḍūḍabhasaddādayo dhātuvasena anipphannā
anya-e0804n0:3315_5: nāma vuccanti, tathā “pabbatāyati, samuddāyati, cicciṭāyati, dhūmāyati, duddubhāyati,
anya-e0804n0:3315_6: mettāyati, karuṇāyati, mamāyati” iccevamādayo ca “chattīyati, vatthīyati, parikkhārīyati,
anya-e0804n0:3315_7: dhanīyati, paṭīyati” iccevamādayo ca “atihatthayati, upavīṇayati, daḷhayati, pamāṇayati,
anya-e0804n0:3315_8: kusalayati, visuddhayati” iccevamādayo ca dhātuvasena anipphannāyeva nāma vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:3316_0: Tattha “pabbatāyatī”tiādīsu saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati pabbatāyati, evaṃ samuddāyati.
anya-e0804n0:3316_1: Saddo cicciṭamiva attānamācarati cicciṭāyati. Vatthu dhūmamiva attānamācarati dhūmāyati.
anya-e0804n0:3316_2: Saddo duddubhaiti ācarati duddubhāyati, bhikkhu mettāyati, tathā karuṇāyati. “Mama
anya-e0804n0:3316_3: ida”nti gaṇhati mamāyati. Achattaṃ chattamiva ācarati chattīyati. Aputtaṃ puttamiva
anya-e0804n0:3316_4: ācarati puttīyati, sissaṃ ācariyo, attano pattamicchati pattīyati. Evaṃ vatthīyati,
anya-e0804n0:3316_5: parikkhārīyati, cīvarīyati, dhanīyati, paṭīyati. Hatthinā atikkamati atihatthayati.
anya-e0804n0:3316_6: Vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇayati. Daḷhaṃ karoti vīriyaṃ daḷhayati. Pamāṇaṃ karoti pamāṇayati.
anya-e0804n0:3316_7: Kusalaṃ pucchati kusalayati. Visuddhā hoti ratti visuddhāyati.
anya-e0804n0:3317_0: Tatrāyaṃ padamālā – “pabbatāyati, pabbatāyanti. Pabbatāyasi, pabbatāyatha. Pabbatāyāmi,
anya-e0804n0:3317_1: pabbatāyāmā”ti iminā nayena aṭṭhannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ vasena sesaṃ sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:3317_3: pabbatāyati, puttiyantaṃ payojayati puttīyati” iccādi padasiddhi bhavati. Ayaṃ pana
anya-e0804n0:3317_4: padamālā – pabbatāyati, pabbatāyanti. Pabbatāyasi. Sesaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Iccevaṃ dhātuvasena
anya-e0804n0:3319_0: Tatra sabbadhātukanissite suddhakattuppayoge suddhassaradhātuto vā ekassarato vā
anya-e0804n0:3319_1: anekassarato vā apaccayassa parabhāvo bhūvādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇavasena,
anya-e0804n0:3319_2: visesalakkhaṇavasena pana ākhyātatte ikārantānekassaradhātuto saha apaccayena niccaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3319_4: kattari dhātūhi apaccayena saddhiṃniyatavasena niggahītāgamanaṃ rudhādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3319_5: sāmaññalakkhaṇavasena, visesalakkhaṇavasena pana ākhyātatte kattari dhātūhi ivaṇṇekārokārapaccayehi
anya-e0804n0:3319_6: saddhiṃ niyatavasena niggahītāgamanañca nāmakatte aniyatavasena niggahītāgamanamattañca
anya-e0804n0:3319_7: rudhādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Kattari dhātūhi ādesalābhālābhino yapaccayassa parabhāvo divādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3319_8: Kattari dhātūhi yathārahaṃ ṇu ṇā uṇāpaccayānaṃ parabhāvo svādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Kattari
anya-e0804n0:3319_9: dhātūhi nāpaccayassa parabhāvo kiyādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Kattari dhātūhi ākhyātatte appakatarappayogavasena
anya-e0804n0:3319_10: nāmikatte pacurappayogavasena ppaṇhāpaccayānaṃ parabhāvo gahādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Kattari
anya-e0804n0:3319_11: dhātūhi yathāsambhavaṃ oyirappaccayānaṃ parabhāvo tanādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Ākhyātatte
anya-e0804n0:3319_12: kattari dhātūhi sabbathā ṇeṇayappaccayānaṃ parabhāvo curādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇavasena,
anya-e0804n0:3319_13: visesalakkhaṇavasena pana ākhyātatte ikārantadhātuto saha ṇe ṇayapaccayehi niccaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3320: Kāritapaccayassa yoge “ṇe ṇayo ṇāpe ṇāpayo cā”ti ime cattāro kāritapaccayā.
anya-e0804n0:3325: Tatra sāveti, sāvayati. Bhāveti, bhāvayati, obhāseti, obhāsayati. Imāni kārite uvaṇṇantadhāturūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:3326: Dāpeti, dāpayati. Hāpeti, hāpayati. Nhāpeti, nhāpayati. Nahāpeti, nahāpayati. Ākārantadhāturūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:3327: Soseti, sosayati. Sosāpeti, sosāpayati. Ghosāpeti, ghosāpayati. Akārantadhāturupāni.
anya-e0804n0:3328_0: Maggo saṃsārato lokaṃ ñāpeti, ñāpayati. Idhāturūpāni niggacchāpetīti etesamattho.
anya-e0804n0:3328_1: Imāni hi nipubbāya idhātuyā vasena sambhūtāni hetukatturūpāni. Tathā hi suddhakattubhāvena
anya-e0804n0:3328_2: maggo sayaṃ ñāyati, saṃsārato niggacchatīti ñāyoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:3329_0: Pāveti, pāvayati, udhāturūpāni. Vadāpetīti etesamattho. Imāni hi papubbāya udhātuyā
anya-e0804n0:3329_1: vasena sambhūtāni hetukatturūpāni. Tathā hi “yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāvā”ti suddhakattupadaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3330: Khepeti, khepayati. Kaṅkheti, kaṅkhayati, kaṅkhāpeti, kaṅkhāpayati. Ācikkhāpeti, ācikkhāpayati. Ivaṇṇantadhāturūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:3333_0: Pabbatāyāyati, puttiyāyati. Adhātunissitāni rūpāni. Iminā nayena sesāni avuttānipi
anya-e0804n0:3333_1: rūpāni sakkā viññātuṃ viññunā pāḷinayaññunāti vitthāro na dassito. Iti kāritapaccayayogo
anya-e0804n0:3335: Akammakā ekakammā, dvikammā vāpi honti hi;
anya-e0804n0:3337: Sayaṃ sodheti so bhūmiṃ, sodhāpeti paremahiṃ;
anya-e0804n0:3338: Naraṃ kammaṃ kārayati, viññeyyaṃ kamato idaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3344_0: Idāni ūhanīyarūpagaṇaṃ brūma – hoti, bhoti, sambhoti, idaṃ bhūvādirūpaṃ. Sumbhoti,
anya-e0804n0:3344_1: parisumbhoti, idaṃ rudhādigūpaṃ. Nindati, vinindati, bandhati, idaṃ bhūvādirūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3344_2: Chindati, bhindati, rundhati, idaṃ rudhādirūpaṃ. Deti, neti, vadeti, anveti, idaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3344_3: bhūvādirūpaṃ. Rundheti, paṭirundheti, idaṃ rudhādirūpaṃ. Buddheti, palibuddheti,
anya-e0804n0:3344_4: idaṃ curādirūpaṃ. Jayati, sayati, palāyati, milāyati, gāyati, idaṃ bhūvādirūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3344_5: Hāyati, sāyati, nhāyati, idaṃ divādirūpaṃ. Kathayati, cintayati, bhājayati, idaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3344_6: curādirūpaṃ. Gabbati, pagabbati, idaṃ bhūvādirūpaṃ. Kubbati, krubbati, idaṃ tanādirūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3344_7: Hinoti, cinoti, idaṃ svādirūpaṃ. Tanoti, sanoti, karoti, idaṃ tanādirūpaṃ. Cinteti,
anya-e0804n0:3344_8: cintayati, idaṃ katturūpañceva hetukatturūpañca. Kanteti, kantayati, idaṃ hetukatturūpameva.
anya-e0804n0:3344_9: Bhakkheti, bhakkhayati, vādeti, vādayati, idaṃ suddhakatturūpañceva hetukatturūpañca.
anya-e0804n0:3344_10: Miyyatīti kattupadañceva kammapadañca. Bhāvethāti bahuvacanañceva ekavacanañca. Saṃyamissanti
anya-e0804n0:3344_11: anāgatavacanañceva atītavacanañca. Anusāsatīti ākhyātañceva nāmikañca. Gacchaṃ vidhamaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3344_12: nikkhaṇanti nāmikañceva ākhyātañca. Ettha ākhyātatte gacchanti anāgatavacanaṃ, vidhamanti
anya-e0804n0:3344_13: atītavacanaṃ, nikhaṇanti parikappavacanaṃ, sabbaṃ vā etaṃ padaṃ anāgatādhivacanantipi
anya-e0804n0:3344_14: vattuṃ vaṭṭateva. Iminā nayena aññānipi ūhanīyapadāni nānappakārato yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:3344_15: Imāni padāni dubbiññeyyavisesāni mandabuddhīnaṃ sammohakarāni ācariyapācariye payirupāsitvā
anya-e0804n0:3345_0: Idāni ekagaṇikādīni vadāma – dhā dhāraṇe, bhūvādigaṇikavasenāyaṃ ekagaṇikā sakammikā
anya-e0804n0:3345_1: dhātu. Bhagavā sakalalokassa hitaṃ dadhāti vidadhāti, puriso atthaṃ saṃvidheti, nidhiṃ
anya-e0804n0:3345_2: nidheti, imāni suddhakattari bhavanti. “Saṃvidhāpeti, vidhāpetī”ti imāni hetukattari
anya-e0804n0:3345_3: bhavanti. Kamme pana bhāve ca “anuvidhīyatī”tiādīni bhavanti. Tathā hi kamme “nidhi
anya-e0804n0:3345_4: nāma nidhīyatī”ti ca “dhīyati dhapiyatīti dheyya”nti ca rūpāni dissanti. Tattha kamme
anya-e0804n0:3345_5: “kammaṃ sattehi anuvidhiyyati, kammāni sattehi anuvidhiyyanti. Bho kamma tvaṃ sattehi
anya-e0804n0:3345_6: anuvidhiyyasi, ahaṃ kammaṃ sattehi anuvidhiyyāmī”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Bhāve pana “satto
anya-e0804n0:3345_7: dukkhaṃ anuvidhiyyati, sattā dukkhaṃ anuvidhiyyanti, to satta tvaṃ dukkhaṃ anuvidhiyyasī”ti
anya-e0804n0:3345_8: yojetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo ativiya sukhumo pāḷinayānukūlo.
anya-e0804n0:3346_0: Nāmikapadatte “dhātū”tiādīni bhavanti. Tattha dhātūti salakkhaṇaṃ dadhāti dhāretīti
anya-e0804n0:3346_1: dhātu. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana “salakkhaṇadhāraṇato dukkhavidhānato dukkhadhānato ca dhātū”ti
anya-e0804n0:3346_2: vuttaṃ. Dhātūti pathavīdhātādidhātuyo. Tattha salakkhaṇadhāraṇatoti yathā titthiyaparikappito
anya-e0804n0:3346_3: pakati attāti evamādiko sabhāvato natthi, na evametā, etā pana salakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3346_4: dhārentīti dhātuyo. Dukkhavidhānatoti dukkhassa vidahanato. Etā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena
anya-e0804n0:3346_5: vavatthitā hutvā yathā ayalohādidhātuyo ayalohādianekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti.
anya-e0804n0:3346_6: Dukkhadhānatoti anappakassa dukkhassa vidhānamattato avasavattanato, taṃ vā dukkhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3346_7: etāhi kāraṇabhūtāhi sattehi anuvidhīyati, tathāvihitañca taṃ etesveva dhīyati ṭhapiyati,
anya-e0804n0:3346_8: evaṃ dukkhadhānato dhātuyo. Apica nijjīvaṭṭho dhātavoti gahetabbaṃ. Tathā hi bhagavā
anya-e0804n0:3346_9: “cha dhātuyosaṃ bhikkhu puriso”tiādīsu jīvasaññāsamūhanatthaṃ dhātudesanaṃ akāsīti.
anya-e0804n0:3346_10: Yo pana tattha amhehi bhāvaṭṭhāne “satto dukkhaṃ anuvidhiyyatī”ti tipurisamaṇḍito
anya-e0804n0:3349_0: “Mātā hi tava irandhati, vidhurassa hadayaṃ dhaniyyatī”ti ca “te saṃkilesikā dhammā
anya-e0804n0:3349_1: pahīyissantī”ti ca imāsaṃ pāḷīnaṃ vasena sārato paccetabbo. Tattha paṇḍavo nāma asso
anya-e0804n0:3349_2: giridattanāmakassa assagopakassa pakatiṃ anuvidhiyyati anukarotīti attho. Ettha ca
anya-e0804n0:3349_3: yadi kattupadaṃ icchitaṃ siyā, “anuvidadhātī”ti pāḷi vattabbā siyā. Yadi kammapadaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3349_4: icchitaṃ siyā, “paṇḍavenā”ti tatiyantaṃ kattupadaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, evaṃ avacanena
anya-e0804n0:3349_5: “anuvidhiyyatī”ti idaṃ bhāvapadanti siddhaṃ. Na kenaci ettha vattuṃ sakkā “divādigaṇe
anya-e0804n0:3349_6: kattari vihitayapaccayassa vasena vuttaṃ idaṃ rūpa”nti, dhādhātuyā divādigaṇe appavattanato,
anya-e0804n0:3349_7: ekantabhūvādigaṇikattā ca. Dutiyappayoge pana yadi kattupadaṃ icchitaṃ siyā, “dhanute”ti
anya-e0804n0:3349_8: pāḷi vattabbā siyā. Yadi kammapadaṃ icchitaṃ siyā, “dhātuyā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā. Evaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3349_9: avacanena “dhaniyyatī”ti idampi bhāvapadanti siddhaṃ. Ettha “dhaniyyatīti pattheti,
anya-e0804n0:3349_10: icchatīti attho”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Dhanu yācane”ti dhātu esā ekantena tanādigaṇeyeva
anya-e0804n0:3349_11: vattati. Tatiyappayoge “pahīyissantī”ti yadi bhūvādigaṇe “hā cāge”ti dhātuyā rūpaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3349_12: siyā, kattari “pajahissantī”ti rūpaṃ siyā, “kasmā no pajahissatī”ti ettha viya. Kammapadaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3349_13: pana “pajahiyissantī”ti siyā. Yasmā “pahīyissantī”ti idaṃ divādigaṇe “hā parihāniya”nti
anya-e0804n0:3349_14: dhātuyā rūpattā “pahāyissantī”ti kattupadarūpaṃ siyā “ājañño kurute vegaṃ, hāyanti
anya-e0804n0:3349_15: tattha vaḷavā”ti akammakassa kattupadarūpassa dassanato, tasmā “pahāyissantī”ti avatvā
anya-e0804n0:3350_0: Keci panettha vadeyyuṃ “so pahīyissati. Te saṃkilesikā dhammā pahīyissanti. Rūpaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3350_1: vibhaviyyati. Aggijāhi pubbeva bhūyate’tiādīsu yapaccayo kammeyeva vihito, na bhāve.
anya-e0804n0:3350_2: Kammakattuvasena hi ime payogā daṭṭhabbā, sayameva pīyate pānīyaṃ, sayameva kaṭo
anya-e0804n0:3350_3: kariyateti payogā viyā”ti. Taṃ na, evañhi sati “pajahiyissantī”tiādīni sakammakadhāturūpāni
anya-e0804n0:3350_4: vattabbāni “pīyate kariyate”ti rūpāni viya. Ettha pana bhāvaṭṭhāne kattuno ṭhitabhāvo
anya-e0804n0:3350_5: heṭṭhā nānappakārena dassitoti na vutto. Ye saddasatthe mataṃ gahetvā sāsanikā garū
anya-e0804n0:3350_6: bhāve adabbavuttino bhāvassekattā ekavacanameva, tañca paṭhamapurisasseva “bhūyate
anya-e0804n0:3350_7: devadattena devadattena sampattiṃ anubhavananti attho”ti payogañca tadatthayojanañca
anya-e0804n0:3350_8: vadanti. Tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ pāḷiyā, aṭṭhakathādīhi ca na sameti, tasmā yathāvuttoyevattho
anya-e0804n0:3351_0: Jara roge. Jarati, jariyyati. Jaravayohāniyaṃ. Jīrati, jiyyati. Imā dvepi bhūvādi
anya-e0804n0:3351_1: gaṇikavasena ekagaṇikā. Tāsaṃ ayaṃ sādhāraṇarūpavibhāvanā. “Yena ca santappati, yena
anya-e0804n0:3351_2: ca jariyyatī”tiādi. Tattha yena ca jariyyatīti yena tejogatena kupitena ayaṃ kāyo
anya-e0804n0:3351_3: ekāhikādijararogena jariyyati jarati. Atha vā yena ca jariyati yena ayaṃ kāyo jīrati
anya-e0804n0:3352_0: Mara pāṇacāge. Bhūvādigaṇikoyaṃ akammako ca. Satto marati, miyyati. Kiñcāpi ayaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3352_1: dhātu “mara pāṇacāge”ti vacanato sakammako viya dissati, tathāpi “putto marati. Kicchaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3352_2: vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jiyyati ca miyyati cā”ti evamādīnaṃ kammarahitappayogānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3352_3: dassanato akammakoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atthayojanānayena pana maratīti pāṇaṃ cajatīti
anya-e0804n0:3352_4: kammaṃ ānetvā kathetuṃ labbhati. “Marati, miyatī”ti imāni suddhakattupadāni, “satto
anya-e0804n0:3352_5: sattaṃ māreti, mārayati, mārāpeti, mārāpayatī”ti imāni kāritapadasaṅkhātāni hetukattupadāni.
anya-e0804n0:3352_6: Ettha ca yo amataṃ sattaṃ maraṇaṃ pāpeti, so vadhako māreti mārayati mārāpeti mārāpayatīti
anya-e0804n0:3352_7: ca vuccati. Satto sattehi māriyati mārāpiyatīti imāni kammapadāni. Bhāvapadamappasiddhaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3352_8: Evamaññatrāpi pasiddhatā ca appasiddhatā ca upaparikkhitabbā.
anya-e0804n0:3353_0: Khāda bhakkhaṇe. Ayaṃ pana bhūvādigaṇikavasena ekagaṇiko sakammako dhātu. Khādati,
anya-e0804n0:3353_1: saṅkhādati, imāni suddhakattupadāni. Puriso purisena purisaṃ vā pūvaṃ khādeti khādayati
anya-e0804n0:3353_2: khādāpeti khādāpayati, imāni hetukattupadāni. Ettha ca yo akhādantaṃ khādantaṃ vā
anya-e0804n0:3353_3: khādāhīti payojeti, so khādāpako khādeti khādayati khādāpeti khādāpayatīti ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:3353_4: Khajjati, saṃkhajjati, saṅkhādiyati. Imāni kammapadāni. Atrapanāyaṃ pāḷi “atītaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3353_5: pāhaṃ addhānaṃ rūpena khajjiṃ, seyyathāpāhaṃ etarahi paccuppannena rūpena khajjāmi.
anya-e0804n0:3353_6: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṃ rūpaṃ abhinandeyyaṃ, anāgatenapāhaṃ rūpena khajjeyyaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:3353_7: seyyathāpetarahi khajjāmī”ti. Bhāvapadaṃ na labbhati sakammakattā imassa dhātussa.
anya-e0804n0:3354: Divādigaṇe tā pālane. Lokaṃ tāyati santāyati. Imāni sakammakāni suddhakattupadāni. Hetukattupadaṃ pana kammapadañca bhāvapadañca appasiddhāni.
anya-e0804n0:3355_0: Sudha saṃsuddhiyaṃ. Cittaṃ sujjhati visujjhati. Imāni akammakāni suddhakattupadāni.
anya-e0804n0:3355_1: Sodheti, sodhayati, sodhāpeti, sodhāpayati, imāni hetukatturūpāni. Ettha ca yo asuddhaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3355_2: ṭhānaṃ suddhaṃ karoti, so sodhako sodheti, sodhayatīti vuccati, esa nayo aññatrāpi
anya-e0804n0:3355_3: īdisesu ṭhānesu. Yo pana asuddhaṭṭhānaṃ sayaṃ asodhetvā “tvaṃ sodhehī”ti aññaṃ payojeti,
anya-e0804n0:3355_4: so sodhāpako sodhāpeti sodhāpayatīti vuccati. Esa nayo aññatrāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu.
anya-e0804n0:3355_5: Tathā hi “kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārāpayatī”tiādīsu ayaṃ nayo na labbhati, evaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3355_6: labbhamānanayo ca alabbhamānanayo ca sabbattha upaparikkhitabbo. Imā panettha pāḷiyo –
anya-e0804n0:3357: Tassa āgamanaṃ maggaṃ, sodhenti tuṭṭhamānasā”ti ca
anya-e0804n0:3358_0: “Maggaṃ sodhemahaṃ tadā”ti ca. Imā hi pāḷiyo sahatthā sodhanaṃ sandhāya vuttā. “Āyasmā
anya-e0804n0:3358_1: pilindavaccho rājagahe pabbhāraṃ sodhāpeti leṇaṃ kattukāmo”ti pana pāḷi, “kiṃ bhante
anya-e0804n0:3358_2: thero kārāpetī”ti, “pabbhāraṃ mahārāja sodhāpemi leṇaṃ kattakāmo”ti ca pāḷi. Imā
anya-e0804n0:3358_3: parehi sodhāpanaṃ sandhāya vuttā. “Kassa sodhiyati maggo”ti idaṃ kammapadaṃ, bhāvapadaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3358_4: pana appasiddhaṃ. Iminā nayena yāva curādigaṇā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3359_0: Dvigaṇikatte subha sobhe. Sobhati vatāyaṃ puriso. Subha pahāre. Yo no gāvova sumbhati
anya-e0804n0:3359_1: sumbhoti iccapi dissati. “Sumbhotī”ti ca kaccāyanamate rūpaṃ, imāni kattupadāni.
anya-e0804n0:3359_2: Nagaraṃ sobheti, sobhayati. Puriso purise coraṃ sumbheti, sumbhayati, sumbhāpeti,
anya-e0804n0:3360: Paca pāke. Puriso bhattaṃ pacati. Nerayiko niraye paccati. Kammaṃ paccati. Bhattaṃ paccati. Pāramiyo paripaccanti. Phalāni paripaccanti, pakkāni hontīti attho. Garavo pana –
anya-e0804n0:3362: Pacchā paccati pākānaṃ, pavatte aṭṭhake duveti ca –
anya-e0804n0:3363_0: “Asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhāra-vipākāni na paccatī”ti ca evaṃ pacatipadassa dvigaṇikarūpassa
anya-e0804n0:3363_1: sakammakattaṃ icchanti. Evaṃ pana sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane kuto labbhā.
anya-e0804n0:3363_2: Tepiṭake hi buddhavacane “kappaṃ nirayamhi paccati. Yāva pāpaṃ na paccati. Nirayamhi
anya-e0804n0:3363_3: apacci so”ti evaṃ akammakattaṃyeva dissati. Ettha vadeyyuṃ “nanu paca pāke’ti ayaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3363_4: dhātu sakammako, tena ‘paccatī’ti padassa divādigaṇikarūpassapi sato sakammakattaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3363_5: yujjati, tasmāyeva ‘paccati pākānaṃ pavatte aṭṭhake duve’tiādīsu vutta”nti. Ettha
anya-e0804n0:3363_6: vuccate – yathā “chidi dvidhākaraṇe, bhidi vidāraṇe”ti dhātūnaṃ rudhādigaṇe pavattānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3363_7: “rukkhaṃ chindati, bhittiṃ bhindatī”ti rūpapadānaṃ sakammakattepi sati divādigaṇaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3363_8: pattānaṃ tesaṃ dhātūnaṃ “udakaṃ chijjati, ghaṭo bhijjatī”ti rūpapadāni akammakāniyeva
anya-e0804n0:3363_9: bhavanti, yathā bhūvādigaṇe pavattassa pacadhātussa “bhattaṃ pacatī”ti rūpapadassa
anya-e0804n0:3363_10: sakammakattepi sati divādigaṇaṃ pattassa “niraye paccati, kammāni vipaccantī”ti rūpapadāni
anya-e0804n0:3364_0: Athāpi vadeyyuṃ “nanu ca bho yathā ‘āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsū’ti ettha “āsavato
anya-e0804n0:3364_1: cittāni vimucciṃsū’ti ca ‘āsavehi kattubhūtehi cittāni vimucciṃsū’ti ca evaṃ divādigaṇikassa
anya-e0804n0:3364_2: dhātussa ‘vimucciṃsū’ti rūpapadassa akammakattañca sakammakattañca bhavati, tathā
anya-e0804n0:3364_3: ‘niraye paccati, kammāni vipaccantī’ti ca akammakattenapi bhavitabbaṃ. ‘Paccati pākānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3364_4: pavatte aṭṭhake duve, asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhāravipākāni na paccatī’ti sakammakattenapi
anya-e0804n0:3364_5: bhavitabba”nti. Akammakatteneva bhavitabbaṃ, na sakammakattena, “paccati pākāna”ntiādinā
anya-e0804n0:3364_6: vuttappayogānaṃ “āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsū”ti payogena asamānattā. Tathā hettha
anya-e0804n0:3364_11: kattukārakavācakaṃ bhavati. “Cittānī”ti paccattavacanaṃ pana kammakārakavācakaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:3364_12: Ayaṃ nayo “paccati pākāna”ntiādinā vuttappayogesu na labbhati. Tathā hi tattha paccattavacanaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3364_13: kattāraṃ vadati, upayogavacanaṃ kammaṃ vadatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kārite “puriso purisena
anya-e0804n0:3364_14: purisaṃ vā bhattaṃ pāceti pācayati pācāpeti pācāpayatī”ti ca, “anante bodhisambhāre,
anya-e0804n0:3364_15: paripācesi nāyako”ti dassanato pana “paripāceti, paripācayatī”ti ca rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:3364_16: Imāni hetukattupadāni. Kamme – yaññadattena odano paccate, bhāvapadaṃ appasiddhaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3364_17: Imāni bhūvādidivādigaṇikarūpāni. Iminā nayena aññānipi dvigaṇikarūpāni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:3365_0: Tegaṇikatte su pasave. Hetuphalaṃ savati, pasavati. Su savane. Saddho dhammaṃ suṇoti,
anya-e0804n0:3365_1: suṇāti. Su hiṃsāyaṃ. Yodho paccāmittaṃ sunāti. Imāni yathākkamaṃ bhūvādisvādikiyādigaṇikāni
anya-e0804n0:3365_2: kattupadāni. Tathā hetunā phalaṃ saviyyati, unnādasaddo pathavīundriyasaddo viya
anya-e0804n0:3365_3: suyyati. Yodhena paccamitto suniyyati. Imāni kammapadāni. Bhāvapadaṃ na labbhati
anya-e0804n0:3365_4: sakammakattā imesaṃ dhātūnaṃ. Iminā nayena aññānipi tegaṇikarūpāni upaparikkhitvā
anya-e0804n0:3370: Iccevaṃ saṅkhepato yathārahaṃ ekagaṇikadvigaṇikategaṇikavasena suddhakattuhetukattukammabhāvapadāni ca sakāritekakammāni ca sakāritadvikammāni ca sakāritatikammāni ca dassitāni.
anya-e0804n0:3371_0: Idāni ekakāritadvikāritapadānaṃ vacanokāso anuppatto, tasmā taṃ vadāma. So antakammani.
anya-e0804n0:3371_1: Arahattamaggo mānaṃ siyati, kammaṃ pariyosiyati. Imāni tāva suddhakattupadāni. Ettha
anya-e0804n0:3371_2: mānaṃ siyatīti mānaṃ samucchindati. Kammaṃ pariyosiyatīti kammaṃ nipphajjati. Pari
anya-e0804n0:3371_3: ava iccupasaggavasena hi idaṃ padaṃ akammakaṃ bhavati, attho pana “pariyosānaṃ gacchatī”ti
anya-e0804n0:3371_4: sakammakavasena gahetabbo. Attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti. Idamekaṃ kāritaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3371_5: hetukattupadaṃ. Ettha pana pariava iccupasaggavasena akammakabhūtassa sodhātussa
anya-e0804n0:3371_6: laddhakāritapaccayattā ekakammameva sakāritapadaṃ bhavati. Attanā vippakataṃ parehi
anya-e0804n0:3371_7: pariyosāvāpeti. Idaṃ dvikāritaṃ hetukattupadaṃ. Ettha ca pana pari ava iccupasaggavasena
anya-e0804n0:3371_9: bhavati. “Pariyosāvāpetī”ti idampi pari ava pubbasmā sodhātumhā ṇāpe ṇāpe iti paccayadvayaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3371_10: katvā avasaddassokārañca katvā tato yakārāgamañca anubandhaṇakāralopañca paṭhamapaccaye
anya-e0804n0:3371_11: pakārassa vakārañca dvīsu ca ṭhānesu pubbasaralopaṃ katvā nipphajjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3372_0: Idāni tā pāḷiyo atthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ āhaccadesitākārena ekato kathayāma – “attanā
anya-e0804n0:3372_1: vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa. Attanā vippakataṃ parehi
anya-e0804n0:3372_2: pariyosāvāpeti, āpatti saṅghādisesassā”ti ettha “bhikkhū”ti hetukattupadaṃ ānetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3372_3: Attanā vippakatanti ettha ca attanāti vippakaraṇakriyāya kattukārakavācakaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3372_4: Vippakatanti kammakārakavācakaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Attanā pariyosāpetīti ettha pana
anya-e0804n0:3372_5: attanāti abyayapadabhūtena sayaṃsaddena samānatthaṃ vibhatyantapatirūpakaṃ abyayapadaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:3372_6: sayaṃsaddasadisaṃ vā tatiyāvibhatyantaṃ abyayapadaṃ. Tathā hi “attanā pariyosāpetī”ti
anya-e0804n0:3372_7: vuttavacanassa “sayaṃ pariyosāpetī”ti attho bhavati “attanā ca pāṇātipātī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:3372_8: viya. Parehi pariyosāvāpetīti ettha pana parehīti kammakārakavācakaṃ karaṇavacananti
anya-e0804n0:3372_9: gahetabbaṃ, “sunakhehipi khādāpentī”ti ettha “sunakhehī”ti padaṃ viya. Ettha hi yathā
anya-e0804n0:3372_10: “rājāno coraṃ sunakhe khādāpentī”ti upayogavasena attho bhavati, tathā “bhikkhu attanā
anya-e0804n0:3372_11: vippakataṃ pare jane pariyosāvāpetī”ti upayogavasena attho bhavati. Evaṃ imasmiṃ
anya-e0804n0:3372_13: sārato paccetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo sukhumo sāsane ādaraṃ katvā āyasmantehi sādhukaṃ manasi
anya-e0804n0:3372_14: kātabbo. Yassa hi atthāya idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ karimha, na ayaṃ attano mati, atha kho pubbācariyānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3373: Idāni akāritadvikammikapadānaṃ vacanokāso anuppatto, tasmā tāni kathayāma, tāni ca kho dhātuvasena evaṃ veditabbāni savinicchayāni. Seyyathidaṃ?
anya-e0804n0:3376: Rudhi ji cipabhutīti, ye te dvikammakā dhīrā;
anya-e0804n0:3380: Ete duhādayo dhātū, tikammāpi bhavanti tu;
anya-e0804n0:3382_0: Tatrimāni udāharaṇāni – gavaṃ payo duhati gopālako. Gāviṃ khīraṃ duhati gopāladārako.
anya-e0804n0:3382_1: Tattha payoti upayogavacanaṃ, “yaso laddhā na majjeyyā”ti ettha “yaso”ti padamiva.
anya-e0804n0:3382_2: Manogaṇikassa hi īdisampi upayogavacanaṃ hoti aññādisampi. Issaro gopālaṃ gavaṃ payo
anya-e0804n0:3382_3: duhāpeti. Gopālena gāvo khīraṃ duhitā. Gohi payo duhatīti ettha apādānavisayattā
anya-e0804n0:3382_4: dvikammakabhāvo natthi. “Visāṇato gavaṃ duhaṃ, yattha khīraṃ na vindatī”ti ettha
anya-e0804n0:3382_5: pana apādānavisayattepi gavāvayavabhūtassa visāṇassa visuṃ gahitattā “gavaṃ khīraṃ
anya-e0804n0:3382_6: duhanto”ti dvikammikabhāvo labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Duhino payogoyaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3383_0: Karotissa payoge kaṭṭhamaṅgāraṃ karoti, suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakaṃ karoti, sace je saccaṃ bhaṇasi,
anya-e0804n0:3383_1: adāsiṃ taṃ karomi. Ettha ca aṅgāraṃ karotīti pariccattakāraṇavasena vuttaṃ. Kaṭṭhañhi
anya-e0804n0:3383_2: aṅgārabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ, aṅgāre kate kāraṇabhūtassa kaṭṭhassa kaṭṭhabhāvo vigacchati.
anya-e0804n0:3383_3: Kaṭakaṃ karotīti idaṃ apariccattakāraṇavasena vuttaṃ. Suvaṇṇañhi kaṭakabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0804n0:3383_4: kaṭake katepi kārakabhūtassa suvaṇṇassa suvaṇṇabhāvo na vigacchati, atha kho visesantaruppattibhāvena
anya-e0804n0:3383_5: sampajjati. Adāsiṃ taṃ karomīti idaṃ pana ṭhānantaradānavasena vuttaṃ “uparājaṃ mahārājaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3383_6: karomī”ti ettha viya. Tattha “issaro purisena purisaṃ vā kaṭṭhamaṅgāraṃ kāreti. Tathā
anya-e0804n0:3383_7: suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakaṃ kāretī”ti tikammikappayogopi daṭṭhabbo. Tathā “brahmadatto rajjaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3384_0: Ettheke vadeyyuṃ “nanu ca bho ettha ekameva kammaṃ dissati, kenāyaṃ payogo dvikammikappayogo
anya-e0804n0:3384_1: hotī”ti. Kiñcāpi ekameva dissati, tathāpi atthato dveyeva kammāni dissantīti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3384_2: Tathā hi brahmadatto rajjaṃ kāretīti ettha brahmadatto attano rājabhāvaṃ mahājanena
anya-e0804n0:3384_3: kārayatīti attho. Evaṃ pana atthe gahite “rajjaṃ kārehi bhaddante, kiṃ araññe karissasī”tiādīsupi
anya-e0804n0:3384_4: tvaṃ attano rājabhāvaṃ amhehi kārāpehi, attānaṃ rajje abhisiñcāpehi, mayaṃ taṃ rajje
anya-e0804n0:3385_0: Brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārenteti etthāpi brahmadatte attano rājabhāvaṃ mahājanena kārayanteti
anya-e0804n0:3385_1: attho bhavati. Sāsanasmiñhi kāritavisaye karaṇavacanaṃ upayogatthaññeva dīpeti, tasmā
anya-e0804n0:3385_2: atthato dveyeva kammani dissantīti vadāma. Ayamattho abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ cakkhundriyādinibbacanatthavibhāvanāya
anya-e0804n0:3385_3: dīpetabbo. Tathā hi abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ “cakkhudvāre indattaṃ kāretīti
anya-e0804n0:3385_4: cakkhudvārabhāve taṃdvārikehi attano indabhāvaṃ paramissarabhāvaṃ kārayatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:3385_5: Tañhi te rūpaggahaṇe attānaṃ anuvatteti, te ca taṃ anuvattantī”ti. Yadi pana karadhātu
anya-e0804n0:3385_6: dvikammako, evaṃ sante “brahmadatto rajjaṃ kāretī”tiādīsu laddhakāritapaccayattā
anya-e0804n0:3385_7: “kāretī”tiādīhi padehi tikammakehiyeva bhavitabbanti? Na, niyamābhāvato, tādisassa
anya-e0804n0:3386_0: Kaṭṭhaṃ purisena aṅgāraṃ kataṃ. Suvaṇṇaṃ kammārena kaṭakaṃ kataṃ, dāsī sāmikena adāsiṃ
anya-e0804n0:3386_1: katā, evampettha dvikammakappayogā veditabbā. Suvaṇṇena kaṭakaṃ karotīti ettha hi
anya-e0804n0:3386_2: visesanatthe pavattakaraṇavisayattā dvikammikabhāvo na labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3386_3: nayo aññatrāpi upaparikkhitvā yathāsambhavaṃ netabbo. Karotissa payogoyaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3387_0: Vahiādīnaṃ payoge rājapurisā rathaṃ gāmaṃ vahanti. Ayaṃ rājā maṃ nāmaṃ pucchati.
anya-e0804n0:3387_1: Parābhavantaṃ purisaṃ, mayaṃ pucchāma gotamaṃ. Āyasmā upāli āyasmatā mahākassapena
anya-e0804n0:3387_2: vinayaṃ puṭṭho. Devadatto rājānaṃ kambalaṃ yācati. Te maṃ asse ayācisuṃ. Dhanaṃ taṃ
anya-e0804n0:3387_3: tāta yācati. Brāhmaṇo nāgaṃ maṇiṃ yācati. Nāgo maṇiṃ yācito brāhmaṇena brahmunā āyācito
anya-e0804n0:3387_4: dhammadesanaṃ bhagavā. Tāpaso kulaṃ bhojanaṃ bhikkhati. Ajaṃ gāmaṃ neti. Ajo gāmaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3387_5: nīto. Mutto campeyyako nāgo, rājānaṃ etadabravi.
anya-e0804n0:3388_0: Ettha rājānanti mukhyato kammaṃ vuttaṃ. Etanti guṇato. Tathā rājānanti akathitakammaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3388_1: vuttaṃ. Etanti kathitakammaṃ. Esa nayo aññatrāpi upaparikkhitvā yathārahaṃ yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:3388_2: Evameva “brūhi bhagavā”tiādīsu sampadānavisayattā dvikammakabhāvo na labbhati. Bhikkhu
anya-e0804n0:3388_3: mahārājānaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇati. Yaṃ maṃ bhaṇasi sārathi. Yaṃ maṃ vadati. Bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3388_4: etadavoca. Pitā puttaṃ bhāsati. Yaṃ maṃ tvaṃ anusāsasi. Sakyā kho pana ambaṭṭha rājānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3388_5: okkākaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahanti. Bhagavā bhikkhū taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ nāthati. Gāvo vajaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3388_6: rundhati gopālako. Dhutto dhuttajanaṃ dhanaṃ jināti. Ettha ca “kamanuttaraṃ ratnavaraṃ
anya-e0804n0:3388_7: jināmā”ti puṇṇakajātakapāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tatthāyamattho “mayaṃ janindā kataraṃ rājānaṃ
anya-e0804n0:3388_8: anuttaraṃ ratnavaraṃ jināmā”ti. Iṭṭhakāyo pākāraṃ cinoti vaḍḍhakī. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:3389_0: Ettha keci puccheyyuṃ “gandhakuṭiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti, buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi.
anya-e0804n0:3389_1: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretū’ti payogesu kiṃ dvikammakabhāvo labbhatī”ti? Ettha
anya-e0804n0:3389_2: vuccate – “gandhakuṭiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karotī”ti ettha na labbhati guṇaguṇīnaṃ vasena
anya-e0804n0:3389_3: gahitattā. “Buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti etthāpi na labbhati “saraṇaṃ iti gacchāmī”ti
anya-e0804n0:3389_4: itisaddalopavasena vuttattā. Tathā hi buddhanti upayogavacanaṃ. Saraṇanti paccattavacanaṃ.
anya-e0804n0:3389_5: “Buddhaṃ mama saraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ, aghassa tātā hitassa ca vidhātā”ti iminā adhippāyena
anya-e0804n0:3389_6: “bhajāmi sevāmi bujjhāmī”ti attho. “Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretū”ti ettha pana
anya-e0804n0:3389_7: dvikammakabhāvo labbhatīti vattabbo “maṃ ito paṭṭhāya upāsakaṃ dhāretū”ti atthasambhavato
anya-e0804n0:3389_8: “sakyā kho pana ambaṭṭha rājānaṃ okkākaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahantī”ti dahadhātuppayogena
anya-e0804n0:3389_9: samānattā ca, adhippāyatthato pana “maṃ ‘upāsako me aya’nti dhāretū”ti attho sambhavatīti
anya-e0804n0:3390_0: Iccevamamhehi ādito paṭṭhāya bhagavato sāsanatthaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ dhātuyo
anya-e0804n0:3390_1: ca taṃrūpāni ca tadanurūpehi nānāpadehi nānāatthehi nānānayehi ca yojetvā vibhāvitāni,
anya-e0804n0:3390_2: evaṃ vibhāventehipi amhehi tāsaṃ sarūpaparicchedo atthaparicchedo vā na sakkā sabbaso
anya-e0804n0:3390_3: vattuṃ. Tadubhayañhi ko sabbaso vattuṃ sakkhissati aññatra āgamādhigamasampannehi
anya-e0804n0:3391: Atthātisayayuttāpi, dhātū honti yato tato. Payogatonugantabbā, anekatthā hi dhātavo.
anya-e0804n0:3392: Yenekatthadharā caranti vividhā nāthassa pāṭhe vare,
anya-e0804n0:3396: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
